content: The matchmaking is unbalanced. I’ve already tried uninstalling and reinstalling the game, but the connection keeps dropping randomly. After the latest update, the game gets stuck at 75% loading and never reaches 100%. I’ve cleared the cache and force-closed the app, but the issue still happens. Meanwhile, my internet connection is very stable and fast when using other apps.

It's a great game overall, my biggest complaint is how pay to win the game can be, about 75 percent of the items in the shop are bought with money, which makes it so much easier to level up cards instantly. I don't like about paying for mobile games, so I've always been a free to play user. There's been some challenges against pay to win users, but nothing major if you manage to have good level cards

As a free to play player with 8+ years I've seen this game change and grow. All the good stuff and the bad. It's a better state now then it was a few years ago. Some things are still not balanced but things have been shaping up recently. The competitive nature of the game feels lacking with no incentive to play ranked. As of recently they changed trophyroad and ranked once more linking the two. Hitting 15000 unlocks ranked and resets at the end of the season to 12000 which is a horrible change.

Money sucker! The game is fantastic. It's highly addictive once you get the feel of it. One thing which I found annoying is when you are in battle mode and you get matched against an opponent of higher your level. It's very difficult to beat them since the health of their cards is much more. Ergo, I wish if we get matched according to king tower levels in battle instead of number of trophies. That would be a level playing field. also, gameplay sucks on mobile internet. I hope creators fix it.

This was one of my favorite games. However, the recent update (early 2025) has reduced the how much gold you can get by so much, you can't hardly advance. Gold chests that were worth 25k - 30k now only seem to give about 4 or 5k, and several other reductions. I've bought the monthly royale pass thing for quite a while. I won't buy it anymore and will likely quit playing all together. Hopefully they'll change it back!!

Three words define the actual state of the game: unrewarding, frustrating and repetitive. Right now, Clash Royale has become the most frustrating and repetitive game of all. I'm quitting the game for good because I'm sick of going against the same annoying decks over and over again. there is a lack of balance and the recent updates and new cards really sucks. The only almost fun thing about the game was the 2x2 battles, but the devs get rid of it.

After almost 7 years of playing and staying positive. The newest update just spells Pay to Win. For the past few years I always enjoyed Party mode over climbing a ladder with an unbalanced algorithm. Party mode was the only way I earn gold coins to level up to 14. You have taken that away to replace with Pay to Win Party mode. The max amount daily is capped at 1000 which is accomplished in a few rounds. You need to pay to collect double amount with a time limit. Who ask for this update?

I won't lie, Clash is a great is an amazing game to play. They now have two different gamemodes and they're both pretty fun to play. The only thing I'm not too happy about is the part where they removed the shop, the one that pretty much carried us free to play players in collecting evo's. Now we have to wait for events like this or gotta buy our way through the game.

Would be fun, which it is, if it wasn't horrible at finding wifi. Can't even go five seconds without disconnecting. Once I was in a battle and my enemy was winning and I could've defended it if this sad excuse of a game didn't boot me out. I have full bars on wifi and internet but then I go into the game and then I have like 1 bar or just none. It gets so bad that in fact, it works BETTER outside in the car... FIX YOUR STUPID GAMES, this also happens on CoC too.

This is one of the best mobile games ever made. No ads. Vertical Gameplay. You can succeed without spending money (for the most part) and most importantly the community aspect of it. but I fear that supercells inability to keep 2v2s in the game makes this app a dumpster fire. I cant enjoy playing w my friends and im forced to face 1v1s against high level players w level 14 cards for some reason. It makes 0 sense why they wouldnt just keep 2v2s in the game. Its so confusing it angers me.

Within two updates they removed both the 2v2 and the ranked mode, giving you no more option for a fair and balanced matchmaking. This makes the game unplayable if you don't put in enough money to level your troops up to what is typical for your ladder points. Every match is either a clear win or loss right from the start, since it solely depends on what levels yours and the opponent's cards have.

I’ve played Clash Royale off and on for over 8 years and it was incredible at launch with fresh cards, exciting game modes and constant updates. However recent years have been disappointing with fewer content updates and an increased focus on pay-to-win microtransactions. It feels like the game is now geared toward those willing to spend money which ruins the balance and fun for long time players. It’s sad to see such an amazing game come to this but it still has potential if it listens to us.

It's an alright game, but with each update it gets worse. They release Evo's for cards that don't need it like the Mega Knight and Pekka which genuinely takes away from the experience. At first it was just a little annoying but now it's gotten to a point that you can't play casual 2v2 or 1v1 without running into an evo pekka, evo mega knight, with a sparky placed behind it or what have you. I guess it's just a bit annoying to see Supercell encourage a playstyle that makes the game boring
This is a really great game, very fun, but it can sometimes be frustrating losing the battles, especially if you're really close to the next arena and lose your trophies.

Honestly the game is shaping up to be more and pay-to-play every update. The developers hardly listen to the community and keep adding things no one wants. They removed many ways one could reasonably progress in the game without micro transactions. My verdict is that if you have an older account with a decent amount of progress you may get something out of playing it. However, if you're considering the game as a new player I suggest you do not get into it, at least not in it's current state.

This game has always been fun. but at the same time there is numerous problems. I have experienced issues with disconnecting or glitching out. The first problem about this is if you do lag out they still count the trophy loss I see this unfair as most of the time it's not most people's fault. As the game continues on it gets frustrating as the game ignores recommendations from fans and players. Most of the time you will run into pay to wins. I don't recommend this game if you get mad easily.

Worst game! even if you have good network connection, the game got suddenly stop and restart between Matches, and the main issue is the game is not opening and stopped between 98-99% in loading screen. I got this prblm more than 1 week, even after doing all the things from uninstalling the game, restart the phone etc etc.. it is not working.. also, the game is money sucker. as a f2p player, It is next to impossible to make progression faster. Dogshit game, DON'T PLAY!

It's an awesome game, with plenty of room for leveling up, playing with friends, and progressing. Card are (mostly) balanced, and it is easy enough to learn. The 1 big problem this game has is that it can be hard to level up as a f2p, especially with all the paying people buying all these special offers and just laying waste to you. So def would recommend playing if you want a casual experience, but you may have to spend 5 dollars here and there if your impatient.

Do not play this game if you want to be free to play. The game is a never-ending treadmill of new "content" where paying players will always have an unfair advantage. Take heros for example, (something no one asked for or wants) through free to play methods unlocking them is completely rng, with a chance of getting a duplicate, and they are being added at a rate far faster than you can obtain them as f2p.

Don't bother. I've played this game on and off for quite a few years. It was very entertaining, and I enjoyed the play style but it is clear the developers are now focused on profit. The addition of evolutions certainly added an element of "pay to win". Evolutions are very difficult to collect, and the game is very clearly biased towards unlocking just a few of them. But they have now abandoned that subtle "pay to win" addition to the much more in your face Champions. Disappointed.

9 year badge. This was one of the best games I've ever played, and I still cherish the hours spent back when it was strategy based. Gave it another go after a 2 and a half year break. Like all great card games where cost to play is involved (elixir here), new mechanics or new cards costing less than their value ruining balance, destroying strategy based approach. Started with heroes and their abilities which weren't too awful compared to what it is now. Select units with abilities devalues them.

although the game mechanics and strategy is alright, they frequently add more to the game that severely limits the free to play experience, such as evolutions which take forever to get without paying for them, and the new heros, which are nearly impossible to get without spending money. Even without this, the ability to spend money to upgrade cards makes it all the more difficult to progress when you are fighting people with cards 2 levels higher. overall, this game is not free to play friendly.

great game to play with friends and overall, but when you start to play a little bit more you can see that its a extremely pay to win game, climbing feels super heavy and progress is too slow. I have been playing for some time now and the recent updates are overdriving the pay to win, increasing the level on the cards that were already very hard to get, and I didn't even start to talk about the luck based progress, since the cards you get are random and probably aren't the ones you use.

Played since launch and have always enjoyed the game which is amazing. Sadly the game is poorly managed. The over monetization is off the scale. 100% pay to win which is very sad. I consistently bought the battle pass and made purchases from the shop for years because I believe in supporting games that bring value. The excessive greed of the game management has driven off a lot of the core players and I won't be spending anything more as a result of this. Hopefully they get it together soon.

I’ve been playing this game for more than five years, and it has honestly been one of my favorite and most addictive games. For a long time, I had no complaints at all. The gameplay was fun, engaging, and always kept me coming back. However, over the past few months, things have changed. There have been a lot of updates, and unfortunately, many new items are now locked behind in-app purchases. On top of that they have serious login issue and doing the gameplay it losses the connection.

I've been playing since the beginning. It is a great game that USED TO involve a lot of strategy. The latest updates made it COMPLETELY PAY TO WIN. It does not matter how good you are anymore but rather how much money you've spent to get lvl16/champs. Almost everyone I know has uninstalled the game because of this. If you're into spending thousands of dollars to just be able to play a game and be equal to your opponents then go on and download. A small amount of money would be ok but this....

Just hit ultimate champion in this game. I had fun with it for the last 7 years. Me being a free to play player made this really hard. I thought the new update would kill the game but I found heros to add maybe more skill or at the very least new pushes to the game. Looking foward to the next season and recommend this to people with money or dedication. Lots of people like to say f2p in clash is impossible and to hit uc is unrealistic but it's very possible me doing that.

This used to be a go to entertaining game, the thrilling of live matching is still amazing. However, the recent changes have just made it a premium only game, everything demands real money, even having good levels don't make sense, collecting things like wild shards is a nightmare, getting a single card evolution is so damn difficult, cant even think of the whole deck. Hope the team does something better and give all the players a fair chance at play.

I've been playing this game every now and then for about 8 years. You will have a horrible time if you don't plan on paying a ton of money for in-game items. You want the new, ridiculously overpowered card to keep up? PAY. A few years ago, you could get a seasonal pass for 5€ which is still reasonable. Now, you have to pay 15€ a month for LESS rewards. Overall, I like the mechanics of this game, but Supercell is just a money hungry company that doesn't care about the playerbase at all.

The game is great! Except when it's not... Making the game easier for newer players is a great goal, but combining it with ZERO compensation for those who are already max level or close, while simultaneously removing one of the most important resources for late game players? A shot to the gut. It's also now more straightforward to "pay to win", with gems being able to be converted straight into cards. It makes it harder to be a casual player. Make pass $3.99, bring back books!

When I started playing clash,it was a great game. but now the game is WAY to pay to win, if you look at the shop, there are more offers then players at this point. there are also numerous cards that need to be nerfed such as mega knight boss bandit lumberloon witch ebarbs and so many more. overall the game has gone downhill since 2016 with the introduction of level 16 and hero cards. 10 years ago, I would recommend, but now not so much.

This game is extremely pay to win, which makes it unfun to play. Very often, you will encounter players with troops 2 levels higher or their King Tower's 2 levels higher, which are unbeatable 95% of the time. This leaves you with 2 options, invest money to upgrade your cards to equal the other players, or grind for weeks, possibly months to have an equal playing field. But then, once you do and start climbing, you will run into the same issue again. I wish I could write more about the game

This is actually a pretty cool game. Great way to kill a little time here and there. The reason for the low rating however is the recent changes to the game. Over the past few months I've spent far more than I should've to "upgrade" my deck but with the recent change they basically negated everything I spent. Which is fine but I will never spend another cent on this game. Overall I recommend playing but do NOT spend any money since its likely to just be wasted down the road.

not fun anymore. supercell kept removing things that rewarded a good amount of guaranteed cards or gold such as the season shop. now, everything is either RNG or P2W. now, just to get a singular card that you wanted, you have to spend several hours trying to get a card you want. Even though I don't remember it well, the chests were a better reward. You at least had an idea on what was in it. The hero update also ruined the game, as we haven't seen new evolutions in a while, which were balanced.

Very Pay to Win. If you don't spend real money on the game it will take FOREVER to level up cards. Every new update they add new ways to break the balance of the game. Progression to unlock heroes and evolutions takes lots of grinding and pure luck. Those who pay money can get them easily making the gap between p2w and f2p ginormous. The actual concept of the game is unique but due to all these problems it's kinda hard to ignore. Also, the devs don't listen to what the players want at all.

I've been off and on with this game for the past nearly 8 years, so I'd say I'm in a good position to talk. This game is so horrible now, either through it being so incredibly p2w and skill not being a factor anymore. Or its the absurd mechanic called "tilting" where the game purposely makes you lose through not putting you against the first player but rather a guaranteed loss. Another awesome thing is the devs just dont care about the player base at all. Don't play this game, its horrible.

The game doesn't revolve around strategy, just who has the higher cards level; most of basic interactions fail even with a few level difference which, in some cases, make the game nigh impossible to win. Continuously adding new evolutions and hero cards, which are barely obtainable as free to play, doesn't help either... if P2W was a game genre, this would surely be one of the top.

this is the most pay to win game I have ever seen, period. It doesn't even let you cancel out of the que. One time, I got let out of the que then got put into a game??? So obviously I lost that game. But if you face against someone over leveled it will be Extremely hard to win. And clash royale makes it really easy for someone to buy cards and gems to upgrade your cards.

The game used to be a lot of fun and a great way to pass time, but it has now devolved into a pay-to-win grind that is repitive and boring. The game itself is a lot of fun in the early stages, but it becomes incredibly stale, repitive and boring once you reach the higher arenas. Unless you're willing to spend hundreds of dollars, around Arena 18 the game becomes more "hoping" you dont run into a player that spent money to max everything out, but isn't skilled enough to climb any higher.

It was undoubtedly the best game I had ever played, capturing my heart and imagination with its immersive story and engaging mechanics that kept me coming back for more. However, over the last few years, the developers have complicated the experience significantly, introducing numerous changes and updates that have made it less enjoyable. Their primary focus seems to have shifted toward monetization, as they continually implement new features that require players to fork out additional money. It

It used to be fun, now it feels like a scam after Supercell got greedy. It takes more than a year to max out one deck, or hundreds of dollars. But that doesn't allow you to enjoy the game because you get locked into that deck. And the card and tower levels make a huge difference. They all cost a lot to upgrade. And even if you manage to get something together, Supercell will add a new level that is more costly than before. I've played for 6 years now, but it's become really disappointing.

This is my experience, I've been playing for 2 years, and throughout those 2 years, I've been decently satisfied, very addictive but frustrating, basically just gambling due to how matches are set up, it doesn't matter the card levels, it only matters if they are in the same arena as you, so you can have level 12s while someone has level 15s or 16s (has happened to me before), plus the current updates are all pay to win. Do not download this game, for your own sanity, and for the current boycott

The game can be fun and rewarding, such as playing challenges and unlocking achievements/ magic items to help you progress. However, everything that you earn through time & effort can simply be purchased with real money. You can become skilled & learn to play with your cards & decks, but alas, if your opponent has spent more money, your odds of winning are slim. Often letting the player feeling very stressed and overall a sour experience that doesnt want you to keep playing for more.

people who say its a good game are just casuals. This is a super p2w game, where you cant progress unless you pay for cards, levels and evolutions, so at some point it just stops being fun. They also seem to counter you with AI decks on purpose at some point to make sure you get stuck and lose. so to sum it up, fun at the beginning, but very quickly will become p2w, and even then it will be hard to progress

The Rise of Heroes? The Fall of Clash! Money Grab! I use to enjoy this game. I actually would spend the 11.99 a month. That was when it was worth what Super Cell was offering for upgrades to cards, and other goodies! Super Cell! You are literally killing it! The game,that is! I remember when you, the devs, actually listened to what we wanted. I don't think anyone likes this update. I think after 10 years, Clash Royale has run it's course.

Utterly disappointed with the game. I have been playing the game since release on multiple accounts. But now the game has gotten so bad, it has become a Pay 2 win. People who have bought the pass can easily upgrade their cards at a much faster rate and overpower normal users. Plus when you keep getting matched with these players, the game becomes so frustrating. Supercell, I am actually really disappointed with y'all.

The game is fun, somewhat addictive, and there's lots of variety. The matchmaking is absolute hot garbage, though. Getting paired with players who have cards 3 and 4 levels above your own is an absolute waste of time, and it's obvious that this is just a ploy to try and lure you into spending cash. Not gonna happen. And even if I entertained the idea of paying to play, the package values are insulting. Honestly, fix your game. Such wasted potential.

Don't get me wrong, I love clash royale. As a fairly new player, I took in heroes with an open mind. However, the way supercell is designing the hero boxes so you can barely get fragments, making paying for the heroes actually better value. The company is biting of more than they could chew with the addition of level 16, forcing free to play players to play against overleveled opponents. As much as I hate to say it, supercell must fix the game otherwise it will be well and truly dead.

I have been playing for 4 years and I hate how the game takes your progress away from you every new season. Example I had around 13,000 crowns. New season starts they knock me down to 10,000 crowns. When you pair up in a match its on purpose. The algorithm is set up for you to constantly loose which makes you play more. And when you pay for certain things, coins, gems or mote cards....then all of a sudden you start winning. Its literally a casino wrapped up in a battle style game.

I wrote a 4 star review in 2018. It is 2025 and had to lower my score... I played this game when it came out. Eventually I stepped away from. The game because as I said in my previous review, the game gives advantage to those who sink money into it. The recent update (Dec 2025) demonstrates the logical destruction programmers can have on a game. The trophy road that clearly distinguished the high level (maxed) players was broken. Game is unplayable right now.

game is okay, not bad, I do plan to keep playing but it is so obsurdly pay to win to the point where there's no point in playing sometimes, and there's also a bug where the events don't pop up in the game screen so I miss out in tons of free stuff and the shop and other things just never load, making it so unfair, please fix this supercell, edit: it fixed itself for about 3 days then went right back, I was about to get my free hero but now I can't because the event refuses to show, 0/10

I think if you're going to roll out "level 16" and then reduce the cost for leveling players should've been refunded. You now have players looking at it like I just wasted several hundred THOUSAND gold. You added the ability to purchase cards with gems - a direct cash grab. You've added a link to your website in the shop which was noted to avoid Google fees for purchases - more greed. Extremely disappointed in this ngl... several main name players leaving.

as a player who have been playing since the start, since the first day the game was officially released on the play store, I'm very disappointed and sad to see what this game is becoming... A lot of the updates were very cool and actually enjoyed them like the season shop and the ranked mode, even the evolutions, at first everyone was skeptical about them, same for the tower troops and the heroes,but they actually added more to the game and made more challenging. But the last update is not....

Been a player since day one. Loved that they added a new mode, Merge Tactics, but after the release of the Echo Sage, completely killed it for me. For the first time since launch, I am uninstalling the game. I was burnt out on the traditional version, so merge tactics was a nice change. But after this ones release, it breaks the game. no skill necessary to use it. no matter how big your people, getting one shot on top of it taking 3 or more of my cards out with a single hit. Unbalanced ASF.

The mechanics of this game have always been amazing. However.. the developers are so greedy that they are constantly finding new ways to make this game "pay to play." The most recent update pushes characters to a max level of 16. The players that don't care about spending money instantly max their characters while the rest have to navigate through impossible odds to make it even competitive. I used to love this game but playing it now feels like a chore. Do better, game developers.

The removal of the books has drastically slowed down F2P progression. Claiming that this made the progression system "smoother" is basically a bold-faced lie. I'm not a F2P player, but I stand firm against dishonest marketing tactics. The game itself is great; lots of content, no ads, good for quick game during breaks at work. Just dishonest marketing tactics that did not used to be here. I hope whoever is in charge takes a step back and becomes more honest with the players.

If I could give it a zero I would. I can't believe the amount of greed this company has came to. They updated it and took items I had been saving for a while to level up card and in compensation...... Some cards and some gems. These items were worth thousands of cards and I had been saving them for years, and on top of it they add a new card level right after they take the items I was going to use to level up. This was the last straw for me, its sad to see such a good game die to greed.

worst game ive ever played. The idea is great, but the matchup system is the worst matchup system ever. It purposefully matches you up against higher level opponents so you're stuck in a constant loss streak and you're forced to pay money to have a better chance at winning. It isnt about having fun anymore its all about monitary gain. trust me, dont download this game. It's good at first till it keeps matching you up against players who've payed money to gain an advantage over you. money grab.

I love the game, but as a 13 year old, I can't use the evo credit card. I hate how p2w the game has become. It has it's strong points, and it IS still fun to play, but more than 80% of the shop has to be paid for with money. Also, I wish they would LISTEN to the community. No-one asked for heroes, and NOBODY wanted level 16. It is a great game, but Supercell need to make their game less p2w.

Fun game but P2W. I've been playing for almost 10 years now if not. One thing that will never fail to amaze me, is how fast someone who pays will get cards. They release game changing updates every few months and the only way to keep up with the changes is $. If you are willing to overlook that for a fun strategy game. this is it. Just don't get invested in the climb. Person winning prolly has more max level cards.

To be honest this is the best mobile real time strategy game. Unfortunately Supercell has sold out and implemented thoughtless monetization features which make progression pointless by constantly moving the finish line. You better bet there will be a level 17, 18, 19, 20, etc. The level cap increase doesn't even come with new exciting features, it's literally the same thing but 1 level higher. TLDR; Fun to play, but don't waste your money.

Don't download. Unless you like spending hundreds of dollars to upgrade some virtual characters. The game used to be competitive, but now it's just a massive pay-to-win. The updates today (like heroes or level 16) are mainly to encourage players to buy more and more for them upgrades. And the matchmaking is practically rigged. You get paired with someone who actually has your same level or someone who spent 200$ for level 16 in the first arenas. Never reinstalling again.

I'm addicted, loving this Game . I said that in 2020, but now sometimes it's annoying. During games, the network is lost even on Wi-Fi and 5G networks. I hate this. Even in a winning match, sometimes one has to lose. I have screen recordings as well that I can share with you. Please fix it and make connectivity better. If there's a weak network, the game should not load.

Haven't played this game after the hero update. They added a new pay to win feature (that looks pixelated) without even finishing the last one (card evolutions). When you get higher up in the trophy ladder you face even more pay 2 win players. The matches are unbalanced and really unfair. The battle modes screen has been under maintenance for a long time. Don't know what's happening there. Also, play on android not PC or the game will crash.

The base concept of the game is very nice and it should have been a 10/10 game. But Supercell has ruined the entire game by removing anything and everything that might help a player play the game without spending any money. You don't get required cards when you need them, the heroes are next to impossible to obtain unless you pay up. Altogether, Supercell has succeeded in making a 10/10 game into this absolute trash of a game

A solid free to play game that has since gone downhill. The addition of evolutions impedes game balance significantly by giving paying players an advantage which coupled with the poor matchmaking (pitting players with multiple evos against those with none) toes the line of "pay to win". As a casual player, I personally don't like how progression is locked behind a competitive mode that punishes you for losing by deducting progress; the added pressure to win makes the game less enjoyable imo.

I loved this game when I first got it, but i was just clueless how much of a cash grab pay2win slop game it is. Every evo cost 12 dollars which is absurd, and champions are even worse. They have a "Pass Royale" every season which gives a broken evo and tons of rewards. Literally no one asked for champions, and they added them anyway. They are broken and stupid. I dont recommend installing. Don't waste your time and play something else

What the heck is wrong with the game lately I am playing it on my internet and even though I have a nice connection it's showing network issues and it also takes too long to login the game it's a waste of time currently to play the game.. I am seriously disappointed with this server problem supercell... Seriously I have never faced an issue like this in brawl star.

Before they added evolutions and heroes to the game it was balanced and it was more skill based. Now the game feels Pay to win because they release new heroes and evos every season with broken abilities and the season shop is most likely gone from the game and that was one of the only surefire ways to get wild shards. I would not recommend playing this p2w garbage.

the game is designed fo be highly addictive. I was able to get to 6350 trophies without purchases in 2 weeks on skill. once there the only way to climb is by paying if you d9nt want to wait to level up your cards. the issue is they release new features like evolution or hero and then people at the 6k level are addicted and are weak and then make the purchase. its a terrible thing.

Initially, it was a fun game, perfect for killing boredom. But after the sudden hype, Supercell switched on dipping a fun experience for everyone and just bagging money. They made it a pay 2 win and for those wanting to have a free plying, fun time, it's not there anymore. No way to avoid match- ups against people who emptied their dad's credit card to win. Will even go further to say they ruined the game!

the game is really good but it is becoming worse now. meanwhile now I lose 5 games out of 10. people play online games to chill but this game just makes me frustrated. I used to play a lot but now I have reduced the time. it is just a waste of time. I always lose 2 matches starting so that I need to play at least 10 matches to advance two steps. easily anyone could see this type of manipulation.

The game makes it impossible to advance after a certain point unless you pay to play. Also, the game claims it uses random match making, but its not. they intentionally pair you up against people who's decks you have a 0% chance of beating. it was a fun game in the beginning that's why they get 2 starts, but not anymore.

this is one of thw worst games in you could possibly install on your phone e or whatever its a waste of storage! They waned my acount with 5 Years of playing the game and 10k trophies and not only that the game is so long and requires an insane amount of patience (im underating the amount of patience it takes) and now I hate this game i realy do but I took time to go back to it to write a review to let you know how bad this game is and do not install it. if there was a -100 stars I would do it.

Do not play!! Game use to be fun but every war we are always teamed against teams that are multiple levels above my entire clan. Never winning these makes it boring and pointless. Clams need to be same level and same card level, not let people lose multiple battles to stay battling low level wars I tried it again and it is all random. no strategy works, it is all luck of the deal now. total bs game. not worth time

The game used to be fun but in the last 2-3 years it has gotten way too focused on Pay2Win that after a point you either grind for months and when you reach your goal it was for nothing because "balance" changes come or a new card gets released that is too op and if you dont sunk way too much money on it you wont get very far.

I used to love this game. I played f2p for years and had fun despite not being able to max cards. Then they released slash royale and lvl 14. I maxed some cards and my friends were playing. I loved it. I was even buying pass royale for $5. But they needed more money, so they added lvl 15, and now 16, increased the price of pass royale, added a more expensive version, reduced rewards, added evos, then heroes which are impossible to get. I haven't spent a dime since. lvl 1 is dead. Game is p2w

Absolutely pay to win game. Really frustrating for free to play players to keep up. Hate the greedy game developers. Spoiled a really good game by turning into money making machine. U neither can grind ranked nor play for fun as a free to play player. Don't install the game right now, me myself got fed up and had to uninstall the game I absolutely loved due to this greedy supercell

the game is pay 2 win and it keeps getting worse with every update, while the gameplay is fun, the higher you climb the more money you need to spend and you can only play one deck since if you queue up you go against the same people at the same rank as your main deck. heroes was a horrible addition, before it took 3 seasons to get one evolution but now it will take 6 months to get a hero aswell. last season i bought the battlepass but the wrong battlepass was delivered.

as a free to play player, this was a very enjoyable game for a long time. unfortunately, over time supercell has made the game harder and harder to progress as a free to play player. with the recent addition of heroes, supercell has totally forgotten about other core parts about the game. and has made it much less enjoyable, so do not get into this game.

Started playing a few months ago and since then every update and change has made the game worse, you can't progress past a certain level without spending money. Some decks are just unbeatable I would be amazed if any of the Devs actually play the game.

This might be the biggest fumble I've ever seen in gaming. Being gifted MASSIVE player counts thanks to streamers and content creators, then doing what no one asked for except the greedy people at the top. Add level 16 so people need to pay more to get better, and Hero Cards, yet another Pay to Win method. I've been with this game since it's peak in 2016 and I've never seen the fan base's morale this low and neither have I ever seen a company this GREEDY.

Absolute disgrace of a game. I downloaded this game on the very first day of release. Went from F2P to P2P in the last few months. The addition of the new gameplay features are all the horrible reasons I don't want to play anymore. Fix this game, or I am moving out to find something else.

I was a paid to play guy on this for a couple years I've been playing quite some time without the pay to play. either way all I can tell you is this if you pay attention you'll notice this game is very hard and is rigged which is what makes it hard this is literally the only game I play anymore and I'm literally thinking about just ditching it shame on the Developers for making this another Monopoly

it's a game for quick timepass but omg even when I have good network the game takes hours to load and after every match the same case I have to wait for hours to load my device is also good but still this kind of problem. I open to game for a quick relax 5-10 min time pass but the loading only take 5-10mins of my time so what the point.....plsss fix this.

I already have a 6 yrs old account in this game. The worst match making ever seen in a game. The developers don't have the sense what match making is. The maximum time the opponent is at a higher level, both in towers as well as in cards. It's like the game is trying to cheat the player by giving such opponents. Please resolve this issue. But I'm quite sure the developers will not resolve it. Generally every old player uninstalls this game due to frustration.

It's a free app. But to try and compete, u have to BUY the pass.. even when u PAY for the monthly pass, it is NOW NOT GOOD ENOUGH. There's a more expensive pass to get cards effective enough to compete. Sad cause I enjoyed playing this game, but this is ridiculous. Edited. Used to be 3star but now I vote 1star, terrible terrible on this ad for Superbowl. Y'all have lost your minds. Terrible. Do not recommend

Don't bother downloading this game, it isn't what it used to be. Super Cell is a sell out company more worried about money than a quality game, while optional without spending you are basically doomed to fail and it's insanely repetitive. New players get 0 new content, free to play get 0 new content, it's a cash grab with bad graphics and poor adaptive potential for casual players or people who want to be good without breaking the bank.

Don't get me wrong, it's a good game, but it could be better. Especially with the fact that when you're at the top of an arena, they put you against bots that can counter your every move, and suddenly your plummeting down back to the bottom. I'd also like to mention the implementation of pay to win over the years, us free to play players are overwhelmed by people with maxed out troops that are impossible to beat, even if your strategy is borderline perfect there is nothing you can do. F2p forevr

I have played since the start and the gameplay is amazing but the game is let down by the very defensive nature of the game. This has not been addressed by level adjustments. tower damage needs lowering and a attack bonus given to attacking players. Also repetitive decks are a problem that needs fixing, by higher frequency stats adjustment. Also heros are just a pay to win as it takes ages to get enough tokens for non P2P players. Clan wars 2 should be scrapped it never worked

Here it goes again when I play Merge Tactics, when I'm in the Gold III, 2700 points and trying to reach 2800 points, that's where the rigging of the game itself happens. The shuffling of cards are so random that you can't even merge a single trait or even an upgrade of your troops. If you can't do that in the early rounds, well congratulations you'll be placed in the top 3 or worse top 4 of the match and lose a lot of points. It is like Clash Royale is screwing your gameplay.

Sad to say I'll only be playing this game for merge tactics. I've chosen to not spend money on this game years ago and it shows how much it means to win by paying. There is also much too going on: evolutions, hero abilities, multiple evolutions spots for higher levels. if you aren't paying you aren't winning. Such a sad state for the game from what it once was and yet supercell takes pride in this game. Good way to waste money though, it will never be the same

Played Clash Royale for 9+ years. It was worth the years spent grinding and the amount of money spent to supplement grinding to enhance my experience because the game used to be that epic. It is no longer epic. I spend way less time on the game now, no money, and am way less passionate about it than I once was because greedy Supercell can't listen to it's loyal and involved community. With every cash grab the game gets worse and more and more long time players are leaving. Horribly disappointed!

This game is so fun and stressful and stress relieving at the same time. But two things. 1, if you're a free to play kind of guy, and you make it to arena 8 or 9, you start noticing pay to wins, still fun though, until the pay to wins become overwhelming. 2, Heros are annoying, once they drop a bunch of evos like Mega Knight, Wizard, and Witch. It's kind of hard to counter. But I like the art and how you have to collect cards to level up, many cards to choose from, and much modes to choose from.

A good game, but genuinely unplayable half the time. It says my connection is bad, does the icon thing, freezes my game so it forces me to lose the match, and magically fixes itself randomly. I do what the support thing says, and it gets even worse. My connection doesn't even seem to be the actual issue because I've played in multiple locations, connected to different types of internet. I really like the game, but I'm rage quitting often because it is just straight up is forcing me to lose.

This game doesn't respect your time or money. This is a PVP game that uses progression as a form of leveling up your battling minions. the level up is RNG. You can either grind for the levels, or you can pay to have them faster. This wouldn't be an issue if the developers didn't raise the max level every time. Because they keep moving the goal post, all your grinding/money spent (aka accomplishment) is nullified until you do it again. The dev will keep dangling the carrot in front of you forever

last 2 updates have degraded the gaming experience. you have been steadily whittling away at what was once a great game. I've been playing since the beginning but I'm enjoying it less and less with each new update. the pay to win aspect has increased with each update and decisions like level 16, removing 2v2 and the old shop and the whole heros thing have almost pushed me far enough to stop playing altogether

This game makes no sense, every time I login 1 minute later I'm in a battle and it says connection error, it's the worst thing I have ever experience in life. And the pay to win in this game makes it so hard to play when your not a kid spending money that's not yours, I played years back when heroes and evos wasn't a thing and it was fun and way more addictive, I get off every 1 to 2 games that I play bc of how crazily the game changed.

This game used to be nice and fun to play, now it's become Pay to Win BS. The Game will either pair you with an opponent that has the exact counter to your deck or you'll be paired against an opponent that spent all their money on leveling up their cards to the max level that easily pushes through all your cards. It's no longer about skill but about who spent more money in this game to win. Pathetic.

Ive been playing this game for a couple years now, and it gets consistently worse with every update. Sometimes there are good things, but on balance, the game gets less and less playable, and more pay to win, with every update. Basic bugs don't get fixed for months while new features that cost money get added. I would say it's not worth investing your time or money in.

Hogrider cycle. It's extremely rare to find someone not using it and it's nearly impossible to lose with. 40 win streak at max trophies just because of 1 card is ridiculous. I had to take him off to make the game half fun again but it would be nice to get an opponent that doesn't use him to change the game up a little. I'll raise my rating if he gets nerfed into oblivion for a few months at least.

Very dissapointing. I had a 5 star review from back when I played in 2022, things were very different. To keep it short, evos are an insane step up in power and the only way to get them was buying the battle pass or buy them from the shop ($12 each evo). Now the new hero class, which is arguably as broken if not more, introduces an even larger gap. They removed chests that could be bought with gems, they removed collectibles that helped level up cards. In summary, very greedy tactics. DONT PLAY!

I decided to try clash royal after a long time ago. But it's still the pay to win game. Basically, if you don't have money to spend on gems or something else. You're going to lose every time. It's unfair in my eyes how someone can buy all of these chests. if you have money, this game is for you. if you try grinding, it's gonna take forever to get all the cards when someone can buy them in ten seconds. Supercell needs to fix their game. It's overwhelming expensive frustrating and pay to win

After 3 years of free to play and reaching 15k I've found that the company is a greedy mess that doesn't care about your experience on this game as long as it's squeezing money out of you. They've lied to us many times over. One such example was them saying they wouldn't add any more levels after level 15, but now they gave us level 16, and the game is so much worse. They had their second chance and they blew it. Don't waste your time with this game its not worth it

At the core of this game is a really fun idea about a strategic chess meets arena combat experience. Defeat your opponent in a battle of wits. But that core, that idea, has been covered in layers of grime. The developers do not listen to the community and blatantly implement new mechanics and cards for monetary gain. It is extremely hard for a FTP player to advance. Spending so much time grinding and upgrading your deck, only for someone to buy the new season pass and get broken cards.

I am so disappointed. This game was the best some years ago, it was pretty well balanced and there was not to spend money to win because you were able to get it all in events and chests. Now the game is basically pay to win. It's so hard to upgrade your cards without buying the royal pass and extra stuff. where is the fun if you literally have to pay to have good cards and win.😮

Game gets revived by miracle. I come back after like 5 years on a brand new account and it was actually kind of fun. that was me exactly last September. literally in a span of a few months, they manage to add, quite possibly, the worst thing they could've to the game: heroes. they're just not fun, man. Heroes are entire win-checks. Oh, and to top it all off? Money hungry. I decided to spend a little cash left over for fun, and now I regret even doing so because I just gave them what they want.

This game is good and bad! first the cards are good, the fact it's pay to win it's so unfair, especially the over levels instead of fixing it, this game decided to ignore and release all those pay to win offers, the shop is full of stuff you need to pay to get. next, I want to talk about level 16, it's even more horrible, the devs promised not to add it and they did, that means more paying and this will make the game even more unfair for free to plays.

Im gonna give this game credits for everything they did, its very good but the only thing I hate is the new update they made: level 16, heros and pay to win. why did they add heros, I mean like it wasn't what we were waiting for, what they could've done instead was to add new champions from time to time or to add two once a year. But I can't lie I still find it fun.

I decided to return to the game after a two year hiatus back in August and because the game has had a resurge in popularity. I don't have any problem with the addition of level 16 and heroes as they do serve as a counter balance towards evolutions. However that counter balance would show IF the rest of the game was designed to make it easier for F2Ps to obtain them, that is my main gripe, there is hardly any way for F2Ps to obtain these things.

Clash Royal has turned in to a payed to win game you can't even play one game with out meeting a payed to win player. The games ruined because of the money hungry company that owns clash. they keep adding new hero's that are extreme hard to get and are super expensive to buy, it's either you spend 20 buck on a hero just for it to get nerfed heavily or spend 20 hours straight trying to get it. The games going to die any day now so don't waste your time on it.

I have played this game before and it was amazing, shop options were sane. One could choose to advance arenas more quickly by paying or it could all the same be done without paying but we were equal. This game today, each month begs players to pay for new evolutions for new upgrades without one it can take months to have that upgrade for one card. It's just not fair. I deleted this game cause its simply to hard to play against people that take shop offers.

decent game but once you start to climb up to the higher arenas most of the players are far more ahead of you in terms of troop levels. it then feels like a pay to win game regarding the huge level gaps. as an f2p player this makes it extremely frustrating and really difficult to make any progress. hope they'll balance the game and make the game fun for all sorts of players.

One of the best mobile games in the world, but there is absolutely no way I could recommend it to someone who has not been playing for years, or to someone who doesn't want to spend tons of money on a "free" mobile game. Devs only care about you paying for the new broken cards (until they nerf them and release new ones so you repeat the cycle), terrible last updates that have changed the game in very bad ways, and a very toxic community. Edit: they ruin it more everyday, hope they lose money

A game for money-spenders. once you reach a certain level, you will face only players who have invested heavily in game. Unless you want to play for 1-2 weeks or pay big amounts for exclusive hero cards or upgrading cards to higher levels.... don't play.

I was playing this game from almost launch of the game but the worst thing I have seen so far is "ECHO" in merge tectics. means one character come push all opponent characters out of the ground in one shot. no strategy needed, no mind needed. day by day game is going 👎👎👎 very bad.

App is terrible, especially when compared to CoC. The connection/sync has constant problems (especially in the middle of a battle) and the matchmaking sucks. It almost constantly pits you against a base 1-3 levels higher, even in tournament mode. 12/19/2025 (Update) - Game required over 12 updates this month alone. While the game is fun-ish the updates & required storage is out of control.

Matchmaking feels completely unfair. I’m constantly being put against opponents with much higher-level cards and decks that seem perfectly designed to counter mine. It’s broken and extremely frustrating.I’m definitely not investing any more time into this cash-grab of a game. It was fun at first, but facing hard counters in almost every match — even after leveling up my own cards — has killed the enjoyment. It just feels like another company following in EA’s footsteps, pushing players to pay!

the devs are destroying this game. the game is unplayable unless you want to spend thousands of dollars. played for 9 years and you think you have a max card. what do the devs do, keep making cards higher levels just so they can try to get more money. now there's champion cards that you literally have to spend hundreds on just to get them. devs need to be fired.

This game is absolutely NOT WORTH PLAYING. Seriously, in 7 or 8 times in 10, you face a P2W player. And Supercell, please delete the level system. CR is supposed to be all about strategies and decks, not leveling up your cards and spamming emotes. Or at least make another trophy road with card levels fixed to 11. I'm not playing this game until level 11 trophy road arrives, ok? I really think CR is a great game. but P2W became too necessary now.

Like a toxic abusive ex, I keep on coming back to this game. There is only one word to describe this game toxic. One word to describe Supercell, Greedy. This is my 5th review. "We want to create games for as many people as possible that are played for years and remembered forever" sounds like BS to me.

This game continues to disappoint. I have played the game off and on since launch. As soon as I start to enjoy again, they unnecessary add features to chase away loyal players/customers. This happens to every single Supercell game. And I have eventually quit every single one of them

Very fun game. I love it. But then, the ten most dreaded words from Supercell show up: "Good news! An update for this game is now available!". terrible. taking credit from creators, level 16, heros, all of it. creators brought this game to life not your "oh so talented team". it is getting worse, and less are playing it, which is good, as this game is terrible. i am deleting it as of today, feb 10 2026, as i should have done months ago. thus game is an enormous waste of time, and i wish i never played it. i speak for everyone when i say this.

this game never fails to shove countless deals in your face. I went to a new arena and didn't level up and was faced with people 2 levels ahead of me. This game has gone past its peak long ago. Updates that arrive now are not innovative, they end up making the game worse and tedious. The focus on pay-to-win system has never been more clear. Used to be a favourite, but currently I barely open it twice a week.

I have played this game for almost a decade. 9 years! The progress I have continuously made over the last 9 years has completely halted due to the fact that I would have to spend R1000 just to get one broken card to max, only for it to be swept under the rug 2 months later. Gets worse and worse as time goes on. You can never keep up with the end game unless you spend $1000's. Just save your time and play something else. Evos are still pay-to-win BS. fine, whatever. I thought Evos were bad, this is genuinely mind-boggling game design. Flaming garbage.

This game was awesome, great and most importantly, BALANCED back in the days. but now, it SUCKS. almost everything is pay to win, being a fair to play player is literally the closest reference to surpass all levels of hell, because of how UNFAIR this game can get in the higher arenas. I was addicted to this game but because of supercell being thirsty for money, I have lost the old interest in this game. thanks supercell.

I have been playing this game and I will continue to do so but here's the truth: There is no way you added evolutions and then heroes with the same cards so if I spent a pretty penny for one card then after I have to decide whether to use it as an hero or evolution. this is absurd. Plus you made it clear that we are just numbers and money. No feedbacks are listened and this is a huge L for the community. Nowadays if you wanna win you have to pay, that's it. The best game ever made. The best the best the best. editing my review (2026) : the dev team don't care about the player base. they don't listen to us and release updates filled with greed. this game has so much potential but they wouldn't listen to any of our suggestions. no one asked for level 16 and no one asked for heroes. i give it one star now.

Match making is very poor. Supercell keeps changing the game. Are they trying to completley ruin it? Hands down the most frustrating game I have ever played. Could be great, but Devs dont care. Have left multiple reviews and messages about the outrageously one sided spawn rate. There are better out there.

been playing for a while now.. it is very much a fun game to play, but it's clearly becoming more and more pay to win kinda game the more they update and "add" new content. writing this in hopes that they make some better changes by listening to the streamers that play the game at a high level and players in general.

Super pay to win. Completely unbalanced, and the game is rigged so you lose and win 50% of the time so you progress by paying or spending way too much time on it. When you are playing good then it matches you up against a AI (or someone higher lever than you) so you lose. I hate this game...alright now I need to get back to grinding to Arena 17.

Greedycell drives this game further into a pit with every update, focusing now exclusively on more microtransactions and completely disregarding community feedback. You cannot progress without paying anymore. Been playing for 10 years, still not even close to max level so I can't play ranked. Absolutely insane how bad it is now.

great game, but within the last few months the game has become incredibly pay to win. with broken heros now, some that you have to pay to get, and magic books being removed, it is very hard to progress as a free to play player.

I've played this game for 9 years, the last update is so buns. I'm editing my original because the new chest system isn't as bad as I thought. but the new yellow heroes or whatever the hell they call it now are just pay to win. updating my review from a 1 star..... to a 1 star. just an update, seems they stopped doing the evolutions and have fully moved towards the whole yellow heros. money grab, so lame

lets discontinue clash mini and shoe horn a worse version into clash royale and then introduce a champion that one shots any enemy,levels up after oneshotting any enemy and gets faster after leveling up after one shotting any enemy.i don't want any social media worker for the company responding i want the dev that thought it was a good idea to pick a time and place

This game keeps going backward. How did supercell look at the feedback for champions and evos and think it was a good idea to add heroes? The game is in its most p2w form yet. I've played on and off for 9 years, I do not recommend playing this game if you're new.

New content with updates? No way supercell won't update anything unless it makes them money. This game is only fun for people who can pay a lot for in-game upgrades. they came out strong, fell INCREDIBLY hard due to the micro-transactions which lasted several years, then they figured out their formula a bit more and its calmed down a bit. we still have some meta issues such as Valk and Mega Knight but its been ok. Dispite those issues, they have done a lot to fix the problems the players had with the game to help make the game easier to progress and all in all fun again. Ive been back playing for the last month and it feels pretty alright at the moment.

It's a great game no doubt, but I'm having some issues lately The loading always, always took me more than a minute (I think the server is down), but it's been more than 2-3 days and it's really frustrating please do something Supercell

This game used to be awesome. Played it daily for 9 years. But greed has ruined it. Pay to win, even emotes are behind $50 pay walls. it's so sad to see a really good game become completely pay to win and if you don't pay you can't stay within the meta and you will lose. I gave it a 1 for the memories but its a 0 now.

one of the most irritating games because the game's server is so bad that my match starts and my opponent has already taken 1 of the tower and then the game decides that my internet (which is Totally good) is not fine and my troops don't get placed at time hence making me loose another damn tower, the moment people started spending and creating content on yt anput this game it has gone downhill and nothing else. SUPERCELL FIX THE DAMN GAME RATHER THAN PROVIDING MORE TOP UP OPTIONS, make it good

This is a Beautiful Game, with a gameplay core so satisfying and perfect, but monetization is horrible, and it doesn't need to be that way. Heros and lvl 16 are a horrible mistake, especially putting them at the same time. Stop adding heros, or put a limit nerf them, make it more accesible to having lvl 16 cards, make more Champions, make more Evos, Make Clan Wars better and more rewarding, give more Lucky Chest per day and add a Season shop or something that replaces it's purpose.

Only game in history even if you are good sport in general in life, you will feel you didnt deserve to lose that game. every deck you play against feel no skill compared to yours, because you dont need to be smart to play this game. 99% of my losses I know beforehand what my ennemy will do, and still can't defend because the game has trash balancing. If you re not in top 1k, there is no skill involved, just timing and match ups. Also , it became extremely p2w with the addition of heroes.

Buns. It's like my elixir was just depleting without me doing anything. It's stupid. How does everyone BUT ME get the OP cards? And not to mention the fact that some of my cards do no damage and whoever I play against has the most overpowered cards OF ALL TIME. Not to mention, 80% of the items make you pay with real cash. The emotes? You need money. Not gems or coins, physical money. Legendary Path? $$$. It's stupid. Not to mention, people pay to get better cards, making it hard to win.

Playing every single day, but can't gain any progress in the game in terms of upgrading the cards and in terms of pushing trophies it's really becoming stressful to gain progress in this game, the lucky chest are giving no value, I hope it changes. thank you 🙏🏻

Clash royale is a fantastic game. No doubt about it. The gameplay is amazing, the mechanics are good, and it is definitely one of the best mobile games out there. Only problem is that it's pay to win as heck. At first, the game feels fair. but once you start climbing higher, everything changes. You quickly hit a wall where your skill doesn’t matter as much as your card levels. Players spend money to win, not by skill, but by upgrading their cards to automatically be stronger than yours.

I used to play this game 7 years ago and came back because of nostalgia. It has changed a lot, mostly for the worse. The cards now are more unbalanced than ever, which killed deck diversity. In the trophy mode, the game punishes you for winning, as you end up with fewer and underleveled cards against stronger opponents. Unless you are planning to play with friends, I don't recommend.

This game used to be my favorite game for mobile, but has since shifted more towards pay to win mechanics. Fun mini games that provided same leveled cards were removed in favor of games that strongly supported a win for players who spend money to advance. I've been playing this game on and off for five years and have spent a small amount of money on the game, and I am nowhere near lose to a max account.

money hungry supercell at it again im at 10k trophies free to play but its just impossible to keep up as every single player i verse has the new thing which they make absolutely broken for a few weeks so you much buy it to keep up I am so underleveled I can not play at all also they are rubish at balancing the game so that you can just make your own deck and use whatever cards you like and think are cool you have to just conform to like 8 standard "meta" decks or loose. in conclusion dont bother

Holy, you don't get a break after playing for a while, it's either you nerf an incredible amount of units or you just make them cost more, I'm tired of being mid ladder and having EVERY opponent and I mean EVERY opponent have mk and xbow. I changed my mind, your fame is completely p2w and if you like having a fair and fun battle with others, this isn't for you, even merge tactics isn't safe. 1 out of 5

since i returned after taking a break from the game, I can't get the evolutions that the opponents have. well i can deal with opponents that have higher lvl cards and evolution. I'll stop playing again but permanently this time. And now they've added new heroes system, you couldn't be more of a money sucker.

game is fun however I feel that some characters are way too OP. primarily the mega knight which has been from the start years ago. when every single person is using the same character that can wipe out almost everyone, maybe its too much. some characters need to balanced

1. You MUST pay the monthly pass plus different cards they sell separately. 2. Be aware you will be facing numerous players with a boost from the begging of the match. as someone who has played for 6 years, owned both free to play and pay to win accounts, i have reached 12k trophies as of now and am sorry to say, supercell has killed Clash Royal. they have chosen money over their willingness to make the game fun and it shows. if you arent willing to spend over $450 and yes, ive counted, just to get to level 16s with a hero from level 14s its not for you, it hurts to see a game i have progressed in over the years has come to this. good luck all but im out 👋

this game used to be fun before they kept adding stuff no one asked for it's not new player friendly it takes 10 years to have a decent account or hundreds of dollars to even stand a chance the new cards or so bad, the heroes are so stupid and hard to get unless you wanna spend 15 dollars on an in game card thats either broken on release until enough people buy them then it's nerfed into the ground or they give a free card thats horrible. honestly just dont download or spend money on this game.

The game has a great concept, and I’m currently at 10k trophies as a free-to-play player. The biggest problem for me is the repetitive card meta. In almost every match I face someone using level 16 Mega Knight—literally every other game. The same goes for Hog Rider. It gets really tiring to play against the exact same cards over and over again, and it makes the game feel boring and predictable. I think the cards should be balanced so that more of them have a similar usage rate.

Don't Play this game unless you don't mind shelling out Thousands of dollars to level your characters, only to have the game raise the max level , and all that money/ progression becomes useless because the new standard is 1 level higher , good luck competing, unless u shell out couple thousands more . Even the basic monthly pass , the evolution, or "heros" you get are busted, overpowered characters, only for them to nerf it a month later , maybe even kill the card couple months later .p2w only

Used to be a very good fairly matched game but over the years it has become entirely pay to win game if you dont have money dont expect to get very far especially with evolutions as all of them are hidden behind a paywall unless a special event is active. Not to mention very unbalanced cards and umbalanced matchmaking wouldn't recommend at all. Progression is extremely slow and you are almost always matched with players higher then you not to mention most of the cards are extremely unbalanced.

amazing game design but recent updated have revealed that the developers do not care about the community that built the game, they only care about extorting you for money by guaranteeing easier wins with paid cards. if you are free to play. you are at a disadvantage. I would rather this game cost 10 dollars to buy then this free to install pay to win model.

Game has went severely downhill in the last 4 months or so. Heroes especially are extremely bad for the game and have turned it into severe pay to win and extra confusion. lvl 16 as well is horrible. I've had a Max lvl 15 deck for 2 years before the lvl 16 update and I could barely get a single full lvl 16 deck after saving up max resources for YEARS. The only reason it's a 2 star and not one is because the game could still be a 5 star if it's fixed. As of now though don't waste your time on it.

I am facing a lot of issues with the game not loading and lags during the game and it's not an issue from my phone/ internet. please do look into this and fix this else I'm done with the game. Love the updates and all the new additions to the game.

The matchmaking is clearly designed to frustrate you into spending money. I constantly face opponents 2 levels higher than me with fully evolved decks while I’m stuck trying to scrap together enough gold for one upgrade. The 'balance' changes are a joke—they keep the new, expensive cards overpowered for months just to drive sales. Save your storage space and don't download this

I'm burnt out and will not be playing the game till heroes become more accessible and less overpowered, like what happened with champions and evolutions. The core gameplay loop is still fun but it's actively being degraded by the dev team in the name of monetisation.

The game is certainly good, but it's unfair to get higher level opponents that often. It's almost impossible to win against them and this suck :) Years ago i deleted the game for this reason, decided to give it another try, was going rather well until a few days ago.

Game is complete trash. Unless you want to spend thousands of dollars on the game, you're not going to get close to the top, no matter how good you are. They make a ranked mode where level 15 is the cap at 10500 trophies, then they realize the free to play players can get that, so they change it to 11000 so you're forced to spend money. I can't do much against credit card players that have a full level 16 deck when I barely have a level 14 deck. DO NOT GET THIS GAME.

Supercell activly took away from the players the possibility to spend 100k for 5000 cards i think it was once a month. So i am activly taking away my positive review. constantly at cap of 5 Million Gold, cant spent enough of it, as you always get more than you are able to spent. Whats classics about the game mode Classics? Heros are garbage, give me a mode where i can enjoy the good old clash royale. Classics isnt classics with heroes and evolutions.

Extremely disappointing. The game does not work properly even on a stable and high-speed network. It keeps failing to load and connect, making it completely unplayable. This is one of the worst gaming experiences I’ve had. Do not waste your time until the developers fix these serious issues.

I first started playing this game five years ago, and coming back to it now is a massive disappointment. The game I remember is gone. The developers have clearly prioritized profit over actual gameplay. As a F2P player, the Evos and Heroes are so broken that players having less skill are winning just by spamming. It has shifted from a skill-based experience to a pay-to-win game. If you aren't prepared to spend money, I strongly suggest not playing it.

I have played this game off and on for years. I have to rewrite this as this game had become an absolute joke. changed to pay to win and everyone uses the same 3 decks. why have a ton of different cards if they are the only ones used. there is no originality or strategy anymore. this game honestly blows hard when it used to be a great game that would kill time. now just a waste of time

You will find stressed, disappointed to play this game. System always match you with high level players. No fun. Everyday spent hours just for complete daily task boxes. It's really unfit for most ordinary people. waste time.

Playing since day one (almost 10 years) and the game is now completely ruined. Around 90% of matches are against pay-to-win Level 16 players. Skill barely matters anymore. Everyone uses the same boring copy-paste meta decks. Heroes were okay, but Level 16 is the worst decision ever. No new cards or meaningful evos anymore, just heroes after heroes, almost impossible for free-to-play. Pure cash grab.

honestly it's really fun when you get into it with its endless creativity in decks and different game modes you can play and even 1v1ing friends, but it's p2w side really starts to ruin your experience once you reach around 3k trophies this is also where you start to find majorly over leveled opponents and it gets really frustrating losing to something out of your control.I wish supercell could fix that so it's more enjoyable for long time players, if you plan to play as a f2p I wish you luck❤️

Been playing this game for 9 years, so good on release and they did many great things, but since champions this game has fallen off Everest. Pay to win, janky, and no longer a fun game to play. I never minded spending a little to skip the grind, but now its a must to drop 20+ dollars to even stay relevent. Free to play no longer exists in this game if you want to play it fairly. A true shame.

At its core this is an excellent game, extremely well designed. At its current state though, the game is being ruined by GreedyCell. This game is pretty fun, but if you dont spend money on it your chances to win are like 20%. Most people just spend real-life money to get good cards, like mega knight, and many more. I've gotten to arena 20 without spending money, but my cards are low level and can't stop a level 14 executioner, or mega night. This game would be really fun if there was less money spending options.

good game. played for a very long time, a major part of my childhood. good strategy, characters, basically everything. doesn't even take up much storage or data when playing either. HOWEVER, recent updates were horrible. Many friends who played this game are leaving, and I will too. the addition of champions, level 16, and two hero slots just made this game pay to win. strategy is no longer needed, as those who are rich can just pay money to buy champions, who have insanely unbalanced powers.

absolutely horrendous do not touch this game unless you enjoy being a complete neek. You need to spend a minimum of £2000 in order to be on an even playing field. yes I said £2000. unless you enjoy running the same 8 card deck for the next 5 years of playing. even if you pay 15£ a month for pass royale that is nowhere near enough money to have a chance. I've played this game for 8 years and I am still missing about 20% of the op broken evos and hero's. If you have £2000 to sink into a video game

This game will freeze mid match or make you lose service at sheer random. Pay-to-win garbage. If you aren't willing or unable to spend all your credit card allowance for the month, you won't do well in this game. This game is such a PAY TO WIN game! I get so close to something I need, and then the game throws players at me that are just impossible to beat. I hate this game so much! After having played this game for 9 years on and off, it has never been in a worse state. If you do not spend real money on the game, you are at a disadvantage. It is wild how there are versions of cards that are simply superior to the free ones. The free-to-player is drip fed progress to getting these same cards. No longer fun.

Have been playing this game since last 8 years, and feel this game needs to improve specially allowing players to choose the card sequence rather than randomising the card sequences. because if your opponent plays hog rider we cannot play skeleton army card as it is not in the sequence. the second time my game glitches and cost me a match. I've been playing since this game released. I'm not the best, but very frustrating to lose when I shouldn't. it would be ashame because I actually love playing this game but next time will delete the game. please fix

game used to be good....now there is no point to play with all the payed-for usage..and...the algorithm that pairs non-pay player against Obvious way more powerful payed-for players to keep them from advancing......be aware.. the algorithm of the game will not let you advance unless you pay ...or play Dozens of matches against paying-players and loose the 90%of the time....... realy hope they find a way to fix this problem as I have played this game on and off for years....

I'm addicted, don't be like me. This game is addictive, and it feels fun. This used to be the best game. But the developers are greedy. This game is also good but as you progress in this game, the game will change a bit and will become more difficult, and when you go above 5500 trophies, you will lose matches continuously or you will feel like it.That the game itself is beating you to the punch, because how can someone land so many troops at once when you're only getting a couple of them, and it feels like the elxer is loading very slowly.I think this game matches us with bot players and makes us lose so that we don't get the 🏆

The game itself is pretty good, gameplay, the characters, the whole idea. It is a very fun game, kind of addictive, and requires skill and learning the game. There's a point where skill barely becomes what determines who wins, and you can play 10 games in a row facing over level players. Do recommend it as a fun game, play with friends, but if you're f2p, good luck facing pay to wins.

extremely pay to win. you can't even really play the game until you have max level cards which they keep pushing back further and further. im at 10000 trophies and every(and I mean EVERY!!!) single deck i face is the same firecracker megaknight slop..Im heavily thinking of deleting its gotten really dull playing zero variety in deck build. so in a nutshell early game its fun but once you get to a certain level progression grinds to a halt and you see the same deck every game. yeah this game is such a money scam. impossible to keep up. and even if you pay to play and advance its no guarantee....extremely unbalanced. Truly better games out there....
