good game no doubt put every little thing has to have an animation and everyone i play against seems to have bought evolutions the p2w players dominate and because I don't wanna spend money on a mobile game I'm at a disadvantage CONSTANTLY. if your looking to pay for a game this is it if not don't download

Card Level Up Simulator by Scamcell A card level up game marketed as a real time strategy game. You'll always face over levelled opponents. And if you pay to get your cards maxed, you get scammed as they will add another level (which adds zero value to the game other than making both players have higher stat numbers), making existing levels easier to obtain, leaving you under levelled by one level. So, they effectively reduce your level by one TAKING BACK WHAT YOU ALREADY PAID FOR.

Deck mechanic leads to a weird game of chicken at the beginning of matches, where whoever blinks and plays first has disadvantage, while their opponent can counter. Additionally every round is the same board with little variation.

This game is pretty fun but it makes me mad sometimes as a player who's been playing for a little over 3 months I've had a lot of fun. the only reason I don't give 5 stars is because it's so p2w I just got my first evo even after all the free evo events they need to make progression easier in my opinion because it was much easier when I first started other then that I haven't experienced any bug and it runs smoothly only if it wasn't as p2w I would give 5 stars

Base game is fine, I loved playing merge tactics until they added the echo sage, the card is extremely broken and overpowered making it just not enjoyable or the "tactics" they say it is. Its hard to strategize when all of your troops get one shotted in the first 12 seconds.

The game is still fun but it's continuously spiralling down hill, it is extremely pay to win. I cannot win a game because I load onto one and they have full level 14 cards and im using lvl 9 because I don't feel like paying, which makes the game completely unfair. Fix your game supercell!

For the past 2 days I have been experiencing network issues while opening and playing this game while in other apps the network is working good. Otherwise the game is addictive and good no doubt. But please see into it I tried reinstalling also but it also didn't work for me

The game is starting to get really buggy (I can't do any controls like uninstalling and playing). Overall a great game but it is a pay to win game now which is a negative but positives - which I am not going to go in detail about - overshadow all the negatives.

One of best game i played.. but i gave only 3 star because of this Ekko in Tactics match.. am sure its annoying for peoples who dont know how to counter that..and also its like enemy has one more character than you, also in one hit, he can wipe out your team🤣 Assassins ez counter this.. but we get bored for spamming assassin build

From my experience,all of the graphics are good and it is what you would expect for a 2025 game. I used to love this game played since 2019, but ever since free to play players have been constantly pushed aside, it makes it hard for the remaining free to play players' stay when they constantly go against pay to wins. I thought I would stick with this game through the thick and thin, but at this rate I'm going to uninstall it very soon. I feel the game is becoming too complicated for a casual player and it is no longer fun as if you're not playing a meta deck you paid 200 dollars to max out, it's impossible to get anywhere. If they revise the leveling system and remove heroes maybe I'll come back but I'm really not motivated to play anymore.

Its like a subscription based platform that's optional. each update they come with a new card that's broken and can only be accessible to pay to play characters. All of my books and magic cards are gone and they now have made it significantly harder to max out cards... I now believe I will never catch up.

I've been playing Clash Royale since it came out nearly 10 years ago and it was a great game. More Money = Higher Level Cards = More Wins... Trophy Road is unplayable... Playing against Max Level Troops at 8000 trophies should tell you something...

Matchmaking is horrible. You play but if you win one, you play against the most overleved players/ one of the hardest counters to your deck. I'm at 10k and I just faced off against 2 hard counters??? This game used to be really fun, but with the implementation of the "battle pass" it has become more pay to win than ever. I've played this game since 2017 and slowly watched it go down the drain. At a certain arena, you will basically be cut off from progressing if you don't spend $ as the match making is as unbalanced as it gets. In the new update cards are now lvl 16 when lvl 15 was VERY hard to get The new hero card is also a no win condition to bait for pass purchases. where's my refund $$

They added level 16 and heroics. Basically all you need to hear. Not even saying anything about removal of books. No one asked for this, no one wanted it. Extremely disappointed with the new update.

This game used to be very fun and I enjoyed having a friendly competition with my friends at school but things haven't been the same. The first fifteen arenas are chill but when you get to arena 19 or higher, then the game isn't fun anymore. I cannot progress at all. When you win one game, you gain about 27 or 30 trophies but when you lose, it sets you back either the same amount or higher. Supercell, make this game more balanced so it is easier to progress. I don't recommend this game to people

Grinding game to level up, it's fun in the beginning but then you hit the wall. Hard. I'm stuck where I play 90% of my games are against cards 2 - 3 levels higher. Not really fun anymore where I lose 75% of my games because of this. This game definitely loses its appeal but if you quit you feel that you wasted all this time grinding so you can't give up. It is definitely a P2W game.

*Edit* 12-4-2025 I've played Clash Royale for more than 6 years, throughout that time there has been balances and updates to keep things fresh. Over the last year though, the game has subtly turned into a pay to win game. The grind is expected, but some of the available characters are really only obtained through purchase less the micro chance of getting something good in a 5 star chest. Sorry devs, I've been a loyal player of the games and it's the shift I have seen over the years...p2w...

I like to imagine the devs periodically gather round and ask, how can we make this game just a little bit worse this update. played for years, spent some money when it was worth it. I'm done now, used to be 5 stars now its just p2p drivel, all good things come to end, this one just happened to be self inflicted. certainly lost the essence that made it what it was back in the day. not worth getting into now, better games to spend your time on.

The game was good but it just keeps getting worse and worse with every update. I played the game for years and with multiple accounts. This is an absolutely amazing game based on what you need to "be good." The entirety of the game is just paying more money for stronger cards. There are also necessary additions being constantly added to the game that makes it even more fair and fun. There's such a paying aspect to it that it gets to a point where you're stuck at one place and have to use the credit card.

I have been playing this game for 9 years and have watched it fall from incredible to a money grabbing "free to play" game that makes it impossible to progress without spending money. every time you think you can win, the game throws you in a match with someone who either directly counters your deck, or has cards that are higher level than you. and don't even get me started on level 16 and heros... if you are thinking about installing this game, let me save you the headache and money. DONT

How to ruin a good game! Changed the progress system, now it is Pay-To-Win. Been playing this since it first came out and made steady progress to the higher levels. Game was fun but very predictable. When you get close to leveling up you lose about 5 matches to bring you back down. Compete against people more then double your castle level. Unevenly matched a lot! People that pay real money to play get the advantage. I played when it first came out & it was the same so I deleted it.. I downloaded it again & it never changed. Update just deleted it again. Supercell is the worse games to download!

I almost had my level 15 account halfway maxed after two years. I did spend money on my account but only the pass every month and I was able to keep up. With level 16 and heros now, I feel like its a HUGE pay wall to get back to where I was. You can definitely take the free to play route but by the time you start inching closer to maxing out your cards they come out with a new update that hurts progression. I wont be purchasing anymore passes in the future.

I really used to enjoy this game. Now it seems like the devs only try their hardest to milk more money from the player base. I think my personal favorite was "we are only bumping max level to 15, it won't go any higher..." and then to top it all off, after this most recent update they gave gems (in game currency) as compensation, but made it so you can only buy worthless and uninspired cosmetics. Honestly slow clap for killing what used to be a great game, selling out for the almighty dollar.

When I hear that they're reworking progression and adding level 16 I was worried like everyone else, but I stayed open-minded and believed supercell could make a change for the better, seeing how many people were coming back to the game in the past year. I must say that now that I see the update and the changes, I am very disappointed. Progression feels worse in a lot of ways and compensation we received feels underwhelming. I love this game and want to see it succeed, but this is not the way...

Horribly Pay to Win. I've played this game for years and have thoroughly enjoyed the gameplay. I have played this game loyally for years. The game is fun, strategic and fast paced at first but is absolutely ruined by slow progression once you get to higher levels, essentially forcing you to spend money if you want to level up cards within a reasonable time frame or get into new arenas and unlock more cards. this game is free to play at first, but once you get to a certain level/arena it's just Pay to Play, which is a tragedy considering Clash Royale used to be one of the best mobile games ever

Actually might be one of the worst games now because they just decided to throw it away for money. The game is generally lagging quite a lot on pc but the game is still bearable and is quite fun. They just are money hungry. Pay to win. (Now added champions that really took skill out $20 can win you any game now I stopped playing every supercell game money hungry)

I am facing a frustrating issue with Clash Royale. Despite having fast WiFi and mobile data still the game often gets stuck while loading 96–100%. It usually opens only after restarting 4–5 times, and sometimes doesn’t open at all. Matches also get stuck on loading before or after games. The same issue happens on my tablet, so its not a device or internet problem. The app is updated, but this feels like an app or server issue. I’ve been with Supercell since 2016, Please fix it.

returning player unable to log into game due to login loop. support is sending automated responses and forced me to in-game support, which is also a bot. unable to actually get assistance. it's ranking up there with one of worst support experiences ever. --2016 5 star review below-- However, having the chests on such long timers is an obvious money grab. Frankly, this timer could be pulled down to 1 hour and you could still make money.

Came back for Clashmas and instantly uninstalled again. Holiday rewards are locked behind a pointless grind. heroes were added, champions are pointless, evolutions unfinished but monetized. Removed books and season shop, nerfed masteries and pass, added level 16 (which means more money you need to spend if you don't want to be underleveled). Trophy road keeps extending making you feel like you lost progress and more things are locked behind it. The game costs more and more money just to play.

The game completely stops after I start a match. After directing me to the game, it just stops. I can't deploy or see anything happening in the match. I will have to close and reopen the game once or twice to play the match. Until then my opponent will already have destroyed my tower or win over me. This glitch literally happens like 20 to 25 times a day. I am losing a lot trophies because of this. Please fix this issue soon! I am using Redmi Note 7 Pro.

After I saved books and wild cards for any reason and picked up all season free chests (which were collected by crown), now I have to wait and save all of it again for extra level 16 that is stealing. Additionally, the recent new cards are unfairly broken and not free for all all levels , and hard to adopt. I started to hate the game two years ago.

Can be, and was fun ag times ill admit. However they are ruining it for everybody that is not willing to spend hundreds of bucks a month to get offers and passes. As a f2p player I find it increasingly annoying and hard to keep up with my opponents. They are adding too much useless stuff and everything can be bought with irl money which renders skill obsolete in certain situations.

This game has been out for nearly a decade and it was once one of the best games you can have on a moblie device. This is no longer the case. It is now the filled with greed and thousands of predetory style of microtransaction which is aims towards younger people. It's sad to see a game I love and loyaly play through out the years to turn into something this awful. This is free to download, but it is not anwywhere close to being a "free to play" game. If youre a new player, find something else.

To anybody considering getting into this game, the recent changes are INCREDIBLY anti-F2P and once you get past the initial arenas, it becomes an absolute nightmare. Would heavily recommend picking up some other mobile game until Supercell decides to revert some of the more controversial changes As if it's not bad enough, the game is also infested with hackers that will forcefully interrupt your connection when they're losing. No amount of money you spend on here will matter, so don't bother

Lots of new updates to the game, played for many years but it sucked now....loading of game used to be super fast, now it keeps getting sucked at 96%, takes 10-15secs to load into the game, sometimes in the middle of the match it just hanged.... cleared cache, restart phone, tried both data and WiFi connection, it's still the same....super disappointing...

It has been fun for years but the recent changes seem to be motivated by money. I Understand these products are made for profit but the price hikes and now harvesting player data for ads and for whatever reason the game suddenly requires cookies after running fine for ages without it. It went from Free-to-play friendly to down right pay-to-win. Disgusted with the latest changes and the constant moving of the goal post. Takes ages to max out a card and then they increase the max stats.

Bots are being changed to be less distinguishable from actual players every update. There is no reason to this, other than to make it easier to hide when they give the player free wins after loss streaks (if you stay below a certain win% for long enough you will be put in a bot queue indefinitely), and make matchmaking more opaque. What's the point in playing a game where matchmaking can so easily be tampered with to manipulate the player into the blatant and aggressive monetisation model.

Classicly fun exp 4 beginners but that quickly goes downhill as soon as you're an intermed. player. It's yet another overrated game. The developer has made hundreds of millions yet the game doesn't give us a lot of flexibility in preferences. There's also not a lot to choose from. As an intermediate player, I already get the jist of all of the cards and gameplay with rewards. The game rapidly gets too competitive and has literally been designed to enrage us. Even the latest music is more aggro.

Stopped playing the game when they decided that every evolution needs to be broken and have some way of countering every deck. Not to mention the monetization is just predatory. Everything is a 22x deal when they don't even know what that means. I've been playing this game since release and it's sad to see if fall so far from what it once was. update: 11/24/25. you greedy slime balls. Y'all need a visit from Luigi

Enjoyable, but frustrating. Terrible matchmaking in clan boat events. Constantly being matched with overleveled opponents for no reason, when all I ask is for someone on the same level as me. Only times I get good matchmaking is in Classic 1v1 or 2v2. Also, heroes & Lvl 16 shouldn't be a thing. Game needs to be way less p2w & more rewardable as well. Do better Supercell.

The game is good, but they want us to spend more money on the game to play, if you don't buy their pass royale membership or spend money on buying other items, you will not be able to push further and upgrade your card. We are so disappointed with the new updates. The network issue is happening a lot in this season, we can't play with strong 5g internet.

Clash royale is an amazing game. But as a person who does not pay money, the level differences between other players are so huge! I barely went through a single arena over 2 months! I went through that arena by buying and requesting cards and leveling up so my cards are at the same levels as the players who pay money. Except for the pay to win system, Clash royale is a great game and I really hope supercell makes a game mode that levels are fixed with 11.(With trophies, of course.)

This game has turned into nothing but pay to win. Buy this buy that buy this pass buy this ticket buy this buy that on literally EVERY screen. They charge you $16 per card to get an evolution, which ruins the game to begin with, and to add insult to injury, they have events all the time that require real cash to unlock the first one before you get to the free ones.

Played this game from the very beginning and have slowly watch it's deterioration. With 121 cards in the game you can tell someone's deck after the first 2 cards. If you not spending money you aren't getting far. Champions were unquire, now you can put 2 in your deck. Evos are OP n you can have 2 in your deck. Half the deck can have OP cards. To have said OP cards leveled or even available within reason time you have to spend money. With each update its more money needed to spend or get left.

It's fun for a bit, but after a handful of hours of play it will begin to constantly match you vs players that are way above your level in what appears to be a blatant attempt to manipulate you to pay to win (their primary way of making $). The grind becomes nearly unbearable, especially w. no concede button. It's a bummer they sold out to greed rather than make this a pure skill game, cuz the core game is pretty fun. But no matter how much skill you have, the bad design rewards unit level more.

Progression is now slower than ever due to recent nerfs. Even if you buy the battle pass ($13), it doesn't provide a meaningful amount of resources. Maxing out a deck now takes either ~1 year of grinding, or $100. I've only given 2 stars because there are still game modes where all cards are set to the same level, which equalizes the playing field.

I played the game from the beginning. I haven't played for awhile, I came back cause of nostalgia and it was completely different. it became so pay to win. I miss the old clash where rare was rare and legendary was legendary, now you can buy everything ingredients the first arena lost a player here can't play with this going on

the game is very good but the only concern is that this game is stuck at 97% loading ... I tried restarting the device and the game by reinstalling it but it is still stuck ... I cleared the cache and my wifi connection is also perfect ... I dont know what happened and I eventually quit the game and when I tried to open it after 1 year or something the problem is same....

I played this Game for over 6 years playing thousands of battles. Free to play. Over time this game became more and more pay to play adding level 14, 15, and now 16 adding broken evos that would then get nerfed to the ground the next month wasting all the time and energy needed to get it. Now they added Heros which is not just a lazy gimmick that wasn't implemented well but just adds more difficulty to gathering cards and gimmicks needed to build the deck that you want to play.

Never left a review for anything before, but had to for this new update. It really shows how you care for your player base with all these new updates coming out. Thanks a lot supercell. Edit: I hate this game even more. I cant even get to ranked where theres at least a lvl 15 cap on cards cause I face a 2-3 lvl difference at 10k. At least let ranked be open to more people so I can play at an even playing field and people can actually beat me with skill.

Do not play this game if you aren't prepared to pay at least 20$ a month.This game is not free to play friendly and requires a substantial time investment to play competitively. When you begin to feel like your getting to the end of the grueling level system, they'll move the goal post by adding a new level and continue to demand you pay for the new monthly overpowered troop in the shop.

not worth your time. I've been playing this for years and was okay with a good chunk of the changes over the years, but now all my books were converted to 20% of the8r actual value. Was it too difficult to let us use them on the level 16 update? the pass has been losing value over time and everything including the loot box's value has gone down with every change done to the game. give your time and money to a company that really does listen to you instead of their shareholders

Been playing for years, 15k trophies, made it very far in the game, but they've finally ruined it with the recent updates. Way too many overpowered cards that aren't fair to like 90% of the rest of the cards. Getting your king 3 shot by a level 22 minipekka that kills 7 level 15 cards beforehand just gets so boring. The game is very boring unless you pay to max all your cards and buy the newest stuff asap. Don't waste your time if you haven't played before.

Fun but encouraged to pay to win. I've played for about 4 months and it's very fun. Personally I have never spent a dime on the game but I still have lots of good items. If you want to have lots of good loot without paying, you'll have to grind the special events and battle pass a bit. But luckily they're pretty frequent. As I'm writing this, in a day, they'll have and event where you can get a free evolution which, for those who don't know, are highly valued. All together, very fun and unique.

A year ago it was possible to get to the top totally free to play (went to 10k wich was the maximum without spending a single dime) but it is not possible anymore as they removed almost every way to get free stuff and blocked behind a paywall the new additions wich are RIDICULOUSLY broken. They DON'T CARE about their playerbase. My note before that was 4/5 but is now the minimum. The only good points are the very low data usage and they don't use AI but that's all.

This game uses bots and complex algorithms to make sure you always win after a losing streak, and lose after a winning streak no matter what. The algorithm scans your deck to see which cards you're playing, then if you've been losing it generates a bot with bad counters for your deck or the bot's deck gives your deck so much value. (If you have goblin curse, the bot will have swarm cards). If you've been winning vice versa. It's also very pay to win. Basically, the game is a casino on your phone

I don't know if I've ever seen a game become so bad over time with a company that acts like it hates its players. I've been playing on and off for 9 years and they've finally put me off to it. Don't bother getting into this game unless you want to spend hundreds of dollars to even have a chance at competing. Unbelievably pay to win, and the new hero cards and level 16 throw any sense of balancing out the window in an attempt to get even more money from you. Used to be a good game

This game is such a cash grab and unless you are willing to spend money you won't really have fun. even if you spend a few bucks here and there and spend time upgrading cards they will eventually release new cards that you will need to spend money to get access too. these cards are insanely over powered and basically eliminates any possibility of free to play players being able to win. This game is becoming like pixel gun 3d. Just with more of a playerbase

If you have money, you can easily beat this game. And supercell makes it worse every update. There is NO tactic or strategy for at least mid to late-game if you are willing to spend money and free to play is almost impossible unless you play for a very long time. With the addition of a new level every year you will NEVER be max level.

(2025)update! game is still definitely unbalanced even 10 years later. Fun to play for a bit but after awhile it's the same as any other game. The play to win features are still OP THIS IS A PAY TO WIN GAME. (2016)But 3 hours 8 hours 12 hours to open chest. Is waaaaay. To long. That coupled with on a 4 chest que only let's you play 2-3 times a day. UNLESS you buy gems constantly to instantly finish the chest. This is a FOR PROFIT GAME 100%.

What in the hell??? ive had this game for 6 years, theres 1 emote in the past i VIVIDLY remember grinding for in an event, and it was a limited one, in the cartoony one related to the animated series on this game, but despite EVERYTHING i scouted my account as ive reecently reopened it after a year or so and SO MUCH OF MY PROGRESS IS JUST GONE. i was on a much higher arena as well, im going to continue to avoid this game like the plague. hours of torture for nothing.

I loved this game once. The gameplay was really fun and the base is still a great game, but greedy supercell monetized the game to another level. When you mention Pay 2 win I'll think of this game first. It's not even funny. Skill isn't needed to climb the ladder. A piece of advice: don't spend a single cent on this game and don't break your phone out of rage. Remember that THIS is a BAD game. may the force be with us

this game is absolutely horrendous for one's mental health, it has never been properly balanced, it is incredibly pay to win, repetitive and I cannot think of a single time this has ever been fun. The game only is surviving off hype from big creators and its addictive nature. if I could give it a zero I could, though that still may be giving this too much credit. So put plainly this game is not good, you will usually, if not always, lose to the person who has more money in the bank. Do not play.

game is genuinely fun but unfortunately riddled with the NEED (yes need) to make in-app purchases, whilst giving the idea that it is free-to-play. Before heroes this was manageable, but leaving these clearly game-winning cards behind a paywall, + increasing the level cap once more, + removing alternate forms of progression to ensure in app purchases is just evil. Just make it a premium game and tone down the free slop. You're shooting yourselves in the foot

ok I like the game but new stuff like merge tactics is bs. I win 4 times in a row and in 2 matches I'm out while other people I've beat are losing more often and still in it. if you play the game you will understand what I mean. there is no way to contact supercell to show instances for corrections. I used to buy the pass but not worth it. this is pay to win fully. if I could give 0 stars I would. only reason I play is so I can play with my son

Why is the Pass $12! it should be $5 max! So much more people would buy it! For some reason I spent so much money on the game but I'm not buying passes unless their $6 or less! Greed, So much Great Potential! Love the game but.... I will admit I left the game for 8 years because I'm not waiting to open one chest at a time! thankfully chests are instant now!

A very fun and addicting game for a while. But if you're free to play don't bother. The game was the best that I've ever played it as in the last few months (I've been playing for four years) but then supercell decides to add broken heroes that are very hard to get for free and level 16. All supercell cares about is money. Would not recommend it for people that want to progress as free to play.

I dislike that they have added level 16 into the game. My main issue is that they locked Ranked mode which is capped at level 15 is locked behind ladder which has all level 16s. This means 3 shoting goblins, lava pups, and log doesn't kill dart goblin. Many of these crucial interactions makes the game depressing instead of fun since it is pay to win instead of skill. I'm a solid player (~65% win rate), but the level gap has me about 50-50 now.

I usually never leave a review but it is unbelievable how the devs can make the game so bad. In the last update where they added heroics and level 16 everything became so much more pay to win. I have been playing for 6 years as a free to play and got to 10000 trophies recently. But the game is not fun, every game I face against people with the musketeer hero knight with everything 2 level higher than I have. The devs don't care about the players they just want to make more money. Don't reccomend

I 1-star'd this game back in 2018, but thought I'd come update my review. came back to play it this year because one of my friends mentioned they had a new game mode. In the few months I've been in, I've seen how egregiously pay-to-win the normal game mode is, and the devs are leaning more into it now. Raised max level (again) and just being as anti-consumer with every change as possible. Wouldn't recommend it to anyone.

As a f2p player. i can confirm that it is nearly impossible to progress without money. every update this game adds makes it feel like they wanted us to give up. ive spent most of my days grinding and yet i still cant progress. Evolutions, Champions, Lvl 15 is already enough to make it frustrating without money, and now Heroes? winning isnt about skill anymore. its about luck. 3/10 not recommended.

Silencing creators is not nice. Forcing professional platers into paying for in-game items in order to have a levelled playing field with other top players is not cool. Forcing high-level players into purchasing in-game items in order to keep up with other high-level players is not cool. Do not download this game unless you support corrupt and greedy companies.

I've played this game since it first came out (over 7 years) and I still don't even have a quarter of the cards in the game at a playable level. It has gotten so bad, you actually would not be able to enjoy this game without spending money. At this point the only requirements to be put on the dev team is to love money and HATE the game your supposed to be developing.

Dont even bother playing the game if you dont plan on spending money. The game has gotten to a point were if you dont spend money you wont be getting anywhere. Game use to be fun, but now its just who can spend the most money. Cant you do 2 different leagues? one were people who actually play, play the game and the people buying everything play against each other? like how are people supposed to play without spending money and falling behind. guys wake up, honestly

they are just killing what used to be a great game.. saved magic items for years in case they ever added level 16, and unfortunately they did, however on the same day they added level 16 they removed all my items. im a casual player and I played a few games every so often, never saw a notice that my items would be removed. in exchange I got 6k gems which was enough for 1.5 upgrades when I had enough books to do maybe 12 upgrades

The game takes eternity to load, the help and support button pops up which is useless as you cannot contact them. observing this for the last 3 days with no resolution whatsoever. This game never had such an issue in the 9 years of its history. And lastly, don't blame it on the network, I am streaming 4K content while your game is busy loading. Edit: After a week worth of good experience, it is again doing the same thing.

Incapable support team. Accidentally requested to delete my information. It's now been over 3 weeks and they failed to respond to any of my messages saying I wanted to reverse the decision. I now not even able to load the support in app. So I've emailed them and they said to message them in game which I can't. I've provided proof that I can't message in game and they simply say all options have been exhausted and they couldn't care less about me. Only been playing their games for 10 years. Waste

Small indie game dev studio apparently lacks the budget to fix constant crashes and freezes on a MOBILE GAME. My PC runs any modern game on ultra but this little chatGPT-coded menace is beyond modern technology it seems. Aside from terrible performance, Pay-To-Win is rampant, matchmaking puts you against kids who stole their mom's credit card and went on a shopping spree. Decent for just wasting time but don't take this game seriously.

I was an OG in this game, and I used to love it. Used to. Pay to win is a massive problem in this game. I have met level 10 players with literally level 14 cards. Yall either need to change your system that pairs the fighters so an op pay to winner faces another instead of someone who would rather play with skill. Granted, I'm no champ, but pay to winners raise the bar from challenging to impossible. 3 years after this review, same story. even in casual matches the troops are not the same.

Ive been playing for 9 years, when they made the max lvl 15, they made it extremely hard if not dang near impossible to get from lvl 14 to lvl 15 so I quit. Now they changed the lvling system back to the original way and added a new level. I Quit playing because they made it so hard to level up and now I need to gain two levels to be max lvl again. Extremely upsetting all that time I spent trying to level my cards to level 15 is now wasted.

Game can be really slow. If you get really high on trophies, if your like me it gets hard to tap on the battle button on fear of losing your trophies. There needs to be a game mode to play all the time and still getting rewards for it. Limited game modes are fun and all, but once you use your free entry, it's like u have to spend like 5 dollars just to lose again.

Okay so I've been playing this game since it came out and there's always been one problem, there just isnt a story mode or a way to make the lore go further, and sure they can introduce animated videos but those don't add to a legitimate story for newer players, and yes its just a mobile game but still I just wish there a story mode Edit 2025 Dec. so uh this isn't looking good right now and turns out you can get a Duplicate of the Heros from the event even if you bought the Hero already. sad

The transition from skill-based to pay-to-win has ruined the experience. We went from rewarding strategy and hard work to rewarding the deepest pockets. Pulling a Legendary means nothing when someone can just buy their way to a maxed-out deck in five minutes. It's a slap in the face to the veteran players and a barrier to everyone else

This game has become complete garbage! I've been playing for 8 years and have enjoyed this game for quite some time, but very well, may quit. The creators have become incredibly greedy, only caring about the pay to play players, making it very easy for those who've only just started to sore past veteran players that have played for 7, 8, 9, years even. goodbye to the honor this game once had.

Hero's update absolutely destroyed this game's balance and the point of evolutions. Im currently in dragon spa and can't get past it because of it. It came to a point where I almost quit, and now its the same process. I win, then I lose to hero's. I've been playing for about 4 months now, and this is one of the most unbalanced things Clash Royale could add. I am dissapointed to see people abusing the Hero's, Becuase Hero's are most likely easier to get than evolutions. im quitting.

The latest update, pure stupid! Apr 2023. Smh, this game going downhill fast! Been playing 6 years, this last year truly disappointing! Nov 2025... been playing 9 years... they made it worse! I need to free up another 1 gb just for the update... they changed the game up so much it's not fun anymore. I can benefit more by deleting the game and free up 2gb plus... They messed it up! Dec 2025... another heavy memory update required! At the same time I need to press a reward 5 times to get it, smh

It's a great concept, but it's ruined by the whole progression element. Levels serve no purpose other than to frustrate you enough to pay, and they keep releasing new levels and broken mechanics. Would've been great if it was just paid so they didn't have to have progression at all.

I'm a somewhat long time player, and the game was relatively fair a majority of the time when it came to matchmaking. But with the most recent updates that have rolled out, it makes it impossible for any free to play player to realistically have a fighting chance competitively now. Absolute garbage update. If you aren't willing to spend tens or hundreds of dollars, don't bother with this game. If you don't believe me, feel free to download the game and take a quick glance at the shop.

After the level 16 update, game experience is abysmal. Free 2 play is absolutely dead, and even though I have bought passes, gems, etc in the past, this is just a blatant money grab that I refuse to support anymore, even though this has been my favorite mobile game FOREVER. This is embarrassing, especially since CR is the top earner for Supercell these days. Pay to win and dopamine releasing mechanics have ruined what was once a really great thing.

game isn't balance as a whole. between champions, evos, and card level itself you're constantly just hoping for a good queue and not someone who out levels you in every way. cards dont matter if your good, to a point, but once you get to that point, it feels like eating bricks. the only way to progress is accumulate cards for a year or buy the all too convenient card packs. Clan wars suck too. just going against cards and towers 3-4 levels higher on average than my highest every game. no balance

Stay away new players, the progression system with the most recent update is the worst it's ever been. I cannot imagine how frustrating it would be to try and catch up to players at King lvl 14/15/16 with how you get cards now. The game is not fun when you are getting stomped and it's become the most pay 2 win mobile game I've seen in awhile.

The core of the game is one of the best for a mobile game I've ever seen, the game mechanics are great, the art has solid personality, and the pvp is very challenging (High skill ceiling). But the game is heavily held back by how difficult it is to upgrade cards, and progress in terms of power in general, this takes off 2 stars, because I think it's intentional to force your hand into paying for the vast amount of micro transactions in the game.

The game looks horrible on PC with the units have a "fuzzy" outline around them. Devs need to look into this and bring the quality up so it is on par when compared to how it looks on the phone. I have already played with the ingame settings and google play settings before anyone asks. It does nothing.

After picking up the game I discovered that the game has gotten worse in terms of pay-to-win. Older regular players may have gotten evolutions but newer players are stuck to either grind the battle pass to get 2 measly shards or either use the best Evo ever, the credit card. Yes, you can beat the game with one single card, the credit card. With this revolutionary card you get access to stuff in an instant where other players have to play hours and hours to even have the chance to unlock it!

It’s extremely difficult to log in, the signal suddenly disappears during gameplay, as if it’s already been set up to let the opposing side win. This is a trash game. Even though the game has been around for a long time, they refuse to change the algorithm to attract players. Instead, it’s getting heavier and more unclear.

12/8/25- Got worse. 10/13/24- Didn't think this game could get even more p2w, but it somehow did. Don't expect to get anywhere in this game past midgame without dropping big bucks on overpowered cards that you can get for only 99.99! These developers have gotten too fat on this game to care anymore 12/13/20-This game is pay to win. And you have to pay big as well. Don't even try the challenges/ tournaments. Also, game is so laggy and keeps crashing, they should change the name to Crash Royale.

I've been playing since this game started. All the time and and money spent on this game to get where I have gotten has been negated with the recent update. I am beyond frustrated. I am uninstalling. Match making has always been terrible. This has truly become a pay to play game. Don't waste your time!!!!

I have been playing for 9 years. this "new" update ruined the game for me I already couldn't get Evos, and they act like it's a balanced game, out of 30 games I will play 25 Megaknights. its boring, instead of making Evos more accessible they made a new troop type the hero that u can only get if u buy their battle pass. I'm not doing it. im free to play and always will be. adding level 16 was a huge mistake. only pay to win players can keep up. the "free shop" update is also 5.99 per card.

Every single update the game gets continously worse, even at its peak popularity it just becomes more pay to win and worse for free to play players. It's usually fun but just degrades as you keep losing to people who spend all their money to max out their cards and just buy their way to the top. Additionally, the progression has become terrible, you can rarely upgrade the cards you want to upgrade, and with the removal of books, it just gets worse. Good game, progressively downgrading.

It was fun ay first but as you progress u just meet enemies with high levels. Especially in the right ranks. Game is unplayable with other players having more levels than you . Note to all new f2p players just uninstall the game. Because it's going to be frustrating getting beaten by a higher level deck and to addition on level 16 it made the game even more unplayable thanks to clash Royale

The game is HEAVILY fixed. Very easy to lose 10+ in a row because the game doesn't register that u are putting units down which can leave a big delay in putting units down. Worth a look and still fun to play but you will never win many in a row. often have team mates quit in 2v2 as well. Nov 2025 update: now you can just pay to win by levelling up you team in a way you WON'T be able to do if you play it without buying gems......sell outs

I've been playing CR for 7 years. Needless to say, the game is power creeped like hell. Yes, it's fun, but a free to play player is going to suffer way more than a whale due to iffy progression and previously mention power creeping, and that's just the start. A point not talked a lot is toxicity in the game. With no reporting of players due to potential cheating or anything, it just clans, which is useless. It creates an unsafe environment, and also don't delete reviews Supercell, K thx.

Extremely pay to win. The main game mode is not catered towards people who don't want to spend money. At 7.9k trophies I'm facing people with an average level of one/two higher than my own cards. Playing anything other than the rotating game modes or the win challenge (that cost premium currency to enter) is an extremely frustrating experience when you lose to people that have dumped more money into the game than you.

After 9 years of playing this game (got into it about 6 months after launch) It was incredibly difficult to watch the game fall from where it started. The developers have gone from inspired to money motivated easily tilting their one of a kind game for a quick buck. I have spent time learning each mechanic, drop squares, elixir management, opponent cycling, kiting, direct & indirect counters, pro tips, specific card drops and so much more to ultimately lose to someone who spent $14.99. SMH

Clash Royale has become more pay to win in recent years. It's a brilliant game but money can buy you too much of an advantage. I have hit ultimate champion and have enjoyed the game as a free to play player, but recently pay to win has made it much harder to progress. The game now requires consistent grinding and even then it's quite hard to level up your cards to the max level. Not to mention the evolutions and heroes that you have to pay for as well. It's a great game but also a bit pay to win

The game itself is awesome. But the problem is that the system pairs you with players who buy with money and as a f2p player you are cocked. It's just not fair for you to play as a f2p player with 12 level towers and 12 level cards to get paired with someone with 15 towers and cards. So if the pairing system is kind of fixed with this issue then it would be very helpful. So it would be better if you get paired with someone with your level cards and towers. The game is pay to win.

This game is strictly pay to win with the recent changes. Also their new way to keep you down in the rankings is for you to suddenly have connectivity issues. This only happens when you are playing meaningful (Trophy Road) games causing you to lose those trophies. For your mental health and well-being don't even download this game.

This game is actually really fun at the beginning until you realize it's a full-on cash grab without any sort of campaign mode. the first experience I had was getting into a clan that booted me for not going to some weird infinite gem website. and then I kept playing and realized that there's actual buyable consumables that make your cards stronger. literally pay to win. you'll notice it later when you get to people who just like threw out three or four combos of whatever and spam emotes

this game used to be fair and fun, but now it is super pay to win. with the new "heros," its more like pay 20 bucks for every new op thing that comes out EVERY MONTH or be terrible,, and just super unfun for free to play. you can access the content of p2w, but it can take 3 months to even access an evolution, one of the most basic charecter upgrades, while p2w gets 1 every month, not counting how much they can get from the shop.

it is absolutely NOT a free to play game.. just fyi, you will never be anywhere even close to finishing the game no matter how dedicated you are, unless you pay up you will never actually be able to play competitively. The higher-ups pulling the strings on this game care about nothing more than making money. player experience? balanced economy? nah, as long as they are making money everything else is irrelevant. Honestly, the decisions they're making makes me wonder how this game isn't dead yet

Very wonderful and FABULOUS game. If ignored that it can be highly addictive but GREEDYCELL wants to Empty our Banks. The game at its Prime when it was launched was SUPER FUN and not P2W at all but as Time Passed, GREEDYCELL or ZEROBRAINCELL started becoming MORE and MORE Greedy after each UPDATE. Till now I Have Somehow managed to not Spend a SINGLE PENNY in the game and ONLY I Know how I am Progressing in the game. Smaller Level (F2P Players) get matchmaked to Larger levelP2W

biggest Pay to play game in app store. No matter how much you spend game let's you win just enough to stay interested. algorithm will match you to opponents with counter decks and you'll spiral down in points loss after loss. it's to get you to buy upgrades. you'll win a little then cycle repeats. been playing this game 5 years. i speak from experience not opinion

I keep having the same problem frequently where when connected to wifi the game drops out and I lose connection. This is particularly frustrating as it usually happens mid-game. I have no such issue with ANY other app or game and all other devices stay connected so I know it is not WiFi and my phone is relatively new. it also never happens on mobile data. please fix!

I cannot recommend this game in its current state. It has become heavily pay-to-win. The developers frequently release 'evolutions' that are overpowered, wait for players to spend money on them, and then nerf them into the ground shortly after to force you to buy the next thing. It’s a frustrating cycle that makes the game more stressful than fun. Save your time and your money

I have played in this game for about 4 years and I could say now that the game has to remove or change options to pay money. There is the shop where you could buy some updates or new cards for your deck for games coins but you also have the option to pay money or just buy a pass royal. And in my opinion this is terrible because you could play in this game for all your life but your deck and your cards will be weaker than some guy who just started playing but he spent money in this game.

the game is fun for a while then you will reach a point where most games are unfair as one player (usually the opponent) is a higher level but this doesnt mean it is impossible to get to a higher arena, it simply makes ir harder and less fun as you will lose and a satisfying win streak is almost impossible, after you get to a high trophy count only then can you play on a even playing field

the newest update was one of the worst things this game has ever done. ive been playing for 9 years, ive seen everything with this game. introduction to champions, evolutions, level 15 has all made this game impossible to play as a free to play player. ive put good money just to compete but now after this horrible update i have to pay more, losing all my wild cards i had been saving for years and giving me gems? on top of that welcome to another step of bs with level 16. Im done with this game.

The levelling system throws all strategy out of the window, Champion and evolution cards are a really great concept, but they're way out of reach for casual players. It's not terrible, but I wouldn't recommend it either. 16/12/25 Edit: Lowering it to one star. They will push updates against the players' wishes that have no effects on gameplay and only serves as an excuse to enlarge the gap to reach a MAX level. I wish I could praise the game for it's innovative gameplay but It's just terrible.

The Game overall would be flawless, I actually liked the concept of evolutions at first. Not for long tho cause the game started to make it harder and harder 4 free 2 play players (missimg Seasonshop worse chest, lucky drops etc.) The developers are basically breaking their fingers just so they can spit pit more unbalanced troops, evos, towers and levels. It was one of the greatest games of all time but now it's nothing more than a cashgrab Matchmaking especially in clan war is terrible

I've held a 5 star review on this game since I was in middle school. I am now a college graduate updating my review to a 1 star. The dev team is not listening to the community at all and punishing those who seek to play this game for free or just for fun. Constantly raising prices for anything while creating new levels out of thin air to make people purchase more while also removing any rewards from non-comp game modes. I have had to upgrad my deck to max level 5 times now. Gross incompetence.

I've always enjoyed this game ever since it launched initially. However, recent choices with their updates make it clear what direction they are taking with this game. New champion cards on top of evolution and another level all in one update and a gem system that is outrageously poor. Strictly pay2win. Cause even with any freebies they provide, the players will have to continue chasing the new champions that release and further spend or grind even harder to keep up. Supercell, do better.

Spend 9 years playing the game, hit max level now Supercell decides to raise the cap. leaving all the work put into getting to max to end up meaning nothing. let's not forget though, if you spend money you can hit max again in no time :). all they want is to suck as much money out of your pockets as they can. Don't bother wasting your time, the best days of this game are long gone and are not coming back.

The game is fun. However, there are far too many cards to collect. They did not scale the card collecting, as new cards were added, effectively. You will hit a wall around lvl 9/16. Be ready to grind for another year or two, if you want to try to max your cards. Would not recommend playing the game until they fix card acquisitions from lvl 9 - lvl 16.

This game is incredibly frustrating to play as you can have the highest level troops you want, but if you don't pay to get the evolutions for your troops, you will continuously lose. The evolution aspect of this game is complete rubbish edit: They have now added an obscene amount of evolutions that are broken and never patched. With the addition of level 16 troops now, this game is incredibly pay to win. garbage.

TL;DR: Nice game, but you have to spend real money so you could play against players that are same level as you.---A qualitative game and very nice and sometimes relaxing, sometimes competitive enough.---Animations are very nice, the quality also.---But in most cases matches are „rigged” somehow (the trophy road and clan wars) as they put you in the same match with players with high card levels. A weak move, made by companies trying to make you spend real money in game so you can advance._ 2.5/5

The idea and mechanics of the game are S+++ tier. The development/ marketing of the game is dog slobber, which literally ONLY wants money!!! They introduce new mechanics perhaps a bit too often BECAUSE you gamble for your favorite new mechanic that you get UNLESS you spend your hard earned money constantly, you will quickly be left in the dust. This game has died before and it's NO SUPRISE THAT IT IS DYING AGAIN!!! There has to be a REAL change in development and cost for it to be worth.

One of the best games I ever played, you have skill, startegy and anything you need in a good game. You collect cards and upgrade them and you play multiplayer with others and you can play with friends. You can join a clan with friends or not. What makes this game soo good you cant stop grinding trophies!

so much fun🙂.. just throw money at the game and get higher level cards and you win... and the games I enjoy the most are the one where I have overleveled cards ... you can't win when you have under leveled cards .... and the solution to get leveled up your cards faster is throw money at supercell Coc is dead because of too many levels ... and this game will also be dead within a year or two .. because of too many levels... currently level 16 wow.....

It's been 3 months and mighty miner and hero knight STILL are bugged in clan wars. Every game I play with them has no ability button. They're vital cards to my decks and I've lost many matches since I go to tap the ability button and IT'S NOT THERE. I'm in a top 100 clan war clan and this is make or break for me. Love the game otherwise but fix your bugs sheesh. The only way I can get across to you guys is through this review. I'll change it back to 5 star once this is fixed, this is so slack

Once upon a time I was a maxed player, but that is no longer possible to achieve without dumping thousands of dollars into this game. Supercell continues to squeeze out as much money as possible the game continues to get worse. Hero's and level 16 updates have fully turned this game into pay to win. If you have any desire to be competitive in this game you will have to spend money.

Insane pay to win, I've played this game since it's release and have had so much fun. When they added Merge tactics I loved the game as if it were my first time playing it. Now this recent update ruined the mode. I introduction of a paid ruler to build a base is super unfair. they have so many thing on the board and you can't really win against them. This has ruined the game for me.

My experience in this game was good until I got to arena 15 and up, the game felt unplayable. I had level 10 to 12 troops but that didn't matter when my opponent could just place a level 15 mega knight on my push and there is nothing I can do, The game also seems really confusing and Pay to win. why can people who pay to play even be matched up with people who have lower level troops, does that seems smart to you supercell? It's not fun if your opponent only needs one troop to win.

Game hasn't even opened in weeks, spent 50 bucks and barely used it at all. Waste of time and money. Do NOT play at all costs. Way too buggy to the point of litterally unplayable. Gameplay is subpar, and I can't even describe the graphics because kids play this game.

its good initially and has so much potential. i get the part where companies have to make money and i wouldnt mind spending money on skins and designs, but whats the point of paying to progress in a strategy game? connected to a 5g wifi and suddenly when I am matched against a pass royale player the network isnt sufficient? its not even worth trying to keep going on after 6k trophies.

P2W and Horrible matchmaking I get that they want you to stay at .500 for your win percent, but their matchmaking takes any and all skill out of the game, if you make a deck, and win a match, you are almost guaranteed to face a deck that hard counters yours completely. Most players at the top have spent hundreds, if not thousands of dollars to level up their cards, since playing free to play doesn't get you anywhere. this game USED to be great, it was an actual skill based game, but not anymore.

This game may be free to play but surely it isn't free to win. It's for those Credit Card warriors. It will take you years to max out a single card. not to mention the 100+ cards. And the recent update solidified it even more. It should have been a strategy game. Not Credit Card game where The One who spent a lot has a full maxed out deck and wins. I know because I have played for years yet I don't even have a single lv 15 card. note that lv 16 is max. most of my cards are lv 10 and 11.king lv14

The game has been ruined by constant money grabs and rug pulls. despite playing for the entire history of the game and having every card, I dont stand a chance against any of the pay-to-win additions. The game is no longer a competitive esport and has been reduced to a gatcha rock-paper-scissors style casino. The most recent update wiped all of the resources I had built up in return for almost useless currency. I played for the last time today. Time again the player base has been trolled.

This game is fun, it has a distinctive charm that has never gotten old. The gameplay is completely unique with plenty of variety between the cards you can play with and against. However, if you're a free to play player, it will be a monstrous task when it comes to grinding and leveling up your cards. Otherwise the game is near perfect, aside from a few card balances that should be done.

game is rig... the algorithm they set up, allows you to win no more than 3 games straight guarantee if you know how to play. after it starts to pair you up with your counters, back to back so you lose no matter what to let others win 100%... game is about skill if both decks are balanced with each other's counters but if one side has all the counters to your deck, you're done... played since it came out nearly 10 years ago , it has become pay to win at this point...

it's great in the fact that it's one of the only remaining games that has no ads. BUT, it is a massive cash grab. I started playing again after a few years of not playing (I just got my 9th year of playing the game badge) and since I've returned I've realised, if you're not playing the 'meta' decks or have evolution cards, you're no match for ANYONE youreplaying. the match making is abysmal, the progressing is incredibly slow, and if you don't fork over dozens of $$$ for this game. You wont win.

I really like all the updates and features they have been implementing, but it's just so hard for new players. Most of this is because the gap between level 1 to 16 is too big and with the editions of heroes, which are too hard to get, it just makes it too hard for free to play players.

6 years. I've played for 6 years on and off, I'm at every card over lvl 10 and at 9926 trophies at the time of writing this review and I'm done, never hitting 10k. after the evos were added I considered dropping this game finally but the heros have definitely solidified it, AND YOU REMOVED BOOKS?? I SAVED THEM MFS FOR Y E A R S and now they're just gone. it's disgusting how this company has taken a well made game, with an enjoyable gameplay loop and turned it into a ptw, micro transaction sim

level 16 update undermines all free to play players. removing books and elite wildcards and replacing it with a "gem economy", just made everything more expensive. free to play players have to play against overleveled cards again for months. without books or elite wild cards, progression is just back to being based on RNG. unless you pay 3000 gems (around 25 euro's) to max 1 card of course!! major cashgrab. and i didn't even mention that heroes will only be available to you if you buy the pass.

Level 16 and heroes have essentially killed the game, right as it hit the peak of its popularity. They also secretly nerfed progression at the same time when introducing these "features". The fundamentals of this game were very good before they introduced all the gimmicks. But corporate greed and hubris has grievously wounded what was once a great experience. Unless Supercell makes fundamental changes, avoid this game for now.

I used to love this game and I played it for years. However, the newest update is the most astounding in years of turning this game into a pay to win experience. Like most apps, the developers have prioritized money over game play as time as progressed. It's unfortunate but now I wouldn't recommend downloading this game unless you plan on spending a lot of money. Update as of December 2025: tried the game again and it's even worse than before. Play anything else, this app has become trash.

Now that the Class Royale cards are out of season, the game is no longer as fun as before. Those who spend money to increase their card levels are getting more benefits. So why do I need to open the chest? If I don't get my cards, starting from the tower, if everything has to be bought with money, then I need to buy it with money on the Play Store. No matter how high I try to go to the arena, it's impossible because my opponent's card level is higher than mine because he spent money. If this con

I am coming up in a decade of playing this game now and can say that over the past 4 or 5 years it's gotten continually worse, the Balancing is an issue that takes millennia to sort out, the playerbase is awful, the monetization is the least player friendly experience imaginable. with the new hero update it's only gotten worse.

I've been playing this game for years now, but slowly and surely they have turned it from being a good, fun strategy game you can even co op with a friend to an abhorrent cash grab you've now basically removed or moved the free rewards so there harder to get while filling literal pages full of stuff you can buy which heads up people won't make you any good at the game, please please don't pay for a thing in this game it went from being the best game on mobile to just another cash its worse now

Please do not to spend a penny on this game, nor at any of Super Cell other games, I've spent thousands of dollars on their game, and when I simply lost my account changing into a new mobile, they showed 0 support, you will face negligence, 0 reply to retrieve your account, their in game support doesn't work ,nor they respond to emails!

Amazing game. Amazing idea. Some problems that ruin it, though. First this game has more things you can buy than troops in the game honestly. You can win any game as long as you spent enough to satisfy all mighty supercell. Second, the game supports toxicity. Puts the most toxic emotes behind another paywall too. Clash Royale is like the sin of greed personified.

This is one of the few reviews I feel compelled to share my experience with, because Supercell was one of the greatest companies in regards to creating unique mobile experiences that really were ahead of there time. I played Clash of Clans and Clash Royale for several years, grew up with COC and played CR whenever I had free time im highschool, that being said the company is just so money driven and drove this game into the grave, by prioritizing the pay to play experience over the community.

Overall, this game is not that good. It's addictive, stressful, frustrating, and a loop. The matchmaking definitely needs improvement. As a young free to play player, this is not fair. Even the ai's are higher level than me. Maybe if you had them separated with f2p and p2w, this would have been a better game. 2v2s are pretty fun most of the time, but this game is just not that fair at all. fair matchups are also making this game fun, but that's practically it. Ps, delete "dart goggins"

Fun game, but many times showed no connection to network. Cannot understand why some players have unlimited power to launch so many power continuously. And now suddenly we cannot access using WiFi, but only mobile network? 14/Feb 2026 ; why can't I log in the game with WiFi again?

the addition of another level that no one asked for has truly become the straw that broke the camel's back. This game used to be playable, but because of over leveled players, more and more gimmicks like heroic cards, the game has become close to unplayable for free to play players.

Calling this game 'greedy' is the understatement of the century; it's a financial black hole disguised as a mobile app. I've been a loyal soldier for nine years, faithfully paying my monthly tribute to the developers' yacht fund via the Battle Pass, and yet, I'm still chasing ghosts. Removing level cap progression at ranked - is a betrayal. I am really disappointed

The foundations for a great game are lost. This game is now: - super repetitive = you keep battling very similar cards - level is everything = you start a battle and see higher level cards on the opposite side, you know you'll only be playing defense to avoid total destruction - pay to win (level up) = when you reach a certain level you will need to pay if you want to keep evolving - frustrating = you go from battle to battle in despair for better chances

It's a very good competitive and strategic game. It used to be about outplaying your opponent, but now skill was removed because of greedy developers, sadly. Every once in a while, you need to pay money to get a good evolution/hero in order to actually play the game, because they're stupidly broken. Few weeks later they nerf it and create another broken card, which, shockingly, is also pay to win. The game took a big downfall...

Cheaters... Supercell does nothing, and the AI response is the worst I have ever seen. I uninstalled the game due to lack of punishment and clarity. Secondly, the report system has too many steps, and the team working on the reports is clearly no good, just like the AI system... terrible.

Game has its charm but if u don't give them your wallet you will not be climbing in trophies. The 2v2 mode is also horrible when u play with randoms they need a report feature 6 out of 10 games has a grief that will abandon the match. Play the game if you hate yourself.

The evolution update made this game more pay to win. It's bad enough that the game has imbalanced matchmaking. It's so sad to see a once fun game devolve into unplayable garbage. Just see the recent reviews. Gj CR team for destroying your game. Played again in 2025. Still garbage and unbalanced game. Pay 2 win game. So sad cause cr started as a great game. Now its just unbalanced mm.

This game can be very fun but at the same time be very unfair because to me it seems like there's a huge match making issue. Also how can I get matched with a person who has a lot less trophies than me but get destroyed by them which makes no sense and I shouldn't be losing that. Also what needs fixed is when someone out of nowhere has enough elixir to put down all their cards or more then they should be loud then I lose because I can't get my one down fast enough or whatever else it may be.

Unbalanced. new character kicks all the guys off the screen, no fight even. matched against players multiple levels higher so there's no chance. moved on for the time being. might try in a couple months.

this game is desperately pay to win, every update feels like a new lackluster way of trying to milk the player base into paying for new game breaking advantageous upgrades and as if that wasnt enough reason to not play this game the terrible servers and frequent disconnects (always at the worst possible moment) should add onto that. Save yourself the time, skip this one.

Good game per usual, but the new pass isn't even worth it seems like they are pushing for people to buy more from the store rather than give you enough money to upgrade cards it has taken me way longer to get enough money from the pass than before! and you cant use your google points to get a discount on the battle pass anymore.

This is just another app in a long line of free to play but pay to win games that's designed to frustrate annoy and aggravate it's users into making purchases so if you like feeling cheated while simply looking to enjoy a few minutes of leisure time then this is the app for you. P.S. To download this app onto your device you first must allow the company that owns it , supercell , to share your personal information with some very shady corporations.

I woke up to the new patch and it is horrible they traded in all my magical books and items for a low amount of gems as well as my wilds cards that I have been religiously saving, as a ftp uk how hard it is so get those items and progress in the game. I spoke to the support and they said they gave me the value of my items based on my level not on their actual value. how crazy do people who are lower level suffer because they don't pay for pass royal and spend major money on the game.

as a long player in 10k trophy range I will tell you that the free to play players will not get past the 10k point. throughout the trophy road you will face overpowered pay to win players and it is now worse now that there is level 16 and heros. clash Royale is a money hungry game and I do not recommend for people who want to play the game for a long period of time unless you want to spend all of your money

its pay to win in this game and constant hard counters so you spend money is unbelievable. game is amazing but best believe they only allow you to win so much before matchmaking decides you need to stop winning and pay more money to upgrade cards. to buy a hero it's 15 dollars and you better have at least 1 if you want to compete but really need 2. same with evos if you don't buy 2 evos at 13 dollars a piece you're cooked, you are not competing against better players. it cost thousands to max

it's really fun you can make 100s of different strategies but gameplay needs a lot more variety. bc once you reach a certain level there's only a few strategies that actually work and you play against the same thing constantly. makes the game extremely stale. I just made a new account bc my maxed account just isn't fun to play on anymore. that's not really normal for a max account to have less gameplay options than a brand new one.

SCUMMY AND GREEDY MARKET TACTICS: After a battle, I always spam the okay button. However, they changed it so after a battle a hero shop item pops up EXACTLY where the okay button is. So, after a battle I emedietly and accidentally one tapped purchased the musketeer hero. They also dont allow refunds so if this happens to YOU, good luck..

Jumped on Clash for a game with my little brother, first time playing this game in months. Thought it would be fun to have a 2v2 match, just chill. Immediately get put against some of the worst Pay to Win players I've seen since War Thunder. Think its just a one time thing, lets try again. Boom. Get put against another duo that are sweating so hard I have no idea how their greasy fingers are still registering on their touch screen. Fix matchmaking, or fix the P2W, then its a 4 star game.

ever since this new update, the wifi connection gets very bad and it always shows the red wifi symbol. the gameplay itself is fine, however loading the game, battles and chests take forever. its not my wifi problem because other games works just fine.

i used to play this game years ago .. i reinstalled it and boom i was surprised by the unfair game it has become and you are kind of forced to pay money to stay on the trophy track with the new mods.. unfortunately i'm going to quit the game again.. waste of time for me.

Dont bother downloading if you dont intend on spending money because you will lose most of the time pay to win period. as the game starts opposite player drops over 20 value worth of troops while you struggle to deploy and wait for your value to increase. idk if they're hacking or pay to win cuz I did the maths and there's no way they can deploy that many troops in a short amount of time.

BOTS... SO MANY BOTS... I came back to the game like 2 months ago, and I gained like 3000 trophies from where I was placed during my few year break. MORE THAN 80% OF MATCHES WERE BOTS!! They always use a handful of messages/emotes only at the end or beginning of the match, it gets very obvious really fast cause its super consistent between matches. And some say they're in clans, but you check the battle logs and magically they're clanless the next second... Used to like this game but, wow.

ive never played a game that caters to pay to wins more than this game. the only way to "get better" at this game is to splurge all of your money to this game. it also doesnt help at all that supercell ONLY cares about money and not the players enjoyment. the amount of advertisements to buy something, this recent update which ONLY CATERS TO PAY TO WINS, and the new "heroic" rarity. this game has so much potential. it just needs better matchmaking and LESS ADVERTISEMENTS TO BUY OVERPOWERED CARDS.

Your game is so paid to win now. The introduction of Heros just proved that. Ever since the Evo cards coming into the game, everyone in ranked ladder maxes out their funds to bankruptcy just to max level everything. I miss the old Clash Royale where it wasn't a constant 5th job to level up cards and grind ranked ladder. I've played for 8 years and have a single level 16 (Maxed before Heros) card. A SINGLE ONE. Everyone I face now has full maxed out deck essentially, all 16. Not Fun. All paid.

Great game. Unfortunately it's too ptw. Hit a low point when Supercell removed book of books and added heroes. A company that just wants as much money as possible and doesn't listen to the community. It's a shame because it it an amazing game otherwise

The game is very fun and addictive until you reach 5000 trophies in which you get bombarded with pay to win players , hard counters , megaknight users and more don't bother wasting weeks of your life just to have supercell put you against someone who has the exact counter to everything you have. If you are gonna play this make sure you have more then 50 bucks in account if you wanna progress

I can't play this game. I was playing a 2v2 and when i start the match, i stay stuck in the loading screen and i try to restart it and it doesn't work. Also everytime i load up the game, it just freezes for a couple seconds. So its not me its google play games FIX YOUR GAME SUPERCELL!!

Clash Royale is a perfect example of how to ruin a great game. What started as a skill-based strategy title is now a pay-to-win grind where card levels and evolutions matter more than skill. Matchmaking is unfair, updates add greed instead of balance, and progression is designed to frustrate you into spending money. There’s still a good game underneath, but it’s buried under monetization and bad design choices.

clash royale is a good game ,but there is two reasons 1 pay to win like if don't want to pay anything it pops up telling do you want to buy this starter pack 2 reason the i was a begginer i liked the map at first ,but everything changed on Thursday the map changed this was the worst map ever there is only one tower now and the card they gave us this is the only cards we can use .

Don't play this game if you value your time and money. On a more serious note, this is one of the best mobile games I've played in terms of gameplay, but it is also one of the most predatory. If you want to play at any sort of competitive level be prepared to spend hundreds of dollars or be ready to grind until the heat death of the universe.

came back to the game a few months ago... was having fun but suddenly they raised the level cap and added heroes for $100. no ody asked for or wanted this, and it was so blatantly greed motivated that I haven't touched the game since. I uninstalled just before writing this review. we have to hold these companies accountable.

game isn't worth it unless you pay to play. on top of that, they added evolutions and champions which makes it harder to win unless you pay to have cards that strong. oh and they will constantly put you up against plays of higher levels with stronger cards. all in all, its not worth the time. Im a level 12 fighting level 15s.

great game *update* (changed from 5 to 4 stars) slowly dying in the worst way 😭. the heroes kinda defeat the purpose of the game otherwise alot more people would still play. everyone I know has decreased their playtime on clash ever since the royal hogs Evo has ended. the hero ice golem doesn't do anything and no one in their right mind is buying it for 15 bucks it's a scam.

Supercell, I am so disappointed... you managed to kill the love I had for this game. I've played your game since it came out, and I enjoyed it. I've spent countless hours and a lot of money because I genuinely loved this game, but this update made it unplayable. I was close to finally maxing out my cards, opening new possibilities for new decks, but now I'm stuck with the same 8 cards. And let's not even mention the heroes. I am so done with this game. The gameplay itself is incredible and addictive, but unfortunately the game balance is lacking and monetization is very predatory. While it's still fun to play from time to time, this can no longer be called a strategy game.
