the game is programed to cheat. characters will target stuff that further away and characters that target buildings will target buildings that are further away. the best part is that this company dose not care and have been making that game cheat more overtime. now the game will change your character you chose and not place them where you tild them to on the map.

Level 16 was already a terrible idea (especially for free to play players), but then you add the heroes who are upgrades of already great cards with broken abilities that make the game unplayable. the reason people like champions is because they are high risk cards that will greatly reward you if used correctly. unlike the champions, the heroes dont take skill to use whatsoever.

this game was so fun and easily one of the best mobile games ever, but after they added the level 16 and hero mechanics It has gotten way worse. It's hard to progress when you are free to play, and if you match up against someone who spends money it's easily there win

I used to enjoy this game. Now it's garbage. The AI/matchmaking is complete BS. It either puts you against someone that has all your counters or it shuffles your cards to where you can't counter. Try adjusting a deck for something you've been seeing a lot. Suddenly it switches. Then most people use the same 6 or 7 spam decks, they saw on youtube which gets boring quick. Then there's the new update with the "heroes". Total hack for people to p2p. It's no longer enjoyable.

Love this game - I've played since it came out. Lately, though, it has felt very unbalanced. For example, today someone I was playing dropped a hog rider, followed by a rocketeer, I countered, and he soon followed with lightning (13 elixer total). I turned my defensive troop offensive (this all took place on my side of the arena) and pushed with everything I had. This was to no avail. Not a single point of damage to his tower. This has happened very frequently lately.

Just a bafflingly horrible recent decision to add an extra level to the maximun for cards. Meaning that players who finally grinded to have a max level deck are, overnight, way behind those in the same ranking just because they weren't willing to pay the obscene amount for card upgrades that will just be redundant again in the future anyway when another big change like this is made.

Logic in this game is so flawed. Basically you get 1 game away from next arena, then the coding and matchmaking makes it that you face either an opponent higher arena level than you, or you face an opponent who has a deck perfect to counter your deck. I've accessed the source code for the game logic and it is exactly how I described, it's architecture is so bad.

This game is really fun, addictive, and the strategy is surprisingly complex and deep. Progression is satisfying. However, the game is incredibly pay-to-win. It is extremely commonplace to face opponents multiple levels higher than you, giving you essentially zero chance to win because they swiped their credit card. New updates like an upped level cap and the addition of heroes have only exacerbated this issue. Moreover, the meta is incredibly dominant. You always go up against the same decks.

game is good, the issue is that if you don't put money in the game you will have fair fight 1/5 games, if you're good at the game and don't invest money you will play vs overleveled players and overleveled cards, machmaking is so bad. don't play.

At frist till 2019 the game was great. After that the game only seems to getting worse. Every game I play I lose because my opponent has over leveled cards. ( I am at arena 19 with level 13 cards). Hero update was good but level 16 ruined it. The game is extremely pay to win. Clash rayal team really needs to take a bit of inspiration from clash of clans team as it is free to play and they listen to their community.

I used to like this game, but they added yet an other level, so on this day I decided to stop playing once and for all and say goodbye to this cash grab of a game, it had good potential, but the company is way too greedy and do not deserve this game to be played nor anything to be bought, don't download this game if you want to avoid losing time and money for them to add a new level once you finally reached high enough to play fair games

Upsides The game is fun, up until mid-ladder, and I like the evolution concept. Downsides Make It so I don't go up against a level 14 player when I have level 10 stuff in clan wars. It is just downright annoying. Also, nerf that stupid megaknight, make it cost 8 elixir and drop it's damage by 10 percent. Finally, make It so you can't buy evolutions from the shop, It's annoying enough going up against someone with the broken evolutions.

The core gameplay loop is great, but they are constantly implementing new gimmicky cards that make the game less balanced blatantly for the sake of getting you to spend more money. It's to the point where it's hard to even want to play anymore.

Genuinely used to be my favourite game but aupercells greed has just reached unfathomable levels, nothing will ever be enough for them. They will slowly strangle out anyone attempting to be free to play by power creeping then further and further. Everyone I leave and come back there's a new level cap, a new mechanic that leaves you unable to compete without it or a new broken spell that overshadows all existing ones. So disappointed in this company that I used to love.

I believe part of the game is about leveling up, moving forward in stat and arena so why is it so difficult to move sometimes nowadays I sit behind this game playing over 200 games and keep earning trophy about 30 like bro is so annoying. I've crashed my phone more than 2s because of this

They have genuinely ruined this game beyond repair. Just when I started getting back into the game they add level 16 and now I can't gain trophies because everyone is pay to win. I tried out merge tactics, which when it first launched was fun, but has now also become unplayable. Starting this season in bronze 1 and I still get put up against people with echo sage, who removes the fun from the game by just deleting my pieces off the board. Supercell needs to reconsider their game or it'll die.

P2W, but it is not fillable on low lvl. The general concept of the game is great, but it has a lot of stuff, making it difficult to see through - it just got messy and u keep getting blocked by progression, that u can pay through. They have to fix their methods.

it's a relatively good game because the play style is easy to learn and understand, it gives you a challenge, you beat it, repeat.(edit nov 6 2025) I'm gonna reword that, it's basic and somewhat difficult depending on who you fight. I'm making a 2 stars now from my original 4 because of how pay-2-win it is, and it's not even closely put together how some people are just so good at the game or annoying. it would be nice to be able to be matched with opponents that you can actually beat.

gameplay is absolutely phenomenal but the worst part is the developers become more and more dirty moneysuckers as the years pass. they make new levels which require players to either play the game 24/7 for 2 years to get to(lvl 15 I'm talking to you) or just pay a big sum of money to reach,and when the account is finally max level after all the precious money spent, they go on to add another new level 😂 Also the addition of heroes and all this new stuff is just terrible for the state of the gme

Very Disappointed. This game used to be one of the most fun and addicting games I have ever played, but as of recently, this game has gone down the toilet. It seems like all supercell cares about anymore is money, and if you don't have money, well too bad for you. It's easier than ever for people to pay to win while harder than ever for people to play for free. The additions of evolutions and heros has only made this worse. I used to love this game, now I'm just saddened by what it's become.

Fun but game play is highly imbalanced and matchmaking is poorly handled. Unfortunately I have tried it off and on for over a year now and it seems to get better for a while and then some update happens that completely changes the balance again. That being said the game itself is well done. The current update has some imbalance with a core mechanic called elixir that some generate at nearly double the rate of others with no explanation of why. It's easy to figure out if you count the elixir.

As of January, 2026, with the most recent updates, the new season especially, the game has lost its touch. The game was already fun with the 2v2 having all the cards available, merge tactics was actually enjoyable. The introduction of Hero cards, and different tower rulers essentially makes this game a pay to win crapfest.

literally every update I wonder if you guys actually think before you make your changes. So let me get this straight you just took away all of the cards that I built up over years of playing the game and turned them in to gems, raised the level cap and now instead of having tons of resources to level up cards I have none. And most of that was made thru season passes I paid for. you people are unbelievable. Make what we earned useless to make us spend more money.

It's just pay to win. You can't get the good heroes for free and you can't really level up your deck, even if you get a good version of the new downgraded chest, you'll just get 10 million copies of an useless card you'll never even think of using

The ladder match is so unfair because a level 9 player match up with a max player at 4k trophies like it's need to be fix. I play this game for a year now and the ladder match is super boring and i might never play this game again if they don't fix it in the future. After 6 years still same issue, this game is dumb stupid

Genuinely such a horribly designed game. You're telling me, that this game has an elo system and a rank system but there's also levelling mechanics that does not correspond to your elo system and instead just depends on how much you grind the game? If you keep winning matches and climb the rank system too quickly boom now you're up against people multiple levels above you and they just stat check you forcing you back down. If you're gonna make a comp elo based game don't give it levels.

Absolute turd. The game is rigged, it will let you win 4 to 7 games in a row then will match you up against players who have decks that are a direct counter to yours to cause you to lose game after game after game, nothing to do with skill. You can tell when you're gonna lose a match because you drop a card and there's a whole second delay before it deploys despite being sat next to a router with 150mb/s download speed. It's designed to frustrate you and get you to spend money on upgrades 💩

Stop spiking my cortisol. Matchmaking puts me in with level 16 cards when my deck is primarily level 14. HUGE difference for free to play. The game is extremely pay to win dropping new things for you to buy every month that gives you an unfair advantage until it's inevitably nerfed. Dropping a new level is the worst decision this game could've made. The best part of this game is playing with friends where all your cards are the same level.

Have been playing this for a long time and love Coc and started playing this because of it. I fell in love with it because it was a fun game. It now just feels like a cash grab with a difficult progress system while playing for free. Sadly I'm now out and will end playing this one as it's too much of a commitment/grind for something that should be fun.

Strengths/weaknesses etc of characters change every season. Game play is good, however there is a problem sometimes on how long a characters drop in games.

Please rework on the game,it was peak, nothing was wrong with it, until level 16; heros... came. Fix the game now, or it will make a bigger downfall, many players left it behind,come on, it's never too late.

WOW SUPERCELL! Im really proud of you,adding another level just for mindless players to spend theyre money on and by adding heroes to make the game even more unbalanced.Im a 10k trophies player with level 13 , 14 and one 15 cards' and of course you put me in match with people who have a full level 16 deck I just want to say that i hope this game ends up like squad busters

Absolutely no words needed. The update is so bad. I know they need money but why is it like this man, this update probably biggest cash grab of all time. pay to win, can yall make an update without ruining the game. still have a page on my screen that does nothing. horrible UI and constant microtransactions. ran into a level 77 play who had a 5 year badge. if he didnt spend over 200+ on the game he would not be that level. no Skilled based matchmaking; algorithm for that is evem garbage. game was peak 3 years ago but this isnt even half the game it was

what the hell is this? my game doen't open even if delete the game and reinstall it. use my network or wifi it doesnt open. sometimes. even if it opens cannoy enter a match. no problem with network only this game doesn't work. And this has been happening from 3 days

been a player for 6 years now, playing the game sometimes to spend time but it's just too Pay to win! not to mention the enemies you play againts if you happen to win a single game💔 its a horrible game, basically unplayable if u don't spend money on the game.🥀

I came back to the game after leaving for years and was having fun. I don't pay attention to forums or feeds but it feels like the company does what they want without concern for who gets burned or disappointed with the game. I won't be back.

I quit buying the monthly pass as the mystery boxes take too long to open. placed on a cool down! tf I didn't abandon anything. decent, but pay to win, so it's not fun if you get decently far for free. matchmaking is abysmal and it puts you against people with 3 level higher troops. you'd think a game this old would be balanced better by now smh or at least easier to level up cards for free to play people. Pay to win game. early phase of the game is well balanced and funn, later phase when you get stronger you start to get player that is much better than you. especialy player who is not in clan they are fixed to win the game. so you can win 10 games than lose 20 or so and later you will advanced very very slowly if you dont pay and buy chest and upgrades.

If you have decent internet, it's fun, but when you have a sudden service loss or spotty wifi, enjoy getting your opponent play while you can't. I'm going to uninstall over the frustration this builds. One moment you're winning, then there's a freeze or you can no longer place units. And all you can do is watch your opponent proceed to get the upper hand and accept your loss.

Clash Royale is a fantastic game owned by the greediest most awful game company imaginable. They insist on setting back progression and screwing over anyone trying to succeed in ranked. Leveling a level 15 card to a level 16 card costs 3000 gems, which is the equivalent of 23 real life dollars. This is a stunning price increase from the previous already terrible system where it costed 8 dollars to get a card from level 14 to 15. Do not get this game. You cannot succeed in this game as a F2P.

it's a great game, and I have been playing for about 5 years. I keep had to getting new accounts as a new phone, but then I got a supercell ID. Everything was fine until around September 2025. The game got way too popular. My friends have been playing for like a month and they are in pancakes. a joke. They just spent so much money on the game, and it's just not fun. in arena 15 I met someone who had level 14 king tower and all level 14 cards. The game win. level 16! this game ment so, Much.....

updating my review because this game has taken a massive turn to p2w. my latest dislike of the game has been the gifts, they seriously gotta show they care about the community some how and loot boxes ARE NOT the way. I don't think fast progression is possible at all in any of the game mods, you have to buy things in order to even have access to all the cards in due time. (took me years in fp2).

I loved this game so much, i used to play it everyday for hours but after lvl16 and the "heros" i barely touch it and it now this game depends on pay-to-win, most of it. They are not listening to us and are persisting in their mistake.

coming back to play after years is a lot of fun. no pay to play is necessary. the way they do chest now and how easy it is to get gold there's really no need to pay any money to be competitive unless you just simply lack the skill. the new stuff is fun too, just gotta get used to how the game plays now. It's a lot more fun with heroes being added and card evolutions. you just gotta be adaptable

Ive played this game since the start. the new update just made it bad, yes there are advantages but the bad thing is that players can easily upgrade their card through purchases while some players don't have that type of option available and so it makes battles unfair, even if you are both on the same level.(e.g. if both players are Lv 14, the other players (opponent) might have cards that are Lv 15 or even 16), that just makes the match harder and ultimately makes you not want to play anymore.

Fair play there isn't anything like that in this game.. Pay to win is more likely.. Every match I play with player with two lvl higher cards than mine and guess what they have all evolutions unlocked SHOCKER! How do you play against that, there is only one way PAYING to win.. if you don't balance this problem the game is GARBAGE

love the game, definitely pay to win, I feel I was kinda forced to spend some money on the game to be able to compete with people who spend their wallets on the game. With that said it is a strategy based game so you still have a fair chance regardless. I also think 2v2's should get a little more diversity like adding different game mode types and also please put a rematch button in 2v2's lol.

been playing for 9 years and it's always been fun until they decided to make everything about money. level 16? money required to get those faster than like 1 card per month. heros? 9% chance to get all 4 if you roll 4 times bc you can get duplicates. you have to pay for those too. and evos? they stopped seeing them and decided to keep adding more pay to win heros. thanks for ruining one of the best games of all time supercell 👍

Clash Royale is considered pay-to-win because spending money allows players to significantly speed up card progression, reach higher levels faster, and gain access to powerful new cards and upgrades (like Evolutions and Level 15) quicker, giving them an unfair advantage over free-to-play players in the ladder system, where card levels matter immensely for success. While skill is crucial, paying removes the grinding process.I'd also like to know why I have to restart my game about 3 during a game

impossible to play on pc, game freezes when loading in at 100%, and if i do get into the game, in the middle of most matches the game completely freezes, so i have to restart and hope i can get a match where i can actually play. this has cost me lots of trophies

I've been playing this game for a few years. I think it's a fun strategy game. I chose to leave this review because I don't like some of their business practices. I'm typically not a fan of pay to win games, even if there are matches where your opponent has the upper hand because they have a slightly higher leveled card. but it's the small things they do, like the card offers in the shop sometimes costing gems. I like the game, but I do not think supercell respects my time.

Used to be a really fun game but has taken a turn to greed. every thing is now P2W as well as the developers not fixing bugs that have existed in the game for months. creating a while new cash grab system (Heros) even though the previous system (Evos) was not even finished. community managers do not respond to any user feedback and then proceed to state that "When a great team of developers work on a game, it will always be popular" even though only 3rd party creators only brought popularity.

It's a pretty good game, but the fun gets ruined every 5 games or so when a pay-to-win player with cards 4 levels higher than yours absolutely incinerates you and then proceeds to spam emotes for a minute straight. Not Supercell's fault, but it's still an issue.

played for 4 years reached Ultimate Champion 4 times and played over 10k games. Throughout the years this game doesn't seem to stop disappointing me every update. Every update is power creep and it is exclusive to paid road. To casual players like myself this is a huge set back for competitive play as I get level gapped or card locked as they are brand new. The dev team doesn't listen to content creators or community..

Most pay to win game I've ever seen. You either don't spend money and have no fun and don't enjoy the game, or you spend money and steamroll anyone who hasn't. That is how the game works. Supercell nerfs progression over and over again with every update and continues to ignore the player base. Do yourself a favour and don't play this game.

This game is really fun, but losing 30 trophies for losing one round is a bit much, and I think it's very tempting to fall back down after we've risen so high. And paying to win is ridiculous, especially when kids are playing. But still, the game is very fun and strategy-based

Pay To Play now. last update took away the ability for Free to ppay players to obtain new items. Updated** now they removed ALL of your card books without option of even spending them

I mean bro everything about this game is just so frustrating and its sad because the game has so much potential to be good but greedy supercell devs just refuse to save the game and instead just drive it straight to the ground they know whats wrong with the game few examples are balancing, repetitiveness, its completely pay to win, impossible to progress fast, the matchmaking is rigged etc there's so many issues with this game its insane I recommend no one ever downloads it or deletes it

I wish I could give it -5 star rating. 1st they introduce another cash grab level, again. Now even the game is buggy. Cant login half the time. Game has connectivity issues. And in clan war match champion ability button is not even there. This game should be removed from play store.

I don't like the update. Supercell has found a way to make even more money off the game. You can now pay to upgrade cards with gems. good game but i am finding a lot of cheaters as i struggle getting a 2 elixir when the other player is getting a 5+ and another 5+ with in seconds which is not possible at the same rate im doing 2 and 3. can I suggest as there is a time limit there is a max amount you can spend (elixir) with in a time frame and that be monitored some how.

there's too much no skill players and the new heros? hero Giant was given out the most and its the worst one. they're trying to milk you of your cash because their evil and greedy. you have to buy hero mini pekka to even have a chance at winning. and theres way too much cards that are overused. I love this game so much, Supercell has made it super easy to start a new account with all the shop offers that come out ever week. I rate this game a 5/5 its the best game ever and they love my moms credit card for all the in shop offers.

extremely addicting, fun and lasts a pretty long time with often updates but i hate how p2w the game can be. once past 5k trophies in the trophy road mode i felt it would be impossible to progress without spending money since plays had cards 2-4 levels higher than mine.

Money sucker! The game is fantastic. It's highly addictive once you get the feel of it. The waiting time of the loading screen is goddamn outrageous. at best- id be back at the start screen in 10seconds. worst i ever had? god damn 1 min+ OR NOT EVEN LOADING AT ALL!!! get out of the game, go back in, wait. MORE WAITING AFTER PLAYING THE GAMES. so much WAITING AND WAITING that im just like- okay, woah. im done after 2 games cause aint no way the loading screen takes THIS long to load. and this problem was nonexistent like a year back, why is it now an occurring issue?

I started playing this game in 2016, gameplay is good but the company comes with the most dumb ideas to ruin the game. This is coming from a veteran player who has been playing this game since 2016, this is a highly p2w game, skills matter less than card levels and how many overpowered Heroes & Evolutions are in your deck. unfair advantage makes a huge difference for your chances to win and lose the game.

the game dictates how you win or lose if you spend money it lets you climb if not the game keeps you low, my level 15 troops and king are getting beat by level 11 & 12 troops, dont waste your time on the game SuperCell are getting greedy trying to get you to spend more money, the game is generally to hard now and you cant move up the table anymore. there is absolutely no point in spending money to upgrade troops as you get beat by 3 levels below your troops

The mechanics were unique, fun and evolutionary. However, to reach higher levels you have to use broken cards for a time till you reach really high level arenas. What's the point in strategic tower defense if there are cards that remove the strategy and outperform those with strategy, at least let those putting effort into their plays benefit. for this reason I've uninstalled, and am never returning to clash

Had I been asked to review this before heroes came out, I would have said something nice about this game. But after the new heros update, this game just isnt the same anymore. 3 words:pay 2 win. the game itself is good,but every month there's a new seasonal pass along with broken new cards that you can't play without.In order to get those cards,you have to pay.And there's like 100 offers in the shop that make it look like as if the company is broke even though they make $100 million every month.This game is slowly dying because of the greed behind it & I'm happy to see this game die.

This game used to be so fun but SUPERCELL keeps on adding updates that no one even asked for. Novel experience, but horrendously designed game. Hard coded 1 second delay for troop deployment and it still lags. Interactions depend on invisible variables that are impossible to intuit (don't get me started on true red vs true blue). Rock, paper, scissors archetypes. dont even waste your time

It's it's not the fact this game is not fun to play. it's the fact this game is infested with overwhelming amount of cheaters who use a zero elixir hack , rigged matches and the pay to win..... this game could literally be the greatest game of all time, but yet supercell is so greedy they can care less about players experience as long as they're getting their pocketbook filled. this game is a rip-off. This is a masterpiece and having the ability to join a clan, to get involved. Being able to be part of the clan and helping out for Clan Wars is amazing. 9yr player, it's fun until you get past 5000 trophies, after that it's sweats playing meta or broken cards like meta knight which gets really repetitive going against him every match almost. This game punishes you for being good. This game feels like call of duty coming out with a broken gun every season hidden behind a paywall.

Game is terrible if you're a free-to-play player. The dev's decision to introduce heroes is egregious and out-of-touch with the general player base. Bugs go unaddressed for years at a time, but hey the store is always working!!

The game is completely abandoned, the devs really wanted to milk out the players as much as they could during their 2025 peak and now all that's left is a shitshow of a game. The game balance is terrible, the progression is now non existent and it's now based on it "lucky drops" which are rigged (there's proof) to give you mainly useless coins. Level 16 wasn't wanted by nobody, each and every new card they add is absolutely overpowered to make it sell faster. The state of this game is atrocious

The game itself is ok, and I was enjoying it. But they released about everything they could to make the game die. It's like they want they're game to die. Heros, Level 16, even though they are giving out some resources here and there, that does not at all compensate for all the things that they have done. And not to mention they are also giving out that same stuff to people who are pay to win, which there are WAY too many of. literally 95% of people who play it are. Pretty bad game now.

After over a decade, I’m done. The game is still full of long-ignored bugs, yet Supercell keeps pushing flashy events. In 3-minute matches, the first 2 minutes have broken elixir balance—opponents gain more elixir without Collectors, which isn’t strategy, just bad mechanics. Many bugs remain unfixed, QoL features like card search are missing, and players are left frustrated.

games become completely unplayable, with ridiculous levels, evos and heroes the games been ruined, quite literally taking a free to play player years to reach the top no matter how well they play, this game rewards money over skill every single time. was good a few years ago but don't waste your time -or money- on this horrendously obvious cash grab

this game is no longer about skill, strategy, or how you play. its about how much your able to spend to buy the stupidly broken cards when they are released. its so pointless maxing a deck because somehow this game decides to give u the worst matchups consistently, but when u switch your deck your hardcountered again. ive been playing this game for 6 years and it's actually a joke what its become to, fix the cards fix the pay 2 win losers and balance out the cards so they are all usable.

This game is a fun and strategic game that I usually enjoy playing since childhood but sometimes it feels like the game intentionally forces losses at specific trophy levels to make players keep playing. Every time I reach around 6750 trophies,the match glitches in crucial moments and I lose unfairly.This is not a skill or deck issue, as I win consistently before this point. The same thing has happened multiple times, which no longer feels like a coincidence.This seriously affects fair gameplay.

I'm being put into a match with people who have higher ranks and better cards than me, it is like you reach a certain point in the game and the matchmaking thinks you are ready to defeat higher level players at a low rank. 0/10 would never play again, dissapointed with my experience. I love Clash Royale, but this game could do better.

lol, Pay 2 Win.. I quit and returned after 7yrs to see for gameplay improvements.. BUT HEY... STILL NO ACTION TO PENALIZE QUITTERS ON 2v2 MATCH!! downloaded this game again in hopes for some kind of balance but I don't think Supercell knows what that is. takes me eight hours to get the four free chest. guessing it's normal to go on a 40 game losing streak. remember when this game was first released and how fun it was,now it's pay to win and copy the top players deck.

To much cheating going on. I've played this game for many years and some games I played are so obvious. 9-Year player with the update that just came out, the game is officially dead. supercell stop changing the economy system. you took away my books of books and gave me some pitiful gems for it. those books granted I did not buy but you have sold in the past for extremely high values and I did not get to use them for their full potential nor did I get paid a fair wage for them. that's just one of many things that has made the game very bad over the last couple of years. goodbye, I'm deleting it

i recently downloaded the game and i was playing pretty consistently for a few days, even made an in app purchase. the thing is i didn't connect to a supercell id and today i played in the morning without any issues but when i opened the game at afternoon, i was having troubles logging in. i thought it was my internet so i restarted the game and it opened a brand new account. ever since i was unable to get my previous account back. is there any way i can get it back?

Like a lot of people in the comment I played this game for years, and game makers manage to flush down the toilet one of the best games made. Premium heroes, boosted cards, stupid mods...1000 stupid moves in newer versions of the game. This game is an absolute banger, Supercell's take on real time strategy with millions of different possibilities at the tip of your fingers is incredibly well executed overall, that being said, in its current state I'd say it can become frustrating to play as its pay to fast scheme gives players too much of an advantage over free to play. This issue has been growing worse over time, leaving certain players outside of the competitive scene. All in all, great game, HORRENDOUS progression.

Its just a shame to see this go from a fun game where the developers cared about the fan base, to something i had to Uninstall for the sheer amount of pay-to-win mechanics, alongside the developers failing to provide fun and new changes during updates. Clan wars is ruined, ladder is ruined, the game is ruined. update as of 2025. They added heroes, all the problems I previously mentioned are now even more severe. It's pathetic really.

The main gameplay loop is pretty fun, but it's so blatantly pay-to-win. "Buy the battle pass! Buy evos! Buy wild cards! No more timed chests, because that would mean that you don't have your free cards heavily throttled to incentivize buying overpriced wild cards! Buy legends! Buy champions! Buy, buy, buy!" How about I don't. Don't get this game. The only viable card is your debit card.

This game could have been fun, but instead, it has mega knight and other badly integrated cards that make no sense to be in a game. this game is so P2W that it is disgusting. granted, yes, I still play this game because it IS fun. BUT, it is toxic, P2W, trashy, and overall unbalanced.

where did my book of cards go? for any newcomers, you may love this game but it used to be way better, an original game. it was simple, now it's got abilities and other things. I've been playing for 9 years. I've never changed a rating like this before. evos started a decline in this game. they can be fun i guess but now heros and the new changes are ruining the experience. part of what made and kept the game fun was it wasn't full of gimmicks. you leveled and that was it. the devs more and more dont listen to feedback.

heroes and Evos have completely ruined this game. it used to be about positive elixir trades. now you just play defence for 2 minutes until you have your Evo's and hope it works. not to mention the plethora of glitches involving buildings and it effecting unit placement. now the musketeer can spawn a building which can physically stop you from placing a troop where you want. don't get it twisted. THIS IS NOT A GOOD GAME. This is a PRODUCT that MAKES MONEY. nothing more nothing less.

First time I've updated this review since 2019. The last few updates, including level 16, lucky drops, and last and certainly least being HEROES, have completely destroyed the identity of Clash Royale. Or, as it should be referred to now, Cash Royale. I still play a couple times a week, and the game is functional, but Supercell is suddenly in maximum greed mode.

this game is fun at its core, but is incredibly pay to win. I honestly don't no what you have done with game, but I honestly feel like you pick and choose when the game works properly.. I don't mind losing but when it feels like I litterally have no chance due to this is pointless even playing..

This game was very good at the start but when they decided to make progression harder, and making the game more pay to win killed it, which made me decide to quit, I would not recomend if free to play.

wow wow wow one of the most addictive games I've played. apart from the gameplay like never ever have I seen a add in this game. about the game its just incredible. honestly no words. Used to be the best game there was to play on the phone, but now with the additions of heroes and other stuff, and so many bugs, it's not as fun as it used to be, free to play is so hard to advance unfortunately.

very fun but you can get very mad when you lose a ton of matches in a row, and you can't really win them back fast because you just keep losing, causing a love-hate relationship because its fun to win a lot and play with your friends and also getting the cards throughout the arenas and it just feels so awarding to get to the next arena or card you've finally reached knowing you've worked so hard to get there.👍 I would recommend getting the game.

very play to win, you'll see people in the match over level and having a deck which just came out and most of everyone doesn't have them. gets boring, developer adding things that we don't need and is making the game mechanics kinda bad while instead of fixing stuff we really needed. so far this game is just seating in my phone without me touching.

Such an awful game it's crashing everytime I'm trying to play since yesterday, even after I reported the bug multiple times, uninstalling and installing the game thrice, clearing cache, restarting phone but none of it is of any help. I have two humble suggestions that could make the 2 vs 2 gaming experience even better: 👉 In 2 vs 2 matches, if a player leaves mid-game, an auto-play feature should activate instantly to take their place. This will ensure the remaining teammate doesn’t feel disadvantaged or regretful, and the match can continue smoothly. 👉 After every 2 vs 2 match, a “Player of the Match” highlight should be displayed immediately, so that out of the four players, everyone can see who delivered the best.

SUPER Pay to win, crashes constantly if you don't have the best wifi to ever exist, several STEEP paywalls, your opponent will always have better stuff than you, HORRIBLE balancing, you could spend several hours just to make ZERO progress, clans INSTANTLY kick you if you're less than beyond perfect, EVERY enemy is a meta-chaser/spammer. The current state of the game is borderline unplayable for free to play players. Someone can only push so far before getting completely weighed down by the advantages of people with overleveled cards and evos. The level 16 update and the heroes feel like one step closer to killing the game again.

The level on ladder is capped at level 15 for 6 months , but when I play clan wars, I go up against people that are overlevelved. for example, I would be level 15 with level 14/15 cards and would go up against players that are fully maxed, which is a 1-2 level difference because of level 16. I find this completely unfair and nonsensical because why cap ladder at level 15 but not do the same with clan wars??? it just doesn't make any sense. This just shows how bad the matchmaking is.

this would have been a great game if it wasn't for level 16, heroes,pay to win stuff,and other things that make the game unfair for most of players,others can't progress on the game.it needs to balance most of the cards like the most Annoying cards to play against.

For those of you who are experiencing difficulties logging on, like the app crashes everytime you load it up this is for you. First, delete the app and re-download it. When the app is finished downloading, go into storage, find the app, and clear all cache and all data. Then I should be working fine. Hopefully this helps :) I found out about it recently I've been wondering how I cant log on.

Clash Royale often feels unbalanced because cards like the Witch can become disproportionately powerful at higher levels, and pay-to-win players can upgrade them much faster, amplifying that imbalance. Systemic pay‑to‑win design that intentionally segregates players by spending and undermines fair competition. This is to document a game design that creates an unfair competitive environment by structurally privileging players who spend real money. The game’s ranking, matchmaking, progression, and reward systems are explicitly tied to purchase tiers, producing persistent advantages for spenders that cannot be overcome by skill or time investment alone.

I've played this game for years and reached 10k trophies. The game was fun and I even bought pass royale a few times. It's always been a somewhat pay to win game since progression can be slow and card levels and evolutions can change the outcome of a match. That said, they have recently made it clear that they no longer care about the players at all. Heros were a horrible addition to the game, level 16 and the gem level rework make it harder to progress, and they don't listen to the community.

Clash Royale is a thrilling blend of strategy, card collection, and fast-paced battles that keeps you coming back for more. The real-time multiplayer aspect is incredibly engaging, and the variety of cards allows for countless strategies and deck combinations. The graphics are polished, and the animations during battles make every match feel alive. The game’s progression system is rewarding, though it can feel a bit grindy at higher arenas, and some may find the in-app purchases tempting if they

Clash Royale is a fast-paced strategy game that blends tower defense, collectible card battles, and real-time multiplayer action. Players build decks using cards representing troops, spells, and buildings, then face off against opponents in three-minute duels where quick decision-making is key. Its mix of strategy and skill makes it highly competitive yet easy to pick up. The game’s balance of free-to-play progression and in-app purchases can be frustrating at times, but still very fun.
Required to pay to win and the matchmaking is bad you can have lvl 11 cards and be playing against lvl 14 players, no skill at all just pure pay to win, this game truly will doom itself
Unplayable after reaching a certain level. Even after in-app purchases and upgrades. Not fun.

Clash Royale is my favorite game because it mixes strategy, skill, and excitement perfectly. Every battle feels different, and winning a close match is the best feeling ever. I love building decks, predicting my opponent’s moves, and improving each season. The game’s characters, updates, and community keep it fun, and no matter how long I play, it never gets old.

it took me years to reach 10000,, and all of a sudden when you be in the middle of a battle the connection automatically lost. making you login again only to see that you have lost. sometimes the game automatically freezes too. Very annoying when you're having network issues, and when you have a phone call just know that it's all over. Rubbish.... BUT ADDICTIVE 💯

Typical PAY-TO-WIN game, with a hilarious algorithm. Very often, in easy battles, the connection suddenly lags and delays. Only after the opponent gains the upper hand does it return to normal. The matchmaking algorithm is also too obvious. When we're forced to lose by the algorithm, it will select an opponent with a counter-strategic deck. Clash Royale isn't a game to prove skill; it's just a casual game for those who pay for the pass. For free players, keep dreaming of a fair and exciting game

This game is absolutely terrible. Match making system is broken. Nothing is more fun than being matched up against someone who is higher level than you and who is using cards that you don't have. Everyone is using the same play style and there isn't any variety to the game. If you want to spend a ton of money on the game then it MIGHT be fun for a while, but why bother? Update: they just added evolution to increase the pay to win incentive. If you want to progress then you have to pay to win.

This game used to be my favourite years ago. It saddens me to see the changes for the worst being made. No chests like before, worst characters and no 2v2 mode. The constant sudden pop ups, sounds amd colors to make it more addicting, make the game more stressful. The game is being changed to appeal to the new generation and getting ruined.

Who woulda thought, the game is still astronomically flawed. Idk if 7k trophies means I'm awful, but it's obvious now they don't care about fairness. Latency is a frequent issue, on various wifi, services, it's not reliable. There's a frequent delay when it comes to placing cards, it's not even worth playing for the daily tasks. Shameful

The game has unfortunately shifted toward a pay-to-win model. It used to have a balanced ranked mode where everyone had access to level 11 cards, creating a fair competitive environment. Now that mode is gone, and it feels like the focus is more on monetization than gameplay. It's a disappointing direction for what used to be a great game.😕😪

This game is full of small and big bugs. Game bugs: Sometimes your net is great but the game has bugs and your internet is weak. The reason you lose is the game's fault. The game used to be very good but now your skill is not visible and the reason you win is because of the cards you choose. The game is full of robots that are extremely strong. Very expensive offers and... I can't say more.

Over the years, this game has devolved into a giant cash grab. I mean, whats even the point of calling it a strategy game when you can be in arena 1 and go against max level cards. I still play because when all is said and done its a fun game, but pay to win has just completly spiralled out of control, to the point where i wanna uninstall.

It is worst when it comes to rank system. I was playing against a player who has more level, more epic cards but he was on same rank as me. Somethings are very fishy here.. everytime right before I'm about to pass to next arena, all my opponents suddenly have that "thing" that I don't have, it could be evolutions, legendary heroes, or 15 level cards. They've completely forgotten about trade tokens and magic coins; I can hardly even get a book without buying them. took all the warmth out of it. total pay to win riddled with micro transactions. not worth it anymore. evolve cards are wild and create some cards that are kinda impossibly hard to beat. unless you have 20-50$ to consistently put into the game there's really no point in trying to get alot of trophies. no leveling system and you oddly don't get many cards that are in your active deck. it's fallen from a fun game to a pay to enjoy and win game so quick

Clash Royale may be one of the most popular mobile games in the world, but anyone who has actually played it knows the frustration runs deep. After losing yet another game, I can confidently say this app has more problems than positives, and here are several reasons why Clash Royale simply sucks. 1. Pay-to-Win Mechanics The biggest issue with Clash Royale is that it rewards players who spend money rather than players who actually have skill. Someone with a maxed-out Mega Knight doesn’t even nee

I've played this game for about 5 months now and I love it. Compared to other phone games you can actually lose games and learn strategies to build better decks and combos. The only negative thing I have to say about it is it's definitely a pay-to-win game. Players in Arena 10 are spawning champions and spamming op cards that can't be unlocked until 6 arenas later

After over a year break, I reinstalled this game after seeing the ad for old players. Sadly, the same issue still exists: CONSTANT DISCONNECTIONS! Even with full 4G signal or stable Wi-Fi, the game suddenly disconnects in the middle of a match, while other apps and games run perfectly fine. This has been a problem for years and was the main reason I uninstalled before. The server feels unstable and unreliable, making the whole experience really disappointing!

This is a game with fun and original mechanics. The reason I rate it one star is due to its macabre amount of psychological manipulation. The game is made to be unfair; every once in a while, matchmaking places you against people with higher levels. You can still win these matches, but it's obviously harder because you unfairly start from a disadvantage. They do this so that you end up losing, get mad, and pay por the expensive upgrades that the game offers via its Battle Pass and shop "offers".

This game is rigged. Been trying to get to max trophies for years now. Every time I'm one win away I get matched against someone who perfectly counters my deck. Begin the loss streak. Once this happens I won't get another win until I fall almost all the way down to the bottom of the arena I'm in. Another thing is that the opponents elixir usage doesn't add up when this happens. Over and over I've counted their elixir and mine at the same time. Not equal...and yes I know how to use it efficiently

Too much gap when it comes to playing against people that buy cards. I understand you need to make money but this is just to much seeing lvl 15 card on a tower 12 player. And from what I noticed its 2/3 of players that are in my lobby. Maybe you sould think about filtering out regular and premium members so it can be a fair match. From what I see right now it's just not a strategy game anymore its just a pay to win game unless you are in higher arenas where you have to an extent maxed out card .

The bots have infinite elixir. If you don't like to be cheated out of wins, don't play this game. For example, I was in a match and had just played a push when the bot played a goblin hut, fireball, wizard, giant, and a knight for one side, and on the other played a mini pekka and tombstone, and this was not the only time it had happened either.

its either you win 5 times in a row to finally make it ti the next arena, get 1 win and 1 loss constantly, or lose 5 times in a row. the game is suppost to be "strategic" but you cant find a perfect strategy without spending like 20$ in-game because the game REFUSES to give you the cards you need to update your strategy to counter the constant other strategies that perfectly counter your strategy and then your opponents for whatever reason have cards from 3 arenas ahead of the one you are in.

The game is getting more and more pay to win. They give some free resources once in a while, but that's not enough. It is even worse if you are a new player or a returning player. You'll feel left out because you just don't have any evolved cards you want, even if you already grinded for weeks. Matchmaking and servers are usually terrible as well. New cards are usually overpowered, making you spend your money to get it, and then they'd nerf it. Thumbs up for successfully destroying the game.

I've been playing this game for over a few years now and it's a good game when you're not playing no skill over leveled opponents who you somehow get matched against every game......this game is so money based you cant get anywhere without spending money the first thing you see when you click on the shop is flashing deals in your face immediately and 30 bucks for early access to new cards..... 30 bucks? This game is so pay to win I don't recommend even giving a thought to downloading this game

After 7 years of playing this game, today is the day I delete it for good! The P2P requirement is just ridiculous now and the evolution element has completely ruined the game. Out of every 10 games I reckon I play the exact same deck at least 5-6 times. The fun has completely gone and the players with money buy their way to the top! Such a shame as I've loved this game for so many years, but unfortunately like every other aspect of life, greed takes over and money always come first.

No matter what if you get one or more wins in a play session you will begin to be matched with people with counters and even just overall higher level cards, me with all level 8 and 9 cards sadly can't wipe someone with a level on me in towers and 2 or 3 additional levels in cards. Simply unfun after two or three games. adding this way later,after giving the game another try, game is unplayable after going back after some time. evolutions are required, or you're always gonna be a step behind.

This game has almost lost its fun and balance element, and while playing, I encountered several frustrated players. And for "Merge Tactics" it should be replaced with "Merge Luck" because it's not based on tactics but luck, after reaching 2500 and 2800, there will be a clear imbalance in the random distribution of cards. Playing 3x &3 winning the first order from 2800 to 2889 then the next 3 rounds will most likely drop back to the 2800-2820 area, this wastes 15 to 24 minutes of time. Not fun!!!

This game has turned into such a money grab. It used to be good when levels were capped at way lower numbers, but now people can just spend money instantly win. The way the arena's are, it's impossible to change your deck because without spending money you're just going to lose. I wish SuperCell would make it even possible to win by skill and not money. I also don't understand what their plan was with merge tactics, and it just seems like another way to spend money on this game

This game has so much potential. Clash Royale could definitely be a very good and competitive game the issue is supercell has basically destroyed any credibility the game had with the micro transactions. This game is pay to win which doesn't effect the best players it only effects the worst players and the average players. Unless you're willing to spend a few hundred dollars, Avoid the game. And if you feel like spending money on the game spend it on cosmetics so you don't make this game worse.

Only Supercell can manage to make a game this simple, a buggy mess. The game constantly crashes and disconnects. The disconnecting issue is especially engaging. It disconnects even when I have a perfectly stable network, and it loves to do so exactly during crucial moments in the match when you're dropping troops to defend a rush.

As a high arena player placed top 50 in the world, iv'e been playing clash since the week it came out, and I have seen how much the game has gone ,up down , and viral, and CRL is truely my favourite game by far, hence the fact that the new updates are terrific, the only bad thing is getting rid of the shop a couple months ago which I think is a disadvantage for lower arena players, becuase of the lack of items to get, anyway very good game highly recomend this, :)

white outline around the cards like they got copied and pasted. There was a clan challenge today that I stayed up until 2am to complete- took each member like 2 hours a piece, and the prize was only 8 tower princess cards. Usually you're able to work hard to catch up with the paid players, but this is ridiculous. It showed a fancy silver chest and barely had anything in it.

Clash Royale was my favorite strategic game, easy to understand and fun, unfortunately if you want to level up you need to pay which makes it a pay to win game. it's incredibly hard to reach higher trophies because your opponents have double evolutions, higher king tower, higher card levels and sometimes the new evolution that you need to buy from the store. I'm at 13,500 trophies, level 14, only one Evo and 3 cards level 15. Solution? Making things more accessible (gold, evos, elite cards...)

Game was great but now gets stuck on the initial loading screen, then goes to updating and a pop-up says it's lost connection. Uninstalled and reinstalled. Still errors out. Internet connection is stable on everything else. Tried emailing regarding issue but they replied back saying to use the app to submit issues. Tried the website and it wants you to sign in but I haven't gotten the emailed code to sign in. Last resort, a 1 star review. Update - the game is working now. No help from support.

This game is actual garbage. At release it was a nice game with balanced cards and was fun. Now when i try to do anything my opponent brings out E-Golems, Mega knights and stuff you'll unlock extremely late in the game just in their deck cause they spent money. The game is incredibly pay-to-win and most cards are genuinely insufferable. 1/5 would rate 0 if possible.

Love the game, been playing since inception, and have multiple accounts across clash of clans and boom beach. terrible game which is really sad because it used to be amazing. this game used to actually take skill but is now just a cash grab. if you don't spend money on the season pass you can't play the brand new broken evos for months. being free to play is extremely hard to get a full deck to level 15 so I'm stuck with level 14 cards which leads to really horrible interactions for me. level 15 and evos were the worst things ever added to this game which is such a shame. i can no longer be competitive

Amazing game for the first 7000 trophies. Once you get to there it turns into an endless grind of rage and pain and suffering until you finally reach 10,000. Then more pain and loss of brain cells to get to fifteen k. Once your there you get suckied into a infinite swirl of never ending grinding to keep you rank up every season. Aside from the murderous rage, endless pain, and constant crashouts its a great game.

Game... Don't play it. Once you reach a certain level, you're hooked and can't quit. You uninstall it, but you'll come back and reinstall it. This is serious, don't play around.

Decided to give the game a try after all my friends telling me to play it. downloaded it and I cant even get past the "updating" screen. its just times out and says i lost connection. ive tried under wifi and data, both of which ive never had issues with for any game and still nothing. im extreamly disappointed cause I cant even play the game.

Made an accidental purchase because of how easy it is to buy and my phone was left on in my pocket. Because no matter how many emails I send, they are either ignored or I get a reply saying that we cannot proceed with a refund because they don't have the tools for it apparently. Fun game, but 100% pay to win. It be really nice if they had a free to play version with ads is fine and then a pay to win version and split them. I quit playing a long time but came back to try it and it's the same. You'll just got a rank where people have way higher cards, special. cards, etc that they bought and unless you want to spend money or grind your 9 years, you are just stuck. There is definately skill to the game and you can't outplay people, but at some point you can't outplay.

9 year veteran with this game and I've never seen such a huge flip flop from a balanced game turn to pay to win. Its borderline cynical the way the game manipulates you. The grind to level 15 takes a level of dedication you'd put into a full time job. Or spend $1000 just to be at an even playing field. They introduce new evo cards that break the game every few weeks and bundles in the shop more than they balance the game by an exponential amount. Save your dignity, time, and money, just dont.

Absolutely terrible matchmaking and game play. Constantly matched with players leveled above or below you, you either win by a landslide or get destroyed. It's hard to upgrade or advance without spending money. No matter how much you upgrade you'll instantly be capped out by being matched against players above you again. Used to be so fun and insanely addictive, but they somehow totally ruined it, sad!

Since the November 2025 update I am unable to play the game. The game constantly crashes when I try to join a battle and suddenly closes, but the battle starts in the background cuz I am losing points. I cleared the data and also cleared the cache, then restarted the device and then tried to play the game again, still not working, still crashing when I try to start any battle. Also tried to delete the game and reinstall it, still crashing. Please fix the game!

Honestly, I used to enjoy Clash Royale, but over time, it just started to suck for me. The biggest problem is how pay-to-win the game feels. If you’re not spending money, you're basically stuck grinding for weeks just to level up a single card, while someone who drops some cash can max theirs out instantly. It’s incredibly frustrating to go into matches knowing you played better, but still lost because your opponent’s cards are two levels higher. Yall fvk with apples tho?

I’m trying to recover an old account I created in 2016 and last played in 2018. I don’t remember the account name or game ID, and I originally signed in using Google Play Games. The account is not connected to Supercell ID. However, it seems that the Google Play Games login option has been removed, and now I can’t access the account. I’ve searched for solutions and found that many others are experiencing the same issue.

Bad and slow servers with frequent in-game lag. The developers should collect and analyze network-related issues for each device. I noticed the game often forces connections through slower servers for the lobby and home screen, even when faster servers are available. There’s no smart network optimization, which makes the experience frustrating.

A game once hailed as the pinnacle of 1v1 strategy games, with other gamemodes that introduced more fun ways to enjoy the game, now reduced to something equivalent to having been created by EA. There is now absolutely minimal strategy required; all that's needed is your wallet and credit card and you can enjoy trampling on players. Additional gamemodes have been overhauled, especially draft mode, creating snowballing and steamrolling situations. The P2W pass is not worth it. Go play COC instead.

This is the most stale, repetitive, frustrating steaming pile of rookie you can install on your phone. At the start it's fun but once people get the meta cards it becomes a bashing your head against the wall simulator, where you will play the same deck against the same decks and win or lose in the same way until you inevitably uninstall. Stay away, if you want a strategy game play Mindustry

I've been playing this game for more than 4 years and not even once I spend money on it. Based on my experience in the past it was quite a challenge to be a free to play player, but after EVOLUTION COMES UP it just ruins the game, every good evolution have to be bought to actually have it, and the chance of having a free evolution TAKE AGES to get. right now I sit at 9000 trophies and the gap between the people who bought the EXPENSIVE EVOLUTION and not, is getting wider each day.
Hit 10K recently but had to spend 300$ aside from that you probably can get there more budget friendly but it's really good game and challenging

Wish we could add the people we battle with to our friends list. (Edit) 4-2* I'm tired of playing the same deck over and over and over again. It's always knight, firecracker, megaknight. It just takes all of the fun out of the game when every match feels almost like a repeat of the match before.

downloaded it again as I felt nostalgia. played a few games and then started running into players with tower buffs that make them shoot faster and character buffs that make normal characters evolved or whatever that aren't in the base game for players who don't pay 12$ a month for the pass. ridiculous. pay2win has no place in a strategy game

half the games you will lose because of p2w players, but the other half is are skill bases loses because of unfavorable matchups. It's really just a problem of overturning. And unfavorable matchups, and make the game worse, not that it could really be fixed fully.

It's a good game indeed. The problem I have and hate so much is how you get matched with decks that load way faster. They mismatch in a way that makes you lose. Also, support does not care about us. I was browsing reviews and noticed they don't try to respond. They love how we spend money(which I stopped)but do not address our concerns as gamers.

I really try to like this game each time i play it, but it's really hard with the problems it has. First of all, the servers are really bad. If you dont have max network connection, it lags, doesnt place the card you use, and even disconnects you. Secondly, it's always been a pay to win game, and Supercell endorses it eith the updates. Honestly, they had a full season with evos to buff the 2.6 hog cycle. Last of all, the matchmaking is doodoo. You either go against god tier players or bots.

Game is absolutely fantastic, becomes quite addictive. But one thing that there should be some more flexibility to the way you get cards, it becomes more difficult to get later on, there should be some option to watch ads in return for cards.

I came back to this game after 3 years its still as horrible as when I left you cant progress at all unless if you pay to win the game literally. the game is based on levels of cards, the higher the level the more powerful, and you can buy your way to higher levels. this is fine but the game matchmaker you in mid ladder, mid game, against people who have spent 200 dollars on the game, and its every game, ive been stuck in the same spot for 3 weeks in arena 19. DO NOT DOWNLOAD

Terrible!! Super Cell has screwed this game up so badly with the matchmaking algorithms, evolutions, and the changing of the goblin hut and furnace cards. This used to be one of my favorite games to play, but now I find it so intolerable. Whoever is running the show at Super Cell needs to be fired for ruining what USED to be an awesome game.

As the updates continue, the gameplay becomes more and more dependent on how much money you need to spend in order to have fun. The developers are becoming greedier by the second, covering your screen with pop-ups to spend a little bit of money here and there. If you haven't spent a good amount of money on this game, you will never win.

If you enjoy the game then play it, but the truth is only a very small percentage of people do. Most just play it because of some sunk cost fallacy. If youre thinking about playing it dont, you probably wont enjoy it after a certain point because its designed to be as frustrating as possible. All of this is done intentionally to push you into making purchases and toxicity is encouraged by devs. Matchmaking is designed to keep you at 50% winrate its statistically impossible to have these matchups

If you are looking for a challenging game with more than 100 cards you have come to the right place. Now one thing I would like to say is that when I call this game challenging were talking I won't leave this game until I get to the next arena type challenging but in a fun way to. Each and every card is different from the last but some cards pair good with each other like when you get hog rider you can put the hog behind the mini Pekka to help him get to the tower faster. This an amazing game

I’ve been playing Clash Royale for years, and it honestly hurts to write this, but the game has become almost unplayable. For the last few weeks, the app keeps crashing nonstop. Every time I go into a match, the screen freezes or the whole game closes by itself. I lose trophies, lose progress, and waste time trying to reopen it again and again. It’s extremely frustrating. My device can easily run much heavier games with no issues, so this is clearly a problem with the game itself, not my phone.

I used to love this game. I haven't played in a while but I came back to give it a try again. What do I come back to? Level 15 evolved Mega Knight. In arena 13. This game is the definition of pay-to-win. I haven't made a single micro transaction at all in the game. It's nearly impossible to make any progress unless you feed the corporate greed. Other than my pay-to-win opponent spamming goblin boohoo every other match, it's fun.

This game is pay to win don't get it. It will put you against players with higher level cards. The tournaments are rigged for pay to play players. I've played since it first came out and it's honestly sad how bad the games gotten since the beginning. Plus you only play against people that base their deck off of tower cards. Like what's the point of playing a game if you're only going to go against a YouTube deck or someone hiding behind their tower cards. VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!

Im sorry, if I recalled a game is supposed to let you have fun right? Yet, Ive play this game for 2 years and the P2W situation has never changed. Overleveled units, as a free to play I expect this to be fixed. Yall have earned enough money. If not, this game is beyond save and I will NEVER think of coming back to this game.

Amazing game, played for 2 years, but now it just stopped working, it loads to 75%,then it gets stuck on updating, doesn't matter how long I wait, it doesn't work, I deleted and reinstalled, nothing, gave it permission from settings, as I saw in a yt tutorial, still nothing

A Fantastic Strategy Game! Review: ★★★★★ Clash Royale is an absolutely addictive game that combines strategy, skill, and a bit of luck! I love the variety of cards and the way they can be combined to create unique strategies. Each battle feels fresh and challenging, with endless opportunities for tactical play. The graphics are vibrant and the animations are smooth, making each match visually engaging. The matchmaking system is fair, ensuring I compete against players of similar skill

this game seemed fun at first, but don't let it fool you. I had fun playing up till around 6k trophies. every game I played no matter what deck I used I would instantly get hit with a hard counter. I was about to make it up another arena and I was one game away so I felt kind of good. fast forward to now, I'm writing this review after cutting myself because I lost 36 games in a row. I used so many different decks and counters but I always lost. this game caused me to relapse into self harm.

I used to enjoy this game but I no longer do, the game is way to pay to win now. I got to Arena 15 and started losing a lot of games due to other player's troops being higher level than mine. The game also seems to not want to unlock cards, I think about 10 weren't found. it limits how you play. I'm deleting this game and I won't look back.

DO NOT INSTALL THIS GAME UNLESS YOU HAVE ACESS TO A CREDIT CARD WITH ALOT OF MONEY. Sure the games fun at first. Strategizing which characters you're going to pick for your deck, but once you have reached a certain amount of trophies, pay to win becomes serious. Card upgrades and evolutions are behind a paywall. If youre free to play, goodluck getting cards for units you actually need for your deck. In this game, the best card is the credit card since skill does not even matter at this point.

This game was great years ago. But now, Supercell keeps CHANGING the game WAY too much & ruins ur progress. I understand that they want to keep the game new and exciting, but every damn week or 2, they COMPLETELY change the "stats" of the cards. Its so bad now, that i COMPLETELY REFUSE to spend ANY MONEY on this game, whatsoever. On one day, you could invest all your coins & resources into beefing up a card, and the next day, THEY COMPLETELY CHANGE HOW the card even works! Very sad.

pay to win, poorly balanced matchmaking which i assume is a product of the pay2win algorithm. I feel these devs need to go back to square one, and find out why people enjoyed this game in the first instance. As of now it feels fixed and soulless. Guess I didn't spend enough ££ to be fairly considered.Not to mention the connection issues that have pestered the game, too busy thinking of the next sell. Save yourself the bother on this one.

Please fix this !!!!!!!!!!!! I do not want to start again

Been playing for 9 years. One star because of their customer support. It's the worst I've ever seen. NOPE. a lady told me what was possible and I went through with it and 2 new agents came and in other words told me I was crazy, lied and told me to kick rocks. Am I asking for too much? Really?!

this is a very good, fun, and entertaining game and very competitive overall the gameplay is incredible but unfortunately this rating is low for a reason, this game is extremely pay to win to the point where if you spend enough money is is very difficult to near impossible to beat and overleveled player not even to mention the evolutions whic I think we're a great addition to the game but I unfortunately locked behind a paywall to even unlock them I want to rate this game higher but I just can't

After maintenance the game being played with a strong network connection actually freezes on multiple occasions and lost of trophies overall game is actually good but I would love to give it a 5 star but actually with a few bugs like playing the game with a strong network connection is just freezes that's not on wonder who will take accountability for the loses of trophies when players work hard to get up to reach their goals and how will you'll resolve the issue!!!!!

One of the worst matchmaking systems in online game i ever experienced. If you play well the game will make you face exactly 2-3 levels higher cards opponents, which on higher arenas becomes absolutely unplayable. The only way to upgrade is to donate or play some garbage modes to earn more cards, which you will have to do a lot, since upgrading champions or legendary cards without actually buying them can take months or even years.

Used to have a good review but supercell, the players and general gameplay have gotten absolutely horrendous. It's not competitive anymore, you just pay 50$ (or more 💀) for the new broken thing they add each update and if you don't, you lose. For your own good, just don't. -- DO NOT RECOMMEND --

I have had my account for 5 years and I had used a very old email that I no longer had access to. I contacted their customer support they ask me to give them my account information keep in mind all im trying to do is change my email. I give them my trophy count, username, ID, tag, clan, and exact xp amount and even after all of this they can't let me change my email? terrible player support ive never been responded to in less than 8 hours it even feels like I'm talking to an ai not a human.

Too many absolutely annoying cards that allow low skilled players to completely abuse them and win in a vast amount of cheap ways. Also, the matchmaking is unambiguously rigged to keep the win/lose ratio close to 50% - you could be winning many matches in the row, and then you take a distinct u-turn and go on a losing streak. As time passes, these conditions get gradually worse, since they keep adding abominable cards, mechanics, and other annoying changes. The worst of all - it's Pay-To-Win.

one of the worst game I have ever played. Everything about it is just the worst, I mean the game is completely unfair, I mean you play against players that have stuff you unlock many arenas a head and another thing is that when you are about to reach like 3000 trophies the game puts you in a match with a much more skilled player than you and then you lose like 5 times in a row, which is what happened to me and i was only at like 2000 trophies and took ages trying to get to the next arena.

The game is hardly worth playing. It takes unbelievably long to level up. the only way to get cards is to get on everyday and win up to 4 games for loot boxes that give barely anything. So it requires at least 20 minutes everyday for months to get cards leveled up so that you can climb ladder. It's not fun.

Like all mobile games, it seems fun for a while, then it becomes increasingly difficult to progress unless you pay. They all have a gambling feel to it, i.e. you win some, you lose more. Clash Royale is exactly the same. Great way to get people addicted and waste all their time and money. I have uninstalled this game.

Honestly speaking, it's a great game, BUT it's pay to win like crazy. It's also super annoying that when I don't buy the battle pass, I will go against every counter to any single deck I use, it also takes slightly longer to find a match, like they are hand picking my opponent. YET the minute I buy the stupid pass, I fly up the ranks like nothing, I somehow all of a sudden don't get a single counter deck until I get to the higher ranks again. It's just hilarious to me.

this game is so bad there is so much p2w and it doesn't care about your level you could be level 12 and it would give you a level 15 enemy which is 100% lose and the game play is so bad. 5 words. THIS IS WHY WE CLASH! No but seriously, this is a highly addicting game and can get frustrating sometimes but thats every game. Yeah this game has pay to win aspects but doesnt every game? First, this game is one of the best games I have ever played, would recommend completely. A lot of people say this game is pay to win but it really isnt, but sometimes you vrs p2w players but the system isnt perfect.

Clash royale is a great game that involves strategy and lots of fun.However there are some frustrating things about it, it is really easy to come across a p2w player because they are usually extremely over levelled and can win without any skill whatsoever.Despite this once you get to the much higher arenas most people will already have high level cards and the game will gradually become much much harder. In conclusion it is a very fun and enjoyable game although it does have some weaknesses.

Changing my rating from. 5 to 1. Merge Tactics is bs. The opponent starts with 3 troops and I start with 2 all the time. Used to be an amazing game, now it's filled with power scaling issues that make the game impossibly difficult to be successful without constantly paying rising prices. The game uses a system designed to maximise player engagement and retention rather than prioritising fair and skill based matchmaking.

Game mechanics favor players who spend money. As you get higher in trophy count it is noticeable that players who spend money (maxed out cards, evolutions) get more points to quickly deploy cards. Even having a deck with low spending does not offset the games favoritism. Overall wouldn't recommend for any new players.

Rampant pay-to-win issue. You can build a great deck, put in effort, and actually enjoy learning the game but none of it matters once you face opponents stacked with over-leveled legendary cards and evolutions way beyond your arena. Every match feels hopeless unless you open your wallet. New players get crushed almost instantly, and the game clearly pushes you toward spending money just to stay competitive. What could have been a fun, strategic experience has turned into a frustrating cash grab.

Clash Royale is the best mobile game out there. It's the perfect mix of strategy, quick thinking, and fun. Every battle feels unique because it's not just about strong cards but how you play them. Plus, being in a clan and working with friends makes the game even better. I can easily say Clash Royale is my favorite game ever.

Clash Royale is one of those games that hooks you instantly. The early game is crazy fun — quick matches, easy wins, and that feeling like you’re actually unstoppable. But then it happens… that one losing streak. Suddenly every opponent is level 16, your cards feel like wet noodles, and the game goes from “haha easy dubs” to “why am I suffering?” It’s still a good time, but man, once that tilt hits, it hits HARD. DO NOT SPEND MONEY!
