Clash Royale disappoints due to two main issues: First, the pay-to-win model. Players who spend money have a clear advantage, making the game unfair for those who don’t pay. Second, the unbalanced matchmaking system. You constantly face opponents with much stronger cards and higher levels, which makes the game frustrating and unfair. Overall, Clash Royale cannot be recommended because of these two aspects.

Genuinely a polished, well made experience, with great graphics, great mechanics, and no bugs. However, there is one fundamental issue in the game's design - it heavily discourages variety. The normal game loop is that you find the most meta deck for your level and personal card pool, and you roll with that, making some minor changes here and there, for the next 1000 trophies or so. If you want to experiment and try new things, don't expect to be rewarded for it.

They are trying to kill the game with this new updates. Now you get half of the rewards you used to get before the new update. Old problems such as Bad matchmaking, super hard and time consuming to upgrade cards, still remain.
it really is very FUN when i downloaded it the music hit me and the match is really really FUN

The game is very gud and addictive but it is P2W game but it is not that big of a problem. People are complaining abt P2W thing bcuz they cannot win while being a F2P player. I am currently in Arena 16 and it only took me 1 yr. People r just bad and cannot win that is why they r giving the excuse of the being P2W. Yes at a limit it a P2W but it is not that bad of a game. It's just the skill requirement is high and not the money in the bank account.

one of the most no skill games I have ever played, not pay to play but definitely pay to win, get put against hard counters or no skill decks which are all maxed out ( after 1500 games I only have one elite card) a toxic community where most players will bm after taking your tower with lumloon as if I get counters in my hand when the game has just started, would be nice if levels could be at least fixed but because no skill players are willing to spend £40 maxing out their decks

you're a greedy company. I love the new spells you've added into this game, but I miss the old clash royale where you win games by strategy and not money. this game has become trash from all the pay-to-win stuff. I like the evo things, they're fun, but maybe queue somebody with evo cards against another person with evo cards. I've been stuck in one arena because every single person I fight has higher lever cards + evo, it makes it super unbalanced and there's nothing I can do. fix your game.
Amazing pure fun, annoying when on a losing streak

The games good, played for 9 years now just im forced to quit after the most recent update. Ive got the S22 Ultra with 40gbs of space left, the game crashes whenever I try opening it & if I open through the app store it just redirects me back.. I contacted supercell & they told me I have to buy a whole new phone in order to continue playing?? Lost what was going to be a life long player, thanks supercell 👍

impossible to play without spending money. After getting rid of chests, it's completely rng on whether or not we get good cards. some days I'll get nothing but cards and no money, on other days I'll have 300,000 gold and nothing to spend it on other than the useless shop. I love goblin giant but super cell won't give me any cards for it. but atleast I have a level 14 pekka

Very good game. Started playing since the day this game came to play store. but now a days even though I am having 100mbps wifi it will still show those network problem symbol. bro how much high speed internet you need to play this game. that's why I am changing the rating from 5* to 1*.
I think clash Royale is awesome. it's a great time killer if you have wifi and your not doing anything.

People say it's pay to win. Not true. I'm at 10000 trophies(which means I beat the game) played since the beginning of last year. I've never paid a cent and yet I've got 17 evos. I grind If u don't it'll take longer to get higher. But it's certainly possible. Everyone who's frustrated has skill issue. 4 stars because it's just not perfect. Occasional bugs and bad balance changes. They do ask crazy amounts for new op cards only to nerf them. Besides that it's awesome

i had a supercell id, lots of data, evolutions and most cards in the game, I got a new phone, logged in with the same account, instead of having lots for trophies and other stuff that I had, it removed all of it, and now I have less then 10 and all my previous stuff gone, because of supercell id and how stupid it can be, been trying to get it back, but no it won't let me

level 16 ruined this game. It was already pay to win but now with level 16 its the end for free to play players. I was already struggling before with level 15, and I finally leveled almost every card to level 14, and obviously supercell decides to push the level cap to 16, nice move supercell, quitting this game.

Their strategy to get people to buy stuff is matching you against p2w players in trophy matches and event matches. For 2v2 they pair you with a teammate that either goes afk or has a spell only deck. They should be ashamed of these deceptive matchmaking tactics. Also, there is no feature to report afk players. Another strange thing is how there is a daily name reporting limit. I would understand if they had even basic filters to block inappropriate names, but people can easily swap characters.

this is a fun game but it has the absolute worst match making of any game I have ever seen you are constantly playing people who are higher level than you whichnin some games is fine in this the advantage is wild as every thing they use is also of a higher level that what you are using ... this would be fine in a new game with few players but thos game is not even sort of lacking in player so that it continues to be this awful is unacceptable

I had been loving Merge Tactics until the releases of the Battle Builder and Sage Rulers. Unless you knock out the BB in early rounds or beat Sage in the first 10 secs she wipes out you whole remaining army in one swipe. Has completely ruined the game. I've never seen a developer try so hard to kill their own games.

I used to love this game but now I feel like they don't care about the players, just the money, cause everything is pay 2 win and free to play is not an option evolutions are hard to get etc. I don't know what happened to this game is supercell this money hungry? supercell, if you're reading this what did you do to your game? Why are you so greedy? And do you even care for your community? 😔

I've been playing for years and I actually hate war matchmaking and when they have level 13+ cards when I'm level 11 is why I'm not going to be playing anymore and it's way to hard to upgrade high level cards your going to be dumping lots of money to -update game is still hot garbage level 10 cards matching with people with level 13+ cards how is somone supposed to play f2p

Ladder is completely pay to win. And and even if at same level cards aren't balanced at all. If you ever get to 9k/10k. You WILL see 90% of the time only 3 win conditions hog rider or pekka+goblin giant, 9% graveyard. And the 1% is for the deck you may use if you feel brave enough to try something else since the other win conditions are pretty much useless here.

I've been playing this game on and off for around 7 years and I know they have been killing the game slowly but this latest update removed the only non p2w way to play the game and still progress. it's a shame because this was a great game. but the Devs are terrible people. you can also tell that they pay for fog reviews too make the game seem better then it is new edit: don't play this game. you'll just be miserable now

pay to win, with trash match makings, people with 3 levels more than you at the same arena, you can buy everything in the shop, the buffs and debuffs are made randomly and everything is expensive, there's no true competition, it's about the cards and levels you have, the game used to be good but now it's unbalanced and p2w, trash

The developers do NOT care about this game. They will constantly buff cards that don't need it, leave other cards untouched that are practically useless. All they want is your money. This game is a horrible place. do not install. do not waste your time. there are better games and better things to do. this game just makes you want to do terrible things to yourself.

like everybody say, it's a P2W game. You won't even be able to win when you're free to play, it's very hard and it's braindead they'll js spam an over leveled card and boom you'll spam your whole deck to defend and js be shocked there's another over leveled card being put on. it's not a fun game anymore it became a money sucking one. can't even strategize because it's braindead
level 16 was not needed, and the conversation rate for the elite wild cards was horrible. deleting the game
Is a bit p2w, as a free to play player, but is still a good fun game. 4 stars.
They ruined the game. It just ain't fun to always be at a disadvantage when not paying.

well to start of it's a really fun game but if you don't want to pay for stuff then this is NOT the game for you U have to to pay 2 win as U can't go up in arenas as Ur going to verse kids who pay if Ur a free 2 play player it's so hard and I've been stuck on arena 10 for 2 years supercell pls help me I need those legendary cards xd
Just put money in the game and u win by one side adding those heroes in the game with that undeafeat ability is totally trash

clash Royale support is useless and doesn't actually help you, it just gives you an AI bot while not actually acknowledging the issue. I lot my account and was trying to get it back , failed cause of this issue but weirdly enough brawlstars cares enough to look into things and gave me my account back. not to mention how P2W this game is. levels are everything and your not getting past level 11 without years of grinding, OR that sweet sweet 🤑🤑🤑 that clash cares so much about. still fun somehow
peak genuinely an amazing and fun game though it gets a bit difficult as you get more trophies

horribly set up to pay and win. will once higher levels it will consistently give you opponents that you cant beat. levels and multiple characters over my levels... definitely should beca game removed for basically trapping people to spend money

This game is intentionally designed to be unbalanced to encourage users to purchase loot boxes to potentially upgrade their cards. It's supposed to be a competitive game yet it's literally pay to win. Absolute trash, don't waste your time or money.
This game is so good. I love it. I can play with my friends easily and can use it in my free time. MEGA KNIGHT

I've recently got back into the game after playing on and off for 9+ years to be reminded of the reason I dropped the game to begin with. It's a good concept fallen into the hands of the wrong people. The game is enjoyable in custom matches against friends but it's not designed for you to get to the top without spending any money. At some point, you will only face overleveled cards that result in an negative elixir trade, even if you defend perfectly. Sad to see a great game become P2W trash.

So my friends told me to try out this game, since it's all over the place. I already knew about it before, and I didn't know why it got popular all of a sudden. Played it for a good 4 days and deleted it. The game is unplayable. Every match you go up against players who spent their life savings and college fund to get the highest level troops possible. The game makes almost no sense, and its EXTREMELY non-beginner friendly. You have to know a lot about the game in order to actually enjoy it.

This game was fun at the start. It can have great gameplay. which is the main problem with this game. constant balance changes to cards, implementation of new ones, like the heroic cards, can make this game aggravating for free to play players. it is impossible to adapt to when the meta changes and constantly demoralizing. every new piece of content added only makes the game more exponentially expensive and frustrating to play as they remove more methods of rewarding the player. avoid this game.

I rated it 5 stars last time, but after getting people that counter my deck i just couldn't handle it. I was in a 5 row win streak and only need one win till the next arena, suddenly i just kept getting people that countery deck. I hope its just a bug but this just isnt ok Edit: Ok i was just reallyyyyyy overdramatic, I like the game again Edit: on second thought this deserves less than a 1.

Uninstalling it after Playing it for 2 years . As now it really irritate me . There is too many bugs and problems. Continuous connection lost retry , I have to start again and lost more than 500 trophies straight just because it get lost in the middle of game even my internet is super fast. I tried reinstalling it but didn't work . Even tried clearing cache . This app doesn't even provide customer support, only we can select those option which they want to listen. no option to give our opinions.

This game is annoying and a waste of time. If you don't get the pass you will be spending your life on this game. Literally took me 3 years to get my deck to max. And even more annoying is the draft challenges. Do you really want to spend your time doing draft every season? This game doesn't have many game modes and will get boring quickly. They are starting to turn this game completely to pay to win. The 20 win challenge resets you if you lose 3 times! So skip this game and play anything else!

I had long time enjoyed this game... but now it is nonsense. The "Mystery Boxes" are a waste of time, despicable. The evolution concept seemed like a good idea in theory, but practically it is coming to a dull point; the Evolution should have been kept at a specific card tier. The time of this game becoming one of those in the memory seems to be nearing. Matchmaking is taking longer than before too.

I think the game could be good but I think it has 10 clear issues in my opinion 1. Why is there timer for a game that takes about 5 min. 2. why us there a cooldown on characters j think how they could have done better is making it so the character that you used has a cool down but not everything else. 3. why do when you start or you when your just in the game go against someone who had for my experience I found myself at 59 trophy and the other person having 81 trophys I can't 10 1/10 star

I've been playing on n off for 6+years. As of now, the game has become pay to win. You need to spend an enormous amount for progression if you don't want to wait for months, just to upgrade a single card to max level. Also, the matchmaking seems more rigged recently, matching you up with counter decks if you win more than twice/thrice continuously. It's designed to make you spend money for progressing. Will be back when these issues are addressed. Until then, happy raging to the ones who stay!

Great game, extremely fun. The only problem is that it's pay to win. People who spend money on the game end up way higher level than you, and your cards in the end just won't cut it. The game says it's 'pay to progress' but you can't progress if you keep losing to people who have paid, and if you can't progress then you will never have a chance of beating them unless you pay.

The gameplay is fun, but the game is pay to win. The evolution cards are really powerful (should I say gamebreaking), and they are basically impossible to get unless you spend a lot of money (13.49$ for one full card). And that's just the tip of the iceberg, to level cards to level 15 it takes an insane amount of time unless *again* you spend 10$ to level one card. It's sad really...

my favorite game ever but been having a very big issue lately which makes it unplayable, in 7/10 matches for the 1st thirty seconds i cannot place any card so by then my opponent has took one of my towers. please fix this bug. (:

I used to love this game! Not anymore! It seems like the only way to win is to pay! Your hard work used to mean something! Now it just doesn't even matter if you face someone who spends constant money on upgrades! On top of that, potions NEED to be removed! The ability to render your opponent defenseless is almost cheating! I've spent years playing this game and lose almost every time someone uses them against me! I guess playing fair isn't a thing anymore!

This game used to be great when it was simple. Even Mega Evolutions were fine. Now it's just like those spammy apps with annoying animations and color pop-ups. It's overwhelming and frustrating. If this continues, I'm sure in two years, no one will be playing. The OG players can clearly see how much it's gone downhill. Whoever is in charge of these awful animations (like the Mystery Box that forces extra clicks) should be fired. This is a waste of time and ruins the experience completely.

An excellent game. Easily one of the best games i ever played. But, it severely handicaps players who can't pay. Several hours and even days of waiting for only 1 chest to open. That's plain cruel. It's simply supercell saying "If you got a ton of money to put into this game, good. But if not, then too bad, get stuck for months making the same progress that a paying player will make in three days." And you can't even have more than four chests at a time not to mention you have to wait for hours to just unlock one chest and only one at a time! That's way too cruel. They need to limit the chest wait time to something like an hour and at the very, very least remove the " only one chest can be opened at a time" thing.

I've had to edit my review because the game is increasingly becoming unplayable with the lags. In the recent 20 match tilt quest, I played a match where I beat the other person (3 star) only to find out later that I was seeing a lie (a simulation if you will) and actually none of the moves I'd made (from 1:30 onwards) were even registered and the opponent beat me without me making a move. It's almost impressive that their simulation was so genuine, but that doesn't get me back my loss, does it?

I'm changing my review from a 5 star for two reasons. First, the game has always consumed a lot of data. (40 - 60MB upon opening the app) I have to use mobile data so as not to lag and lose trophies. Not worth it anymore. Second, I discovered I'm the only one who's having the problem. I engaged support only to be rudely brushed off and told to ONLY contact them if I had another query as they'd already responded(rudely). I've loved the game for years but I have no choice but to uninstall. Sad.

Aesthetic wise, this game is great. The controls are easy to understand as long as you check what each card does. The one problem I have is game balance: some cards, like hog rider and royal giant, are way too powerful. They're almost always going to get a hit or 2 off, and cost relatively little, so they can be supported easily. The game for some reason will also sometimes put you against people who completely counter your card deck, which is quite annoying.

Clash Royale was SO much fun for the 3 or 4 years I played it, was a great time killer, and the strategy of its real-time battles was very enjoyable. Sadly the most recent wave of updates (the most recent one in particular) has made it so that I find no reason to keep playing. The free to play friendly progression system has been done away with in favor of making the players have to buy their way forward and enough is enough. Deleting the game and most likely never looking back. Hehehaha. 💔

Its fun at first. But very soon after, it caps. And making progress is not possible without spending a lot of real money on gold. Or spending hours reading and watching strategy videos and articles. If you are looking to delve deep into a game and spend time and money, this game is for you. If you are looking for a game to just mess around with without going hard core, you way want to look elsewhere.

I really wanted to like this game, but the constant connectivity issues make it incredibly frustrating to play. I frequently experience lag spikes that disrupt gameplay, making even simple actions feel delayed. On top of that, there are frequent disconnects during matches causing me to lose or, worse, get kicked out of the game entirely. This has happened multiple times, and it severely impacts the enjoyment and immersion of the game. It’s really disappointing !!

While it can be a fun, competitive game, the lack of true content updates can make the game seem stale after awhile. New cards and new game modes can be nice, but its basically the same game since launch. A problem with the game balance, is that the game seems centered around dealing as much splash damage as possible, and the cards that do this are extremely durable, namely the valkyrie.

At the beginning is fun, it's fine, but when you go further 4k the game becomes p2w, and the matchmaking is terrible, it matches you against opponents with a great level advantage, and if you want to play with the same level card you go to the challenges, but everyone uses pretty much the same cards so it's boring after a while... Long story short... Don't waste your time in this game, you can find better multi-player games

Honestly really like this game, so it can have 2 stars. The cards are cool and its a nice strategy. Now for the long list of cons, first and most important. This game is pay to win to an extreme degree. If you don't pay, you won't get too far. Second is the fact that you never know or can choose what decks players against you have, meaning you could go into a game with someone who completely counters anything you have, and the ranked system is terrible. This is a short list of the cons.

I started playing this game when it first came out and it was awesome!! Simple, play the game, get a chest and wait, you actually had to work to get cards and legendary cards were the best and crazy if you got even one! Now, I've gotten a free legendary at least twice a week for the past few months. And everything is so pay to win nowadays and all of the evolutions have completely ruined the skill factor of this game. My favorite deck (logbait) is completely unplayable now.

I have played since launch. It was a great game then, and over the next few years of the games life, it had improved. The first season pass was $4.99 and that was a reasonable price for the amount of items you received. Now it's $11.99!?!? The screen is littered with in-app purchases. If you want to reach your free rewards, you need to first scroll past at least 10 different micro transactions that range from $1.99-24.99. I miss the original game. The game is now a cash grab :(

Used to be my go to game. Even got my wife playing it with me. After the Clan Wars 2 update it has become extremely boring and monotonous. Do whatever you can to not become level 13 cause immediately after that you will only play 13s that seem to always have a max deck. You will not be able to experiment with other cards, if you want to win. I quit buying the battle pass cause it seemed to speed up progression but it doesn't matter if your only progressing into a brick wall.

The game has become so "pay 2 win" it's ridiculous. I used to really enjoy the game. After coming back to the game after leaving for a few years I got matches that I won fairly easily. Then got to challenger 1 and kept facing level 11's w maxed cards. Event challenges are a joke. EVERY time I win 2-3 matches in a row and then get 3 losses in a row. Magic items are just more p2w. And makes it harder to unlock new legendaries. 3* bc as long as you not trophy pushing you can still have fun

The game is pretty good, but I won't give it five stars, for I have one problem. When I play 2v2 almost 1/5 of matches I play with an AFK. The problem here is that there's no balancing the game where's there an AFK or someone Dcs. I know that this isn't a big problem, because the game is focused on 1v1, but one such thing happens to me I just wanna stop playing it. It would be great when there was a mechanic where AFKs where disconnected automatically and the remaining player would receive elixir x2, or reporting system. Anyways the game's very good and keep up the good work! :)

I've noticed with more and more updates, the game lags a bit, which isn't bad, but glitches a whole lot more now. The game is getting worse and worse with freezing and glitching. Either on my brand new phone or my tablet. Whether it is true glitches or hackers, the game needs some serious help i think after 4 years or is about time to quit. Can no longer okay competitively when 3 out of 5 matches glitch for the loss.

Like many other players I've been around since the beta testing. Such a well-thought, deftly made game. However, I do have one concern. And one that many of my friends, who have also been playing the game for 3 years, can confirm. It seems as if you are doing good and win consecutive matches, the game will automatically queue you up against DIRECT counters on your deck and set you up for a very frustrating losing streak. If you download this game, prepare to be frustrated 40% of the time.

The game is good as such strategy gaming but the level we end up playing seems quite fake as we go deeper, you are lured into the game, when you reach a certain level and you feel you are playing good but it's fake... Please don't get too deep into the game. Its my experience at certain level if you keep playing you'll get to know, you will start losing and loss continues even when, how good a player plays at level 7 around 3000 trophies, I came down by more than 300 trophies while playing continuously, so it seemed that I was not good player at level 7 to keep up the 3100 trophies. Playwell :) have a nice time ;)

The game has become too repetitive. After about 5200 trophies you begin seeing players that all use the same deck of cards with slight changes. At first it didn't upset me, I understand that it's a choice to copy and play play with someone else's deck. But my problem with it is, that is the ONLY thing I see in this game now. There are 99 DIFFERENT cards that each do they're own thing. But instead everyone chooses to play the same thing because it's considered "good". I enjoy the game. Rarely.

First off asking for a review after every battle is really annoying. Seconded even when you're lucky enough to get a really good card it benefits you nothing because it's so easy to kill at level1 and they are so rare you'll likely never get 2. You have to spend hours trying to get enough cards and gold to level anything up. Still sucks. Update 2. Often hate this game. Don't want to have to grind foreeeeeever to complete gold rush or events. Want to play than be done!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

It's a fun and engaging game, but this is the third and final time I uninstall it. The matching algorithm is completely unfair. If you want to consistently be matched against players who are 2-3 levels higher than you in every match, then this is the game for you. If you consistently want to play impossible to win matches against level 13 maxed out troops as a level 9, then this is the game for you. I've spent $100's over the last 3 years and I'm finally done. Good luck to you all!

"Great game if you if you like teamwork, strategy and dragons" I wrote that review in 2017 alongside a 5 star rating. The game is now more pay-to-win then ever with the addition of the lvl 14 update. It no longer takes skill to get new cards, it now takes time and/or money, and lots of it. The game isn't much fun without friends to play it with in my opinion because it feels less like a game and more like a chore. Champions can be unlocked at lvl 14, which isn't something you can get by playing

Nice game. I have been playing it for about 4 or 5 years now and I have to say, its a great game. It can get really addictive when you start playing. But there is a problem where you fight opponents at a higher or lower arena than you. But it is a good game. Sometimes its a pay to win. The challenges and clan wars are really fun. The chest take too long to open and sometimes it gets too hard to find a legendary card. Would definitely recommend. (Also I rate it 4.5 stars not 4!)

Came back to the game after a few years and they absolutely ruined it. The pay to win is on another level now. I reached a point where it is impossible to win a single game (no matter which gamemode I play on) because I get thrown into matches with higher-level enemies AND enemies with evolutions (broken cards). The only way I can compete against this atrocity is to pay $$$, get evolutions, and max all my cards out. And one other thing, the monetization is shoved down your throat. It's over...

Clash royale is a fun, tower defense like game. You do not have to spend money to win in this game. I was able to obtain legendaries, cards, and push trophies without spending much money. Although I did spend 15$ on the game it was optional and didnt help the actual gameplay. I am now level 10 with every card in the game and am at Master 1. This game either requires lots of skill, or lots of money.

This Game is one of the best strategy games I have ever played. Colorful graphics, strategic gameplay and best mobile game so far by a long shot. Well done, keep it up. Edit: Supercell, you are an absolute disappointment. It is incredible how fast greed can corrupt and destroy everything. I'm leaving my previous rating as a memoir and proof of how great this game WAS. Incredibly P2W now, something my friends a couple of years ago never believed and would never happen, and then lo and behold.

Matchmaking is custom designed to screw you if you don't pay cash to level up. Troop levels aren't taken into account during matching, so youre constantly running into people who max leveled their troops, giving them a massive advantage over everyone else. It's very hard to max level a single unit without paying, much less all of them, so f2p players are at a massive disadvantage. Not so bad at first, but gets VERY bad later on, to the point that its almost unplayable if you advance too quickly.

I've had my "good job supercell, this will be a hit" review up since the game came out. I'm taking my 5 stars to 2 stars. The new bugs are killing me. I just lost a game because of the reconnecting error it throws up every second game. You guys made a hit but it's taking a downfall. I hope you guys put in the effort to fix these bugs.

The game is fun to play both alone and with friends. Strategy and skill (prediction and timing) are on the same level, and that's why the game is competitive. Each game lasts max 6 minutes and that makes it so easy to just play one game and then stop if you are busy. The only (huge) cons is that either you pay with real money or you have to dedicate your entire life, for months, in order to get to a decent (competitive) level. I would give it 5 stars but this thing makes it 3 for me

Worst balance I've seen! The tournament fight is a really interesting idea, but I've never seen such an unfair gameplay! I'm lvl 9 and I usually don't pay for mobile games and I'm playing against lvl 10 players, who have nearly every card you could imagine. I couldnt even attack a single tower and lost 4 times in a row! So, if you want to play a game truly unfair, this is the right for you!

This game is fun. It's a good time killer. However I would like to point out is the balance in this game is very bad. The random player search could really use an overhaul as there is too much level difference giving advantage in most cases. Even if there were longer wait times to get the correct matchup I would be happier personally. I'm sure that it wouldn't take that much to balance this game. All in all I have a lot of fun playing but there are times that I have no urge to play due to these issues. I'll change my opinion and rating as I see changes.

One of my most favorite games. I love the animations for legendaries. I love the chest cycles and the awesome 2v2 button. You guys should advertise stats royale, but not a lot. That was me three years ago. Now I think the game is more fun for the people who actually want to spend money on the game. I have been playing for a while. Now, they added pass royale, making it 5 dollars, and it really made me mad. I'm not the only one who thinks this though. Pay to Win. But it is still a good game.

Glitches everywhere! For the past month and even worse with the recent update, the app closes out as soon I am matched in 1v1 or 2v2. And if it doesn't close out, it lags causing me to finally enter into a match already in progress. I messaged and they told me it is my connection. If it is was my connection, other devices would not be working properly during these so-called "connectivity" issues. I am unsure if it is just glitches in the game or their servers being uncapable to keep up. Fix it!

Honestly I grinded this game all the way up to 3400 trophies after that it was a living hell. you lose WAY to much trophies when you lose and all the pay to wins just have legendary cards at line arena 7. I thought this game was good at first but it kinds sucks.

Spent years playing, finally got to the point of maxing out cards, now cards aren't maxed because of the level 14 money grab. I'm out, screw this. Just reinstalled to check this out after my 2021 review and somehow it's gotten worse. Wow. Uninstalling again. Install this only if you want to spend a ton of time and energy and money to be remotely competitive. Then, when you do, they'll change the game as a cash grab anyway and you'll have to start over again.

A game that is a deck building, troop placement strategy game. It's a pay to win game, and free to play players will be very much at a disadvantage. It takes time to figure out what troops counter others, and that's what game knowledge and skill is needed. After playing for years I'm uninstalling for good. It's worth while if you want to put hundreds of dollars and countless hours into it. Displeased that it's how it is, the strategy parts is what kept it enjoyable for so long.

The concept is good, but the game itself is terrible. For starters it is one of the most unbalanced games out there. One day a certain card is broken and the other it is useless. (Although there are some cards that are consistently annoying like elite barbarians and mega knight). Secondly, it is pay to win. People willing to spend money are going to get a big advantage (it's worth noting that no content is kept behind pay walls). It only gets props for the creative game modes and the rare fun.

Not having a simple report system is frustrating. So many ways to make things harder or even boring for others and the game does not seem to focus on these issues. Every time you play a 2 vs 2 match, someone is going to troll you out. Whether it is in your team, or the other one. It always happens this way. Well, I once stopped playing. Now I'm doing it again. Thanks for the time spent =)

Briefly fun, built for frustration. I won't get into the pay to win aspects of this game since that is common on mobile. The real issue is the matchmaking is explicitly built to slow your progress. If you're doing well and having fun they match you against an opponent built to beat you. Early on this happens less but don't waste your time. Eventually this game will be more frustrating than fun.

After a 5 year break, I decided to try the game again. No surprise......game concept is still amazing but you guys just cant get the game play equal. It is more than frustrating and who the hell wants to play a game where you pretty much lose 90% of the time. I am a lv 12, playing lv 11 opponents with maxed cards. This was my last try. I find it funny that there are so many negative reviews with the same complaints. Good luck but not worth tje investment nor time.

This game used to be fun, but now, it's just about greed on the developer's part. Raising the cost of things, reducing the free items and prizes, basically getting less for more. And every opponent goes to the internet to find their deck. You battle the same cards all the time. Gets old pretty quick. No more Clash Royale being played in this house.

Honestly, I used to love this game but recently its been rigged. I used to win every once in a while but now I loose every game and everyone I play against is leveled at least 2 levels higher than me. I loose every game and it's just getting annoying, even after switching up the deck... Hopefully something changes for me! Just jumped back on after not playing for a while even 400 trophies down I'm still loosing and playing crazy leveled up people. Might delete the game again.

Cash grab updates, devs aren't listening and it's all about the money at this point. You get bombarded with ingame purchase offers, the gameplay is stale, it lacks innovation - the introduction of lvl 15 was the last straw, I think that the game is dying unless Supercell reverts the damage, that they've done. But currently I have no reason to believe that they will do so, they're too stubborn about it and will run the game into the ground. What a shame, it used to be an enjoyable game.

The game play is fundamentally great. So simple to understand yet so many layers of interactions, timing and transactions makes the game play very fun and makes you feel very skillful. However, progression is a slog (it took me 2 years to get to max), updates are very infrequent and underwhelming at best and there really is only 1 way of playing the game. I deleted my supercell account along with 4 years of experience and its been awesome.

The game at first was great. I have played it for 6 years. Until the continuous updates, unnecessary characters and excessive cash payments. Once you don't have money for a card upgrade , you will LOSE a Battle and trophies. Another issue the game has is this buggy feature during Clan Wars. You attack an enemy boat and their health bar for the cannons are still intact. Overall, the game used to be great, but NEWER ISN'T ALWAYS BETTER.

This is a good game... If you have fast internet. The game itself can be played with slow internet but the problem comes when you load into a match. You see the game doesn't check if it's loaded for you before starting the match like games such as League do. Instead it just starts it and if your game takes a bit longer to load than your opponent's, they immediately have a major advantage.

Came back to the game after a year or so off only to find the micro transactions are worse. Every screen has a call to action. Elite wildcards, diamond pass, gold pass, 3-4 shop offers, events, etc. It used to be a fun game and the only reason I left in the first place was because of IRL events. Now it has become your typical mobile game. Sorry Supercell this is not for me.

The new vault mode in clan wars is one of the most idiotic, stupid, and uncreative things your team has done in a very very long time. Aside from that, the classic war deck mode is unfair, often giving one player cards that do not counter the other player's deck. If you can fix this, I'll change it to 5. After two years, I still wish there was an option to give zero stars.

EDIT: The addition of the pass has made this a completely subscription-based game. Realistically, you don't pay-to-win anymore... you pay-to-play. Non-sub players are at such a disadvantage it is basically not optional. While it seems possible to remain competitive without paying money, the reality is that you will always be behind anyone who does. This is because of the mechanic by which you can buy the cards themselves rather than opening the chests.

This game is really great. I've been playing since the game game out. Back when clans costed gems to make and when Legendary cards weren't a thing. I'm running a successful clan that wins wars almost every time and I am passionate about this game. However, the recent update as majorly impacted the experience of playing Clash royale. A lot of people I know can not access Clash aroyale anymore and every time I go to initiate a battle, the loading screen takes about 15 seconds which is drastically impacting my gameplay as enemies are taking out my towers before I even actually enter the game. Another issue that is really intoxicating for everyone is the new trading system. A lot of people are complaining stating that its "a MonEY GraB" and so on. My clan is filled with over 30 trade requests because trades have become so complicated and poor now. This was a really good game but I am afraid it will plummet into failure if you do not reverse the changes or recreate them in a way that suits everyone. If you read this, thank you for your time. This is a really good game but has had a devestating update.

Clash Royale is a very sloppy designed game, with very lackluster created characters, and very few updates, and when there is one, it always seems to be filler and doesnt actually produce anything productive for the well being of the game. While there are some times where Clash is kind of enjoyable, however, those moments are vastly overshadowed by the extent of said lackluster characters and very, very, VERY poor game design. I would never recommend it to my worst enemy in a million years.

Very pay to win, but it can still be kind of fun. Edit: It was 3 stars, but it's now so P2W that I can't progress at all. I'm not a bad player, I do decent in challenges. But I don't have the money to sink into all the evolutions. To be able to play multiple decks. Dagger duchess is what pushed me over the line. There are no more wild cards in the season shop, so unless you want to spend money enough, losing 1/2 the games because your tower troops are under levelled.

The game is great on a technical basis. There are very few bugs, the large variety of cards function as they are described, and there are several interesting battlemodes. But with all fun aspects of gameplay considered, some of the out-of-gameplay core mechanics are just fun killers. Since cards and towers are leveled, if someone has cards many levels higher than yours in a fight, they have a significant advantage. So, either you buy more cards with real cash, or painstakingly collect them. 👎

This has become a pay to win game. Subscription for bonus chests and other benefits. If you don't spend money, you will have a hard time winning. Edit : I decided to try the game again. After playing for a week, good internet connection, i am placing cards and the game is waiting 3 or 4 seconds before placing the cards after i tried placing them. Impossible to win any matches like this.

Used to be a good game, but has quickly went downhill. It's extremely pay to win. The new cards are extremely overpowered and it takes WAY too long to upgrade one card to max. For example, I've been a free to play player for about 6 years and don't even have one card at max level yet, but someone can easily upgrade all their cards if they are willing to spend some money. Very unfair matchmaking too. It puts you up against players who are 3 or 4 levels higher than you.

This game was fun. WAS. But this new update completely taints my opinion of the game and shows what it really is about. Yes, the pass royale is pointless and was horribly implemented, but the fact that the game is becoming less and less playable as it goes on speaks volumes to Supercell's intentions. Patching a few of the sometimes years old bugs isn't enough. I have spent money on this game, got to 4K, but this game has become a money grubbing unplayable mess. Good riddance.

high reviews for this money grab game is either from those prepared to spend significant sums of money or those new to the game. Thought I'd update again after the introduction of the level 15 cards and evolution cards. Again as has been each update, it's just another money grab. They've boosted a set of cards that are impossibly difficult to upgrade unless you pay £5.99 each... These cards are boosted to such a degree you're pretty much going to lose if you don't have one and the opponent does!

Played for 8 years. They decided to make the game a fully pay to win game. Nearly no progress can be made if you were maxed level 14 when the evolutions came out. Been using the same deck for years, so has many people. Now everyone is forced to find a deck, hope that it stays relevant by the time you get the evolutions or level 15. Game used to be fun, challenging, easy to pick up at any point without feeling like you're playing a new game. Loved the game, until money became the main priority.

Editing my review from 4 years ago... The matching system SUCKS! I get either players too tough or they're able to bring out 3-4 characters at a time but yet, I have some of the same and it won't let me go that fast. What gives? Definitely set up pay to win! Could be fun if you stood a chance but you can't keep up and then have a time for them to go yet they take most your life before forming? Yeah no, I'm through with this! Long time player no more!

WORST UPDATE EVER!!!! I've played this game for about 4 years, was always a great time killer and was interesting. Since the last update, battle matches are unfair and the chances of winning a match are ridiculously low. It's made the game boring. I have pretty high level cards but I can't even fill my chest slots since the update. I've bought the battle passes each time, but I won't be spending any more money if things aren't fixed.... I'll be uninstalling instead, which is a massive shame 😔

I love this game so much, and I would rate it 5 stars in a heartbeat, but I have encountered a major flaw. My phone isnt that great, so at the beginning of a game it can take up to 30 seconds to load into the match. In those 30 seconds, I've usually lost a tower or even gotten 3 crowned. It makes it impossible to climb, impossible to participate in clan wars and impossible to participate in events and challenges. Please just add a feature where the game doesnt start until ALL players are loaded.

EDIT - Game is still fun to play, is still dynamic, is still strategic. But the company has shown time and time again a disconnect from players. Clan war refactor was atrocious, and even if they took some steps to correct it, I still think it shows a stubbornness to stir back at unpopular changes, and the new upcoming addition of a new card/tower level that adds nothing other than just grind, and the dishonesty of announcing it after an event that nudged players at spending gold is a bad omen.

it's a fun game I do enjoy it, the only thing I don't enjoy is the game says it matches you with an equal opponent's trophy count, but the algorithm to me is similar to a slot machine. It allows you to win by not comparing the experience but just the trophy count, (which is how they get away with it), but the games ultimate intentions is all for the money, so the more you play the more you lose so that you can spend money on the game to increase your chance of winning. The match making is a lie.

I think its a pretty good game, but when the game updates and I realized when I saw other reviews I went to the options menu and clicked 'From this device model only' for the reviews and it seems the game only works for Apple products, and me having an Android the game just crashes and won't let me play. So if you could fix it so it would work for androids too I would appreciate it. Overall Great game

It is just a pay and play game. You can play for free for the initial level. But after certain level,you'll not get enough cards to level up untill you pay up. The match making also is very illogical. Also the server get disconnect a lot of time in between games. Especially when you play a limited entry matches. Pathetic.

You guys need to fix the new setup. I'm a level 11 and I'm always playing level 13 players with higher level cards. I can only get so far. Players are purposely losing to collect better rewards when the season restarts. In doing this, I get to play people who have no business playing at my level. If you think I'm going to spend money (which could be the idea on why you allow it) to help level up my cards, you're out of your mind.

The gameplay, graphics, and mechanics are awesome. There are several issues... In battles you will usually face decks that are clearly superior unless you get VERY lucky and get two or three good rare cards. Also, the chest times and limitations are ridiculously high opening one chest every three to twelve hours, and most of the upgrade cost past level four is so expensive, you'll be playing for weeks to upgrade even common cards... Clans cost way too much money to create. VERY disappointing.

Game takes way to long to be able to upgrade your cards. It always matches you up in unfavorable matches. Also, there is sometimes a lag at the beginning of the game that lets the other player get a head start on you and by the time the lag is over its pretty much to late and you lost. Other than that its a fun game that lets you pass time.

It's gotten pretty bad lately. Been playing since day 1, but I'm considering ending it here. Update: I took about a year break and came back and it was even worse. The game is riddled with constant "new" additions and updates that overcomplicate the game. The evolutions keep getting added to more and more cards making it honestly less and less fun. It's to the point where anyone new has to pay to play to keep up. I've been here since the beginning and I feel like I need to pay to play tbh.

Wow... I used to adore this game, up until the point where Supercell became gluttonous for money over the satisfaction of their player base. Another issue is the ridiculous match ups and the fact that my connection is lost at random times, resulting in me losing hundreds of trophies. And yes, I do have a strong, stable WiFi connection. If you wanna stay happy, stay away from Clash Royale.

I've been playing the game for like 6 years now. It use to be my favorite game to play, but here lately (actually for a little while now) it just seems to be going in the wrong direction. It's become less enjoyable to play over the last several updates. I think it's unbalanced and has several unnecessary parts. There are like two ladders now. This last update has really made less enjoyable.

I play very casually, usually coming back for a couple weeks every year before I stop again. I'm still disappointed by the lack of variety in the ranked game modes. Everyone is running the same/similar decks. This game has so much potential, but the lack of *REQUIRED* balance updates usually means running into the same types of decks against Enemies with the same play style. There's unfortunately no variety and as a result very little fun for casual free to play gamers.

My review still has not changed. Fix your game.. The way they set you up should be by level not trophies. that way it's more of a fair fight and you don't get screwed over by some one with a level 6 vs a level 3. The chest should have shorter timers then they have now. It shows that it is a pay to win. What made clash of clans fun was it was not a pay to win game. Guys step your game up for me to give you more stars.

I have played this have for a few years. It has increasingly become loaded with all sorts of ads and purchases which I can handle to an extent. But now the gameplay is affected with the evolution cards. If you don't pay for all of the add-ons and packages, it is harder to compete on the same level. Good for them for making money, but it sure makes the game less fun. Unfortunately I am uninstalling this game now. I guess it will free up some wasted time.

I'm getting game lags and slow connectivity always when i open clash Royale which was not fixed still even after a year. It's not fun anymore. And another thing is that i often get low connection icon although my internet speed is super which often lead to loss. I'm starting to wonder if there's a crack game that messes with the actual game, to also note that it's happening over and over. I'm in love with the game but this right now is a heart break. I hope they really take care of their game.

Clash Royale is, and has alwaye been, a fun game to compete with other players or just pass time. I have played this game for 3 years now and I still find it fun. The main reasons I rated the game 4 stars rather than 5 are that at high levels progression becomes incredibly slow unless you pay. Obviously it makes sense that progression slows down, but in this case it is way worse than it should be. The other reason it lost a star is because the new matchmaking system is ridiculous.

It's become a pay-to-win game. I played it since it started and I really enjoyed it until the pass appeared. Now that I see a player using a different tower skin, I know this player will probably have better cards than me. I don't plan to spend money on a mobile game; I've done it before and I found it a total waste. Please try to match players according to their "paying status", so things are fair again.

Great game, though the developers have focused too much on more bells and whistles to get your $$ more than improving game play. I'd say 75 percent of the time you get paired against a direct counter for your cards making skill meaningless. I miss the royal of old. They should have left well enough alone but I guess that doesn't make you rich. :( From 5 star to 3 New update as of 3/31/22 is too much. QUIT ADDING BS! It's getting too convoluted. It's overwhelming

Used to be one of the best mobile games, but for the past few years the game has become so pay-to-win, if not at the very least money-oriented, that even the whales have a hard time catching up. It's no longer about the cards or the gameplay, but on how much higher we can make the upgrade levels and costs to the point where any skill-based matchups get nullified. Anything that made the progression easier and simpler has now been removed or nerfed heavily. This game doesn't respect your time.

Mobile games like this only solidify the fact the PC and console gaming will always win out...this whole greed thing the world has fallen into is crazy...get ahead by spending real money on a bit of coding?! Lol you have to be kidding me I don't mind spending $50-$60 on a full game with plot and loot, etc, but I wouldn't spend a dime to get a digital card and if you don't you don't move up easier to loose trophies than gain and again unless you buy you never see the higher arenas or the characters that come with them. So yeah...there's my bit

Game play is cool, but dropping players trophies doesn't make any . What's the point of earning them when you're going to take them and drop them a level? I've earned a lot of the cards playing on different levels, so you can't use that argument. Moreover, you shouldn't loose trophies when you have glitches & connection issues. The developers should've thought about that since it's a live action game. What if players are in the middle of a battle and some where down the line poor reception causes

It makes me sad to see yet another game consumed by supercell's love for money. As if in app purchases weren't enough, adding the "battle pass" or whatever allows people to significantly further there process in the game with card upgrades and resources than people who don't pay. Now, you see level 10's with Max level cards and the entire leveling system on its own means absolutely nothing. I used to love this game but now it just sucks, like really really sucks. Save your time and money!!

I had a bit of fun, trying to catch up to and best friends, challenging myself to see how far I could get without spending money. The answer was two level 14s (max at time), which took a year and a half, and 5600 on ladder. They'd been making improvements, extra daily rewards, and it was possible to get the later card thresholds with books of cards and chests from the free battle pass. Then they scrapped the books and free battle pass. Good luck not paying, I'm out.

Those saying it's a money grab lack skill,patience and understanding. Been playing sense the release, got frustrated several times. Then I realized some people are just better than me. Yea it takes time to max out your cards , but it's not impossible and can be done without spending. Like ANY game with in-app purchases, spending just speeds up the process. Learn to realize , good things come in time.

It's a great game. No doubt about that. I've bought a few pass totaled on one account. The problem is, it randomly signed me out if that account and it won't send any verification codes for me to sign back in. I list my email and it says it's sending a verification code and nothing is in my inbox. I've lost an account that I put years into and I can't get it back. I can't get any account back.

I'm dropping down my rating to three stars due to the game becoming more a pay to play game. It is very easy for a lower-level player to buy a lot of stuff and become so darn good at the game because your troops are higher level then people that are two levels higher than you. This is extremely infuriating when I'm someone who's put a lot of time in this game and then run into someone who's a level 11 and I'm a level 13 and have level 13 troops whereas he has level 14 troops. :(

I've spent 2 years playing this game. Spent a couple hundred dollars. Played on fully maxed out accounts (My personal best is 6683 and I have 400k cards won). Supercell has turned the game into an absolute money grab, and I feel like my only way to retaliate for them killing a game I loved so much is to rate them low and quit playing it. There were good times here don't get me wrong! But now I just can't put up with it. Not the same game anymore. It's going in a downwards spiral too with no hopes of it getting better. Good luck to anyone who wants to bother with it.

I've been playing this game for a while and the game has always been balanced for the most part... recently I've noticed a bit of a change and today I played a match on my new phone (so since I don't want to link my account to Facebook I started a new acct) where my opponent was 5 levels higher than me and all their cards were much higher. :-/ great game though, can't wait to see where you go with it.

It has been five years, and Supercell has yet to resolve the persistent issue of players going AFK in 2v2 matches. Today alone, I encountered eight such instances, which has led me to consider uninstalling the game. Furthermore, it appears that the game is primarily designed to cater to those who invest money into it, leaving those who do not with a frustrating experience.

My original review was 3* and then I took it up to 5 in May of 2016. The devs really listened and made good changes and additions. Lately, it's been going downhill fast. They are emphasizing profits over the quality of the game. Players who don't shell out real $ are more and more disadvantaged when it comes to the ability to level. You get a LOT less gold these days if you don't subscribe to Pass Royale. I have been having fun with it lately though, so back to 4 stars.

Once I wasn't able to play 2 vs 2 because "I left many matches", the thing is that it was the game who left it, it crashed so many times, and still happening, that did not happen before, now I get very frustrated while playing because of many glitches and other things like balace between players, sad because i really liked the game but you had done few things to resolve this

I think we should have the option to choose a deck we want to go up against in the training mode. I put decks together to counter others and I use training to rehearse and anticipate what I go up against. The AI in training right now doesn't help much and the least we can do is put decks together that we normally see in a battle. Decks are stronger now with these new upgrades to the point where it is a bit unfair at times. Hopefully your team looks at this & consider this as an option.
Really fun experience and simple to get the hang of. Since there isn't an actual chat, its difficult for people to be toxic if someone loses. But all around great game.

This game wants your money, and, like most other mobile games, it's going to try to suck it out of you. If you want to play for free, expect a lame, limiting free pass (oh, and a battle pass system, but you'll know that soon enough), rigged matchmaking avoidable only to payers or long-time payers (you'll get put against some players with hefty card rarity, level or castle level advantages) and a very time-consuming path to upward progression. It's a shame, as the game was fast-paced fun.

This game gets more hate than it deserves. The graphics are good, no ads, and lots of free loot. The gameplay could use some balancing and the amount of trophies won/lost should be reworked so you don't get completely stuck in a certain tier. (Like me lol) I frequently face opponents with max troops and higher level castles which is very hard to compete against. But there's a good variety of game modes and clan wars can be fun if you find an active group.

This is why I will never invest in this game unless you're like them. This game is a cheat, when you figure out how to beat most of their line up, troop movement slows down and elixir generation slows down too then in the middle of the game, disconnects and re login you and you can never win any match when you see 'Reward limit reached'. And they clearly don't want anyone to reach 4000 trophies without any payments. Overall it's pay to win. What a great cheat game. In summary, MONEY TALKS..

As somone who's played this game since it came out, I have to say I'm very disappointed in what it's become. It was always a pay to win game, but it could be played with friends and you made it fun. Unfortunately the matchmaking still sucks. I wouldn't give it 2 stars for just that tho. I tried logging into my supercell id and it didn't let me. I want blocked and if I was, I should've been notified. I promise, when too update your game a lot of people will come back, just fix it, please!

After playing the game for over 3 years now I can not rate above 1 star... Game is all based on spending money in order to win (pay2win), the match system is unlikely to be fair, for example I myself am level 11 and fight against level 12 players etc.. This happens in order for players to pay for in game items of course. Overall I rate it with a single star because of the reasons mentioned above but also the lack of new updates that bring hype to the game.

The complaints about needing to pay to win were unfounded until this update. The 5 dollar pass, while optional, is thrown in your face. When you get a crown chest, you're forced to view the "elite reward" that you can only get by buying the pass. Essentially, the app is now structured to show you what you're missing out on instead of letting you enjoy a free game that gives you the option to buy extra goodies. As a long time player who has spent money, I'm really upset.

Best. Game. Ever. I've played this game for 3 years, and it still seems to amaze me in every way possible. New stuff almost every month, new and old challenges, clans, and much more. I highly recommend playing it. Trust me, you won't be disappointed. Editied: nevermind. This game gets boring after doing the same stuff for 5 years. There's really no variety and it's turned into an even more microtransactional hell then it already was.

Been one of the biggest proponents and defenders of this game for the longest time, my playtime is over 21 DAYS total, could be more by now, my account is probably 6-7 years old, and I've played on and off since launch or near launch, been so long I can't remember. Something I do remember is how much fun the game was, how over the last couple years the inconveniences and pay to win features have really stacked up. To be frank, the game is dying and they are milking whats left of the player base.

I like this game a lot. I actually started playing it just about everyday outside with my fiance, we both have separate accounts. Sometimes the internet is the hardest thing.... Once it starts lagging I can't see any of my "cards" and by the time it fixes itself I've lost already. Wouldn't suggest kids under 12 to play, as in the chat they can be pretty vulgar. But in all very addicting game hands down!

Game used to be fun, but it way to much diverse in the number of cards in the game. One minute, you destroy your opponent, the next you're in a good battle, then you go on a 7 game losing streak of just getting hard counted out of your mind and unless you have spent tons of money on the game to get more card and change your deck you get stuck partially at higher level arenas. The game is very skill based, which is great, but sometimes it literally doesn't matter how good you are you just loss.

Editing my review from 2016 to one star. I've been playing this game since it launched. It had been the one game I put money into each month. And was happy to do so. Now they have doubled the monthly price for the game pass and made some curious gameplay features. I completely understand that an established game needs to attract new players but not at the expense of long time existing ones. I was a play every day kind of user. Most days was logging in multiple times as well. Not now...

THIS GAME IS EXTREMELY EXPENSIVE. IT COSTS THOUSANDS OF DOLLARS TO PLAY PROPERLY. I keep losing to people blatantly because they paid money. I'm only in the middle of the progression system. It will only get worse as I go. Apparently now they're adding a new level that either costs thousands of dollars, or takes literal years of constant gameplay to unlock. I don't want to waste money on a phone game. I play better games on my PC all the time. This is a fun game to play when I poop, at least.

It's a fun game that I have been enjoying longer than any other mobile game. I especially like that the games are quick so I can play a quick match whenever. Deck building is great. I don't like the move to a season pass it makes it feel even more pay to win than it did before. At 5 bucks a month it's just more than I am willing to pay. But I have a lot of clan members that like it and continue to pay for it so I guess the price works for some people.

I've been a player and supporter of this game since it's beginning. The changes over the years have been pretty predictable. Increasing the card level cap, adjusting the in game economy and such. It was fair and made sense most of the time. Multiple game modes were added to get Chests. Chests are the main avenue of progress. This latest update has taken away the multiple options that were available to players to progress and funneled everyone into the "Trophy Road". 500 characters isn't enou

A game that keeps on giving. I've played this for years. I rate 4 stars, as I do think the game was better at first. Most updates and new cards seem to have changed the game to worse. Also every time a new card is made, it is over powered. I suppose this makes everyone want to own the card and spend money to level it up. Then after a year or so it is nerfed to balance. I love the game anyway!

This went from good to very bad. I would not recommend putting money into it if you actually want an edge in the game. It almost seems fun until you play for a few weeks. Its very unbalanced and you will see the same cards being used by everyone and if you don't have them, you're screwed. Had to uninstall to make space to make my phone run just that much faster and I still get adds for it. No! Never again!

I played this game when it first came out years ago and I recently picked it back up. I can't, I just can't. It's 100% pay-to-win, does very unbalanced opponent matching, and is full of noticable cheater/hacker. Not to mention, in the past 5 years, they have hardly added new content and what little content they have added is just completely unbalanced with the rest of the game. Would NOT recommend this game unless you want to spend money for a bunch of nonsense to make yourself better. 🚫

When clash Royale came out, it was a fun and unique game. You choose very carefully what you would upgrade and what strategy to play. It was very balanced and when you lost it felt like you legitimately got outplayed. All of that is gone. The game has genuinely become pay to win. They will add new content that takes several months to unlock while playing free. And by the time you finally unlock it, it will be nerfed. This game is not fun anymore, do not download it. It will only waste your time.

Game is very unbalanced. You can pay to get gold and cards to level up quickly. Otherwise the game is extremely grindy. It will take you well over a year and a half to get to max level. On top of that, those who pay can upgrade their cards faster, giving an unfair advantage on the field. The challenges are barely worth trying since they're dominated by players with very high level cards and towers. An OKAY game at best.

I thought overall well the idea was good. Just with the awesome cards and the different strategies makes this a fine game. Mechanically, this game really ruined it for me there was no like incentive for me for playing long periods of time in the day just like 30-45 minutes every 4 hours. I understand like earning money is important, but if you can't even delete a chest this game really doesn't seem on that interesting. Other then getting stars to rank up, but even then not very rewarding.

It was all good about a year ago, but now every time i open clash royale , first match will be delayed upto 1 minute and i will be lost. It takes a lot of time to open every day's first match. I got my new bluetooth headphones and when i connect it, it is strucking with audio and more disturbances are coming. It is normal when i play without headphones. I thought it is headphones fault and i tried to listen songs on youtube without disconnecting them, it was excellent and same repeats again...

It's becoming more and more of a pay to win game. There's quite little you can do to progress, especially at the higher leagues, but then there are players who buy a royal pass and bam! They'd progress with the speed of light. There is an exponential difference in opportunities between those who pay and those who don't. It is now frustratingly difficult to keep on playing without paying. The only reason I gave it 2 instead of 1 star is that i' ve been playing this game from before it was p2w.

The game can be fun however the game allows you to start a battle and then will not let you actually play anything stating that your wifi is bad even though it is five bars. While it is not allowing you to play, you can see every move your opponent makes as the game gives them a free win. Makes no sense! If it really cannot detect your wifi during a game it should not allow you to find one in the first place.

Fun game to play, not too many updates but when there are it's just new characters and such. Not much maintenance patches. No lag, not really, gameplay is simple. Update since 05/2018 The new boat clan war is lame the first day it came out. Lots of people already knew it would kill the game, and it has. Besides that, game is the same. Matchmaking is off sometimes. I'm maxed out and play against lvl 10s in war or so. Makes no sense. No interest in this game anymore

Been playing since before global launch. This game used to be great now it's almost unplayable. Ever since the war update, I've only been matched with lvl 13s with all max decks, and they're always over 1000 trophies higher than me. It's pointless to even try with my level 11s. They don't balance cards well so let's add new cards instead of fixing a very broken game. If I hadn't spent so much time in the game is uninstall. Don't download, you'll be better off.

Match ups can be a little one sided. But a good simple to play game. ^^^ Initial review^^^ Since then ... Frustrated with constant "Balancing" of cards by the manufacturers ... The way I see it ... you focus on building the strengths of the cards you like to use based on a certain deck strategy ... then all of a sudden ... a card you have worked to build up gets a review (Witch😢) ... and no longer has the impact or works in with your strategy ... now trying to find a new strategy ...

Clash Royale does a great job of staying engaging at all levels of play with its MMR system. It's a good strategy card game and has a reasonable way to reach end game content without getting boring. My main problem with the game is an extremely weak clan system. Recruitment is basically impossible without being extremely high level or lucky. The clan system is really only useful for requesting and chatting with friends. It could practically be an auction house and be the same in usability.

Not gonna lie this is an amazing game. If you play it too long it may die out, like on me. But have to admit they have changed so much to the game but kept the core mechanics the same. Only thing is you need time to play the game or atleast pay to continue in some scenarios. Great game. Definitely recommend strategic players to try it out for yourself!!!

Honestly a very fun game, not too addictive and just as fun for casual gameplay as well as serious gameplay. Very simple to get the hang of and overall just a great game, i would probably rate the game itself 4-5 stars. However their suppory system is appalling. I have been trying for ages to find fixes for issues but seem unable to. The only 'help and support' they offer is a list of 50-100 questions, and if your question isn't on there, you're gonna have to solve it yourself. No live chats.

The gameplay itself is fun but over the years this game became way too greedy. Don't get me wrong lucky chests are good but the fact that they keep adding new stuff is annoying. First the champions (no big deal), then the Evo's (I mean it's ok) and now the heroes? What else do they plan on adding? And don't even get me started on the fact that they removed the season shop.

I used to have fun with this game years ago. Now it became a game for people who pay to have more upgrades and more advantages. So new people get screwed. It's very hard to win a game in Clash Royale now. I tried several decks that used to work before but it doesn't matter because my towers and cards are lower level compared to other players. I always lose. They should balance the game allowing only players of the same level against each other. It's simply Unplayable!

Played it very actively for over a year but then quit 4 years ago. I downloaded it again to check it out for a day, and was sad to note that the same issues plague this otherwise great game. There are a lot of new cards, but the common/rare ones are complete garbage. The best decks in the game still include 3+ specific legendaries, which are really hard to get if you're free to play. At least you get two or three guaranteed legendaries as you level up now but there's like 15 of them by now...

Done done and done with this game, I recently installed this again thinking I'd give it another shot. There is no change whatsoever.....in fact it's got worse. Such unfair gameplay. First of all the matchmaking is pathetic, it's pay to win. Unless you are willing to pay loads of money to buy the best characters you are not going to level up and you will lose every match (so frustrating 😡) The elixir is tampered with on certain matches. The fun has gone from it. FIX IT SUPERCELL!

Have been playing for more than 3 years, and this has been the final straw. Laggy servers, unexplained prices, and awfully pay 2 win. Prepared to get nothing but misery and years of getting tilted with them not giving anything for you. It has been one of the very best games I have played, but now has become the very worst I have seen. This had been a great journey, but as the hero lived long enough to become the villain, this game has become too much of a pain to play.

Updated review from returning player. This still is the best game of its kind. You can play without spending money, however spending will help you advance a little quicker. The grind can be fun but once you get to higher levels it's less about skills and strategy and really about what deck do you have. Again, fun game, best of its kind but it gets very repetitive at a high level. Not much room for actual strategy

I used to have fun playing this game until they nerfed the pass royale progression and now gives 1/3 of what it used to. On top of that, they tripled the cost of the pass. They added a new level, which adds nothing to the game, and this time, it is very costly and nearly impossible to max a deck. Costing 100 champions for a single level 15 card and books only work towards 1/10 of a level 15 upgrade. They've ruined the game and given an unfair advantage to spenders. This game is dying. Delete

If you like to play games without spending money then play this, and lose every single game you play. Clash Royale is the biggest pay to win game on the app store. Sure it's a fun game in the lower levels but theres a point when you start playing people with 2 levels higher than you and their cards are way better, not to mention their extra health on the tower's. I could recommend this game to people that have lots of money to spend and people who are absolutely never mad or frustrated.

I am experiencing lagging, poore connectivity to the server. I have played on wifi, on data, on different locations and with the same issue. I wrote to the customer service and...ignored me. And the main issue of the game is GOLD. I have lots of cards lvl 12 but no gold to upgrade them so those common, rare etc. tokens are no help. Only it gives you very, very few gold Maybe when I will retire I might have a chance to upgrade all the cards to lvl.13

Never able to get into the game after the Sep 30th update. It's either "Login Failed" or " Connection Error", or I think there is another error msg about the server or something. Tried uninstall-restart-reinstall for dozens of times but obviously didn't work. The help desk did not offer any helpful advice either. I shouldn't have complained about the frequent crashes earlier, cause at I could at least log in then. I liked the game a lot, but disappointed now. Hope the team could fix this soon.

So annoying, i can't play it anymore. It used to be so much fun, but right now you enjoy it only if you spend money on a monthly base to buy things. Whenever i click that battle button i always get opponents 11 or 12 tower level with troops level 14. Like why is even possible? You get destroyed in a sec. Sure for a company the more profit the better, but there should be a balance because its becoming tiring for a big number of players.

The card system and loadout system feels too bad and it seems like every loadout you pick will just be obliterated by another player that has a better loadout than you. It also feels like if you dont play this game for longer than 2 months you are way too behind and you will lose to any player and you will be set back a lot. The main problem with this game are cards, loadouts, and mainly the skill gap.

The brilliance of Clash Royale begins with its intuitive core gameplay. The objective is elegantly straightforward: destroy more of your opponent's towers than they destroy of yours within a limited time.
