Players simply drag and drop cards to deploy troops, spells, and buildings. This low barrier to entry ensures that newcomers can jump into the action without a steep learning curve, making the game instantly understandable. Ps, i used ai

Pay to win. Used to be a fun strategy game, but over the years, they've made it much harder to have an enjoyable experience without paying ridiculous amounts of money. It still has its moments, but they are overshadowed by seemingly unwinnable games and constant toxic behavior from other players. Also, the app frequently restarts in the middle of games, ruining the few games that are fairly matched. This was my go-to time killer for a long time, but it looks like it's time to find something new

Game is so bad I can't even Install it. Just goes to 90% and stops. I've had the game on other devices before, same issue occurred. The one time I actually was able to download and play the game I had a terrible experience. Horrible skill based match making, impossible to play unless you use the broken cards, and extremely laggy. I would spawn into a fight with my king tower at half health points.

I would've given this 5 stars if this issue didn't keep happening to me. The game crashes unexpectedly but often when I'm opening chests... Which is to me one of the most rewarding experiences of the game. I'm afraid to buy any chests now as I'm quite sure that my money will be wasted. I just tried to open a big chest and was so excited and I got two cards out of it before it crashed. I'm so upset! I really wish the company would fix that issue, I am so frustrated that I want to give up the game entireIy.

Maybe the developers have given up on the game, but why can't they see the problem with a character when almost everyone has it in their deck. Firecrackers everywhere, all of the time. The game needs balanced. There's other favourites but you simply can't play a game without there constantly being a firecracker in play. She's too cheap and her damage is too strong. Oh, but let's make her evolve, that'll be a great idea 😆

Used to be one of my favorites, but I feel like it's slowly dying. Favorite content creators have slowly stopped creating content because it stopped getting views. Feels like the company just wants cash grab after cash grab. Used to have a good sense of progression with the monthly pass, but now the value of passes and shop deals have gone down drastically. The game is free to play, but if you are you will start progressing real slow after the first few arenas. I really hope it gets better.

Used to be great. Everytime you start to catch up they shift everything so you have to buy a ton. It's a cash grab. Game is fun, but infuriating when you put so much time to max out each card, then they raise the max...also, when u finally do remax them, you'll still get the cards in chests, so they don't even help you. I'm gonna uninstall if it keeps this up. I wouldn't get invested in it. Too frustrating to have to pay to win. If all else is equal, fun strategy game. But it's not equal.

Imagine an uno player try this game, and well that player is me. The game is a great time passer game the matches mostly take about 1-3 mins of gameplay. I just wish that they added a feature where I can save my gameplays to my device saying that I'm a content creator of many games already and I wanted to edit it. But still, its a great game until you reach a point where you'll feel stuck, keep pushing and you'll reach to the last arena. Goodluck on playing and I hope you reach your goal.

The game is in a heavy downward spiral with how the game is being handled. It is becoming such an issue that content creator and pro players are losing favor in the game. I feel nothing but anger when I'm playing. I installed and reinstalled the game 5 times, I believe. It's final this time since there is no point in someone picking up the game again or for the first time unless they are certain they want to spend money. There is no optional part anymore if you want to actually progress.

I've been playing this game for a year. Got a new phone and couldn't sign back into my account. For some reason, it continuously updates and stuck on the update until it crashes. I started a new account rebooted my phone and I played for a few weeks and then it went back to updating. And just stuck on the update until it crashes unplayable. I'm glad I didn't spend money on this. That's too bad! I wanted to spend money on this now. It taught me not to trust phone games anymore

Save your money. The game is very unfair. It makes you play with higher level players all the time. I think it is all about money. The more you pay the easier matches you get. Level 8 players against level 10 and 11 players mathematically very difficult. Not fun for new players who are just growing. Clan wars require you to have 4 decks of 8 troops, which is 32. It won't be easy to level them all up easily and you will face a lot of unfair matches and unnecessary stress in your life.

Still playing it hoping the bot issue will be corrected . Seems the game will let u win 3 in a row, then take u down , over and over till u drop 1 or 2 arenas, This game would be great, if not for the 3rd party interference from bots, it allows them to cream u in minutes , they can toss out tons of high level troops that u cannot do, we an only work with 10 elixer drops at a time . So very frustrating, and if not fixed soon the game is gone, been playing from day 1, and the fun is getting ruined

Games fun and all. Ok, progression system, different decks are all fun to use and whatnot, and visuals are really good for such a simple game. Only gripe, really, like everyone else has already said, is the "pay to win" aspect. Playing players with max cards in lower arenas isn't fun at all, and almost garuntees a loss. Fun game, though, if it weren't so geared towards pay to win gameplay. Bummer...

This isn't a strategy game. online battles devolve into who's played the game longer, and who got the legendary cards. Half of the time I would lose battles because my opponent would spawn absurd amounts of high value units far faster than I could. It seemed like the bar that fills to let you place units was just slower for me, because it would take me several seconds to spawn something, and it seemed like my opponent could spawn two per second for the sane thing.

Decent game, if you have never played this game before its OK at first and I do like the card feature. However, after a while it gets very repetitive, the war system isn't great and the chests are way to expensive considering you might not even get a legendry. The wait to open a chest is wayyyyyyy too long, like I said it's OK at first but overall its very repetitive and you don't get that sense of achievement after moving up a arena.

The game WAS fun. But that was before they decided to go more heavily into in-app purchases and making it a pay-to-win game. It used to be pretty competitive but now if you buy anything to give you a leg up, you can't be beaten. The same goes for opponents. Unless you pay for the 2000+ gem chests (which translates to roughly $100 in real currency) then you'll get the same 5 cards over and over and over again. The game offers no room to grow.

I have been playing this game for 6 years. Since the early and good days of it. The game was fun, challenging, and most importantly fair. However, through the recent years, it's like the game devs ate shifting more toward "pay to win", and it was at this point which marked the beginning of a downfall of the game. Imagine you have been playing the game for years, with so much experience and decent amount of resources, just to be beaten by someone who bought their way and maxed out everything.

I've played this game before multiple times, but I always ended up uninstalling it after a few months because of how repetitive and frustrating it gets. If that wasn't enough, they decide that it's a great idea to change multiple things about their game, making it more heavily p2w, and seeing as how the only way to progress fast is mostly paying for absurd things, it's just not worth playing as much. I am disappointed with how Supercell has gone this horrible path, and I want to see them fix it

There's not enough room here to explain what is wrong with this game. Within the last month or so it tries to wipe my progress regularly. Out of nowhere I'm in training mode. I am able to recover my progress, but it'll happen 5 minutes after a last login. But I've been helping my young son to build himself a game. He's worked very hard, gotten to level 5, and was really proud. Supercell wiped his game today. I have no idea if I can get it back. I'm livid. Garbage company and game.

Warning: recent changes have ruined the game, it is completely different to previous years. It's very sad to see one of the best games from the 2010s, of any genre, be tainted by corporate greed - to such an extent that it is now not only Pay To Win, but Pay To Play. Supercell have been monetising the game to within an inch of its life, with the introduction of Level 15, plus card evolutions - you now can't even compete in higher sections of the main game mode unless you spend a lot of money

Just uninstalled. It was a really good game, kept me entertained for months. It really was, but as you progress, it starts being a bit different. Matchmaking is really bad, high level players cheat matchmaking by mixing really low level troops and really high level troops, and it makes winning really difficult. Clans wars are hard to do. Some players join clans but do not participate as there's no tutorial for it whatsoever.

The latest update has made it so that the chest timer resets randomly when closing the game when it is a queued chest. I got the league pass to help with the game but instead has been a detriment. After reaching out to support they said its a known issue and they are working on it but was nothing they could do. Waiting almost 2 days for a chest is a big issue. I probably won't get the league pass again.

I played this for years, spent a lot of money and loved it, then for whatever reason they got rid of the best way to play, non trophy game modes were insanely fun, 2x elixir, 3x elixir, and everything in between, made it so much more fun then the standard mode and was optional for anyone who didn't want to play it. Gone. And so am I. Unistalled

game is amazing, pretty much everything. except one major flaw. WHY AM I GETTING LEVEL 14 PLAYERS WHEN I AM 10. please change somthing and make it better. it's totally useless.. it's not possible for me to win at that moment. please fix it somehow ik it's an old issue.. but I might have to quit atp..

Unfairness, in its worst shape. I don't mind paying. Even just donating to the developers. And this game is so fun & requires thinking and strategy. So, it could be one of the best games of all times. BUT, there is a huuuuge disadvantage to people who don't spend any money. I have been playing for 3yrs & I'm level 10. 80% of the times at score 4700 I am matched w a lvl 12 with troops at 13. Do the math and they are 50% stronger than me w castles. That's horrible!!! DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME!

This game is a joke now. It didn't use to be like this, but now, 20 seconds into the match you can tell who got host. Especially with the halloween matches. You either get three stars or you get three-stared. SOMETHING TO NOTE IS THE SEASON PASS. I have noticed that if you purchase the season pass, the match making algorithm is much friendlier... but then again, this review might not even matter because it most likely will get burried and forgotten because of its content.

I've been playing this game for 7 years now and the latest changes to the game are just greedy. They have increased the cost of the premium by 25% and decreased the bonuses you get for it, and then to add insult, they now have en even more expensive tier for double what it used to cost, only to get what you used to get for half the price. You are selling virtual items with zero expense. You are officially ripping off your customers. I will never give Supercell money again. This is too far.

I've been playing this game for fer years, it was a great game, very well balanced and I had a lot of fun playing. Up to now, with all the new paid buffs, it is simply impossible to play without paying, in freemium game model to destroy the balance in such a way is suicide! Good luck with keeping you player audience with a 5% win rate for non paying player. It really sucks you destroyed the game. Goodbye.

It was good when it launched. Now its just pay to win. I am always matched against a higher level player once i cross a certain threshold in trophies so basically I'm stuck at one place. I have to wait like this for long time or i can buy ton of gems and level up my cards fast. The developers getting greedy day by day. They are more focused on cosmetics and less on mechanics & matchmaking, so this is a pay to win basically.

Out of every game in the world, this is the biggest example of wasted potential. The core mechanics of the game are brilliant, however the game is completely unplayable without either years of grinding OR as supercell wants, no exaggeration, hundreds of dollars. Every update compounds this problem, and the developers clearly have no interest in improving the game, only in making more money. A true shame, as the gameplay itself would have made it the perfect mobile game if it was only fair.

Played for years, spent some $, and I expect to pay for good entertainment. However, now you have to spend money regularly, just to keep up. Beyond that, it's hard to figure what the point is. I think the game has stalled, and creator direction is haphazard at best. Seems like constant tweaks to keep money rolling in for no real improvement in experience. Play BB as well, and same story... tired of supercell.

I played this game from the starting, I took break for few years, when after long time started to play I noticed something wrong, then I found many of my unlocked cards are gone, all my legendary cards also gone. Now it is like playing the game from the scratch, and as cherry on top, the match become frozen in middle even though my network, memory everything was good, disappointing 😞.

Great game, occasionally you'll come across people who pay to play but you dont have to spend money to enjoy 2021: I have been playing this game off/on for the last 4 years and sadly it has become saturated with loot boxes & pay to play mechanisms. The last 4 years is proof that there is an algorithm which prevents you from collecting and maxing the cards you most use, without spending money. It's akin to gambling, it really sucks that a lot of kids play this and are used to pay to win games.

It was really enjoyable until it wasn't. I'm all for giving a company money, especially when the product is free. But Supercell has littered both coc/cr with micro transactions ranging from the prices of full AAA game titles. In the past, I thought the grind was fun, and paying for gems was a helpful boost. Now, they just can't help themselves and stunt all progress for players who are having too fun and not paying (enough).

The advertisement on YouTube shows the person who is losing using the 'angry character' and him saying 'Hold Hold' but when you play, it is some one who is ranked higher than you (or a lower rank that spent money and every character is ranked 14 or higher) talking trash. You could be better but it really doesn't matter. Frustrating game, making them millions though, keep spending!

The game lacks progression. I have been playing for two years and there is an inherent problem. First off it takes too long to level up. I have long sinced stopped purchasing micros as I cannot afford it. It isnt a matter of price, the amount of money it would take for a brand new player to become competetive is ridiculous. On top of this you must be a part of a clan to enjoy any casual play. And I'm not on enough for clans to want to keep me around.

Ca$h Royale used to be my favorite game, but recent changes have ruined it. I played since launch and bought many of the $5 passes. I tried playing for the first time in months a few days ago with mortar and lost to someone playing hog, eq, and lvl 15 evo firecracker. The only way for me to gain trophies would be to spend even more money, which seems to be what the devs want. Goodbye cr, youll be remembered, but not missed.

Played this game on and off for years. Makes the game difficult when some players use "cheats". Have played against some where the creatures made are impossible to make as quickly as they have. And when watching the battle back, the opponents elixir bar fills suspiciously fast. No way you can make a mega knight, pecka, with support before they cross to your side of the field.

I'm sorry to say that this game is no longer brilliant. It is definitely aimed at pay to win players. The December update has made it impossible to upgrade cards by trading because both players need a trade token and who'd waste one of those on a trade they didn't particularly want. Also higher players tend not to donate cards anymore as they have to pay to do so once they're max level. Terrible. Fix this. This was my 5 star review:"I download a lot of games but end up uninstalling them as I get bored. I have played this everyday for almost a year and have not been bored the entire time. You can play as much or as little as you like and works well whether you want a free to play game or a pay to win game. Brilliant."

I have been playing this game for many years (at least since 2018/2019, if not earlier. I used to LOVE this game, I made friends and family download it so we could play together, and it was a blast! I had great times and really enjoyed farming my way up. Since the introduction of the "double battle pass" and evolutions, I think they've been pushing a bit too much into the hard currency rewards/pay to advance mechanics, but what I personally find worse of all is the endless scrolling in the UI

I love that Clash Royal is finding ways to create longevity in the game. In my last review, that was the change I wanted to see and gold being easier to get. I feel that was accomplished but at a huge cost to the free to play community where even the pass, which I use to buy, is not worth it to be buying monthly. I love that there is more to do but now progression is hard and not as enjoyable with all the additional features stunting F2P in relevance in the game.

This game is great it runs on most devices with no lag (maybe internet lag but nothing they can do to fix that) and has action packed matches what last up to 5 mins. You can play the game without spending anything but the game tempts you into it. I have spent maybe £10 on it and I'm at a pretty high trophy count missing only 2 cards. One problem is smurfs. Every 3-5 games you will encounter someone 3 levels above you and there is nothing you can do. Anyway great game would recommend!

Just another pay2win game You can play normally at certain point with basic cards, but after a time, you'll get opponents with higher level towers and cards than yours, that its almost impossible to win, not only the matchmaking gets horrible, the chances to get good card are extremely rare, and once you get you're stuck in the same level for a long time, if you want to have fun for a time and delete go for it, but if not you'll be forced to spend money to keep going up.

Great game, fun and somehow strategic. However, the "pay to win" royale pass is unfair for players who did not purchase the pass. One might play for a year and work their way to a level 12, while a player with the pass could reach higher levels in 6 months. The best solution is to match players according to their status, that is, if they have paid for credits or not.

I've always enjoyed this game when the game first came out. The game was fun and you needed skill and patience to gain wins. Now it's practically RNG with higher card levels and the algorithm match making. If you're looking to have fun, this is not the game to choose. Most of the player base is competitive sweats, trust me, I'm one of them. It's very frustrating to play as you can't have fun making your own decks anymore. It's all just "meta" no individuality. Supercell has been trying too hard.

I tried getting back into this game after several years away, and I can't believe how monetized it has become. The mechanism to upgrade cards to level 15 and getting evolutions is specifically designed to nickle and dime any player that wants to be competitive. Battle pass is more than twice the cost it used to be, and now there are other tracks to buy that need further purchases the further you progress on them. The game itself is still fun if you can ignore the money grabbing.

Definitely my most played mobile game. 2025 Update: I took a long break from the game and reinstalled to see the new content... and man it's bad. They somehow found a way to make the game even more pay to win with the unfair evolutions, which are just better, overpowered versions of troops that are extremely difficult to get without paying for them. Was fun to try out the new troops they added then I uninstalled after seeing evo firecracker for the 100th time in a row. Not worth it.

Been playing with my clan since 2016. We've all lost interest over the past 6 months. We're maxed out with nowhere to go. The season pass isn't exciting by any means and its laughable for $5. They need something big. More levels, cards, arenas, modes, CUSTOMIZATION... even the Clan Wars 2 update is blah. Battle ship defenses for minimal rewards of the saaaaame stuff.

It was fun for a little while, and then the strategy became nothing but stall on the original version. I was gone for a bit, and when I came back, they had party mode. That's where you could earn chests while playing interesting games like 3x elixir, but with the update today, they took that away. Uninstalled just now and not looking back, party mode was the last fun bit keeping me holding on and buying the season pass.

In the usual CR fashion, the new update is riddled with source code and algorithm issues. Mostly in the 2V2 mode but it can be seen across the entire platform. Once again we see the uneven game matching as well as the return of the super elixirs. Good luck non pay to play gamers. If you're in it for the long haul, it will certainly be a tough ride. Our suggestion is to find another game to play until the super brains at supercell fix it.

I would just like to say that this game was really fun for the first 5000 trophies, but afterwards, it became a pay 2 win unbeatable mess. I'll go up 100 trophies and drop due to overleveled cards, cards that shouldn't be obtainable in the current arena, and the constant reminder of such being shown in the store with 8 offers showing up before you get to free items which by the way aren't even that great. Supercell, you are a money hungry company that couldn't care less about their playerbase.

Great game if you enjoy paying to win. Great opportunities to have fun, but you are limited due to the restraints of the game wanting you to spend money on chests, chest unlocks, Pass Royale, emotes, etc. Also, with Pass Royale being introduced, players who purchase it get bonuses that give them an edge over other players. That would be fine if the game were not considered "Free to Play"; however, it is not.

Gameplay is pretty solid, all things considered. However, many units are simply poor and shouldn't be in the game anyway. The evolution mechanic is trash, and again, shouldn't be in the game. What inspired me to leave a poor review most, however, is the Shop, which has become a pit of mud. I counted today: 16 different $ offers before I could see the free shop. They keep making things worse for F2P. For example, they thought it would be a good idea to lower free content in the pass royale. Trash

very average and honestly not too fun, but can sometimes be enjoyable. this is because of the fact that you just fight others, have to wait hours to progress through the game and upgrade things, and decks can be easily overpowered and can take down anyone, which is unfair, and not fun. Sometimes it is fun and fair, but it isn't that often, which also makes it not fun. it's ok I guess.

Great mechanics and we'll thought out, I love the animation and the wide variety of characters. Although these are good it is heavily dependent on the money you spend for more cards, but this can not compare to the community. Ever since day one I have been spammed by taunts everyone I lose. The game play it's self can get repetitive after awhile as well.

This game has so much potential. It immediately presents itself as a fair 1v1 deck building game where you outskill your opponent and strategize to become victorious, but it becomes obvious fairly quickly that any amount of skill can be easily replaced with a few dollars from your credit card. The game is filled to the brim with loot boxes and the rarest cards that could come out of those boxes or the "legendary" cards are incredibly overpowered. Tl;dr: pay to win, not worth your time.

I've been playing for years and have never been this disappointed. From removing chests from party mode, ruining POL by making it a mode that takes twice the time to play, and killing pass royale, every single change they've made has been for the worst. I'm a pretty busy person and enjoyed playing party mode for a more casual experience, and liked grinding quick 3 min games on POL, can't do that now. I've been an on and off pass buyer, but I'll never buy it again unless the changes are reverted.

Last week I got my 4 year badge, I've been enjoying this game for that long. Since the latest update, I lost all enjoyment in this game. Now if you don't mind spending 6 or 12 dollars a month, this game is for you. For free-to-play players like myself, will have to play catch up every year they add a new card level. Card leveling is not fun, and with the new update; progression has been slower. Core game play is still fun, but not if you're stuck with your one or two fully leveled up deck.

Used to be fun and met a lot of great people on the game. With the nerf of the pass, paying players get less bang for their buck and f2p players get even less. A whole ~12 us dollars for rewards that don't do too much(also considering that the rewards included so much previously for only $5!). Additionally, with level 15 coming sometime in the future, clash isn't looking to good. And I thought level 14 would be the last of it... The final straw has been pulled.

For the love of God please lower the cool down for clan wars! It's better than it was, slightly. But the cool down time is just ridiculous. I feel like you should be able to get two rounds of attacks in per day. In theory clan wars is awesome but in practice it's really just annoying and I feel forced into it. I run a clan and unfortunately due to the lack of ability to opt in/out of war I've had to kick so many people. There should be an option to partake in war like in COC. Please change!

So this is how the algorithm works now - you win 2-3 games at a stretch and then start loosing. After loosing some matches you win one or two and again start loosing. In the sometimes they'll give you a huge trophy push, and then bring you down so that you are hooked to gaining back the lost trophies. This makes the game addictive in a frustration way. I used to play this before, then stopped, again started. But from now I'll never play this anymore. Also it's so pay to win now.

it was fun!!! but once they made the game more about spending money it become so annoying. this game is made in such way that u will not enjoy it if you don't spent money. 4 years ago it was the best mobile game and now it just feels like they don't care much about fairness. I was tower level 12 with all my troops are either level 12 or 13. I faced player that had tower level 11 but units that were maxed out. it shouldn't be that way. if u want to download it make sure you have money to spent.

I have been seeing many people say this is pay to win. That is not entirely fair. I have been playing for 5 years... I have leveled up my cards over that time, so have thousands of others. That being said, yes, you can pay to level cards more quickly. And they often nurf cards that don't need it, and kill cards completely by over compensating... I don't like it as much as I used to but it is still fun for a match our two every day

The unlock times are so freaking long. Don't get me wrong, the gameplay is very good, but damn it puts a damper on things. Yeah, you can play even if the chest queue is full but dn, it feels so unrewarding if you do since you don't get anything... I understand that you need to timegate stuff supercell, but the way you went about it is... Pretty poorly thought of to say it nicely.

For Supercell: You may have heard this but yes, chest opening time needs to be more flexible. There should be a system to encourage more playtime to decrease chest opening time when full. Else, it feels hopeless when you already have 4 chests and playing again does nothing.      To Players: It is a great new concept from CoC but the cards paid players have are far too good. So do keep in mind that if you are not going to pay, however skilled you are, it is almost impossible to trophy push to the top.

Last patch completely wrecked this game. Everything that may be of interest is now locked behind pay walls. As a veteran player, the only thing I had to look forward to was the possibility of new backgrounds. Use to be able to farm gems in hopes of getting the ones i wanted. Now that is next to impossible. The ones you CAN get get by doing dailies are not so great and bland. Overall, I only log in occasionally to kill time. I use to pay the $5.99 pass but now rewards from that are lacking.

Like the game and they have finally strick a balance between pay and non-pay to win players. The game is not perfect, but it is quite good. The monthly balance does get annoying at times, as they take cards with high win rates and "nerf" them. Typically new cards come in overpowered and there's a race to use them and purchase opportunities to get them only to have the card depowered within the next couple of updates.

this game have a very weird way of playing. just by paying more money can make you stronger, and was usually make the game one-sided, since the person who can actually amass an army of at least 2 epics, especially the Giant skeleton, can most certainly take a tower with them upon their death. and also, when you're trying to go up an arena, and the enemy was one arena on top of you, usually taunts you and make the experience worse. they also lacks the sense of sportsmanship.

Matchmaking rigged for you to lose to make you buy gems. Endless microtransactions. Just a few of the problems with this mobile version of an EA game. When this was released a couple years back, it was absolutely amazing and supercell made a masterpiece. Now, all they care about is money. Making a battle pass that gives huge competitive advantage to those who buy it. Matchmaking that puts me up against level 10s and every now and then 11s when I'm level 9 with higher level cards. Ridiculous.

I've been playing this game for about a year as a Free to Play and I have made it to nearly legendary arena. The game is super fun and I have spent countless hours playing. The UI is fun and colorful and there are a lot of different characters and possible decks. My only complaint is how much they annoy you to pay for rewards and perks, even though most people can level up and progress just fine without season pass, paid cards, etc.

It's a pay to win game, don't recommend it. It may seem that you can upgrade without spending real money, but the algorythms of the game are way more clever than you think you are. So it will force you to spend real money, to achieve what other p2w players has achieved. It will only give you opponents that are higher level than you. It's not strategy, it's unbalance and p2w game. It's not a hate, I've been playing this game for more than two years, and I only have two cards upgraded at max lvl))

Matchmaking is still bad after you go on a win streak. Also I think you guys should add names on who are online. Maybe put like a green dot next to their name when they're online and nothing when offline UPDATE: 5 years after and matchmaking is still awful. You go on a win streak and the algorithm then makes you lose a lot to keep it "even". There is absolutely no reason for me to be lvl. 10 facing a lvl. 12.

I've played hundreds of hours of clash royale, and I can tell you that this game used to be amazing. However, Supercell cannot delivering the experience that they used to. Now, matchmaking is a horrific experience, there's a battle pass, and the game feels MUCH more pay to win then it used to. I'd love to give it a good review for the years of enjoyment it gave me, but I cannot. Supercell has lost the way. I dont recommend this game to anyone.

I played the game for almost 2 years. Even spent some money, which is rare for me. But these last two updates back to back have really shown that supercell is no longer concerned with keeping things fair or a lesser version of pay2win. If you like spending money to have a significant advantage, this game is for you. It'll be a fun game until you reach the higher end of the game. Then be prepared to break out your wallet to get ahead in any way. Game is a joke now.

Once I became in arena 4 there started to be many pay to win players and just now I encountered a enemy with a knight evolution at just arena 4! I have been stuck in arena 4 for a month or so so please don't make the players buy very powerful cards or evolution as it will be unfair for the new players. This game is pay to win. Worst game ever.

Updated: Avoid at all costs, company has given up trying to make a fun game anyone can enjoy and has resorted to catering to only whales. I've played this game for many years now and always held on hope that things would get better, I've given up. I don't believe they will turn things around or care anymore. Those in charge seem to be focused on draining as much money from their dying game as possible while they still can. Don't waste your time!

You should be able to change your name as many times. But either than that it is a good game. I change my mind. I have been playing this gane since the dawn of time and the state it's currently in is just sad. They chase nothing but profit by forcing you to play against people who are in higher levels than you so that you are enticed to buy in-game purchases. The season resets are also a way to make you pair with higher level players. Game is not fun and I would not reccomend downloading it!!!!

I deleted this game a couple of years ago due to the moronic decision of the developer to add taunting as a requirement of playing the game. Fast forward a couple of years and a mute option has been added for the taunting. The game is now being deleted for a different reason. I bought one of the special offers yesterday, and was double charged. When I reported that I was double charged Supercell wiped out some of my deck that I had before the offer to correct their error. As always, Supercell's concern is about profit, not doing right by the customer. So I am no longer their customer.

Absolutely scam. Biggest money making game I've ever played. Not about the experience of the players.. Bring out updates and make the game harder, trying to make people who play it spend more. Probably bots too. Also bring out an update where the maximum characters have to get further levelled up. Sick of it. Also, not to mention you can't buy what you want; everything is wild-carded making it an EVEN more of a money making scheme. Go away

For a real time strategy game you'd expect a more balanced troop levelling 
system. The end game drop off means without spending a dime, it'll take you 
at least a year for you to get legendaries to level 3 and epics to level 7. 
However, due to the nature of this game, it is extremely tempting for 
people to pay for diamonds, pay for chests (which still not guaranteed a 
legendary card). I do not recommend this game to anyone since you will end 
up wasting your money for no reward.

The game is fun, but the matchmaking system is a joke, as almost every match I'll fight someone several levels below me which makes those wins feel cheap. (At the time of writing this, I'm level 11 in legendary arena). The progression is also a grind as cards cost exponentially more gold as you go along while the rewards don't scale enough. It's not worth buying gems in this game as the normal chests are overpriced for what they give. (20$ for a guaranteed legendary) It's a somewhat fun grind.

Game is fixed, don't be the first person to put a card down. Which means make sure you have a few good defensive cards. If you don't place the right card at the right time you're game is basically over. Which is difficult given the obvious lag that the developers have never fixed. Some cards say they do certain things, then they don't. Don't buy anything here, basic time waster of a game.

The game is addicting. It's a fun tactical game. However, the matchmaking can be very bad. Guy 2 levels higher than me on my arena crushes me. Also, hackers can be found. Not fun when 3 pekka appear early on, and I'm elixir counting. It's fun but frustrating, which is why I gave it a lower score. Game is also extremely, and I mean EXTREMELY unbalanced. They're almost as bad as Riot games in respects balancing

One word can be used to describe this game, pay 2 win. Game starts of enjoyable than you reach a point where every match you go against cards 4 levels higher than yours, this makes it almost impossible to win unless your opponent is completely incapable. Progression is very slow, the only way to progress faster is by paying. So I would not recommend this game, every once in a while you get a glimpse of hope to keep you going. But you are destined to fail without a credit card.

This game has been deteriorating for a few years now, but the latest upgrade has decimated the game. The structure of the game has been made 'brainless'. Up until recently you had a few options to build cards in a minor way via the 'shop'. Now there is no way to play things you're own way. After playing this game for 9 years, this latest update has destroyed the game. I think Supercell realizes the game is fading and they are out to get the last of the Pay to win players before it folds.

Clash Royale could've been one of the best mobile games. The gameplay is fun, fast-paced, and strategic. But it's heavily pay-to-win, ruining the experience for casual or fair players. Early on, progress feels good—you unlock cards and improve. But soon, you face players with over-leveled decks unless you pay a lot. It's frustrating and unfair. Not recommended if you're free-to-play. And bring back the season shop for us the free-to-play

I have been playing this game for 3 years and have 15k trophies, this game is extremely p2w and has a mechanic that pins you against decks that hard counter yours when you are close to ranking up into a new arena. Do not play this game it is addicting but horrible, you will crash out.
the new merge tactics rules is completely unbalanced, you can have a 4 star even when they aren't unlocked, and they 1 tap anything????

I used to pay $5 monthly for a pass which was reasonable for the amount of entertainment I got out of the game. Even though I was paying, I still thought the game allowed free to play players a reasonable chance to compete. However, the new update definitely makes it a pay to win game AND with more than doubling the price while giving less for it? I won't be paying and soon probably won't be competitive, which probably means not playing (or paying!) much longer...

0/5 stars. Ever since you moved the 2v2 modes, no one plays them anymore. Can't find any games because it takes 10 minutes to find them. ALSO I exclusively played the party modes ever since it was a main attraction to the game, which you recent hid in the menu. I specifically paid to upgrade my cards for these modes, I've maxed out at least 4 of cards. Now there is a cap to them. So ALLLLLL the money I spent is wasted. I will be submitting a refund claim to Google Play.

Pay to win. Rigged arcade-like game reminiscent of old coin-op machines where you were destined to lose no matter how well you played. Which is fine (because the developer can do whatever they want to make money.) The truly sad part is that people think that half the time they are playing other people!! That is a misrepresentation by the company. Half the time you are simply playing the comp. Ends up just being frustrating and no fun. Find another game to waste time in and don't stress about CR.

Originally a really fun game. It deserved the 5 stars I gave it in 2016. Now in 2024. This game could disappear off the app store I wouldn't care. Prices of micro transactions is crazy high for what they are. Cards are really unbalanced. I single card could destroy my whole deck. It's kinda ridiculous. "Oh the game is teaching you how to play" no the game is teaching me to spend money if I want cool stuff. Good luck supercell, you've become a joke of a company in my opinion

Fallen from grace. This still is one of the best mobile real-time-strategy games but I just cannot recommend it after all the predatory changes to the monetization system. You will like it at first but eventually the gameplay becomes unfun as you must bang your head against the wall that is max level decks which you will never be able to obtain.

Disappointed that there aren't any safe guards to prevent accidental emote purchases. There should be a second pop-up that asks if you're sure you would like to purchase this emote so you can click yes purchase, or no do not. Instead they basically tell you "too bad so sad, we can't reverse it because it would be unfair and others would take advantage of that feature". They expect you to spend more money on gems in order to immediately replace what you accidentally spent, so more $ for them.

I am furious. I bought a gold pack with money that you guys have claimed that I requested a refund for. Whereas in my Google account I have 0 refund requests or transactions and the money is missing from my bank account. Customer service basically told me "There's nothing we can do, but you can buy more gold!" Don't make purchases on this game cause if something goes wrong, they WILL NOT HELP YOU.

I played the game for a long time through many updates and I can say without a doubt that it is terrible. It's pay-to-win posing as a free game and the amount of money the game makes is ridiculous considering how lazy it is. Unbalanced to the point of having an undeniable meta, bad players drop ranks so they can win battles and even with a good connection it will lag so bad that you will miss entire battles. Essentially the game is saying "Pay for me so you can play the way I want you to play.".

Similar to the other reviews I've seen, I've had this game pretty much since release and it has become noticeable how pay to win the game has become. You can reach the higher rankings simply by spending money when it used to take skill and strategy. Still a fun game, but not something to get too invested in if like me you don't wish to spend money.

Been playing for more than 3years. They make it easy for you to play at the start, but makes it almost Impossible to win unless you pay for upgrades later on. In the end, strategy doesn't matter since you will be matched with level13/14 paying players who haven't even played a long time. At least in PUBG upgrades are cosmetic and doesn't affect your game performance. This game is all about making money. Don't waste your time. Oh this causes Screen Burn in over time.

The game itself is fun, but if you haven't been playing for years or aren't willing to pay up, you're not going to make much progress. Lowered from 4 to 3 stars due to the 2nd evolution slot being locked behind king level 15. I accept Supercell wants to make money, but it's gotten to the point where they're just sabotaging their own game to try and squeeze more cash out of players.

It's definitely the worst game of Supercell nowadays. Each update they are monetizing everything in the game. Battle pass, Golden Bank and, especially, the "best" offers in the shop. Balance of the game became pay to win battles where you will be stuck for a long time before you upgrade to a level on which you will be able to make some progress on your path. I was playing this game from the release of it, feeling bad about these changes to my favorite game then.

Theres no balance in this game whatsoever. Higher level players can ruin the experience of lower level players pretty much at will. Pay to win or get screwed over that's the SuperCell way I guess. You would think they would put you up against players with similar skill level, but no. It puts you against pros on an ult constantly. It's all about thier precious esport. I've been playing for more than a year with little to no reward for being dedicated to the game. The CRL fantasy had a thing you were suppose to be able to click for rewards in game..... if you were on a phone during the event you were just out of luck, because it didn't work. They care about money and that's all. Dont download it, it's a waste of time and money.

I have spent untold thousands of hours on this game. The core gameplay is the best game ever made. However, the last few updates have been shifting the game towards more and monetization. Games need to make money, but it shouldn't lock away gameplay. There is so much potential for more cosmetics. Charge through the roof for skins, for customising your side of the arena etc. I would pay so much to get a limited edition brand deal starwars lightsaber for a mini pekka, or whatever. Not level 15!

a very rigged and pay to play game. too many overpowered bots once they hook you by making it super easy to advance (at first). Do not spend money or the game gets harder because they know you'll spend money to advance. one of the most "rigged" games in the store. It's fun but frustrating. play only if you don't get triggered easily. it uses the push pull system, you win some you lose some and it has nothing to do with skill. it's almost criminal how rigged this game is. very much like a casino.

It's a good game but hard to be a casual player. If you want to play for free, there comes a point where you can't hope to compete because your cards are too underpowered. Spending real money to upgrade your cards is a waste of time for the average player because you're looking at literally thousands of pounds to max out your account, at which point you're up against the big boys, and essentially in the same boat as when your cards were underpowered, except you've blown all your cash.

Great app, but still waiting for ability to queue all chests, not just 1 after the current unlocking chest. Sometimes people do not log on because they can't, and chests are left unlocked for a day or so. And the feature is nice, but why not include up to all 4 chests?? instead of just one. 4 stars until that change is made. Thanks! Maybe make the 1 queued chest free, and all 4 part of buying the pass. Also, it feels like they got lazy with note ratio. Bottom buttons are ugly stretched...

So I already had a review on this game in which I ranted about how the Royale Pass made the game too pay to win. However, there have been recent updates allowing free to play players to progress easier, and it is much appreciated. Unfortunatley, there are still cases in where you get matched up against players that have much better things than you, making the game unbalanced, so alot of balance changes have yet to be made. After that, it will be five stars from me.

Words cannot describe how much I hate this game. After trying (and failing) to get to the legendary arena they add in two more arenas within the same hour I finally get there. You cannot get ahead in the game unless you pay for chests or their "totally not pay to win" magical items that can instantly level up any card and upgrade it for free... for the low low price of five dollars. On top of that the game will decide that you have won too much and match youup against someone whois leagues ahed

after playing on and off for a significant amount of time I've decided how I feel about this game, its fun but its flawed to the point where even casual play becomes a chore. The game is pay to win at its core, to win games you need to level your cards, cards are leveled using gold and extra cards, cards can be bought using gold, gold can be bought using gems and gems are bought using real money. it quickly becomes unenjoyable as you wont progress very quickly without paying.

Working as a software tester led me to realise that no program could ever be perfect. However, there are some glaring issues to this game, especially with the new update. 1. When doing clan war battles, if you get 2 or more victories (aka at least 1 tank broken), you should get 3 lucky drops. However, this is not the case. 2. The push back on how rewards are obtained in favor of some money is a kill-joy in my opinion, especially with no more in-game currency shop. Shadow what the game was tbh

This game used to be very fun, but I simply can not recommend it to anyone anymore. Since Clan Wars 2, every update has been worse than the last, and recently, the evolutions update was horrible and super P2W. This used to be a legitimately skillful and fun game. But not anymore. I even invested a few bucks, like 15 bucks on the passes a few seasons when the game was fun, but it's not anymore. It has been progressing more and more P2W, unlike other Supercell games. Don't bother starting now.

You might want to try and do a little work on the matchmaking algorithm that you use. You have these challenges to unlock new cards or cards that are harder to come by and somehow I am paired up against people with exponentially better cards - who (in reference to the rage challenge) already had the dang card. I am currently in Arena 10 and only have 3 legendary cards. I refuse to spend money on the game because I am quickly realizing that it is a pay to play game. I have been playing this game for a while now, this is my second account - got a new phone and lost the other account. I just wish you could either try and make the matchups a little closer or at least make it to where you can win without having to spend money, but then again that probably isn't something y'all want to do...oh well that's just my two cents

The recent addition of lvl 15,removal of gems from masterys and the changing of the pass of only made the game worse. and while the new evos are cool, they are greatly overshadowed by what has been taken from the average player. They made progression harder, more tedious, and less fun. The difference between free to play and paying players has never been more apparent.

This game has some serious balancing issues in matchmaking, I thought the game was supposed to be fair for everyone that played? Not just those who have high levels, I was playing against players that were level 9 when I was only a level 6. Extremely frustrating if you ask me for someone trying to kill some time by playing these kinds of apps. Not only do I cheated but it makes me not want to play this game anymore. Supper disappointed, please fix then I'll see if your rating goes up. Much Love❤

Dont waste your time. it was cool when you first start. but they really push spending your money. They do not have a costumer support team that can help with anyone's questions. they offer an AI generated help system that can only help you with 5 different subjects. After studying online, Im finding out nobody can ever get any support. Spent hours now trying to get my account back up, but they don't offer a way. Finally uninstalled for good.

When I started playing it was a perfect, simple game, now it's way overcomplicated and completely pay to win, it has left me no choice but to either pay or uninstall. The update that brought evolutions is pretty sick, but they are way too overpowered, and anyone can just pay to get them, while they could be free, so everyone is even. Such a twisted way of making money, hope you learn from your mistakes.

over years playing this game, it was fun at first, but with the recent update, it got boring, and it got a lot harder to get cards now, and really, with the mistake update. I hope they change their mind and add their chest again. Also, the tokens shops were good. I don't know why they removed that, too but I hope they bring it back and learn from their mistake

This used to be a 5 star game. The update to level 15 and card evolutions makes the gap between high spenders and no/low spenders so great that there's not really any point playing unless you're going to full on whale. I've given it a few months, thinking "maybe it'll get better and I'll get used to it" but there's no getting around it, a player with level 14 cards is simply outpowered by a player who spends and has a bunch of evolved level 15 cards.

I used to love this game, it was one of my absolute favorites when it came out, and it had some bad updates in the past, but they always bounced back. But the past two updates in a row have absolutely killed the game, the first one making the game pay to win and removing tons of rewards and value and overall nuking all of the fun in the game. It is not worth the grind anymore after that update alone, but then they added evolutions, which are literally pay to obtain. They're just milking a corpse

This game has been on a steady decline for years. To same the game hasn't always been p2w would be dishonest. But they suffer from the old saying "Give an inch take a mile" where they've been steadily seeing just how much they can increase the predatory monetization in the game. This latest update has been their most daring yet in this regard. Unless you're the type that likes to invest a house into their gaming experience I would not recommend this game at all.

I have been in here for a long while and I have spent some money as well. The game presentation is a hoax, along with the game itself. There exists no balance whatsoever, as supercell would have you believe, there are not even basic restrictions and rules, in order to make sure that the game is having a basic concept, it is an anarchic mumble jumble, sold as something else.

I hope to god they decide to actually balance out all the cards. Combine this with level differences because its a free-to-play game where you can buy stuff with real money, and it makes this game one of the most unfair, infuriatingly difficult to master games on the app store. Clash Royale is an embaressment to games with competitive play. You can't buy higher level characters in Overwatch. You can't buy more boost in Rocket League. What a joke.

Gameplay is fun but the game is entirely pay to win. If you aren't willing to spend money, you're going to have an awful time. Matchmaking pairs you vs players with higher leveled cards and king towers. The progression system is insanely slow. The balancing in the game is wildly lackluster. If you aren't planning on spending money, I do not recommend this game at all.

Let me completely honest. this game has fallen off so much it's unreal, it seems supercell is trying it's best to ruin this game for anyone who doesn't spend money on microtransactions. it's like call of duty all over again but on mobile. it is pathetic and scummy, it used to be bearable, you used to have so much things that would help you level up your cards as a free to play, I have been playing this game for around 4 years now- I recently unistalled it because the changes were too much.

This game used to be so much fun and one that I'd play with all my friends. Over the past year, however, Supercell has taken some of the most fun and rewarding things out of the game. They've raised the level cap, and turned to pass royale into a "give us all your money" type beat along with countless other things. This game may be beyond saving.

This game's goal is not to entertain you, but to make you buy at least something. The internal store is not an option, it is a prerequisite. A very large number of players with legendary cards and cards that you can only get through three or four arenas. Only a cyber-athlete who created a new account for fun will be able to play comfortably and grow at low levels.

This game used to be fun, but now it's a money-making scheme. They sell you on it being a free to play game, but the gap between a free to play player and someone who pays for perks like season passes is miles. Besides all that, I recently got scammed by them. It claimed that I made shop purchases that I didn't. When I went to inquire in the help section, they lied to me multiple times and tried to make it seem as though it was my problem even though I had proof it wasn't. I'm sick of this. 😔

With each update they make the game worse and worse. It is anti consumer and anti free to play, as to have any meaningful progression you need to spend money. This is already annoying enough, but add to that the fact that the pricing is horrendous, and you get a terrible progression system. The base game is fun enough one you get to max level, but of course to do that you must spend money, and all of the other game modes they add aren't fun, they are very basic. Do not recommend

The game at lower levels is luring and habit forming. At higher levels, no matter how many chests you open, the algorithm will not let you upgrade any card to level 10 or above at least not the cards that matter unless you purchase something from the clash royale shop. It draws unbalanced game for you to finally make a purchase for good cards. Fraudulent by design. They think people won't understand their trickery.

Tbh, this game is a quick crashgrab. If you're thinking about playing this game, just keep in mind that 90% of your progress speed is counting on how much you spend in the game. And the amount of gaslighting the developers did in the trailer for level 15 is crazy to me. It just goes to show how much they dont care about how the community feels. Level 15 has to be one of the most HORRENDOUS uptade added to this game. Horrible but hopefully still fixable. Hopefully the devs finally start listenin
Edit: game is dead. Level 16 killed the game and heroes overpowered. I quit

Recently I've seen many negative reviews, and to make sure you can see both sides of the coin I am sharing my opinion. This is one of the best games for mobiles. It's has ton of different well thought mechanics, nice style, catching gameplay (like for sure, I'm playing for 5 years) it's made good, it is the original. People complain about card upgrading, they say it's too long, and you can speed up this process with purchases, you can, but it doesn't affect gameplay, only your skill will, enjoy

Years of play removed the shine.Most notably, the matching algorithm is garbage. The most generous interpretation is that you're forever matched against your best day. It's maddening when you just want a chest. I enjoy the gameplay, even if devs currently hate swarm mechanics. However, I am irritated by the chest timer mechanic, and the incessant demands for reviews are beyond annoying. That being said, it does seem to be a good game, even if the chest timers are -extraordinarily- frustrating.

This game always had a pay to win element, but after almost 5 years of playing, Supercell has turned their greed to overdrive, and largely ignores the feedback from their players. At this point, it's no longer fun to play, as you HAVE to spend just to be competitive. Avoid the game, unless you want to spend a lot of money on an old game that doesn't draw new players.

Greedy. The only thing the developers have in mind is fattening their own pockets. The recent balance changes and taking away the season shop while also implementing this new ranked system made the game (somehow) even more pay to win. They finally made the game utterly and completely unplayable. Congratulations! It's a fun game nonetheless and there's no other like it but I won't be playing it, unless something changes.

I don't see how a game that is so unbalanced as far as match ups are concerned deserves more than 1 star. If you pay to play I'm sure the game is more fun but, I will never waste my hard earned money on something that I can't physically own. The game is free to play to a certain point but, once you've reached that point good luck. You are pitted against max level cards to a point that is ridiculous and takes the fun out of the game completely.

Clash Royale is a very fun (and addictive) game. It is a extremely exciting mobile game, that forces you to stay calm under pressure. It is a fantastic game overall, except that it's pay-to-win. It's SUCH a big frustration, because, unlike a lot of other games, you don't pay for cosmetics. You actually pay for the most overleveled stuff. I don't pay a cent, and it is really hard to keep up with all the overleveled/pay2win players out there.

Game has kept me interested for a few years. Only major negative is that it's a money pit. Updates are usually amazing. Boat race sucked at first nI still hate being limited to one play every 24 hrs for the clan. Just when I'm getting bored, they update, bring a new card, and change things up. There's a reason this game has been around so long. It's because they never stop working on it. They're never content and always changing with player feedback. It's that dedication that keeps it awesome.

Be warned. This game heavily involves either countering or being countered by the enemy. Rarely does this game involve a proper fair 1v1 scenario. I have played this game for over a year now and the only reason i am still playing is because of the time i have invested into it. I do not recommend spending money onto this game since most of the deals are just overpriced. However, I do enjoy the variety of different characters that are available to choose from aswell as the war day gamemode.

This season's update has ruined the game. Since the price hike a while back on the "Premium" pass, everything is so pay to play here. Yes, everything is eventually obtainable, but you need to grind for years to get up to level 15. The current season, though, has really made horrible changes to the game. Pretty much less of everything that was in the pass before. The only update they should have given was unlocking your earned chest instantly. Make an OG season pass, and go back.

There's to much parity in the game. Players use the easiest, cheapest cards and spam them and there's nothing you can do about it. It makes the game repetitive and boring. The paywalls are also absolutely absurd. Supercell tries so hard to get youre money rather than make the game more enjoyable. I've played this game on and off for about 7 years and it has gone downhill because of the repetitive game play.

I've been playing this game since the year it came out. Sometimes in the past, they introduced shards. These let your character be more elite. Little did I know this was just a way to benefit to pay-to-play players. After what feels like a year of the shards being released, ice earned a grand total of 2 of them. They developers have found a way to advantage paying players while holding non paying ones down. I'm about done.

Wow, this update... I've been playing CR since almost the very beginning, and I've seen it grow from the basic 1v1, to Clan Wars, to Pay-per-season, etc. I understood supporting the developers with the $5.99, but now for the same exact thing they're asking $11.99? Really? I've been paying the $5.99 a month, but this seems very greedy and I'm very close to Uninstalling the game and finding something else to give my time and money to. More than double for the same thing... disappointing.

Update - now it's even more obvious that paying players are given the advantage. Meeting same or lower level opponents with higher level cards all the time. Additionally, strange things are happening to save opponents when they are losing. Google should take this game out of the store and review what is going on, fewls like a complete scam now. Pay to win. If you don't pay you will not get ANY good cards. The paying players have an edge that is impossible to handle if you don't pay.

Every update makes the game worse. What used to be a game of strategy has become a game with no skill due to the inclusion of evolutions. Furthermore, every update makes progression more difficult unless you spend a large amount of money. Do not download this app. They do not care about the player experience only about money. And as with my experience, it has only gotten less fun throughout the years and is now unplayable.

Game was a lot of fun for years. Then came tencent. Since they purchased Supercell, it's been downhill fast. This latest champions update with level 14 was the last straw for me. Just another in a long series of attempts to get their greedy fingers on my wallet. Playing War Alliance now. It's actually fun. Thanks for ruining a once great game.

It's really hard to make progress, even if you buy the gold pass, which was nerfed severely in the latest update. Plus, the amount of grind for high level cards increased drastically with the introduction of level 15. This makes it difficult even for paid players to achieve maxed decks, and completely annihilates the already slow progress of the free-to-play. It's now the biggest grind since DS3 single player covenant farming. Or, you could shell over hundreds of dollars to speed things up.

Clash Royale used to be one of my favorite games. The strategy provided interesting gameplay, the progression was fun, and you felt accomplished. However, as of late, it seems that the dev team is making the WORST possible choice with every update. Evolutions were broken for almost their entire lifetime and continue to be troublesome, limited modes and challenges are less fun, clan war is uninteresting, and now progression has been MURDERED. I don't understand why these things had to happen.

It's been fun playing this game. I've made friends over it, had fun with it, and enjoyed playing it casually. That said, I can't honestly say it's fun to play anymore. Between the major battle pass (season pass) nerf and it's increased price, and this absurd, unbalanced, lazy, and free2play punishing excuse for an update, I can definitively say that both playing the game casually, and spending money on it in any way is barely to not worth it anymore. Sad supercell, you ruined something great

Latest update is broken and hangs on startup while showing "Account alert" dialog. The review below is for older version of this game. Probably the best game created by Supercell. I think it's not worth using real money because early stages are the best part of the game and that's the part that you can skip with little real world money. The resources you get in the game grow linearly but the prices go up exponentially. Expect to pay hundreds of dollars if you want top cards with shortcuts...

Overall the game is fun, the new updates seem to correct some of the errors from the previous release. We are probably still stuck being beat by the exact same clans for a month. Magic items help lvl cards... which is good but makes it quicker to get a brand new card maxed, which makes the fun of getting specific cards less appealing. If you have all cards maxed on a specific tier, you cant request cards of that type, but you should be able to request ANY card due to needing star points.

This new update is a scam! Just right when the game was finally improving and they do this to us. The apology is a good start, but doesn't change the fact that we have no gold left to upgrade our cards. This game need to give us more gold, and not 750 gold limit per day. Also, you need to add a way to opt out players that don't attack in clan wars. This game has too many issues already and you guys aren't solving them, instead you keep adding more and more problem to the game. #NoLvl14

Used to love this game, started playing with guys from work several years ago when the game was still fresh. The new war mode, however, was, by far, the worst update to the game, and I've noticed a steep drop-off in players who haven't already been playing for a long time. The war is only fun if you have a large, full clan of nothing but very active players, which causes infighting. If you have a smaller clan, get used to seeing that stupid boot every week!

Finally uninstalled this game. After multiple years of trying to make it work, I'm done. The pay to win aspects are just too egregious. If you don't shell out ALOT of money, you simply can't be competitive. This "game" is fine at the lower ranks, but as you progress you get to a point where it's more about who has spent the most money and not who's the better player. I will never support another Supercell game. Don't waste your time on their games, unless you plan on spending thousands.

Needs to have training for different game modes. hard to set up decks that work for temporary game modes and tournaments. Wow you made this a monthly bill. On top of the micro transactions. DUDE you put a time limit on the tears.😑 at this point im playing for my teammates but I would not recomend this game. Its very disappointing now. "Can't wait to see the advertisements come out before every match. Guys get on that." 🤡 do you though sell every ounce of your soouls.🤑😈👹

Been playing this game in 2017, I have some issues and problems, problem 1: matchmaking, sometimes I get paired with the player 2 levels over me or even under me. (to be completely fair) problem 2: You literally need to play this game every single day to gain a lot of experience which takes forever to level up when your level 7-8 and higher. Problem 3: Its pretty pay to win. If you ran out of money, you will either pay with gems or real money which grinding players find it annoying. That's all.

This game is well ,how should I say this without being rude ,not in its best ,but it is worthy a try. I mean ,it could be better but I still like spending my free time trying to beat other players. It has its problems though ,like for example , you are a low level player and when you decide to play duel , you play with a very strategic player in which is nothing compared to you or its lags that may bug your experience in the game , despite all those issues , I will give this game three stars. ★★★

Writing this review with first hand experience, this game is not worth trying now , it has lot of unwanted new things which makes it extremely hard for free to play players , if you have ample money to spend on game go for it rest can avoid. This is the kind of game where climbing the leaderboard doesn't depend on your skills but the amount of money you have to spend on this stupid game

Downloaded the game at launch and played fairly consistently since with only a few breaks. Loved this game, but the current pay-to-play system with level 15 cards and evolutions is ridiculous. Supercell has ruined their game and turned it the most disappointing money pit. I'm by no means against a company monetizing their game, and have in fact spent a fair amount of money on Clash Royale. But the newest update is nothing short of pay-to-play. I don't know if I'll ever play this game again. 0/5

Legendary cards are not worth nearly what they are priced in shop. 40k for an ice wizard? Ludicrous. The lumberjack is a great example of a good legendary card. Fast, but can only attack 1 target at a time; upon death, however, he drops rage, which is very useful for support style cards, like anti-air. I do LOVE this game, and that's why I want to see it get even better. A few balancing changes and thus would be golden. Btw, I do LOVE the change you made with micro-transactions, as it does seem worth it to pay for chests that have special attributes like picking your own cards or striking out ones you may not want. I love this game and just want to see it go in a positive way.

I've enjoyed this game for years and years, and while, yes, they've increased the amount of monetary options for purchase, my main complaint at the moment is the "Skibidi" advertisement that has been circulating. I already have the app on my phone and I keep blocking and disliking the ad. The ad keeps reappearing without the dislike, being a new unblocked instance of the ad. I just want to stop seeing an annoying ad for a game I already play.

This game was perfect when It released. But now, It just pay to win and some troops need to be fixed (Huge damage, bad movement, and some players copy paste each other when the game should be depends on skills. The only thing they focused on is the shop lol. It's really boring to play it these days. And btw, I'm a high level player so don't think I wrote this review because I'm bad or anything else. I just want to share my opinion on a game which I missed its old version.

The game used to be good: You get chests, up your card levels, enjoy and that's it. Now it has SO MANY things you need to pay LOADS of money to be able to level up properly and "enjoy" the game for five minutes. It's just a cash grab at this point. Now it's not about who has better strategy, it's about who has more money into their accounts. Absolutely ridiculous. If you want to burn some cash, this game is what you're looking for.

The game was fun when it came out, but slowly over the years Supercell has changed what made the game good. It's so bad it's possible to softlock progression at the very start of the game. This review isn't so change can happen. it's to bring down the overall rating in a collective group effort. I would have choice words for you, Supercell but then you have a valid reason to take this down. I'm simply upset. That is all. Thank you.

This was a pretty neat game, I've been playing since late 2016. I loved clash, but they're killing their player base with all these horrible updates. With lvl 15, the game will be less fun for all of the f2p player's because they don't wanna spend money to progress in a game that claims to be free. I also hate how they did the different game modes. I think the season shop is alright, but the fact that we don't get crowns for it is absolute bs.

I've been playing this game for nearly a decade now and the most recent update has made me stop playing. I didn't love how long chests would take and progression felt painfully slow for years but with daily lucky drops, the battle pass, and the season shop. It felt faster then ever. That is, until they cut the battle pass rewards in half, got rid of chests and the season shop and changed the daily rewards. I have played this game for a long time, but this was the final straw for me. I give up.

Great game, but Supercell has many issues with it they need to fix: 1. In-game payments blasting everywhere 2. (If competitive) rather unbalanced 3. Mid-ladder is very toxic (this is a player base problem, not a Supercell problem) 4. Can become very dull when Supercell doesn't continuously add new changes and cards

This game can be fun, but will likely end up being frustratingly painful for many. The truth is the game requires tons of work to be put in as you will need to level up your cards, your tower, and work quite a bit to get enjoyment out of the game. But even despite putting all the work in, this game is plagued with many issues: certain deck combos being favorable, some cards being a bit too strong, being part of a clan, and the level gap making many games unfair or screwed. Good Luck.

It used to be a great game, but got pay to win in recent years. But I can look past that, whatever you need to do to keep up sales I guess. But let me spin you a tale of horrid customer service. Ive had an account pretty much since launch, but lost it because I deleted the email account linked to the supercell ID when I was inactive for a long time. While trying to recover the account, I've given details only the account holder would know, but was banned for 31 days. Seven times.

I had a good review up for years, but this game is now a shadow of what it once was. last few updates murdered progression, rewards, and even the audio is now butchered. This newest update has changed/destroyed the foundation of a nearly 10 year old game, and the few remaining non-pay-to-win aspects are completely gone. thanks for that. and also thanks for automatically opening the 8 year old chest I had saved since Arena 4. this game is unplayable.

Fix the matchmaking. 600 trophy difference? How is that fun for people who haven't played since day 1 or spending $$ for years? Used to be a blast, now it's a money grab to balance the playing field. UPDATE 2024: Even worse. Pay to win - - >pay to play. Playing this game without spending a ton of money is just feeding the players that actually have paid an insane amount. I've spent money on the pass, and bundles from time to time; without a consistent investment, you are nothing.

This game was gotten so much worse with the unfairness. It's obvious that some game you have no chance at winning. When you play no clan bot, they always have exactly the right characters to beat you, and you can tell they get the potion so much faster than you can. This game is a total pay to win game now, and it has just sucked all the fun out of playing it. It's near impossible to move up the tiers or ranks without paying for it. Don't bother down loading this it with just irritati you.

I've been playing since 2016, and it was such a good f2p game. Unfortunately, they have been rolling out horrible updates that make it so you have to pay to play the game. If you're looking at starting the game, I don't recommend it. They took the chest away and limited how many lucky drops you can get in a day. So unless you're spending money, then you can't advance fast.

I used to think this game was great, but honestly by this point it's the worst money grab I've ever seen on Google Play store. They make you think you're strong, then the matchmaking throws you against near impossible opponents, making you feel the need to spend money in order to keep playing and progressing. And when you do, the matchmaking somehow gets worse and you don't see any progression. Every new update ruins something people loved and limits the game more, forcing unwanted purchases.

You downloaded the game, starts out fun, then you spend hours playing. Past 2000 trophies you will run into p2w players, anything past 4500 and the game is basically pay to play, you cannot constantly rank up without spending money or running into someone who spent their families whole salary to be good at the game, doesn't matter how good you are at thinking the highest payer always wins, you get to a point where you are fighting max level decks with level 11 cards and you don't have a choice.

Clash is fun, and very easy to load up and kill 5-10 minutes multiple times a day. I've been a true free-to-play for over 3 years, so you absolutely CAN compete and have fun while not spending money.
