However, this is very much a pay-to-win game. Countless players drop significant money to buy chests, gems, etc in order to boost their overall level and card levels. It is not uncommon to see people with max leveled everything, despite their profile showing minimal donations and a shorter game time

This is the worst update I've seen to date for this game. No chests for 2v2 matches, long waits, and the caps on earning stuff from challenges, 2v2, etc. at 1,000 tokens is just dumb. I play maybe 10 minutes a day now and then turn off the game, whereas I played for hours before. As the leader of my clan, I have a standing order to demote anyone who buys the pass. Fortunately, the 20 or so who usually buy it (myself included) have not bought it. Screw your greed!

this game is basically unplayable for people who don't spend anything on it. if you don't buy the battle pass, which is horrendously overpriced, you don't stand a chance of climbing at all. rng favours those who put money into the game. you will always be in a bad matchup with under leveled cards if you don't pay. Supercell should really offer refunds on the gold that is spend on a card when they rework it. All of the time and gold has now gone to waste. No point in playing this game at all now

The devs are seriously killing this game by not listening to the community & making the game a disgustingly money grabbing situation where you need to spend lots and lots of money to be able to compete in a fair way. It's a shame becuase it has so much potential but the game is just running into a thick wall. And let me be more clear, level 15 simply sucks & we do not need it!

Used to be a fun strategy game, but now it’s just a cash grab. The developers clearly imbalance the game on purpose to push players into spending money. Progress is ridiculously slow unless you pay, and new overpowered cards are introduced just to milk the paying players. If you're not spending, well, good luck... It’s gone from skill-based to wallet-based. Disappointing.

Please fix the emote glitch in the shop. I'm missing 2 emotes, yes they are regular not exclusive. Since I'm not missing 3 and only 2..I'm guessing that triggers the glitch, of the last 2 no appearing. I have reached out to you'll, but no effort has been put in to resolve. I have spend hundreds, been playing the game since first day. Not asking for free things just asking to correct this. I'll give it 5 star review if this gets addressed, since I do enjoy the game. Thank you.

Overall, this is a great free mobile game. It can be very competitive, while having an edge to players who pay for certain things, everything is still achievable for free. Great art work changes recently, some nice improvements with the banners, and my favorite as of late; the mastery challenges. There is a lot of strategy in this game with the 107 cards, while some of the limited time events introducing some interesting cards just for those events. Overall, I've had tons of fun for 6 years.

At first I thought this game is gonna be at least alright in terms of strategy but it turns out that if you don't have the card, no matter what strategy you use, you are destined to loose the game. Specific cards like Baby Dragon, Skeleton Army, and etc are cards that will give you a really high advantage which in turn guarantees your opponent's loss. Also, the card selection just sucks. You can't view a card's abilities just because you don't have it or not in the level to have it? What??
it keeps restarting me this game's stupid I've got to arena 10 two times already and now it just restarted me again I hate this game I hate this game

Player and spender of more than 8 years and now is finally the time to completely cancel this game. It started with legendary characters and they have done it again with the champions. We accepted all this,but level 15 ?! Ridiculous decision by dev ops. They could have pivoted and made money through so many other ways but they have given up and are now resorting to take in as much money as possible to the point where they are okay if it kills the game. Capitalism 1 Gaming community 0

After a while opponents seem to be picked purely based on your decks weaknesses and you fall so behind, it's not worth the anguish of 20 losses in a row. Edit: I recently tried to log back in because there are absolutely NO games worth the time on Google play anymore. Everything gets boring and I'm about done altogether with gaming. To conclude, the support team could not help me get my account back unless I gave them proof of purchase. I have my account! What more do you need?!

Prior to wars 2.0, I had given this game a rating of 5 stars. The old style of wars required building a level capped deck from a limited pool of cards and required real skill to build well and because of the level cap, all players were on a level playing field. You were required to play 1.5 matches per day with opt out. All of that said enter wars 2.0 where you can't opt out, there isn't a level cap, and you are required to play 4 matches per round. Clan died from this update.

They made this game a money laundering business. The developers only care about money. It's now Pay 2 play. $350 for some items was only 5$ a few months back. The design is awful to navigate. £10 for a single level up from lvl14 - 15, there's literally 100+ cards. Making maxing everything will cost you at least a £1000. It's impossible with f2p. It'll take you 48 months for one level up for each card. Please, quitting or never installing this game is the best option for these greedy developers.

Just came back to the game after 3 years, and it's a pure nightmare, if you're planning to come back and give this game another go, please don't for the sake of your own sanity. The constant pay-to-win forcing, and locking broken units behind pay walls is really saddening, considering how good the game originally was. It has gone to shambles and is down in the dirt right now.

If you are new to the game, and play against live players at the start, they'll have higher level mob than yours. I complete run you over and not sticking to the same level comparison, they could use money to buy the cards to level up while they are at the start, that's a big disadvantage for new players that want to play this game. I like the game, but can't deal with the pay the win stuff.

I've been playing since the beginning, 100% f2p. I'm at lvl 13, I've got 13 maxed cards right now. I'm missing some sort of goal. I'm slowly maxing card after card, even legendaries, through requesting. Playing the game does not really further this, there are hardly any rewards I want which could make me push trophies. I'm just logging in three times a day to do the routine and that's it.

For someone who played this game since its beta stage back in 2016, it's saddening for me to write this review. The stark difference between this and Clash of Clans, is how terribly greedy the pricing strategy of this game has become. Two kinds of season pass subscriptions and overpriced cosmetics. You even got that piggybank nonsense crammed into the game. So many unnecessary updates as well. I remember back then when the game didn't even reach 100 MBs in size. Now it's almost half a gig.

I play this game every day and I've made good progress without spending a penny. I'm on Level 11 with nearly 13,000 points. However, the game is plagued with connection issues. I can guarantee to lose the first game of every day because the app takes so long to connect to the server. By the time I'm into a game, it's practically over. Subsequent games connect perfectly normally. Other than that problem, the game is well balanced and fun to play

I have played this game since it's launch. I am sad to say the following: This game is a money grab entirely, the strategy and fun went out the window a few years ago. Every subsequent update has made the game less engaging and rewarding. They have consistently ignored player requests and have worsened the experience for players not wanting to spend hundreds of dollars on a rock paper scissors mobile game.

Gambling: The Game If your opponent's troops and towers are higher level, they win. If you're equal, you get good gameplay. If you're more leveled, you win. You need to play for 2-3 hours to get the same progress as feom spending a dollar. Leveling up is trivial if you're paying. Be ready to throw away games if you're opponent has a high level.

Why? You have to pay for win. You can't even play anymore, it's just not fun. You are too greedy for money. I played the game before when it was "normal" and it was really fun, you have such good ideas and the game is great and interesting but your lust for money is too much. WORST GAME EVER.

It's a really fun game to be honest, but it's p2w, for example, evolutions. You can buy them from the shop but if you're f2p you have to wait 3 months to even get 1 Evo, and I get that everyone is p2w and they all have higher level cards. But skill is important too, but if there's a too significant level difference there's just no way to win, still kinda fun to come back to time to time but it's just so aggravating when you proceed to reach 1 game away from next arena you lose indefinitely.

After playing this game for almost 10 years, I'm finally deleting it. Once you reach a certain level and win a trophy, the game starts favoring your opponents in the next few levels. In the recent update, they even removed the chests, which is extremely frustrating. I'm no longer playing this game, and with these kinds of changes, more people will probably stop playing it too.

Previous rating 5 stars just down vote 2 stars I've been playing this game since launch, almost 3 years ago. And it has been a blast. Last year they implemented a pay by month "service" pass royal. This month I felt it wasn't worth 5 bucks, so I passed on it. WTAF! You can play this game and get rewards but at a fraction of the pace you were once able to, it is nearly unplayable. If you haven't already played this game of haven't played in a while - DON'T. Supercell will soak you for everything

Played it for almost 7 years and I must say, they are trying really hard to get players into paying. It became pay2win and that's just sad because it really had potential. Since they published tower level 15, I'm being spammed with offers, where I can upgrade my card to level 15 for "only" 7,99€. On the other hand, if you don't pay, you really have to grind in the game to upgrade only one card to level 15, it's ridiculous. The evolutions are pay2win as well- either play for 6 months or pay 15€
0 Strategy, toxic and 100% pay to win. Never had a more frustrating experience playing a mobile game

Support for this game is non-existent. We have had a player harassing members of our clan for more than a year. After several months and hundreds of reports, it appeared to be resolved but the player has returned and has started harassing members so much that they are leaving the game entirely. Also if you get deployed and cant access the game for a period of time, they give control of your clan, that you used currency to create, to someone else with no option to take back control when you can.

It wasn't a fun experience. At first, when everyone has the same cards, it was pretty fair gameplay. Everyting was fun at that point. But later on people began buying cards with money and absolutely destroying. I had no chance. I would like for the legendaries to be nerfed, or at least the ability of buying them with money be removed.

This game used to be really fun. Now, it's nearly impossible to win a battle or progress in the game. The gold cost to upgrade a higher level character is 75k-100k and therefore takes a long time to be able to upgrade your characters. It seems I am always paired with players that have characters maxed out, making it impossible to win. The game is more frustrating than fun.

The game is fun, and I can see myself playing it for a while especially whilst I'm travelling. However, there are server side issues that really need to be looked at. Although I have full bars and my connection is stable via data and WiFi, my games have a habit of losing connection, ruining the overall experience. I would say the game is definitely worth giving a shot, I just hope this issues gets dealt with soon.

The "Update for Losers" will result in this game never getting another dollar from me. I purchased the event pass monthly, but they continue to make it more difficult to allow us to play together, and have now removed pretty much any reward for doing so. They might as well just remove 2v2 instead of burying it in deeper and deeper menus, and now you can't just click play again, that too was removed. Be better, or I, like many others will simply jump ship to that new game coming outsoon
everything is pay to win , it takes so long to level up , level 16 card and heros ruined game more

Don't even waste your time. By my third game I was facing a Pay To Win player with units that ran over mine like they were ants. Game doesn't even try to lure you in with a slow curve. Its Pay To Win from the very start and strategy involved in unit decisions is meager at best. You're essentially just throwing units at each other. A very similar game thats more balanced (in the beginning) is World War Doh. Play that instead.

Pretty good game, until arena 6 when it becomes pay to win. The game markets itself as a strategy game, but after a while it just becomes a matter of who has the highest card and king levels, which is directly controlled by how much money you pump into the game. Also there are the legendary cards which are really rare (easy to get if you pay a lot though) and some are really overpowered. Fun in the beginning, boring pay to win "game" after a few hours.

Has potential to be a truly great game, but has been ruined by bad design, only possible to succeed by buying in game currency, mechanics to earn currency in game amount to too little, too late, bullied by those who do spend hard cash, ........ This review originally written in 2018 and while its now easier to gain common cards, the real game winning cards are too rare to collect and gold to upgrade them is painfully slow without spending hard cash.

Updating my review again & like I said some years ago the pay to play has finally caught up to the game. Devs; you need to atleast listen to your own content creators on YouTube on their many, many videos as to what the game is doing wrong. We all loved playing this game but this game's downfall is now not a question of 'if' but 'when'. Absolute Shame.

Bro I played this game for long time, worked hard to get to where I am without paying, well maybe a little for gems what happened? If you want to download this game and start from the beginning don't. It's to much pay to play now and the matches are out of control with a match where you are down by 3-4 levels( I've had some where I was 5 levels above my opponent)Was a fun game but take it from someone who has been here for about 6 years, don't bother. I'm uninstalling now. DARKNESS FLAME is out.

They've truly outdone themselves. I thought the level 15 update would be the worst they've ever conceived, but they truly put their full wits and will together and went out of their way to compose the worst update by far. I had already given up on the game a bit ago, but even hearing about this update drove me to the point of even having it on my phone. I've been dedicated to the game for quite some time, reaching GM and such. The game has had a good run, but as all things do, it has truly died

I used to enjoy this game quite a lot back in the day, but since then, it has fallen further and further downwards due to becoming increasingly pay to win. The latest update especially is probably the worst one in its lifetime. Level 15 is almost entirely a cashgrab due to the ridiculous amount of time and money required to fully max out and even Evolutions,which was an interesting mechanic, has been monetized by Supercell. Do not play this game if you value your time and money.

it was a really good game early on but as days went by my experience just went downhill till arena 10 it was okay but in the legendary arena all i face is level 14 enemies and the meta keeps on changing and my cards being level 10 or 11. now it is just a pay to win game and nothing much is left of it

It's a fantastic game it's one of the most fun games I've played in a while, but it does take skill, and there r a lot of people that r pay 2 win, but overall it's a great game. I wish u could remove shards from one card and give it to another card

Corporate Greed!!! The game is fun and has been on a balancing rope with the different cards in the meta. The new cards however change this completely alongside the new level. Rewards have also been nerfed, the gap between F2P and P2W widens. I hate this, alongside the other gamebreaking mechanics.

Eh what can I say that hasn't already been said for the many games that are just like this? You fight PvP, join a group and use a 'wars' mechanic. There's a premium pass you pay for that gets you better loot and skins, and it's a free game so wait timers are its bread and butter. This one has cards you collect to level up troops, which isn't original but is at least interesting- I can at least see why some people buy the premium currency. Overall okay but I wouldn't waste money on it.

The issue is as many have mentioned that the beginning is very enjoyable up until you have spent enough time to be hooked at the game. At which point "matchmaking" only ever puts you against players that have a perfect counter deck, or are completely maxed out, in other words telling you "you can be that good too just buy them chests so you can get maxed out too" as getting chests the free to play way is incredibly slow. Conceptually I love the game, but supercell is worse than EA as a company.
very greedy game not even a single match is fair all match are pay to win and very toxic matchmaking . don't download this game deleteing forever..................

I wish players would be able to unselect a card during a match because I have accidentally deployed a fireball in the very corner of the screen. I accidentally tapped the area with the corner of my hand. I've seen other players I'm competing against doing the same thing I just mentioned as well. It's an easy fix. cmon, supercell!

I was a clash Royale player then took a break. I came back a to play couple of months ago and they have made it pay to win. If you pay, you get more evos and that is enough to win. There is no balance between the different cards. I have one car that has an attack speed of 1.6 seconds but a card that cost 2 more elixer has the same speed and 3x the health and does area damage and can jump in the air and cause more damage. It keeps getting infuriating to play with the meta builds everyone uses
P2w experience, the only way to win is with the ultimate debit card 0.0 cycle. No canon for that.

it's fun at first then they only put you against the same type of deck to force a loss, I fought the same deck with just three characters changed about 12 times in a row, I still won some but fighting the same deck everytime is tiring and needs to change.

So the game is amazing. Graphics are great cards nice and easy to drag around the field. But lately I have been having some problems. When I try to join the Modern Day Challenge or something like that the percentage goes up slowly and when it hits 100 it crashes and when I click on Clash Royale it crashes. So I have to restart the app every time I want to go back but still cannot join a game. Overall a very good app

very fun, especially with friends who play the game even if it's just for a bit. gotta try it at least once and dont give up after a few times of losing, it's all about strategy and once you get the hang of it you'll have lots of fun even if you lose. Update: became very pay to win I feel. I haven't spent a lot of money on this {maybe like twenty dollars} game. I've noticed you just get stuck at a specific rank if you don't get lucky/specific draws from the chests or pay for cards.

So this game is decent. No doubt about that. The concept is great. But the game is becoming predictable and repetitive. Everybody uses the same things. My Wi-Fi is usually stable, but still has a chance of lagging. If only the game would pause if disconnected. A great feature you can hopefully add. There are flaws to this though. Players in a losing side might just disconnect and connect to stall. Maybe you can only lag out twice before they cannot use it anymore. Consider please.

I used to love this game. I even used watched content creaters. But it seems now everything is just a mess. They've added way too much. They need to simplify the menus, mechanics, and UI, it's full of noise and ugly. The problem is that this game makes drastic changes and doesn't look back. It started to go downhill after they changed wars. There is definitely sense of pay to win going on now and battle pass cost more now, forget that nonsense. Gut the game, more does not mean better. Daunting.

Its a fun game, with a simple concept, three towers, attack and defend. The better you become however, the more you're punished. A good example, if youre level 11 they will constantly put you against a level 13. Also, the constant re-balancing of the cards is really irritating. Unfortunately the developers have become VERY money hungry and have released season passes. No reason to stick around anymore. Tried game again, still garbage.

A great game for wealthy gamers! The gameplay is fun, and there's lots of strategy options. Plus, with the ability to dump money into the game to try to unlock stronger units or upgrade the ones you have, there are endless spending opportunities! Who can turn down the offer to max out a specific card until the end of the season? Anyways, I left it with 2 stars because the gameplay is actually fun, but if you're not willing to pay, don't expect to win. Uninstalled.

My most played mobile game. i love that it doesnt prevent you from playing with a stupid energy system, and i love the balance between precise timing or positioning, and sparce player input. great strategy game, but tailored for mobile. The thing i hate about it is the leveling system. im ok with unlocking cards but leveling up causes a lot of frustration as you are put against level max players. Edit: Very detrimental updates as of late. Unfortunate design is making the game worse for everyone.

I started playing because my kids were always "Clashing" and talking about the grind. It is fun but the software needs some work. Frequently freezes, drops WIFI or 5G internet, and/or stores the moves and when it catches up the opponent play is accelerated. The algorithm doesn't account for card level so there are matches where you are, or can be hopelessly overmatched. I like that it can be picked up for a quick game but the frequent drops and slow rewards don't make it a long term play.

The graphics are great, and the gameplay is entertaining and interesting. Sometimes the controls will slip up for me but overall it's a very well made game that's free to play, and quite easy without paying. However, the new pass royale seems a bit much, it's not really necessary and it's just another ripoff of the epic games strategy to make more money.

Bad updates make games go into the forgotten apps or just uninstall them. This used to be an average game with a lot of potential. A lot of recent changes helped close the gap between whales and new players. The season pass was accessible for everyone who had time to play casually. The last update of April, changed everything for worse. Now the season pass can't be finished by playing casual, and ranked uses a mode that isn't for everyone, making it harder to climb. It's time to move on...

Liking it a lot so far! No need to wait for resources to upgrade buildings or create troops; just go and attack opponents straight away. Real time and exciting. Edit after 3 days of playing: the chests take so long to open, you can open only one at a time, and there are only 4 slots for the chests. After filling these 4 slots, playing a match doesn't give you anything except trophies. So in the end you can play only a few matches each DAY (which can make you progress in game) which is really disa

Really fun game, even though sometimes it feels like the games makes you keep getting counters to your decks. Though the reason it's 4 star is because i've been disconnecting every single game at least once, sometimes more. And it has made me lose so many games from disconnecting for even just 5 seconds. Please fix this problem, it only happens eith clash royale.

Worst game of all time. I thought Supercell were fighting toxicity but they became so greedy that they brang back the emote that they removed because it was to toxic but they brang it back for 6 euros. Secondly you can't progress withour buying stuff in the game. Most of the players can't play ranked which means no elite cards which means no lvl 15 cards. It takes for F2P players 3 months to get evo for free which i think is ridiciolus. And i can't play comp cuz im lvl 14 tower and cardsveryhard

The most recent upgrade made the 2v2 games unplayable. Not sure if it has opened up cheating, if they've increased the difficulty of the bots, or of they're just pairing players inappropriately, but the game is now unwinnable. It's taken all the fun out of it, dozens and dozens of games lost in a row, with no chance of winning. Even if you're close, something will happen to force a loss - your partner will drop, lag will occur, or your opponent suddenly has 30 mana to use. It's become a joke.

Great game at the start... wasn't long before i got to a point were i would be faced with opponents who's deck just dwarfed my own. At that point there was no possibility to make progress. I had reached my peak and for the next 3 seaseons, reset after reset, i was met with matches that were impossible to win. From there all i saw was a loss in progress, the more i tried to reach were i once was, the harder it became. The game is set up for you to play for years but never reach your goal. TRASH!
This game is just pay to win unless your willing to drop money don't play this game

This is a great game! The gameplay is great and doesn't get old, the graphics are simple yet great, and generally a great game. As much as I'd love to give this app a five star review, recently since the new update my game crashes on the loading screen. I get that things like this happen but I can't help but feel annoyed, as I am now going to be kicked from my clan for missing war. Anyways, great game, just please fix this issue.

Terrible. It's a fun game at first but developers straight up got lazy with the game after some time. The same passion and energy that was put into the game is gone. Nothing but recycled seasons, and royale passes (battle pass). Game is extremely boring, and caters towards those who pay up. The new clan wars 2 feature; only real way to win is to have higher leveled cards, which you can pay to level up(optional). Good luck trying to get max cards without paying, so far it's taken me 4 years. FUSC

One of the best designed games on the play store. Good graphics, responsive controls, fun game concept... but the ones who contribute (with real money) had more chances to win. Because of that if you don't want to contribute, eventually, you'll get frustrated with the game. Despite of that, is a really fun game that can be enjoyed for free (only an account is required in order to get some data of you).

Brilliant game, wonderful concept, great graphics! Unfortunately recent introductions of new cards have disturbed the balances of the game to the point where it isn't fun to play any longer. There isn't skill involved any more it is pure luck! Unfortunately the developers have decided to make money. With the most recent update the regeneration rate of players that spend money is much faster. The rate is supposed to be 1 per second, mine is close to 1 per 2 seconds, because i spend no money!$hame

This game is wonderful as it is easy to learn how to play but also very strategic. However, it is the matchmaking system that makes you pissed off. After winning some easy matches, you ALWAYS confront hard counters CONSECUTIVELY for quite a lot of time. I am sure it is not random but the system tries to manipulate your win rate - in a flimsy way. At first, losing streak made me play more aggressively, but as it repeats continuesly, now I just quit the app and play infrequently.

The game is fun for a while, but there really is a cap unless you spend money. Point and case, youtube lvl 1's 3 crowning everyone. They may not admit to it but there is a balance problem that becomes very apparent when you climb the ladder. i get it, they need to make money too, but i can't spend any more money on this game. the game glitches and crashes at random intervals. the balance is iffy. Tried again, 1 week uninstalled. Game got better after I spend $10, then back to trash.

The game is really fun. But i hate that the game decides when you win or lose. You can play against someone lower or equal to your level in the first battle then the next will be someone stronger so you can win and lose. Also in the chest they don't possess new troops most times so you have to work with the little troops you have and you have to battle against someone with all the troops available for that level.

It's a good fun game, fun art style and great tactical depth. I understand the need for in-app purchases fully, but this game really throws them down your throat at every opportunity and there's little in the way of safety net to stop you getting utterly trounced purely because you only paid $20 and the other guy paid $200. Really enjoying the game but there are more "balanced" experiences out there.

The game crashes every time I try to enter the marketplace tab. Quite convenient timing for such a bug to pop up, since they're offering free stuff there that is no longer accessible because the game crashes every time you try to get to it. Additionally, the matchmaking is awful. I'm always paired with someone at least a level below me, and even when playing super old decks, I still win because of the gap. Buggy and blatantly unfair to its players.

When Clash Royale first came out, I absolutely loved it. I just couldn't stop playing it and it was all fun. But now I have faced a serious problem with this game. I have managed to reach 5000+ trophies with mostly lvl 11 and some lvl 12 cards but now I just face people with maxed lvl cards which are quite hard to beat. Even upgrading a single card takes months and a lot of time. The main issue is at this point I'm just stuck and there's nothing I can do about it(frustrating).

like most recent reviews, I've been playing and enjoying this game for years. But since the last update the slow creap of pay to win took a massive leap forward, so much so that players 3 levels below me had a full set of maxed cards. Coupled with the lag (that only seemed to happen against players that have paid) and the crashing, this game has become unplayable for those that don't want to spend a fortune to play.

This game would be so much better if the pairing system actually worked, since I can't beat a single person, and randomly fighting in stages 6-9 levels higher than mine, and if there was something to prevent your stupid partner not doing anything and basically abandoning you, like a auto placing, I guess, that took the first troop card and put it on the battle Feild if all were charged and five seconds have gone by after none have been touched. Just an idea, tho. It would make the game much better
after the 6th arena the game turns into a nearly impossible pay to win game that slows down more and more the higher the arena

The most addictive game I have ever played in recent years. U need to learn more and more as u go up the ladder. I get frustrating loosing streak sometimes. I think the matching system needs to be improved. We should be matched according to our levels, not trophies. 5 stars if supercell fixes that. Update: I have love-hate relationship with this game. I've uninstalled and reinstalled the game so many times.

Having placed since the day it launched, for years it felt addicting and fun, with the grind to higher trophies feeling rewarding, and I could physically tell I was getting better at the game mechanics. However after so long it no longer feels fresh, and it takes so long to upgrade cards that I haven't been able to develop any other deck than the same one I've been using for years.

I don't see why all the reviews say this is a "pay to win" game. Sure, you can spend money to speed up the process of crafting your perfect deck.. but that's every collecting card game in a nutshell. With its simplicity, this game gives players the ability to tune their own strategies, with a healthy meta of decks that all have their strengths and weaknesses. The deck size is a bit small for a card game, but I think that just adds to the strategy of choosing combos vs tech cards carefully.

Honestly, don't get this game, I was on 4130 trophies and every single game I keep playing I keep losing, I'm no on 3972 thr game won't put me with anyone even my level I'm level 10 and I keep getting put with people on level 11,12, and 13 and every higher level you go up you get more health on your towers so it's harder for you to actually destroy there's then them destroying yours, o can't remember the last time the game put me with someone on the same level as me, I'm on the biggest losing streak in all time, I haven't one a game in any game mode u can ever find while ur in the game, like solo, duo, the challenges or even the clan wars or collect cards for your clan, the game just decideds to put u on a losing streak and they keep doing it to me, once you win a game or 2 in a row goodluck to you even trying to play more games because you'll lose more than you gained, it's just so stupid, if this keeps happening I'm going to have to delete this game because it keeps messing with my temper, I wouldn't want to delete it because the amount of time I've spent playing the game but this keeps up, it's just gonna have to be they way.

Not worth your time if you are an old player and here is why: Yes, this used to be a good and fun game. The cards were balanced, your opponent is usually at the same level as you but not anymore. Skip the game for a while and see how the latest changes will make your 'old' strategies pretty useless and the only way to get back on the track is to use the new cards asap, which is only possible through real money. Thanks Supercell, you just destroyed one of my favorite game...

I've played this game since 2016 when the Princess was the first legendary, and the game has been going downhill. Evolutions, P2W mechanics and the shop being over run with countless "great deals!" The game has become a nightmare, filled with overpowered cards and the true strategy is now just lost. Spam evolutions until you win, or spend money to max out every card you have. It's not like it was back then, and I wish it would change.

I used to love playing this game. I was level 10 and had every legendary in the game. But recently I've had this recurring issue. My game will start a match and 15 seconds into the match, it freezes. I've dropped from 3540 trophies to 2190. And I know it's not my device. I've tried multiple devices like the LG v20 but I'm still getting this bug. Please fix it so I (and many others) can go back and playing the game we play and love.

Used to be very addicting making decks and using them. However, after gaining a certain amount of trophies, you reach a point where your cards are 2-4 levels below everyone else's, so you constantly lose. You aren't rewarded with gold to level up your troops if you lose, and you can't drop trophies (to play people at your level) if you lose either, so you're stuck. Then it becomes a grind to get wins and gold to level up your cards. When you reach this point the game isn't fun anymore.

I've played the game for a very long time and can say without a doubt, it's been fun. Unfortunately with the recent update with "pass royale", it became clear to me what direction supercell has decided to take. The new update has left tons of bugs and introduced a 6 dollar super boost to instantly decrease the time it takes to get Legendaries and the sort, oppose to having to earn them through heard work and motivation. I can say that this game has passed it's peak, don't bother installing.

The game has become EXTREMELY sticky since the July update of 2019. By which u mean it will lag in the middle of matches, on the menu screen, when I'm trying to change from the store tab to the deck tab, not to mention the incredibly long wait times for the app to launch. I also get tossed into the middle of games when I'm trying to start one, and 1 if not both of my crown towers is already destroyed. I've been playing for 3 years, and clearing space won't work. Like if this is happening to you!

It's hard to play if you're a F2P player because there is a lot of Pay to win players and clash royale keeps offering an unfair advantage for them, it's so hard to keep up with anyone when you're in a higher tier and don't want to spend some cash

I love playing Royale when it will load. Sometimes it tries to load and goes into a loop of loading and restarting. It will load to 50%; then it will go back to the supercell screen. Wash rinse repeat. Frustrating. I quit playing for a while. Came back to the game. Similar problems. The game is lots of fun but it will freeze in the middle of the match.

The game has a good concept, but it seems unbalanced which makes it so incredibly frustrating to the point where playing more just seems pointless, throughout your progress, you're constantly matched with people (most likely AI) that have higher card levels, which in turn slows your progress even more. Of course, if you're willing to pour money into it, you can level up and get the OP cards.
Incredibly disappointed in hero update. makes games unplayable through a paywall.

Used to be a huge fan of the game but now I feel like they have tried to make everyone happy and have rigged the game in the process. (Update) It seems that party mode is gone. For those unfamiliar with the game, that's the mode that you can 2v2 with friends and gain chests without losing trophies. Also matching should not be based on trophies alone but instead use both trophies and average card level

Incredibly good, interesting, fun and balanced game but the company has become increasingly greedier. The most recent update gutted the progression for casual players, forcing them to play the main competitive mode if they want any rewards at all for playing. Along with the same update reducing rewards from the battle pass and challenges, makes for a very poor experience. I would absolutely recommend playing this a year ago, but now I would recomend staying away from it.

The game was killed by the update. The update ruined the fun aspect(s) of the game; 2v2. You no longer earn chests OR crowns from anywhere but ladder. Lower level players can now unlock champions as well, and it's locked behind a pay wall, giving paying players a huge advantage. The pass also costs $1 more and gives less, while having an option that gives the same as the old pass, but for $12. A $7 increase!

Fast, fun, and competitive game play. Easy to get hooked once you give it a try, but then there are the downsides. The lag in matches have gotten a lot worst, you can load into a match late at no fault of your own; have an up to date device, a strong stable Wi-Fi, and enough free memory will not save you from it. For a game that supposed to be competitive, how can you market this for an esport when you can load in 10sec or more late?

The game is a total time killer. It's fun and has great game play with no delay or bugs or any of those stuff. The game is practically perfect except for the fact that you have to wait 3 Hours if not more for a better chest. Even when I'm full, I play cause it's that addicting but I'm not making any progress. Getting higher in trophies but not having the troops for it. I don't want to wait 3 Hours to play one match that makes the addiction characteristic part of the game useless

Update:. Broken! I keep getting a pop up that says "ERROR!  Client and server are out of sync!" The only option is to reload which doesn't fix. I tried to uninstall and reinstall but still broken. Nothing in the help and support page about this and no way to ask a question there. Will update when fixed or I receive a reply.    This is a great game. It's fun and really engaging.  My only complaint is that the notifications are broken.  I often get notifications that say a certain chest is unlocked when nothing is ready or the wrong chest type.

It was decent during my 2.5 years of play, but I can clearly see some issues. Don't get me wrong, the seasons are great, with magic items making upgrading easier, the game seems to be good. However, going on ladder is practically impossible as the matchmaking is still fairly rigged. The game is good, until you find a dilemma like mine. Also increase the rewards of chests, they hold basically zero gold, a massive currency needed to upgrade all the expenses

Good at first, looks like it had great potential, however it falls short for a multitude of reasons that I cannot fit in this review sadly. Don't spend money on it, I made that mistake with a single $10 purchase to try to get back into it, because when I had fun; it was amazing. However what really did it in for me was the lack of variety this game has; EVERY PLAYER without fail uses the same deck, so it is literally the same battle everytime you play. Thats just one thing wish could share more.

The game is amazing, real-time strategy battle one of the bests. But I like 
to suggest one thing, hear me out. When the internet connection times out 
instead of kicking the player out and just letting the battle continue, can 
you just automatically pause the game for 5 seconds to give time for the 
reconnection. If 5 seconds passed and the player didn't reconnect then 
automatically resume the game.

Yea I have to agree this thing becomes rigged and almost unplayable when you get to the league arenas if you're not paying out of pocket for upgrades. Matches are so uneven ( lvl 9 vs lvl 13 max). Then they toss in a freebie here and there for you to win. Literally the other player doesn't even attack at all. So weird. Started off as something great though but just have to let go when start to see what's going on..shame.

It was a decent game but recent updates made the gameplay more grind-ish and annoying overall, with several heavy penalizations to the players' progress both for pay-to-win and, specially, free-to-play ones. It is clear that the care that was put to get the game where it is is long gone and is no longer worth playing unless you want to spend a good chunk of money to get somewhere in a reasonable amount of time. Would recommend it two years ago, but now I honestly can no longer do that.

Just uninstalled the app, there's something wrong with the algorythm. Sometimes when you use the characters, instead of taking the left they take the right. You may be winning and all of a sudden the character goes the wrong path. Other times it doesnt matter what you do, even having cards with a higher level the opponent defeats you, or takes time for the character to show up having full elixir.

The game is great. A great strategy game that you have to have a chess mind for. Also the challenges and team games are fun. There is a bit of pay to win elements though. Also I have uninstalled a couple of times because of the game changing my cards. It is rare but it is frustrating during matches. Other than that the game is pretty good. If the pay to play and glitches were smoothed out then I would give 5 stars.

I like the game so much not until when Im getting a winning streak, the opponent will get stronger, like my tower is just level 10 and most of my opponents are in level 11 and 12, sometimes it's level 13 towers. In addition, I have a good internet connection then suddenly the game will slow down, lagging the game and opponents winning. Kindly fix this..and those hackers. Thanks!

At this point, clash Royale has become a pay to win game. I loved this game so much because it was truly one of a kind. But now, with evolutions, wild cards etc it's extremely hard to farm gold and gems and waiting to get them takes too long. With crazy prices for deals in the shop really not many ppl can afford to call this game "casual" anymore. Game used to be a stress reliever for me, but every time I play chances are 2 out of 4 times I am matched with a maxed out player with 2 evolutions.

Update*: Now the connection is stable and very good to play, rarely drops connection. -- In the past was very good, but now I don't now what happened, the connection to start the battle freeze in the loading area, and when enter in the game is already over(Is frustrating lose the war battle in this way, I've played 3 battles collecting card before for nothing ) my internet is very good and this isn't the problem

The game is no doubt good. There's a lot of possibilities when it comes to future development. Mechanics, features and all (elemental advantages, spell defense, structure-unit interaction) . Things I wish were better: I hate that teammates can bail out on you in a 2v2. Consecutive games like that can get frustrating. I also wish there were more communication options. Strategizing messages, co-op, etc. Personally I even want a message for when teammates leave matches. Also crown tower growth 😬

The game is pretty straight forward and would be a lot of fun if it wasn't a pay to win game. Unless you drop loads of cash to max out your cards, you'll get stuck in middling levels forever. Which means no new cards for a very long time. Events would be a cool alternative but that gets expensive too if you ever want to win there. And the 2v2? It's horribly random.

The levelling system is garbage at higher levels. The gameplay in the beginning is great, but at later arenas, it gets so hard to find people your level, but instead, they hand you people level 11 and 10 despite you being level 9. And BTW, you level up by leveling up cards, so you know they're cards are way stronger. I'd be fine if the fights were with equal level players, but I'd rather not play if I get in multiple fights in a row against high level people that I know I can't beat.

Good game but the way how they manage updates and introduce new features were horrible.1. There were too many bugs. At least one disconnection around 15 battles. I had to quickly close and re-enter the game to salvage it mostly ended in a lost. 2. Wanted to sent message to supercell by last time they didnt bother to respond so there is no need for me to do that. 3. Slow compare to the first year of release. Slow load, slow game play. Slow in fixing bugs. Sometimes spawning takes 2 to 3 secs.....

Used to enjoy the game, but got really frustrated with the constant push to buy passes. It became nearly impossible to grind out upgrades. The menus are so confusing, there is so much happening, as a casual gamer, it makes it extremely difficult to just log in play a few games and then wait for chests. It seems if you are not on this game all the time, you are missing out on so much. It is like going on holiday during peak times, still enjoyable but you need a holiday once you return. Exhausting

Fun game to play but every now and then some problems pop up that wont go away. Game keeps getting stuck while opening chests. Game abruptly restarts during intense matches at times. Some buildings lag when putting it into position even a half second lag can net you a loss. One major problems is the teammates the game "randomly chooses" I can lose 20 matches in a row while playing with a game selected teammate and can only seem to break the streak when I play 1vs1. This happens all the time.

The game is quick and fun, you need to use strategy and you'll battle many different kinds of people. I wish the company would upgrade their servers tho, because sometimes you get disconnected in the middle of a battle. Sometimes it's only once, other times it's incessant. Currently, the game won't open properly. When trying to login, the game informs me that there's an update and brings me to play store, but there's no update to install. I tried the uninstall/ reinstall method, same thing.

Was originally a five star a couple years ago, now, as everyone states, it is severely a pay to win deal. I get when some skill can come into play, but now it is simply just pay to wins and bad luck. I don't mind when money is spent on a game, but don't make it to where it ruins the experience for everyone. Most of the time I am always countered by cards that are higher leveled than me, and not by a small amount mind you, by a few levels and "stars" at that.

Still fun, but used to be a lot more simple and straightforward... they keep demotivating the long time players by making it easier and easier to obtain stuff. We spent the time building up to what we have, and it feels so unfair that the new players just can come in and collect gold and level up their decks in such short time. The game felt more fair prior in this regard.

Addictive and fun, sometimes it can seem rigged, but the fan base is huge and for that they have a very active staff constantly changing the game to balance power and fix any issues that may pop up. there are tons of YouTube videos as well. I've had this game for 2 years now with no plans on uninstalling, and I've barely put any cash into it whatsoever yet I'm a single level/arena away from the world tournaments. it's just a great strategy game.

I started playing again after a long time since I got busy with college. When I tried to update my game it just gets stuck halfway (in game update) and after a while I get prompted to restart the game. This issue is stuck in a loop and I tried to clear cache and data, as well as reinstalling the game (twice!) Even as I start making this review I encounter a ton of other reviews about Clash Royale becoming a P2W game. I'm suddenly unsure if I want to play this game again.

The game is awesome! I've been following it and waiting for it to release ever since Supercell did a beta of it. It's awesome, and easy to learn! (Edit); Although the game isn't necessarily "Pay 2 Win", it's definitely like Clash of Clans, in the sense that it's "Pay 2 Progress (Faster)". You can easily play the game without paying a single cent and get to the higher arena levels, but it'll most likely take a long time. The game also has /slight/ balancing issues, but supercell tries to resolve t

It's funny for a while. However, if you want to get serious it becomes an annoying money grab. The game seems to intentionally put you against maxed/over leveled players and expects you to be able to win. The concept is nice but the environment made the game not fun! Eventually the game became not worth the time or grind! Play the game knowing it'll be fun in the beginning, but you'll have to invest heavy or you won't be able to go against other people you face!

Fun while it lasted but it feels annoying and complicated trying to get back to playing... They realized how long it took to level up and now there's a bunch of systems and nonsense hoops to go through, I literally uninstalled it instead since I am not trying to learn new systems or prize tracks. Gamers just want to play and stay at the top, why so much need for new systems, money?! Nostalgia turned to annoyance, I respect that it was once really fun so I couldn't leave it at one star.

I love the game and there is always something to do but I feel I've lost the insetive to play. Mainly because progression has slowed down at you get closer to max and the level curve is an issue. But the game is great. Personally the biggest issue is replay ability, the core game play of ladder is stale. And the progression. Attempting to funnel resources to your fav one deck is difficult,time consuming, feels like an impossible task and detrimental to other modes like clan wars.

Encompassing strategy, player wit, and utilization of over 96 playable cards and millions of deck creation opportunity, the game opens up many options and holds very little restriction to what agency the player can have, despite meta decks being a problem or the occassional balancing issue, but is to be expected. Although the game can be won without the use of in-game purchases, it will take more chances than not to make you want to with special chests, gold, and gems, but gameplay is managable.

Used to love this game, and played it a ton and had fond memories. But over the years monetization and unnecessary, money driven changes grew and grew, and have culminated in the past months being despicable when it comes to free vs paid experiences. Do yourself a big favor and steer wide clear of this game in the modern era. It's only going downhill.

It could definiteley be a good game if it didn't stop and close itself every three seconds and if instead of constantly saying there is no signal when I get three bars with LTE and also when I go and play a 2v2 it closes and when I go and open it up again it loads up to 50% and re-loads without fail every time not allowing me to even enter the game. Not too much has changed since I played it a while ago in terms of connection.

The game has seemed to take a turn for the worse. I deal with so much latency (mainly during the challenges and war) that it makes it extremely difficult staying competitive. Most of the time is like the elixer never comes while the opponent drops and endless barrage of troops. Then the get speeds up and I'm dead all before I can drop a single card. It was fun while it lasted.

Everything is great. I love this game. It has evolved so much than before. Just one issue though. For some reason, the tips that are shown at the matchmaking screen are not completely visible. They are so far down the screen that their cut in half and i can't even read them. I wish i could put screenshots here but i can. But otherwise this game is good

Dev team could really step it up a bit more in update frequency. They still need to fix problems in the game such as trading, which is slow to update. These 'offers' suck now. Otherwise the game is complex in strategy yet simple enough for the average user to pick up and progress quickly. At first that is, once you get to a certain level you'll be grinding for years unless you pay hundreds of dollars.

The game has been moving from skill based to pay to play. You're pretty limited in your progression until you start to spend money. For example, the 5 dollar monthly subscription which gives you double the awards and more than double the value of what you would usually earn progressing freely. It is a great game overall and I'm a few years in veteran

Fun game.Addictive.Takes long time to level up. Edit: After 4 years I have to say the game is now trash. After you get to the high ranks it can take months to upgrade a card. Everyone you play literally just waits until you play so they can set up a perfect combo that you cant counter. Then you wait 30 seconds and they do it again. Also the progression stops. Once you get to 5000 trophies everyone has max level cards and if you go on a win streak, you will go on a lose streak. Negative trophies

I've played all the clash games for a couple of years, this one is the most unstable and frustrating to play. Constant freezes and crashes during play. Once they banned me for an hour because they thought I was leaving the game intentionally. Ive rebooted phone and WiFi router, hasn't helped. Finally uninstalled and reinstalled game, waiting to see what happens. Decided to leave review for others. I like the game but if this reinstall doesn't work it's gone. I don't have these issues with boom Beach or clash of clans.

The whole point of this game is to get people to spend money. It's only enjoyable if you have maxed out meta cards, and even then, the matching algorithm makes you lose enough to never truly climb until you've pumped some more money in. My advice: like all addictions, you'll wish you wouldn't have started. It's fun at first but when you get good at it, it'll get the better of you.

Pay for play, just stay away! Used to be fun but they constantly tweak it and have ruined the experience. Older cards are weakened (mega knight) and newer cards are too powerful (electro giant). Plays extremely slow at times where your opponent will be able to play cards more quickly putting you at a significant disadvantage. If you don't spend $ on it you'll be ok, if you do it will be a complete waste as whatever you invest in will be tweaked until it's useless causing you to spend more.

It is a very fun game from the start... Then you get to higher arenas and it just becomes this pay to win system where skill doesn't even matter and it's just about having high levels and all of the new cards on release, it's a shame really, and now they added pass Royale to even further the pay to win aspect of the game. Once you get 5k trophies just stop playing unless you want to spend money.

This game is so much fun, one of the most addictive games I've played on a phone, or even in general. Unfortunately, as many reviews have stated it takes WAY too long to open up the chests, however I don't agree with people when they say that ruins the game, you can always still earn trophies/achievements even when your chest slots are full. And when it is I play just to earn them and improve my skill level and find the right team combinations. I also expirence connection problems I would say about 30%

Rigged matchmaking and pay-to-win biased. At first, the game looks balanced and fine, but the more you progress on the ladder, the more difficult it gets. Not because of players and cards, but because matchmaking is unfair - either the game puts you against a player that is 2 level higher than you or against someone who has season pass and clearly has an advantage. I really like this game, I've played for more than 3 years, but now I've decided to stop playing definitively. The game algorithm is so deceptive that when you're on a loosing streak it doesn't matter how many decks you switch, how many legendary and combos you use, and how much time you spent without playing it, you'll always face someone with a deck that's perfect for neutralizing yours. There comes a point you realise it's designed to make you lose more than win. To make you feel frustrated in order to trigger you to buy season pass and all the pay-to-win nonsense. I've never spent a penny on this, and I wish more people did the same and boycott. It gets worse year after year. 3/5

It was great at first. I really enjoyed the game and quickly rose up the ladder. It was exciting and fun, for a time. Once I reached max level I started to really struggle to level up my cards and it has become worse with more cards and the same little rewards. I didnt see it much when I was lower level and lower on the ladder, but they really emphasize the spend money to stay competitive feature. I cant fault them, it is a business at the end of the day, but it killed my fun.

It is very painful that I open the application and let me play "normal" 4 or 5 games, after those games it starts to go slow and bug at the start of the game the screen does not work and the troops on the contrary they begin to move in fast motion and in one demolish my towers without allowing me to attack. and not only that, there are times when the screen freezes for minutes and when defrosting, I'm back on the menu of the app, losing 20-30 trophies or bug and make my phone reboot alone.

I've been playing this regularly for a few years. It's been great to take a break from work, have a few battles, help the clan etc... except it's progressively become pay to win, and the evolution cards have taken away almost all the fun. You can be having a good, well balanced battle... then the evolution kicks in and there's no point any more. Oh well, perhaps it was time to move on anyway, so am uninstalling. Thanks for the good games, back in the day...

I wish they didn't have to "even" up the leveling system in the cards. i was so hype to keep track of my card levels and show them off to friends, but now, all of my friends and I have no use in trying to compete now. But anyways, very good game, very fun and addicting. The challenges and tournaments need a fix on matchmaking. I end up facing higher levels than me. This gives them an advantage in card placing, card leveling, and all that. I think it's unfair whenever I lose to level 12 or 13 .

Ok, after 2 years playing I spent like 10 bucks and I know aint much for you but for me its a lot. My game is glitching after the update, sometimes game freezes and suddenly goes on, but some units start to look like a black square and it glitches the game. I am also having trouble sometimes accessing the shop, sometimes it even crashes my game. I just want to play and enjoy what I spent, please help.

Game was good and now it's frustrating. It matches you with higher levels than you. I'm a level 11 and it's always matching me up with level 13. Towers have more hp, troops are all maxed out. Nothing I can do to beat them. Been on a losing streak cause of it. This takes the fun out of this game and it's becoming dumb! I spend money in the game and for what? To keep losing. Supercell needs to fix the match making. Even if it goes by trophy level, they should make it go by tower level not trophies

Constant crashes piss me off to no end, I shouldn't have to buy a new phone just so I can play a game (and it worked well before, so why the problems now?). 4 out of 5 times I lose because I get kicked out, have to log in again, or the game freezes. As if those weren't bad enough, the supposedly existing confirmation step didn't come when I accidentally entered a challenge with a 100 gems... The unfairness is just another problem, you have to purchase stuff if you want to advance...

The game's great but the battles are almost always against someone who's at least 3 levels ahead of me... I see that players are matched based on their trophies, but when you're resetting the trophies of all players to 4000 at season ends, it's a tough fight for people who just entered 4k trophies and easy win for those who have been playing it for so long. Both the players tend to lose interest. Try matching up players based on levels instead of trophies may be...!?

I wanted to like this game. Believe me, I really did. But it's a bit hard to like it when the algorithm sets you up for failure. I always get matched with people that always seem to have exact counters to all the cards I have. I would've passed it off as chance encounters, but this has consistently happened to me in the last 20 matches I've played, most of which I've lost. It's very demotivating to lose so many times in a row, which is why I'm uninstalling. Supercell needs to fix this.

Terrible experience since past 2 days. My internet is top speed , every video, every app works flawlessly. But this game just loses connection every now and then and then just basically hangs. It takes pressing hardware buttons on the phone to make the app go to the background somehow so it can be terminated. Even hangs on simply starting up some times. I'm losing so many trophies just because the game thought I was offline.

It's a fun game, but it constantly crashes after a few matches. All the solutions seem to point towards user side error but I don't want to force my phone to give a game more ram. Honestly, instead of making the player fix the issue, why can't y'all just update the game to fix it? Furthermore, when I do re-enter the game mid match, it freezes on the google play account popup and makes it impossible to counter the enemy.

I've been playing this game for years, and I leave this game for years. I want to play this game because of it's strategy, I don't want to play this game because of it's development system. The way to upgrade your cards is too hard, and the tower lvl also necessary. The game is good if ur cards are full, but the problem: To upgrade everything full almost impossible. The time what necessary is too much. I think the game needs to get easier.

3 years on from my original review, Supercell has been proactive with maintaining interest in the game. But with the introduction of the paid events, as well as the introduction of party mode, mismatches seem to be occurring more frequently. Continued balance changes are good for longevity, but it would be good to see a revisit on the matchmaking algorithms.

Good game I guess but, now that level 14 is here. It's hard to level up and get to a next level when you'll randomly get matched with a guy 4 levels above you or more. And I don't know what to do about this but, sometimes I'll start a match and then the person your fighting has there cards boosted with speed. I don't know if anyone else has had this problem, but please fix it. As of now in my opinion the game is unbalanced. Please fix this as fast you can and I'll change my rating.

I've been playing this game for years now, since it came out. and I would give it a 5 star but the game have some flaws that are very annoying, for example occasionally I would be playing against someone (whether I'm on the wifi or data) and I would start getting a disconnect icon which should mean the game should pause, right? well you are wrong. the enemy will continue spamming troops meanwhile you cant do anything but watch the enemy destroy your side. I've lost over 300 trophies today alone.

Addicting and infuriating, the matchmaking has been heavily critized and I respect that, but my issue is that the game so far has experienced not one, not two but numerous crashes during or at the end of a match and its either the game itself or the internet connection but its never been this often that this happens. I've played the game since launch and it still holds up as a fun game but jeez too many crashes

Fun, but ever since season three the first match I play when I open the app takes about 30 seconds to load, and in real matches I would have already lost by them so I need to always need to start a training mode match. Also, ever since season three, the Audio turned TERRIBLE. It's All skipy with parts of it coming in and out. Like it's muting and unmuting really fact. It generally is really annoying. I doubt these problems will be fixed though because they probably aren't common

It's difficult but not impossible if you don't pay for their BS. No kind of match making and now with their card evolutions monsters having added effects? blatant pay to win for streamers and whales. It was an unnecessary add on.

The game is a lot different than it used to be. They just keep adding more and more new garbage so they can justify raising the prices on things and making more things cost money. Odds are if you don't spend money to buy whatever new evolution or champion there is, you'll get beaten by a person who has. It feels like the developers are entirely disconnected from what players want. Evolution was a totally unnecessary concept to begin with. Fun as a beginner but playing high level is total hell.

DON'T install it. The app crashes, there's lag, connection breakdowns, player matches way below and above our gamer's skills. Lately, you sometimes can't place your card onto the field which leads to a lost battle. Oh, not to mention when your opponent starts before you! Why am I still playing it? Because I've played for 3 years and I'll wait for a change.

I used to play it a lot more a couple of years ago, the problem imo is that at a certain point after clearing the "normal" arenas, it gets really hard to stay competitive. The best decks in meta change a lot and it is almost impossible to get all cards maxed out without paying money which is why you have to stick with one or two decks. This leads to you not being able to compete once these decks aren't as good anymore.

This used to be one of my favorite mobile games. It was incredibly fun but still challenging in a fairly balanced way. I feel though the game is still mostly well designed, Supercell's failure (or just plain indifference) in solving key issues with the game such as matchmaking and ridiculously high ingame and real money prices for lackluster rewards has lowered its fun factor and raised the frustration level to make the game less enjoyable to play.

This is one of the best multiplayer games. And it needs brain too. Tactical. Nice graphics and features. News Royale is also up to date and interesting. And the best part is it loads quickly. No lags. Moderate crashes. It also consumes very less internet traffic. Edit: It is taking too long to load the game. And it's not a network problem as other online games work just fine. I have a decent 4G internet. Please fix this ASAP. Quality > Quantity. You should ramp up Quality Checking a bit.😇

I love the game, get to play it with my little brother, but for the 3rd time now it has completely just shut down on my phone. I'll be able to play it for a few weeks, and then one day I'll get on and it wont load, and it gives a connection lost error message, and it just refuses to work. So I have to delete and redownload, and even that doesn't work sometimes... great game but it definitely needs some work.

I loved this game, I downloaded it as soon as it came out. After time I uninstalled because I had no time to play. I re-downloaded it to play and see how fun it is. I played and won a few games in a row, but then only got paired up against people with maximum troops and level. Terrible matchmaking, game does not reward skill, Trash, and should probably should just shut down servers.

So it has now been two weeks and super cell still hasn't made right their bug that caused me to lose my weekly bonus. I provided screen shots of the issue to a rep when it initially happened, have followed up a couple times but no one has been able to give me anything for the chests /weekly bonus that was lost. Just keep responding that oh we are working on it.

This used to be, hands down my favorite game to play, i would spend hours a day climbing trophies or practicing new decks. i have played since beta and continued to play for 3 full years. I have gradually stopped playing as much since the game takes forever to progress when you only have epics and legendary cards to upgrade, and they don't update the game as much as  they used to. 2 years ago every update had at 4 cards released, now we get a new card every few months. The game just doesn't feel the same. Still love the dev team and the game as a whole, it's just doesnt at all feel like it used to.

I play this game for a long period off time.. On the top levels you need to buy to be able to survive the levels. The game is not really fare.. 2 levels difference when u battle (level 8 with level 10).. Towers different powers, characters different levels. I quit playing it start to be very annoying game now. To become a top player you need to add seriously cash into. Notting new added every day and week same ans same..

I love this game. This I a suggestion: the game can get a little boring sometimes, so something you could add to make it more fun is adding a button for random deck or pick a category(air, buildings, melee, etc) and not know which cards you bring into the next battle. This would be especially fun for friendly battles, where trophies don't matter!

When I first started playing this game I loved it. It's so fun. But then their matching system became very corrupt. how long it's been that way, I'm not entirely positive. after noticing a losing streak trend that had weird things happening I started reading gaming forums for answers. They have a "losing pool" (fixed losing) that you get stuck in and can't get out for 15 or 20 games. It's been said they do it to even out the winners but I it's dishonest to the players. It's killing this game.

I've played this game since launch. I got up to player lvl 10. This game is great early, a lot of fun, but once you get into the upper leagues be prepared to waste lots and lots of time. I've played this game for an hour straight and gotten 75 to 80% draws. You get constantly bombarded with annoying emotes. This game has a lot of great potential to be great but there's just too many infuriating aspects making it unplayable after you get so far.

If you happen to be one of the lucky few who haven't layed this game, don't bother. The game has evolved over time from a simple and fun spin-off game to an absolute pay to play nightmare. When you first start the game, the in-game shop is small, no battle pass available, etc. However, as you progress, the game seems match you up with decks that 'conveniently' counter your deck, while the shop gets bigger and bigger. I've seen as many as 20+ purchase options at once, totaling in the hundreds.

These new updates makes the game much more unbearable. I don't need to play triple draft for a whole season - I sometimes skip those fights altogether because it takes a lot of time and it's more based on luck of the draw than real skill and strategy. Those already maxed out at trophy road would feel this much more since there's no way to go but down from there. With all these changes, I really question why I play anymore

The game was fine until the discovery of 2v2 battles in challenge modes. I don't get to select the partner of my choice, and then I get one who either leaves the game or isn't as skilled as I am. This problem should be fixed as soon as possible as it makes no sense at all. I waste like 100 gems for the challenge by playing it again and what I get in return is nothing.

Absolutely addicted (idk if that's a good or a bad thing) but it's pay to win for sure. I painstakingly save up the minimal resources I get to upgrade without paying. I paid for the month pass ONE TIME and made more progress in one month than I had in over a year otherwise. Also the addition of a firecracker evolution has almost broken the game. Probably 95% of the decks I play against use that card. And here I thought the goal of the game was to make a balanced experience. Joke's on me.

Playing since beginning. Fun and addictive gameplay stopped me from not playing. Love it. Edit-1: Experiencing improper scaling issue after the recent update. Also, 2v2 matchmaking taking forever making it unable to find a match. Edit-2: After 7 years of playing, I no longer think this game deserves my attention because of their anti F2P campaign they've started recently. Bad updates one after another makes this game not fun anymore. I guess we can call it the "Tencent effect".

I enjoy the game but find it annoying that I'm in the legendary aurena where I face people who are stacked with legendarys and I can't get a single one. It's not balanced... edit.... with the new updates. There are moments with such huge lags in the game, it can cause a huge turn of events that can cause you to lose. edit: After all the updates, I feel that supercell has done a good job to keep the game balanced and continues progression.

Used to be a fun game now it's just frustrating. If you don't spend money, good luck. I spend a little but I'm not going to spend the amount required to level up quick, continue tournaments, or buy the Passes every month. Lots of new additions where if you don't buy upgrades you will get slautered. My biggest complaint is the App crashing in the middle of a game, sometimes multiple times. Half of my losses are do to the game crashing. Very frustrating.

Ever since the last update it takes forever to find opponents, I usually hit cancel because the system takes forever to search. Then I'm usually matched up against opponents that are a few levels higher than me. Also, when I go to drop troops it sometimes takes 3 or more seconds for them to actually drop. If I could give this game negative stars, I would!

This game is fun to play however it seems at times that the game gets laggy and you can't play troops at the beginning resulting in losing a tower right off the bat. Countless times the game has stopped working in the middle of a match causing me to log back in only to find the game over. Also multiple times I have gone on "losing streaks" which seem a little too convenient,  sometimes 13 consecutive.  It is very frustrating when you play these games for fun and invest money that it can make you sooo mad.

Been playing for 6+ years and really enjoyed the game. Its now unplayable. Game crashes multiple times per match. Sometimes I can't even open the app without it crashing 10 times in a row. You would think with all the obnoxious cash grab concepts creeping into the game, that they would have the money to fix these bugs. Huge disappointment from a game I really loved

This is an awesome game but there is a massive bug that I'm not happy with.... I have come along way in the game, and I unlocked the Arena 2, then when I clicked battle, it wouldn't work, I was searching for opponents for 10 minutes and nothing would come up, then I pressed cancel and it did nothing! Fix this! Email me when u get this comment, thanks! <3

The concept of playing units/buildings in real time is very interesting. However, the development team seemed to have gotten comfortable with the game. Out of the three years I played there has only been a handful of sporatic content update and most of them do as much harm as they do good. The balance system is neglected , the rewards are meh, the progression is slow, the UI degrades over time, and the dev communication gets worse and worse. I'm out of words but essentially get out while you can

Good game. the people who complain about the algorithms, it goes off of trophies, not your own personal level. So if you gain enough trophies to play with a king tower higher than yours, good for you. Yes, people advance faster when they spend money, but you don't need to spend money to advance. I have played this game for years on and off, and am almost at a level 13 king tower and have plenty of level 13 cards without spending a dime Anyone who says that they need to spend money is impatient

This can be a really fun game. Until you constantly lose and get matched up with people 2 levels above you. Nothing like losing 8 games in a row at a high level, then being ahead and losing connection. 3. Matches. In. A. Row. The game can be really fun when it works right, but the matchup system is really unfair, and the connection errors half way through a game are infuriating. Still gets 3 stars from me, so you know I like it when it is fair.

I've been playing this game for a few years now and have been through many of the changes and updates. Some I thought were great, while others missed the mark. Clash Royale offers a pay-for-progress, but that doesn't necessarily mean victory. Players that choose to play for free are still capable of achieving the same end goals as players that pay, albeit at a much slower pace. In individual matches, both the free and pay-for-play players are effectively on a balanced playing field creating a thrilling and competitive environment.
