I was a free player and over the course of the previous few years, have been slowly progressing up the ladder and upgrading my cards to remain competitive at the higher levels. Understandably, as you get closer to the top, progress slows down considerably, but doesn't stop completely. For a free player like myself, it's annoying but manageable. Enter update December 2018. Supercell unveiled a number of changes that seem to target their paying customers (I don't fault them, just an observation). However, a side effect is my already slow progress has slowed even further. Combined with the almost monotonous gameplay (facing streaks with multiple different opponents that are all rocking the same exact deck) that I've experienced for the last 9-12 months, it is a little too much for me. It's been fun, but I've reached my natural end game and it's time for me to walk away.

this was my favourite game but i don't like it anymore. it's laggy, there's way too much bugs. it disconnects in the middle of a battle. for being one of the biggest games, i was expecting there to be less bugs. it's pretty much pay to win, i've also heard if you try to drop trophies, you get stuck with other trophy droppers and it's annoying.

Really well made game. The card that are not newly added are well balanced, the game modes are fun, and if you can find good combinations of cards, then you're unstoppable (well, for a while :) ) and you have a way to play it completely free. The main problems are usually the newly added cards being overpowered and at the season end, the game becomes rather unstable. Note that though this game needs a huge cache that can easily go past 1 gb size, so you need to watch your storage space.

In terms of gameplay and graphics, it's amazing. Very addicting and what not. However, gave it at 3 because once you hit level 8 and up, it is IMPOSSIBLE to compete fairly without being forced to spend money to even get a fair game in. You will never unlock all the cards or be able to compete at a high level without spending money. I refuse to drop a dime on this game for principle.

This should be a good game. But, it IS pay to win. Beyond the first levels, there is NO WAY to advance without paying. And then only a little. The more you pay, the higher you go. Otherwise, you run in place. Advance and you face two or three levels above, like a primary school team vs college or pro. No way to win Pay and you get higher level. Lose a few, you face lower - too easy. Also, it's a bit rock-paper-scissors. Other guy's cards are unstoppable or a walk over, but can't change mid game

I enjoy playing the game but have gotten a virus or something that keeps knocking me off line every time I enter a battle. I like the weekend battles if I could only stay on long enough to actually battle & lags in response time. Happened for several months now. I have tried virus scans on my phone. Nothing found. Never had this issue before; just after the last major game update. I don't want to have to uninstall but only other thing I can think of trying. Sincerely frustrated.

I have played this game for years hoping that it would improve. It has not. The match making algorithm has you climbing trophies to get close to 'rewards' then changes to make u drop all of the trophies and more. This happens on an hourly basis going up and down on the same but never making any progress. The matching making also seems to match u up with either player/bots that have no idea what they are doing or perfect counters either way waste of time playing this.

I left the game a year ago after playing for 3 years because it became unbalanced and really hard to have fun. I returned a few weeks ago because I hoped it had changed. It hasn't. At its core this is a great game. Fun, slick and easy to play free or paid. It has a great community too. The problem is some card combos just ruin the experience. I made it to challenger level and king level 13 and it doesn't change. Skill isn't rewarded as much as just playing the overpowered cards and winning.

The recent update killed free to play progression and took away a large part of the game's charm by removing chests. Edit: ok THIS recent upgrade left the f2p progression dead in a ditch and removed any semblance of the game that once was. shame.

The matchmaking algorithm is unfair, dishonest and manipulated. I've been playing about 3 years and I'd say there's some sort of "winning score" for each player based on his skills and other variables and you'll be matched with opponents with higher "winning score" most of the times if you don't pay, especially in a challenge mode. Lots of times I've won for about 6 or 7 matches and lose for 3 times in a row when I spend gems to replay. Most probably my opponents have just started participating.

Fun, well designed game. The issue I have with the game is the need to pay for stuff to unlock any of the decent characters. I understand the need to make money, but I haven't unlocked any legendary characters and I refuse to pay for it. It unlevels the playing field when I'm playing against someone and they paid to unlock and upgrade all their characters

The game has become laggy. I lost so many matches because of weird laggy animations especially in case of golden knight. Its movement is very unpredictable. Its just straight up annoying. Also the game has become slow after the updates. even if you have a good internet it still shows that wifi icon in the middle. Haven't had these kind of issues in while. I'm taking a break from this game. Hopefully these issues will get fixed till then

It's a unique game with a great number of characters to choose from, gameplay is fun, special modes are cool and such. But one huge problem with the game is that, when I get into a game, the other player is 2 or 3 levels higher than me. But not only that they have high leveled cards (some gold) and they just spit out 4 and 5 elixir cards out of no where. This game is unfair and really unfortunate.

Clash Royale is one of the best games on mobile; polished, competitive, accessible. The most recent update made some great progress forward. Unfortunately, instead of only requiring one person per trade to have a trade token... It now takes both players. Trade tokens were rare to start with. Now, it's even rarer to participate in trades. I think this is more frustrating because it seems like a step backward, promoting more money spent for something that used to be really neat and mostly free.

If you have an IQ above 80, this game will make you want to punch a hole in the wall. The matchmaking algorithm is so insanely horrible. You basically win a bunch of games in a row and start to play other people who are 2 levels higher than you with max lvl cards. It's essentially pointless to play them because they 3 tower you without even trying. When you hit this ceiling you have two options; you can play out 10 losing games in a row and get pissed, or you can press "battle" and close the app

the game concept is fun, the new changes are great, the gameplay is worse than ever; there has been an excuse given, that it must be network related. while a cell tower can trunk out/be full, I've played at off hours and experienced this same issue. it's not a memory issue, I've over 10 GB of storage unused; I've tried clearing caches, the data, uninstall/re-in, but it's not making any difference, even on full LTE bars. This points to the servers or game to me, but i can't give 4 or 5 stars yet.

Everything is very expensive here. New cards take 40,000 coins to unlock, but you only get 44 coins per win. The chests don't give you much, either. Also, it takes a long time for chests to unlock. In battles, it is often that your opponent(s) are one or even more levels above you, which can be very annoying. Sometimes, your opponent is unloading cards while you are still going through preparations. Otherwise, a very good game to kill time.

Overall, it's a great real time strategy game with variety of card combos to choose in defeating your opponents. But the major downside is the 'cancel' option which doesn't quite work, especially keeping you locked in a searching for players screen till the app resets. The game's mostly about upgrading for the most part since being at tower level 1 restricts play to just the features of Battle & Party. Joining a clan is moot because you can't donate as a level 1 player. Great time-killer though.

i'm really not sure what they're going for at this point. It's certainly no longer fun. I want to like it, I've installed + uninstalled about a dozen times the past couple years, but this'll be my last. I just can't. Balance is really, really bad. Nonsensical frills make gameplay and app navigation literally exhausting. Wars aren't fun. Microtransactions everywhere. If you're looking at picking this up, I highly recommend you save yourself some time, energy & look elsewhere (player since launch)

I have mixed feelings. The game seems a whole lot more beginner friendly as it was in 2020. Cards are easier to level up, and trophies inflation was a thing of the past. I still have an issue with how time-consuming to max a card though, and in 6.3k, non-maxed cards are a huge disvantage. The main issue here is that the slow rate of chest flow leads to an even slower rate of card flow, and thus levelling up becomes harder.

Playing this game for a while. It started off fine, however this is an extremely p2w setup. Although I'm making decent progress, there is a pay wall to progress. Matchmaking is terrible, in that you are often playing against higher levels. I don't know why it can't be based on trophy level even in challenges? I'm playing against opponents with 2000+ trophy difference regularly. I also feel that the game is designed to force you to want to pay to buy cards. The core game is fine.

I stand by my original review, the chest unlocking system is still garbage, but with the introduction of pass royale (the free one) and trophy rewards, chests (or at least unlockable ones) are no longer your main way of getting new unit types. This ensures that you'll get all of the units you need eventually, making the game more fun to play as a result due to the ability to actually engage in the amazing deck personalization and exhilarating, fast-paced mind games that this game promotes.

After playing for longer, I had to change my review. This game becomes a stressful mess when it comes to ladder and sometimes wars, the game has become frustrating and almost a chore. I still like it a bit though, I like clans and challenges, but that might be it. Don't play this game if you rage even a little bit, because Clash Royale will bring out the worst of you at times.

My enjoyment of the game is diminishing with the recent introduction of the River race challenge. I don't understand why when I win a battle against an opponent my clan ship goes backwards. The multiple weeks of races gets dull. The game is still somewhat enjoyable but not as much. The game seems to have kicked me out and I can't login to it. It's not sending me the confirmation code for my email. Tried a few times now... really strange. Guess I'm done playing it.

Weather when it's starting the game or ending a match, it takes years, and if there's a little bit of lag, it gives you a disadvantage, not to mention if the game so happens to even crash, nine times out of ten you will lose the battle. This is terrible when you are doing a challenge or event and the game blacks out so you lose the match. It doesnt help that the battle pass is terrible, with nearly every company doing the same thing where you must pay with real money and not in game currency

they added a lot of new stuff too the game since I left however the late game is now PAY TOO WIN all the evolution cards are now in a pay wall and if you can't level up too 15 well too bad you are going too have a hard time playing ANYTHING TO DO WITH WAR GAME MODES. I almost say I give up every game because I know they have an advantage. terrible for a returning player because you get nothing against this and is incredibly one sided

Used to be great, but the experience keeps getting worse. Random freezes, losses of connection, etc, that end up resulting in lost battles in absurd ways (for example, I play a card, but it won't put it in the game because it loses connection to the server, then it puts my card at the wrong time, etc). Will Uninstall.

Changing my rating from 5-star to 1-star. I love the game but the app has shown so many technical glitches in the recent past. I have reported it multiple times but there has been no response from Supercell. The game keeps on crashing on my phone whenever I open it. I have missed several war day battles because of this glitch. Have been playing the game for last 3 years and I think now I will have to move on just because of this incompetence of Supercell.

I have been playing this game for 4 years and I absolutely love it. Its unique, not too hard to get used too and loads of fun. But that's until you reach the legendary arena... because there your skill almost does not matter anymore and the game becomes almost pay-to-win until you reach the max level (13) but if you are planning to reach the maze level without putting any money in the game it might take you 2 to 3 years of regular playing.

The game feels and plays very well. Gameplay does become repetitive at higher arenas and that makes it hard to play for extended periods. It also feels extremely pay-to-win as you can level up cards much faster with some $$. Overall I'd say the game is excellent for a mobile game, but the pay-to-win aspect and the repetitive gameplay at higher arenas keeps it from being a 5/5 in my book.

Fun game but requires a huge time investment and/or money investment to fully enjoy the experience. Upgrading cards is a long, long road. I've been playing for 3 years now and have payed upwards of $1000 and still don't have everything maxed or anywhere close to it. However, it's a novel and unique experience. The gameplay is timeless and this formula can go on forever. If you have the patience for molasses slow progression then you will enjoy this game thoroughly.

An issue i (and as i have been told many other have) reported roughly four big updates ago that they promised they were working on still isn't fixed. In normal draft battles sometimes the last choice you make is switched once the match starts leaving you with the card you specifically didn't choose. The replay shows the switched choices, making you question whether the error was on your side. It is not. This can be observed and reproduced fairly often, and they still didn't do anything about it.

Fun and easy game; once you reach the highest of levels, it's matchmaking system sucks. My standard deck consists of a few maxes and 12s but when I want to try something new, cards near or below tournament level I'll play 2v2. According to the tips, it matches based on a mix of skill and card level, but it isn't fair in the least for me to be paired with a lvl 10 fighter and facing an enemy team with max level cards. I understand there is a training ground but that doesn't feel the same.

Great game in the beginning. Lots of room for creativity. As you progress in the game it becomes very repetitive and typically the fastest way to succeed is to pay a lot of money and then copy the most successful decks from other players. By playing the less efficient decks that might be more original you're usually at a disadvantage. Great game if you you're OK with paying a lot and copying what others do. Not much room for creativity and success.

Alright, I've been playing this game for years and have to change from 1 star to 4 stars. Not going into all the details, but the pay to win was always a huge problem to me. Once I finally got a few cards maxed for a few good decks, I find it more fair and do very well against other maxed players. It took way too long to level up and for a while I would only log in to collect free chests, and request cards. Regardless of everything I love the game a lot. Clash Royale made a genre of it's own.

A con!!!!!!!!! This game may seem great at the start but as you go up the levels you will start to see the patterns appearing, it is definitely fixed by the game designers so you don't reach the top. If you see through the facade there is no point playing and definitely not pay for gems!!! P.s they never answer any emails so your on your own!!!!

Used to be fun, played for years. Now complete cashgrab. Essentially, you can still play fair ranked solo battles and the various game modes that keep changing, but forget joining a clan. Clan battles no longer have modes where the card levels are capped, so unless you have played for years or PAID to progress faster, you will always be at a disadvantage. Good while it lasted, but now ruined.

Another great game, spoilt by greedy developers. This used to be a fun, casual game you could play when you get a spare minute. Now, it's completely pay to win with so many 'premium' options. Long time (8 years+) player, and this is the worst it's been. Matchmaking is also very bios once you get to a certain level, making it impossible to get further without using YouTube decks. Terrible game and nothing like it used to be.

The gameplay is very good, until you get to some of the higher arenas, where the game becomes pay-to-win. Not really a way to fix this. I also dont like the overabundance of new emotes, since the only real way to get them is to spend hard earned gems. My opinion of the game has gone downhill, since I advanced through arenas very quickly, and hit a standstill trying to make the first league.

They screwed with the algorithm again. Now just because of lvl I'm always matched with far more skilled players. I'm a casual gamer having to fight tooth and nail just to perform routine tasks is not fun. I was already thinking about deleting this app for good. This might be the final nail after 3 plus years and unknown (but high) monetary investment. Including $5 per season since the first 1. Update I've deleted the app might try again in six months.

Edit: 1 star can't even use the app UPDATE : I get fake notifications telling me chests have been unlocked, also the free chests icon sometimes shows more notification dots than there should be. There's no easy way to report bugs. The connection can be really poor, even on stable WiFi and 4G, recently I have noticed more and more connection dropouts. The re-connect system is poor, there needs to be a feature to help this along and give a 20-30 second window to the player that lost connection...

The game is frequently updated and balanced. There are many events for both single player and guilds. One thing to note however, is that it can prove challenging to reach high ranks without purchasing in game currency or grinding really hard. I chose the latter and still only made it onto the leaderboards once. Great game and if you enjoy fast paced strategy then I highly recommend!

6/27/2022. War is horrible. They need to make an AFK or story mode, the mode is a waste of time given there is no levelling and you have limited cards to use. If it wasnt for the gold nobody would play it. Its showing its age but nothing better is coming along. But again, war needs to be cancelled and new modes invented. War, what is it good for, absolutely nothing!! (Except a bit of extra gold and a way to waste 3 minutes of your life not having fun, but clanmates sook when you dont play it)

I've had many bad experiences with, especially mobile, games that are bombarded with ads or purchases, but this one takes the crown, it doesn’t have ads, but it's in-game purchases are ridiculously expensive, since you need >200€ to upgrade a card to level 12 (from 11, assuming you already collected all the cards needed for the upgrade). And when you're close to getting to a new Arena, the game intentionally pairs you with bots or pay-to-win players that have all cards at least 1-2 level higher

It's a good game. The pairing system is horrible. How does a level 7 get paired with a level 10? They have all these super rare cards and the other player only has one and a lot of common cards. Seems like the only way to win in this game is by spending money. Update: uninstalled due to players having to pay to win. This game used to be fun. On to a new game

I've been playing for months I love it. Has some glitches that need to be fixed. It tells me wifi signal isn't good and will log me out alot during battles when my wifi is fine. It also won't let me open the app as of 10/26/21 since the lvl 14 update it keeps telling me I need to update and there isn't one. So I've paid to play, and I can't play.

I re-downloaded the game after 2 mounths... pay to win get slam,Ed with 30 dollar offers and bad mackhmakeing my first games, losing to overpowered evos from offers and deals. all my old gems and coins? worthless. the event tab isn't even there anymore, and all the good stuff is locked behind a paywall. Progression feels impossible, also most carts aren't even fair they to way to much damage. The ga,e overall has fell of now science they removed the more fun ways to progress like season shop.

Solid game concept and design, my only problem is with the lack of ways to play the game, pretty much there will always be a really buffed card and will be played often, or one so weak it never sees play. After a while it got boring when certain cards became meta. There should be different maps or concepts to keep the game going. I got this game for android the hour it came out and have the game many times, it just doesn't become fun after a while.

Really addicting gameplay but it a) has engagement based matchmaking so the game picks and chooses which deck you go against to make you either win or lose and b) is REALLY pay to win. So pay to win that for a while after reinstalling the game, google play would crash due to the sheer amount of microtransations there were. I feel that the game would be way, way better if it just wasn't so darn greedy.

I've been playing this game for 8 yrs every time you reach the end of an arena you get one easy game against a bot or underlevelled player. However after that, the game you need to win to progress to the next arena is impossible. Extreme pay to win game. Used to be way better.

You have the nerve to put bans on players even after they've spent money on the game? nah. thats too much. there's a reason many of us fell off this game years ago. pay to win. you actually have the nerve to charge 80 plus for something that will only upgrade 2 cards at most, and not give you an entire game like a normal market. the banning for players leaving is the icing on the cake. the company has gotten too greedy. dont waste your time.
Just when im having fun the game gets unfair ive calculated everything the opponents dont even have eniugh elixir for some things

It's one of the worst apps and games I've ever played and used, you reach up to almost 15000 trophy and then they get you back to 11000 suddenly without any previous warning or notification, and you get nothing instead! you don't know why you're playing cause at any moment they will take you back to a one year before trophies! it's just nonsense...

worst game in the gaming history. shame on such a big gaming company like supercell cant even manage games properly. The game loses network in the middle of a crucial match , i was playing my finals in my college tournament where this happened due to which I eventually lost the finals. Many players have complained about this issue but the management is busy updating and promoting some stupid ideas.Many old players like me have started to lose interest cuz of this issue. #stopthisbullshit game

The overall mechanics of the game are fun, though sadly it has become nothing more than a cash grab in recent years. Shop offers becoming more and more expensive and offering poor value, new overpowered cards being released which can only realistically be obtained by spending money and progression being next to impossible without buying the aforementioned offers. The game being pay to win has become even more noticeable nowadays.

Obviously sometimes there are matchmaking issues between higher level players against lower levelled players in the same arena. However the game is incredibly immersive and enjoyable with lots of new things to learn making it much more fun than any other strategy game in my opinion.

I have 1gbps connection. Just because I play too much FPS PC games. Just about before December, the game suddenly become unplayable. Reason? You have ton of bandwaidth to play while playing this game on mobile, PC at most 95% of the time you will get the wifi no connection icon in themiddle of the game screen. This also happens more and more time when matchmaking and the screen suddenly stops. My mobile is in the Snapdragon 8Gen2 so I dont really find any reason the game is failing.
This game is terrible. it's only purpose is to con players out of their money. It's not worth your time.

im going to give this game 5 stars, but there are a few things that bother me. I do not have any cards I can upgrade anymore. so when i get to upgrade my cards I can't they just stay there. also, book of cards just stays there because I can't upgrade anything. it would be cool if we could trade cards in for gems or something for left over cards we dont need.
it's fun BUT... there are a lot of balancing issues as of now and Don't show any signs of being fixed.

Expect to have to pay if you don't want to be playing for 3 years to get a maxed deck. Once you're there, though, it is fun, I must admit. The party mode they recently added keeps gamemodes in cycle, which is nice. Ladder is surprisingly balanced currently, though war is getting stale. Overall a solid 4; it's the only game I've kept installed over new devices.
fun game, keeps you busy for a while but super paid to win grinding feels tedious, but overall fun game

I used to rate this game 5* but it has been completely ruined by greed. The core game is great but supercell constantly makes the game worse for non-whales. At this point the game is trash, they clearly only want to abuse addicts willing to spend absurd amounts of money to compete.

It's brilliant as a game. Strategic, graphically attractive and really smooth. However it is the ultimate pay to win game and I'm sure thousands of kids are pumping money in to get the edge. It's enjoyable for free up until a point when you are constantly playing against people with an advantage, most likely from paying rather than playing for a long time.
please can you fix the loading screen because it keeps telling me that it is updating when i have already done so.
It gets to a point where it's pay to win and the clan battles are very unbalanced

I like playing this game but right now it's not letting me in, keeps saying updating but stops and it's not my wifi so I'm not liking it at the moment.....once again it's doin something and I can't play the game, not my phone or wifi, says updating and then I need to log back in, already uninstalled 3x and still nothing.

I don't why there is always network problem . My game initial freezes for 30 to 40 seconds .Like what I am supposed to do ? I keep losing because of that Supercell please Fix this issue I don't know if I am the only one facing this issue
An incredible game I really enjoy playing, I would recommend it if u like strategic games and game sense

this new update is terrible!! i have to rate it 1 star to show how far backward you have gone!!! its things like how can you get rid of the event shop, and just chuck more onto the season pass!?... effectively you've made it harder and we won't be able to get as much value out of our time!!! making it harder to upgrade and further progress into the game. I'm going to take a break from the game now and come back when hopefully they sort something about this, because this is a joke

After playing for 6 years the game has gotten to a bad state. it's filed with p2w, and it makes it easily the most unfun and unbalanced game ever. always releasing overpowered cards which guess what, you can buy to get immediately. And the addition of more and more levels, bad progression system. It's not the same casual game you can pick up and enjoy

adding level sixteen. Extremely predatory towards children with access to credit cards. Terrible leveling experience. Balence changes based off of use rate instead of actual combat statistics. Requires a big amount of time and money to be somewhat competive. In order to be even a little competive, you must constantly spend money. Wether it be in the item shop, buying the diamond pass, or a new broken card comes out that you must buy and use to be competitive. This game was dead, shoud die again

I believe that you should bring more things to free to play players because you always find over leveled opponents except if you grind and get your whole deck level 15. If you remove most shop purchases the game would become much better. also bring back season shop it was the best thing ever (and don't release op cards, make them cost 50€ then need then in a week).
strategy game fs. The Strongest Card in the Game Is Credit Card.

WHY THE HELL isn't there a confirmation button when you buy something with gems, I'm so annoyed by accidentally wasting gems because there is no confirmation button, I accidentally tap the screen and all of a sudden I'm down 100 gems. An amazing game but would not recommend. At first the game feels amazing, but the more you progress the more you will be at a disadvantage if you are free2play. At a certain point it simply becomes necessary to spend money on the game to have any chance to even compete. I've been playing for over 2 years and I'm not even close to maxing out a single card and in my rank (Challenger 2) every other guy has his whole deck maxed. The game had great potential but has been ruined by corporate greed.

I get kicked out every 30 seconds, so sometimes it takes forever to do anything. Even when I have full bars. Fun game overall, like the cards and updates. Add more evos. Is p2w, so for me I don't pay, it makes it hard to advance arenas. I like the setup and how it works. I like doing friendly battles, because your towers have the same health. Makes me rage because I face p2w every other match or something. Love the game, play or a lot, add a new card soon. That would low-key be peak.
It's a great game with strategic gameplay but the game way too pay to win. you can buy gems and everything to get overpowered cards and way too high leveled card but is overall a solid game

Its a really good game you should try it out yourself climb the arenas, unlock new cards, play different game modes, and become one of the best. Its unlike any other mobile game I played high quality, and you compete against other people. Try it out!!!

so I played the new merge mode and it is terrible and boring. whoever thought this was a good idea: I am lost for words. And to remove 2v2 for this. I don't know what to say. I have been playing this for 6+ years, for reference. edit: it's back.

it's a good overall game.but one thing is that when I try to get on it loads up to 75 % then says updating. but then it says login error and internet error but my internet is perfect.and I cleared cache and it still doesn't work so when I uninstalled it and then download it again it still doesn't work sometimes. Supercell fix your game! I just tried to download it again and it reset my download at 93% I'm about to crash out
Overall I love this game, but the main concern I have is that there are too much ptw items that instantly make me want to get off he game otherwise i love it great playstyle and great for long trips.
Could I get a little more help with some cards man. only get so many hero fragments at once. games expensive.

Originally 1 star, changed to 2 - this game is EXTREMELY pay to win. As long as your opponents pay money and you don't, you are destined to lose. The card levels matters so much that the counters of a certain card can be COUNTERED by that certain card if it is over levelled. TD;LR: No matter how much skill you have, if your opponent pays and you don't, you will lose.

It's a nice strategy game. have been playing since like 2016-2017 when it came out , and my only problem with the game ever since has been how easy it has become to get a legendary.. like when i started ,you were cool if you had one , nevermind more like i got 1 legendary in the entire 2018 but this year i got like 13 alone..

I played this game for a couple of years back when everything was balanced and fun. But now it's absolute garbage. The focus on p2w before and now is night and day. They added so many new cards and evolutions that it's impossible for f2p players like me to keep up. Additionally, I feel like the game's matchmaking mechanics are designed to make you lose. I have one deck of decent level cards, and I get hard countered almost every time I play. I can't switch cards at all or I will be underleveled.

Clash would be better if match making was improved more and there was maxed levels for each arena so someone cant have a level 15 evo pekka in arena one and so the game would be a lot more fair cards wise. Also when your on a win streak you shouldn't have to go against 5 different decks that completely counter your deck just because your winning games. Other then that clash is a pretty good and enjoyable to play.
It doesn't load and it says no internet connection and I dont know how to fix it.

this game is unfair , you will always lose even if the enemy has no skills but spent money on this game, he will have max lvl cards while we get less gold , so card lvls are always lower than them, and then you will lose again and again, unfair match making, getting 2 lvl higher kings with max lvl cards, while i don't even have one card that is max lvl.
Not able to login plz help I am playing this game about 10 years now this problem I badly miss this game plz help not able to login

Game is getting worse. Very quick. You have to spend money if you want to win and if you don't you get hard stuck, making the game horrible to play. You don't make progress without spending money, and now with the addition of the diamond pass, giving low level players incredibly powerful and unfair cards makes it almost impossible to progress. The only way to progress is by using pathetic, sad, low skill decks, or spend around 12-15 £/€/$ a month. Theyre killing the game because they want money.

Supercell is absolutely desperate at this point to save this game. It's absolute trash, the updates widen the gap between free to play and pay to win players. The shard pieces you must pay to use, and you need many of them for a single card. Upgrading cards is near impossible since they took away collecting individual cards. I've been playing since release, the game is at its lowest.

it's a great game, they are doing really well with the evo's. PLEASE MAKE A SEP SEPARATE SECTION FOR UPGRADEABLE CARDS. instead of the filter, just make a small area dedicated to cards that can be upgraded, makes life easier.

I don't recommend playing this game. Everyone plays the same tired old decks. Evolutions are pay-to-win, and cards are balanced horribly. Most of the time, it feels like rock, paper, scissors. If you don't have a counter to the opponents deck, then you lose and vice versa. Yes, you can win by playing meta cards and some skill, but playing the same cards and decks over and over is boring.
Absolute garbage devs. so out of touch with players. They only care about your wallet and nothing else. If you respect your time, Just stay away from this abomination.

Game is blatantly pay to win. After coming back the shop is filled with purchases just letting you buy legendary and evo cards. have lost multiple matches just because they have evo cards and I don't. Thought this would've gotten better with time but it's somehow worse.

too many p2w players, toxic players, and can't get cards without paying $11+(yes I'm talking about evos). overall fun to play with friends but losing 10 times in a row bc ppl spent money to make their cards extremely overpowered is not enjoyable. supercell ik you guys want more money but your gonna lose more players as time goes by.

This game is horrible, the matchmaking is horrendous, if youre a f2p player youre gonna be stuck in mid ladder until you can finally (after months on months onto years of grinding) catch up for paying players. this game is fun and competitive, but I shouldn't be struggling half as much as I do just because im f2p.
so pay to win it ain't even fun anymore and i'm in seasonal which is the highest place you can be and all they do is make it harder for free to play

it's a fun game and you can create more than 3 decks and one more thing you can get good cards and evolutions

If you want to see what pay to win games feel like - download this game. People can buy in, and get access to mid-late game units while you are still learning. Even their basic units are stronger than yours because they can pay to power them up. It's hardly a strategy game even, more luck based depending on the type of deck you and your opponent build. It's fun, it's addictive, but i wouldn't recommend it. However, super impressive matchmaking times. 2-5 seconds average.

Supercell doesn't care about their players they put pay to win players on the same server as the free to play players. How can the free to play players enjoy the game. It's not about creativity anymore it's about whose card has the higher level.
Easy 5 stars, great mobile game for the gameplay alone. If only it didn't cost hundreds of dollars to unlock all the stuff and play an even match. A modern AAA game is only $70!
Paid to win unfair matches. I'm lvl 11 enemy lvl 15

I am in arena 12 and still have yet to get an evo since I refuse to spend money on a free game. the game seems to want to punish me for that fact and put me against 3 people using a hyper leveled boss bandit and multiple other cards that aren't accessible in that arena. This game is too pay to win for any kind of interaction to feel enjoyable.

This game was soo good at release, but sadly turned into greedy cash grab. Good luck if you want to try spend your in-game currency in the shop. Instead it's a paywall filled with stuff that is only available to pay with real money. You wanna grab that nice looking chest that says "FREE"? well.. you need to buy the thing over it with real money if you want to access it. It's so manipulative and ridiculous. The rewards have gotten worse and worse making the progress is painfully slow.

I'm almost positive the game utilizes an algorithm to pair you against people using decks that you cannot beat when you try to win too many games in a row. The endgame offers nothing but repetition. Once your account is maxed there's little to no fun.

I started playing this game and was enjoying it but seam after a month goes straight back to unfair matches, dont bother down loading you get paired against all level 14 and above and all have evolution all takes to match you with someone who has the same evolution as the other person to make fair, for example the war match to day am in 7000 trophies and they were on 10000 rocking full team of level 15 and am on 12, only in silver war

Really fun game only downside is that if you get on a good winstreak, you play against overleveled players and the game is very pay 2 win. They should update clan wars and add a shop to buy things with medals you earn from it. Also bring back season shop.

This game has potential to be really sweet, but it doesn't want to be any of that. You are literally forced within the first 2 hours to buy expansion packs and booster pack or you can no longer progress. I tried this game for 72 hours to literally lose every single fight after 2 hours of play. Absolutely horrible, one of the worst forced microtransaction games ever. Will never try this game again.

I need trading tokens bro 😭. everything is pretty good though, just wish I wasn't playing a level 14 king tower when I'm only level 12. I also lost my old account with full level 15 deck and have no way of getting it back because its an email I no longer have
good game but I think it needs better updates to not make us players mad... Ps add more f2p ways to level up cards for the chirtmas season.

It's a total Pay to Win garbage. Matchmaking is unfair, no matter how much they claim it is. You can lose 50 times in a row and they still won't match you up with someone who's at the same level as you are. If you want to be frustrated go ahead and play this Paypool.

Updated: Honestly it's an okay game. The problems arise with match ups against much stronger players in one on one, and people leaving battles in 2v2. There is no way to report players for bad behavior in the latter and both make it nearly impossible to win. Enjoyment is QUICKLY impacted by these issues. Plus, I stress tested the temporary play restriction for abandoning 2V2 matches and it's a joke. In short it's worth playing for fun but not for putting any money into.

List down my questions👇 play 3 seasons passes to lv 90 just to get a guaranteed evolution? opponents always levels above you? tokens don't work for the people who don't pay? always bad updates and op new evolutions? why creating tactics mode in clash royale to? between the zero repercussions or accountability of players in any 2v2 mode throwing the game on purpose or leaving mid game and the connection interruption losses while having full 5g coverage or wifi partnered with the clear pay to win balance issues, this game is leaving allot on the plate for areas that could easily and preventably be better.

this game is amazing before they made p2w a must to advance.in fact i will break down the progression of ladder.(0-2000 trophies)barely any pay to wins so its quite fun here.(2000-3000)still fun.(3000-7000)where people unlock megaknight which means they will spend at least half their life savings just to get it.(7000-10000)where 99% of people have maxed level 15 cards when you are stuck with level 13s.

Maxed 90% of cards, only spent ~$20 on this game over the last 5 years of playing it. The other reviews are right in saying this game can be difficult or unfair at certain levels. Pretty good game. It's fun and uses strategy but is kind of pay to win because when you get high enough you find people with cards that are 3 or 4 arenas up maxed out and then they completely obliterate you.

Game is pretty fun. 3-5 minute matches. Takes time to learn the cards/combos but a lot of good videos to help. You can pay to level cards faster, but you can't pay to win. There is simply no way to buy skill, timing, or card placement during the matches. Every loss is a learning opportunity and hackers are few and far between. Truthfully, a pretty good way to kill 3-5 minutes.

This game is very good and fun when it works. Almost every time I load into a match, the game freezes and crashes. Then after about half an hour, I can finally do the things I want to do. I'm playing this on an LG K20. Aside from this relatively large issue, the game is very fun, with charming graphics and excellent multiplayer gameplay. The clans are very useful for connecting with friends too.

this game is very rage inducing. the matchmaking is trash and I'm convinced the game tracks the cards that you lose to and puts you against them. for one of my decks I was contunuisly put against one deck and I always lost then I swapped decks and I have never saw that deck again despite being in the same arena im assuming they do this to make you spend money on the game by making you feel like you have to (you pretty much do)
a very stressful fun game but needs to be less pay to win

Fun at times, frustrating at others, and a bit addicting. Grading is due to several changes I've seen over time. Ranking systems are trash. If you use a good strategy, it won't matter. they match you with opponents; not based on relative strength. so you're either much stronger, or much weaker than your opponents. This actually discourages people to spend money (which im assuming is the businesses goal). The matchups should be based on mean level of the 8 cards you're using.

Unfortunately, this game has offered very little new content recently, but they continue to make the casual experience more and more frustrating. This most recent update and future ones that have been revealed look to continue these trends, so don't waste your time.

It was take all you have because that's the only way you can progress. Edit: 2019. Still pay to win. No quit option. Crazy long time 4 chest

I really enjoy the game, but every morning when I try to play, it’s always down for “maintenance.” It feels like there’s more time spent on maintenance than on actually playing. Please look into improving this.

Support will ignore you and not fix the gane issues. completely unballanced and full of pay to win trolls that purposly drop ranks to just to force certain people to loss. the support is very toxic and this game is extremely toxic with no reporting. you report something and they will just ignore you or say thats not our problem. someone calls you a slur they just ignore it

As many others have said this game is pay to win. Every game I play the other person has cards two higher than my highest. To upgrade cards and unlock the actual full potential of the game you have to spend 100s of dollars. Game mechanics are inconsistent as some cards will target the tower even though it's further away and they aren't building only cards. Don't waste your time with this game. The developers don't care about this game other than making more money off it while they still can

I got scammed. I bought a legendary pack for $5.99, I was supposed to get a random legendary card. However, I got an purple epic card. Waste of my money, I wouldn't spend anything in this game anymore. It's definitely not worth it now that I know I won't get what I paid for.

If you want to play a repetitive game this is it.. I play the same decks over and over with cheaters all around the world. Customer service is great, I asked them why some players have a extremely powerful card compared to mine, both at the same level. They gave me a great answer "unfortunately we can't help you at this time" and then they freeze my in game support. I would suggest don't start playing this game.

Been playing since the beginning and probably will to the end. Game will set you up against opponents that have exactly what's needed to beat you, like you're playing the computer and not a person. You gotta have all 5 decks maxed out that each use a different strategy and cards to try and fool the algorithm but even that does always work. Overall, game is frustrating but a good way to kill time.

This game has become a mess. I've played since day one. It's better in some ways now than what it used to be. Progression is much easier so you can level up and get to the 'real' game. However, miss match galore. You will be destroyed repeatedly in quick succession. Clan wars are a pure mess now. Yes I may be level 13 but I'm using cards I don't use to make a 4th deck which is made of lvl 10 - 11 cards, where I am matched against a maxed level deck. No chance of winning. Pure waste of time.

I have been playing merge tactics bt still the game doesn't support for players who didn't pay for the pass royale wantedly the trophies are being reduced by the games algorithm when compared to players who pay for the pass this is utterly sad to players who have been playing for years no respect to players who are playing this game for more than 6 years

your new merge whatever it is is completely fixed sometimes I lose one or two or I lose three or six make zero sense it's complete random selection of characters there's no skill based in it besides keep drawing until you get something to level up to three star I've had people have three stars in the second round somehow and then the last couple matches has just been wait while I try to drop my troops but they won't drop but my enemy gets to drop his troops and then I see my towers play clans

Ever since the last 2 updates, this game has become nearly unplayable. ...used to be one of my favorite games. I can't even make it through a match now without the game shutting down on me. ...like, literally closing the game and going back to my phones home screen. It also closes the game 4-5 times in a row when I'm trying to log on. This is the only game I'm having trouble with, so I know it's not a connection problem.
This game is pay to win.When you play this game you have to pay them money to get good.Don't play this game unless your rich.

This is that "hate it, love it" type of game. Despite its P2W nature, the game is incredible; from animations, graphics, and to its unique characters and features. It's hard to grind the game but with the right deck for each arena that matches your play style, the game can be fun. Though I do suggest that you don't grind it extensively to avoid being bored or stressed if your on a lose streak. Overall a 7/10 game. It's good, but can be better.
This game used to be good but supercell has gotten greedy and have made the game unplayable to f2p players.

great game, but I accidentally deleted the game and then I redownloaded it and ever sense the game wouldn't load, soon as I open the game it just kicks me out without saying anything. This has been going on for about 1-2 hours I dont know why or what to do, someone please help!!!

Although the gameplay and mechanics of this game are really well polished and the games design is very good, the experience of playing it is bad, to say the least. Although they definitely have attempted to improve, balancing the game is still massively unbalanced. generally if you can lose a game too someone who is as skilled or even less skilled than you simply because they happen too have a deck that counters yours perfectly or because they have spent more money on the game. It's not balanced

been playing this game for 9 years and this is the only game this is true for. vibrant rich community with lots of strategy for the expert and casual. Paying will help you advance quicker but there is no ceiling on playing for free if you invest the time it. Major plus.....NO ADS....though lots of in game things to buy if that's your thing. Clans is what really sets this game apart. you can spend 20 min playing or 20 hours...up to you.
paid to win especially for the average player the new update just made everything worse for people that cant spend money

Awesome game! Great gameplay and just good competitive fun! Get this game, you'll be as addicted as I am. 5 stars. Edit: After playing this for a long time, I have to say, the developer updates are nothing but more ways to monetize the game. The latest being the worst case. Now you pay $5 A MONTH! for "season pass" and if you don't, your progress is negligible, making you fall behind unbelievably fast compared to players that do purchase it. Disgraceful and greedy.
with lvl 16 they took away the ability to have several comp decks. good game where the company chokeholds us for cash

After a certain point you go on a horrific losing streak that makes you rage quit. And progressing by just playing becomes very difficult so you end up spending money, but unless you have a lot it doesn't really help you.

Its the worst game i have ever played. The best card is the credit card. Imagine you invest 10k in this game. This is what most of my enemys do. Its impossible to win in 60 percent of the games cause your enemy paid more money than you. Only because the game is free in Play store doesnt mean its free ingame. This game is the perfect example why games get worse and worse each year...

After the last update, there are some problems. When we watch the reply of the game, it ends in a different way. Sometimes it shows like I won early than the actual game and sometimes it shows a late win. Now the game isnt loading at all. It is becoming worst and disaster day by day. Updates making it more worse. The removal of party mode was utterly dissapointing. Now they are only focusing on getting money.

Wouldn't recommend. An absolute cash grab made to look pretty, only that. You could completely dominate your opponents just by spending money on the game which is absurd. Servers are completely broken and the game lags half the time even when you're connected to excellent wifi. Skill is an extremely small part of the game and most of the time the higher level player with better cards ends up winning the match.

How can you make an internet game/software that isn't compatible with the internet...does that make any sense to you...that only means one thing...your program/software is out of date..if your program has repeated interruptions and can't keep a connection for the whole 3 minutes...then your hardware needs to be upgraded...it's that simple.. you can't keep blaming everyone else because we have the latest and greatest cellphone technology and your product can't keep up!!

Had a really good time playing this game for years, but now its just pay to win game, that really makes you frustrated on every matchup. Uninstalling to prioritise better games in life that actually require skill now. Thank You

This is one of the best games ever made but I really despise having to tap a bunch of times to open a chest. It doesn't create the reward system that I think it is supposed to create. Please make it an option to remove that!!
its good if you wanna spend like 15.99 for a pass and then 5more for a single emote

it could be such a good game if not ran by a money hungry doesnt care about their player company its full of p2w overleveled people and f2p players like me get stuck in arenas for a month and half now with no progress because we cant beat a lvl 16 megaknight with my lvl 10 cards in arena 15
Is so fun and so many arenas is like levels,but this game is so pay to win but is fun.

Been playing for years. The game has become entirely pay to win. Huge shame because it used to be such a good game but like others, they've abandoned the fan base that made them, so they can make a few extra bucks. Edit: 1 year later the problem is worse. Evolution (super) cards and (super) towers that either take MONTHS to unlock, or require you to purchase a second level tier of battle pass. Just gross at this point

Have been playing the game for a while. Initally I really liked the game and had fun with the clan I'm in. However since the release of the new clan wars, I've also lost interest in the game unfortunately. As the clan wars was one of my favorite things to do. I still like the game from time to time but then only for one game and then am done again. Quite sad to see the game going from 5 stars for me to 2..

Honestly, this game sucks. I used to play this game a lot because it was fun, but now that I look at it, Clash Royale is just a miserable experience. Why is that? It's because of levels. You could have one huge "push," a term used to describe when you put a lot of cards onto offense, but then the next thing you know all your cards are defeated because they are underleveled. Besides, this game promotes sticking to one deck, as that's the deck you'll mainly be using and invest all your cards in.

This game used to be pretty fun back when I was 7 and I played with my family friend but now, it's just so different. This used to be a slightly competitive, fun, enjoyable game but now with all the magic coins, book of cards, etc. Its really easy to gain certain cards and items that were extremely hard to gain a couple months back. For example, I worked very hard to earn some legendary cards but now, I can easily upgrade my kegendary cards with the book of cards, etc.

I played it for some time, and enjoyed how balanced the game became. However, over time new characters were introduced that made the game lose this balance, now it's a mixed bag and I don't enjoy playing this game. I tried it again, a few years after leaving it and it's the same, if you use money, you have a higher probability of obtaining characters that give you any unfair advantage. It's pay to with in the long run, and I don't want to be part of a game that follows such a model.

It is well optimized and functions. My concern lies in that they keep pumping out more and more p2w features and continue to drive player base towards the same cheap strategies and make it impossible to experiment with different types of decks in order to reach top since everyone uses those cheap strategies to wall off any fun and unique playstyles. I am no whinner who cannot "get good", this game has just objectively spiraled downward. This has caused me to delete this game and abandon it.

I love this game but there is one thing in the gameplay. When I deploy a troop is takes 2 full seconds to actually deploy plus 1 second for it to start attacking. This may be a small thing but its really annoying since sometimes I have to defend really fast and the enemy troops are already here, i deploy a troop and even if its a spell like a zap, it takes too long. The Zap is an "instant" spell, but while it consumes elixir..... and gets deployed..... takes too long and people cant defend well.

Used to be a really good, fun, and challenging game many years ago, now it's a pay to win. Progress is not made by winning battles and opening chests, now it's about having to pay for the season pass, pay for upgrades, pay for gems, or pay for gold. Matchmaking is incredibly unbalanced, with players being paired with other players 2 levels ahead of them with fully maxed out cards rather consistently. The only thing that makes this game remotely tolerable for me anymore is the clan I'm in.

I used to like this game when strategy was actually a part of it! Now all you have to do is spend $5 for "Pass Royale" and you basically get unlimited tries to beat everyone! Its ridiculous! No point in playing if there isn't an incentive to get ahead! And also I'm level 11 and I only face level 13s so this game is so stupidly unfair it's ridiculous. Uninstalling!

New update is much needed, still not enough gold! I'm a level 13 been playing over 4 years and still have only level 11 cards. I always have good stable connection, or using data 5G. The servers of this game desperately needs a update. I'm constantly losing connection and losing thropies and crowns! I think the game has so many people on the servers it weighs down the connection. Overall this is a fun game, still needs a lot of improvements done.

It's just amazing. But the only problem I find with the game is the tournament matching. Every time I get into a tourney, I get opponents at least an xp level above me. It seems that they do it purpously so that the lower level players can never get the bonuses . If supercell would fix that, this game will be the best on this planet!!!

Years after my first review, the game had changed in tons of ways. There have been ups and downs, but for the most part, I was able to handle supercell's pay to win antics; however, that has changed. The most recent update introduced clash pass. This literally killed the game for all f2p players. Now, the game is objectively better for those who pay per month, and it's not just gem spammers anymore. On the bright side, their matchmaking system seems to be much more balanced as of recently.

The game is actually fun to play, however I'm constantly being frozen out in battles, my device is not old yet it seems to bodge when I play sometimes. It wouldn't be a problem if losses weren't a big part of the rewards system, but I'm very bored of logging in, losing unnecessary crowns, and having to spend the day attempting to get back tht which was wrongfully lost. Great game, just not fun losing because of game malfunction. Uninstalled today unfortunately.

I have played this game since it came out just about and it was a big downhill when you could buy your way into good troops, but now this new update. No sir, that makes it even more unfair. But there are WAY too many glitches and laggy times in game. I have great internet and it'll buffer or knock me back to home screen in the middle of a war battle. Fix the bugs please! Ever since you sold out the game has been super glitchy. I have excellent wifi and it doesn't load right half if the time.

TWICE, when i went on hog draft race, it crashed. The first time, it was stuck at 81% for a few minutes. The second time, it froze a few moments in. The third time I played, the openent got FAR superior cards to me, but that is a different story. My main concern is that out of three loses, in only one did I even have what was even classable as a chance.

I can't say there was a time I truly disliked clash royale's core gameplay. I used to play for hours and began in 2019. I loved the micro interactions between cards and learning them all. But recently everything has changed. Level 15, matchmaking, evolutions; even a long time player who maxed season's pass couldn't keep up. I just want to play the decks I leveled years ago, not playing whole months to max one new OP card, just for it to get nerfed after I upgrade it. Uninstalled. I'm done.

The concept was great. The meta makes things kind of bad, but it's still manageable. The Clan Wars 2 update took things from bad to worse. Now, instead of pouring your heart and soul into getting 8 cards to max level to win, you have to do that to 32! What an absolutely ingenious idea!! Seriously, unless you want to spend lots of money right off the bat, don't download this game. I can literally derive more joy from watching US politics than playing this game.

I've played this game for years and always had a fun time. However, the latest update is a big money grab. They clearly don't care about the player base. They want you to spend $100 to unlock the four new level 15 cards and then spend another $10 to upgrade a single card. Otherwise the amount of time it will take without paying the steep price will be outrageous. I'm talking months to max a single card from level 14 to 15. Supercell you've failed us yet again. Update: still money driven trash

I Have played this for several years and really enjoyed the balance between free to play like me and pay to play players. There has and should be a slight advantage to people willing to pay, which is good as it keeps the game in business. Currently, with the huge advantage to level 15 cards with the special ability. All things being equal in terms of skill, deck, etc, the special ability deck will win. I'm in a fairly high level clan but can no longer pull my weight w/o spending time or $.

Clash Royale advertised their battle pass saying that you can CONTINUE challenges for free. I have had to restart the past two challenges.. Also, 44 gold for winning a battle in multiplayer?! What a joke! I've played this since launch, but I think I'm moving on. I have played For over THREE YEARS and still cannot max my cards. But Supercell won't care about my opinion.

Horrible- so can't tell you how many times the game has crashed at a crucial moment. I have to log back in and am destroyed by the time the game loads again.  Gameplay itself a 5 star but this type of issue in an online game is unacceptable. Free to play style is a 3.5 star. Legendary cards are horribly integrated but everything else is okay.

After playing this game off and on for over 4 years I have learned that everything is fixed. My opponents aren't random or real-time players. My tantrums are mocked all the time so it appears that whomever I am playing is assigned to keep me at a certain level. Upon watching other clan member's elixir speed mine seems to be a lot slower. So I lose a lot because they deploy more cards which put me a disadvantage. There is so many different ways the game beat you. Their cards take more hits.

I want to like this game. Three years in and there's still something holding me back. The game quickly became more predatory with the in app purchases. The imbalance of cards as you head into the higher stages of legendary arena clearly show this. Progression is halted and you start to only lose battles based on the fact that someone's stats were higher than yours. This game would be great if the devs cared about the player's experience rather than who has the deepest pockets, because I don't.

The new card level system is garbage, and so is the match making system. I would refrain from making in game purchases. I get it that I should be paired up with others that made in-game purchases, but I shouldn't be paired up with players who are level 12 or 13 with 180+ tower health and 3 maxed out cards, while I'm level 11 and dont even have a single card to the max. Other than that I appreciate how the dev's made it easier to get gold, and i give them props for not making it impossible to get, but thats about it.

Only problem i have found is the game is a major battery drainer . If they can fix the battery usage, then i will give it 5 stars. They fixed the battery drain issues. Game is great , fun time killer if you have a few minutes or hours to burn. Only problem is it has become a subscription game now. So you can play for free , but be prepared to be destroyed by anyone paying for the game.

DO NOT DOWNLOAD!! it's completely P2W game. The game is good till arena 4 then it becomes P2W. I am in arena 5 and the players I match against have arena 10 cards, the community is toxic, all the players I match against have overleveled cards. Supercell please fix this. I play Clash of Clan the COC Devs atleast listen the community.. but clsh royale Devs doesn't even bother to listen the community I wish I could give zero stars

To a certain level this game is fun to play. After a reaching to level 8 the game becomes unfair. The match making is effed up. You have to play against players 3 to 4 level advanced than you. And if you don't spend money you will feel stuck to a certain level and the progression becomes so slow that it feels frustrating. Overall I would like to say play as long as its fun and then quit. :P

Clash royale is an awesome game! I don't like that it is pay to win but this is my go to game when I'm feeling bored! I am a completely f2p player with 15000 trophies and Royal champion league, and the one thing I can say is that its not too hard to progress as long as you play consistently a little everyday. still, the pay to win could be reduced but overall, so many great memories with clash royale. thank you supercell! :)

I've been playing the game for 8 years, and it's just gotten worse over time. SuperCell has made it a pay to win game in every aspect possible. It completely sucks for players who are just trying to have fun and enjoy the game, and even worse for players who are slightly more competitive and serious about progression. My advice to ya'll don't waste your time downloading the game unless you have enough bank to play.
Great game but too many hackers. Pay to win.

PARENTS!! Your kids will waste your money. Most pay to play games are still kind of fun because if you're skilled, you'll be alright without having to buy things to increase your odds of winning. This game is designed to be addictive and force you to buy cards. There is arenas you can get stuck in and HAVE to buy cards to progress. For years (since it's debut) Ive played regularly. I just uninstalled because I've plateaued unless I wait months to years for freebies again. Read other reviews..

Having issues with the game. Everytime I try to load it, I get a message saying there is an update available. Click on the update button and it brings me to Google Play. No option for updating, uninstalled and reinstalled the game and still getting the same message. Need to fix this issue now. I've been playing this game for years and no issues until now. Currently in the middle of a clan war and if I miss my attack due to this I will leave a very negative review and uninstall the game.
fun but too pay to win. there is no reason anyone should spend any amount of money on a mobile game

After this update I'll mostly be on standby for this game. 6.99 was already high enough for a monthly pass... now it's 8.50 for a meh version, or 17 for the diamond pass... this game has become the definition of pay to play over a short period of time.. this more or less was the last game I religiously played as it was fun and not entiiiiiirely money grabbing. Now?....the reward system also has become a complete joke. I still can't believe they warped clan wars into the thing it is today....
Bad, making game worse and worse one update at a time. Goodluck trying to get into this game as a new f2p player!

Hi, I want to mention a very pig problem you did after the new update. Forcing players to upgrade non used cards is so annoying. For me it's a waste of gold. I was lvl 10 king, I used to play league and that was pretty funny. Now I can't play both. Why lvl 11? It's not my problem for having low king lvl. I have no reason to open the game, collecting gold to upgrade the cards I don't use is so hard. It's not easy at all. Why am I paying without getting something back?

I love this game and got all the way up to the second league. Personally, I do not like the idea of having a royale pass that you practically have to pay money for. The tower skins are cool but I wish that they would add them to the shop and just make them cost say, 1000 gems. Also, I play with friends and wish that they kept the game modes like draft battle in the friendly battle menue permanently.

I have recently returned from about 3 years of not playing. I came back around the Goblin Party event. I loved the event, it was super fun and made me happy to have downloaded the game again. However, after the Update For Losers and finding impossible to play Clan Wars any longer, and now the whole 'Terry' event. It really seems that the devs of this game are absolutely unenthused. I don't want to Uninstall this game again when I've seen how good it can and used to be.

My game keeps quitting me/crashes out to my desktop when I start playing against another player 100% of the time. I tried fixing all the problems such as reinstalling, Log out of Google ID, correct time and date, all updates are up to date. I did read somewhere to try getting an optional update from "Relevant app store." But I couldn't figure out how to get that. Otherwise I would give the game 5 stars. :(

This game has gone downhill, especially since the last update. The price of the pass has gone up, & a new pass added for $11.99/mo, which is outrageous. I used to buy the regular pass every month, I won't be going forward, nor will most of my clan. There are fewer chests awarded now, no chests received for 2v2, and the new event where you earn tokens (daily limit imposed unless you buy the pass) is a waste. You can't buy much with a daily limit and the options are terrible. The game sucks now.
Pay to win game that only wants your money not for you to have fun and it now sucks

This entire game sucks. It's fun until it gives you the most broken players of all time to 1v1 you, putting you down 300+ trophies. It also just has so many ways to P2W. I love the game but it needs a fix.

I played around 4 hours total and could already see just how much they want you to pay for chest unlocks to get card upgrades to help you level up faster. Which is quite literally pay-to-win. I cannot support a game who's greed comes before its supporting player base. The game is nothing without it's players. Unfortunately a lot of players are too ignorant to see this problem. This game has some good potential to be great, but the paywall is massive and unfriendly to new/free to play players.

For sometime I have been suspicious, but now after years of playing, I finally proved it to myself. The game cheats, and decides who it wants to give a little elixir boost to. I do not know how it decides on that, if it's by region or amount of wins/loses. Finally, the developers seem to decide which cards shine for a time before changing, and then call it "balancing", it's nothing balanced about it, just foolishness.

This game is by far one of the worst games I've ever played before, the matchmaking an the constant irritation of people getting more exilir than you is just not acceptable and the owners of this game really need to fix this because this is not right WORST game ever🤮👎!!!!!

This game is definitely awesome, however there's a bug I incountered and even I tried to clear the data of this app and kog in to my previous account, the bug was still there. The bug I incountered is there's a notification in my magic items that won't disappear. It is so disturbing to look at. And that's all, I hope you will be able to fix it.

So hard getting the cards to max level which result in unfair game, unless you spend money in the game to get cards. I've been playing for over 5 years and only got one set of max level cards. This game is about luck and not skills, 8/10 games the opponent will just counter you and lost. Want to change to other set of cards? They are not max level, even so, after you selected it, the algorithm seems to know and you will be counter again. Don't play this or you are wasting time and depressed.

I've never played a worse game in my life if you've been playing for long enough you'll have card people won't get until end game making it impossible to make any real progress, I've been playing for 3 years and I've literally never been able to get pat stage 11, sure there may be skill involved but literally every single person I play against has a card thats atleast 5 stages away from me

I truly love Clash Royale as a game but this new update is overwhelmingly disappointing. Raising the level cap to 16, removing Books, and taking away Elite Wild Cards all feel like moves made purely to slow down player progression and push people to spend more money. I understand free-to-play games need to make money, but Supercell made $78 million last month; and apparently that wasn't enough. What this change really does is punish dedicated players who already spent years grinding.

Game is trash! And the creators! Unfairmatchmaking. Would give 0 stars if possible. Been playing game since 2016. Played often and thought that there was a way to EARN you way to the top. NOPE! You have to pay to play to make yourself better at high levels. As well if you choose the wrong cards too upgrade you will hurt your play/ chances to upgrade/ and overall lose a lot of matches.Glad that I wasn't dumb enough to give any money ;)

It used to be my favorite mobile game. I played it right after release, so I was f2p competitive. The amount of cards and strategies is beautiful and so much fun to play around with. The problem is the meta. Once you're in higher arenas (if you're even a bit good), you'll run into meta constantly, and it ruins the creativity to me. Why offer 100+ cards if only 20 are really good. Still a great game to return to all the time though. It's a game of strategy and creativity. Truly one of the best.

2v2 matchmaking is horrible 9 times outta 10, my teammate is either nonexistent or just plays randomly. You're forced to sit and watch the whole match instead of just leaving the game or else you have to wait a whole hour cause of some dumb "penalty". Game is a ragebait sim.
MATCHUPS ARE NOT EVEN CLOSE TO BEING EVEN .. .TRYING TO FORCE PLAYERS TO BUY CARD UPGRADES ... NAH

I've tried playing this game multiple times, but it's just a cancerous buggy pos game that cares more about mo ey and purchasing your way to the top than balance. screw strategies. they don't matter. you'll be going against people 4 levels above you. you want to do something and be able to climb,spend 100 dollars,or cry because you don't have 900 hours in a Terri Le game getting destroyed. oh y, u want to get something to keep up. no, you need to win to get stuff so there's no catching up. 0star

The game has fairly improved in a couple of months and is really fun to play, though the only setbacks are difficulty in maxing a card to level 15 and the game being in favor of p2w for fast progression....

worst game of my entire life. Its pay to win the second you download the game. If you don't pay to win then you won't have fun in this game at all. On top of that, the devs don't balance cards correctly and it leaves cards overpowered for months on end.

Absolutely horrendous game. The developers will purposefully cut your connection in the middle of a match regardless if your winning or loosing. It's not a connection issue for sure, I've checked and I have almost perfect WiFi. Game is also unbalanced and EXTREMELY pay to win. Like to the point that the game team refuses to listen to the community and will continue to drive this game to the ground with Pay to win features. Don't bother wasting time for this game.
great game I would recommend kind of pay to win but still enjoyable without pay to win and it has great leveling

Clash Royale was fun to play. However in recent times, it feels really impossible to progress in the game because many people will either have over leveled cards, cards that aren't unlocked for their certain arena yet, evolved cards that have ridiculously overpowered abilities, and it gets frustrating to play at times. Supercell thinks that this problem will be solved by constantly adding cards, but it doesn't. Stay away from clash royale, there are other better games.

This is no doubt a pay to win game. The upgrade towards the high levels are way too expensive. We should have the option of degrading cards and get back a portion of the gold spent when we upgraded the card. The match making algorithm is garbage. You would experience a very frustrating losing streak for no apparent reason. Trophies you patiently worked hard for many days would be gone in just a matter of minutes. This game is not for fun and recreation. Zero stars if I could. 👎👎👎

Matchmaking is unfair and you will always get stuck at a certain point, always will get matched with someone way higher level than you, its complete pay to win and you will have to do ingame purchases to get good and progress
Fantastic game but just nerf p2w a little bit p2w is so op we started seeing full level 16 deck with royal chef in midladder is just pure pain

I stand behind behind my previous review after coming back and playing for the last 5 years and paying for the pass every month since. The new update is trash. It started with the new matchmaking update, then charging more for the pass. It was already not worth the 5.99 each month but I paid it to keep playing. Now 11.99? Get real. You have in app purchases to help offset your cost of the rising market. Will not continue to play or spend money on this game. WOULD NOT RECOMMENDED.

Used to have a good review from me but supercell has become too greedy. Before you could get a lot of things by playing free.
