I have decided to stop playing this game because it just ain't fun anymore. Imagine being level 13 and fighting level 15 pay to play winners it's just not fun.

more then 7 years play this game , unfortunately the game is created in a way that they make you lose by lagging 0.3 mls enough to not put the hero counter the enemy, is for years they do this so you put more money in and they let you then to win , I don't recommend to take seriously this game because you all will be sad disappointed
super clam game to play for long car rides and just super competitive and not that hard to play the game it has cool up grades

Hi. I honestly gave up after going up against megaknight,boss bandit,p2w's. so many problems that they don't fix, plus there are too many p2w's I have been trying to grind trophies but the matchmaking system is just out of hand. Personally, I find that this game is alright. It brought about a new genre of games altogether and generally revolutionised the gaming scene. Anyway, this game is great in its combat, system, and balancing. However, it falls short of 5* as they took many methods of getting gems and other really convenient functions (ie quests). Also, clan wars sucks :( Good game though.

I have played this game for 3 years and I bought the pass every month until 2 months ago when it was nerfed. They tripled its price while they were giving less than before. Now, they are adding more levels and they are selling it as if it is going to cost less gold than before. It is needed like 3 times more cards to upgrade 1 card which makes you spend more money. What’s more, they are adding evolutions on the game but the requiered shard are only available in a 15€ pass. It is already dead.

Incoming updates are terrible for both new players and free players, and they are even bad for paid players as well. When adding a new level (meaning more cards and gold needed), they lowered rewards in the pass that would be needed to do so, even to paid tiers. Paid tier is getting a major downgrade, and the price is being raised. This is a sign for everyone to quit. There should be no fear of missing out. You'll miss nothing by leaving.

Laggy at crucial moments, as if the game is trying to make you lose. Additionally, high level people crash their trophy level to play in lower tiers, so your perpetually fighting overleveled people and clearly the game has not attempted to solve the issue. Frustrating waste of time, and I regret spending money on this game. Also, the "strike" system is super rigged. Whenever you use it to reroll your cards, it always rotates through the same sequence of bad cards in the same order.

Best game! I'm playing it since day ONE. For those who say that you need to spend money to progress, I spent about $10 in total in 7 years, which I didn't need actually, and I'm still enjoying the updates and I progress consistently while I'm getting all cards, all badges, almost all evolutions, and that's how it is. You need time and consistent gameplay to progress over months/years. This is the business model of casual battle roayle or PvP games.

I haven't had the game for about a year and a half and when I redownloaded, I can't say I'm really surprised to see nothing's changed. You have lower level players that have WAY better cards from higher levels that have down ranked and it's impossible to win. It's more angering than fun when your towers are knocked down in two seconds and you can't get anything in against your opponent. Disappointing.

The cards that are annoying all have synergy (i.e. megaknight + rocketeer). The game encourages pay-to-win by locking the new OP Evo cards behind a $10 paywall or 3 months of grinding 3 different battle passes. A single card upgrade from lvl 13 to lvl 14 costs 75k in gold and that can take a week or more to accumulate only if you consistently play daily.

Usually crash without any signals even if the game has a maintenance. I lost more than 300 points for the "Re-log in" problem, Very annoying problem, and this is the reason that I have to rate it to 2/5. Btw, the game play is good, easy to play, control and understand the strategy.

App crashes way too much... The loading screens load way too long. It had happened multiple times that I try to enter a battle but it loads really slowly and by the time I enter I see that my opponent won three crowns and the match is over before I could even enter the game. It also happens that whenever I'm in the middle of a battle the app lags or crashes, and when I open the app again to play it loads really slowly again and then I end up losing trophies. Fix this and then I will rate this 5.
this game is so fun and it's about perdition to win each game. you make mistakes but you learn from them

Very great game, used to be extremely balanced and fun to play. But now with the battle pass system it has become pay to win. People who buy a battle pass will recieve a ton of gold and cards during the season compared to those that don't spend any money. Giving them higher level cards and an advantage in the battlefield. Sad that this occured.

Latest android version is so buggy. You are shown start screen but game almost ended!!! Fix it!!! Game can be fun but most of the time it is about matching algorithm not about strategy. Looks like you are A/B tested and capped at winning. Also about 10 to 20% of the time, you get players that play throw away games. Poor versioning and requiring force updates at least 3 times last 2 weeks. App crashed and there was no way to recover account. Ridicilous!

After the update, the game has been crashing quite often causing me to be afk in matches and losing trophies and challenges. Also moving to the shop window makes the game laggy and crash most of the times. Im really pissed at this because I tried many times to reinstall and clear the ram on my phone and it still the same way as it was before. A great game but a game that crashes quite often is a no no for me.
An amazing game but there is so many p2w bums that It makes the game unplayable as a f2p player.

It used to be good, not anymore with pay to win, if a pro play with low level card vs a noob max decktheres no way a pro can win, that's why this game is getting worst and worst, and everyone is deleting this game, fix the cards and bring old clan war updates.. And the season shop 🙄

The game can be fun at times but I feel like there are times the match making makes no sense. I'll be put again people with way higher level cards than me. I feel like there are times the games makes me more mad them i can enjoy playing it

Have been playing this game since it's global launch, it's pretty addictive. The only good thing about the game is it's graphics. This game used to be a fun game but not anymore. Devs aren't paying attention to the cards that needs to be balanced. They're upgrading/balancing the cards that needs no change whatsoever. Skill used to be a major factor while climbing the ladder, but nowdays it depends more on card levels and which cards you have/use. Basically, it's pay to win game.

I’ve played this game for over 9 years, but recent upgrades have ruined the balance. The game now feels heavily pay-to-win. Players who spend a lot of money can progress and win easily, while long-time players struggle. I’ve only topped up about ₹1000, yet newer players reach King Level 13 in just 2 years by paying. Meanwhile, old players like me and my friends are still stuck at levels 14–15. This is extremely disappointing.

my account was hacked many years ago and by the date i cant retrieve it, the support isnt able to give me solutions and its a no sense cause i can prove the ownership of the account they just don care about their players, the only thing they care about is u spending money in their overpriced things.

I really like it and I don't want to know that people are paying money to buy stuff that your average player is not. After 2 weeks I gave up on Clash of Clans. Have been playing this game for a very long time, with each update the game becomes less and less fun they constantly change the stats of everything. They are in it for the money. leaving one star for the level 16 update just uncreative and unfun only adds more bland "expansion" to the game, clearly running out of ideas because you'll have to keep adding new cards if you want to keep releasing evos every season and credit card maxing killing the game the second you get a massive popularity spike. they need to stop the predatory diamond pass and make a better reward system with better odds you don't need to add all that to keep progression moving when ranked exists+tournys

broken on arrival, the seven cards glitch can't start any normally clashes. worst part i had this game back in highschool 5+ yrs ago so of courses none of that progress or even name came across (tho i had little hope anyways) guess ill stick to my other mobile game thats in the top 10 rn and is from a south Korean dev team

Bring the og game back and keep this one running. I promise you most will flock back to the og, to before your games downfall. This game used to be great. I started playing when it was first released. But it is ruined by a pay to win structure. It's near impossible to get a level 15 deck free to play, and if you don't have one, the opponents will have an unfair advantage over you every time. Their troops and towers will have more health and deal more damage than yours. That is if you're higher up in trophies like I was before I quit. It sucks because there is a good game here, but it's been ruined by bad decisions.

I had originally rated this with I believe 4-stars.  It is incredibly fun and addictive but recently my game has been having problems.  I'm not sure if it's cheaters or just the game glitching but it needs to be fixed.  I've been getting into games where the opponent's king immediate begins jumping up and down and his health bar flashing on and off like when he first takes damage.  I am unable to place troops most of the time and have to do it repeatedly.  After one of his princess towers takes damage, the king jumps up like it took damage but stays and begins shooting my troops. Enemy troops will be killed by mine and immediately Respawn with no explanation. In a recent game, my baby dragon took out a minion horde going at my king tower and disappered, only to be replaced by their full health minion horde. When I watched the replays it shows that I did not place several troops that I had.

It's a great strategy game, good graphics, a bit off lag between when you put a card down and when the game actually decides to start playing it, but there are a few things that y'all should change in the game, one of them being that in 2v2 challenges, a lose should not count if your teammate leaves the match in challenge matches, I lost two times because of that reason.

A "free" game that is quite fun for a month, but it's appeal is lackluster after that. Problems with the game: Unfair matchmaker - You could have the exact same cards as someone but theirs are higher level which means they are 10% stronger. Long Grind - Getting all the cards isn't the hard part its leveling them up, getting one card to level 13 takes about a year now imagine a whole deck of 8 cards. Pay to ease the grind - It will cost a lot of money but higher card levels give you an advantage.
Completely pay to win. There's also some slight lag when placing cards sometimes. (I have good wifi and I've noticed this on other devices as well, doesn't lag too often though)

This game is horrendous. People that enjoy this game are little kids. Adults playint this game have lost their mind. This game is the worst I have ever played. I've been playing for few years and its changed a lot from when I began. most of my cards are maxed out, I do not pay to play. join a clan, if you can get dash pass will help you increase lvl and card lvls but if not just take ur time. eventually you'll get there. its z game for fun and just like any game there are ppl who pay to play. there are nice ppl toxic ppl. but again its a game if its not fun for you, find one that is...

It would be a great game if it wasn't pay to win, and didn't make sure you always have a 50% win rate, and wasn't littered with bots. It's not very fun to play against a level 12 mega knight in spooky town, followed by a lobotomized tin can that has a deck comprised of only spells

The game itself is very good, cool concept and overall its good gameplay, But theres a problem with people that p2w all the time, im only at 1.8k trophies and im seeing way too many opponents that have evolutions, Id really like for the game to lower the pay items in the game

The game is very unbalanced, and pay to win. I get matched with players who have all level 12+ cards while I'm still stuck on level 10 cards because the free-to-play rewards are garbage. ultimate level of foolishness, a person with level 9 king tower gets matched with a person with level 13 of king tower. Do not play if you frustrate easily. I used to enjoy this game quite a lot. It was neither too easy nor too hard. It had become practically impossible to advance in levels. There are times when you lose for 8 or 9 games in row simply because you are paired with people that are so over powered in comparison. It says to take a break if you find yourself in a losing streak. By that standard, I would never play more than a round, maybe 2, any given day.

Clash Royal has been the only game on my phone that withstood time and replayability. I've been playing for more than 5yrs and have spent loads of money. I have to say that the last update (a week ago) is really bad. One issue is the monthly $4.99 pass is now $5.99! Why!? Now there's a $11.99 pass!? This now feels like a money grab. 😢 😭 Time to find a new game.
top notch casual game, from a top notch software house. hours of simple fun for all at no cost

I've been playing this game for over 4 years, and somehow the game keeps getting more pay to win. supercell has a created a brain-dead meta by having overpowered cards that can only be attained by paying money. I've concluded that the game doesn't care about their players and only prioritises income. overall although there are some fun moments in the game it's definitely not worth the stress and addiction to download it.

I loved this game. Has played it since launch. I finally uninstalled last month when they announced lv14. I thought they would never done that. They should have just add the champions without touching the lv cap. This just adds years of grinding, no fun at all. I still like the game, but just can't go on the journey again when knowing that one day they will add lv15.

I'm enjoying it until I got to arena. 8. because first off people use spam decks, expensive decks and also normal which is hard to all counter in one deck. and also the amount of things the need to debuffed is crazy. and not to mention the amount of money you have to pay to have fun in this game. its a really good game and i also think the idea behind it is also good, but it just gets to a point where you can't play anymore.

Clash Royale is an enjoyable strategy game that combines tower defense and card-based mechanics. Its quick, action-packed battles make it perfect for casual play, while the wide variety of cards allows for strategic depth. The clan system adds a social element, letting players collaborate, share cards, and compete in wars. However, the game’s progression can be slow, especially for free-to-play users, as upgrading cards often requires either time or money.
Ok first off I waant to say. Yes. The game has A LOT of pay-to-win elements to it but get past that and the gameplay is fun, card abilities are interesting, and everything is still unlockable in f2p

Whilst fun at first, the higher you get in the games trophy system the more pay to win the game becomes. It ultimately becomes a game about who has the best evos and highest level cards, making it a nightmare for any f2p players

At first, I loved this game. It was great, but it slowly got more boring over time as the meta shifted to an incredible amount of bridge spam and other whatnot. So I left the game, only to come back a few months later to realize that now, the game constantly crashed. I lost 100 gems trying to recontinue the most recent challenge, only to lose two rounds due to connection failures (and no, it's my wifi. This has never happened before with this game, or any other.) Not to mention it's such an uphill battle for players who don't want to put in cash since gems don't come often and everything runs off gems. So, needless to say, I'm done with this. Had a good time, though leaving with bad memories.
this game is so money focused its crazy this is just a money grab game because you cant have fun without playing with money

I've defended this game since it came out as not pay to win. However, the latest few updates have proven the complainers right. This game used to be great, but now it's just awful. Matchmaking is a joke now too. The dept working round the clock to ruin this game is doing an excellent job.

Loved the game, until a glitch froze my screen and kept the game running in the background. When I finally got control again, in game purchases had already occured and the app was trying to access my google wallet. Very dissapointed in this turn of events. Farming for certain types of currency in game is a long process. To have a glitch waste all of my time spent.... Is frustrating. ABSOLUTELY DO NOT RECOMMEND!!

Fix the matchmaking and economy of the game edit: 2 years later and it's even more p2w. You will suffer playing against opponents with mismatched levels until you fully max out your deck. game also doesn't care about balance, let's busted cards stay busted as long as they are new and then needs them a while after

This has been the worst game I have ever played.It has tons glitches. This game also only caters to those players who spend money on the game. So, only those players have privilege meanwhile the ones that are free to play, get matched with them and get destroyed by their very high level cards because they can afford them. Played a long time, talking years, and they refused to do any balancing except for cards that don't need the changes. The same 7 cards have been running rampant for years! get a bug with last update , whenever I claim a reward from the gifts of current arena tree , after the box opened, the process did not continue to next gift not opened but close the gift tree and get back to the first interface (welcome interface ) please reverse what ever last changes you did guys :) , thanks

DO NOT RECOMMEND. I usually don't mind games with battle pass systems, especially if it adds extra fun to an already fun game, but Clash Royale has the gall to make it a pay wall thing. At a certain stage it's impossible to progress unless you pay to upgrade your cards. I played well over 30 consecutive games to come to this conclusion: No matter what build you pick, the games pits you against AI players that have an exact counter build to you, forcing pay-to-win. Don't waste your time and $$!

The game in its latest form is an actual scam. In clan battles, it is extremely rare I vs. someone my own tower level (it's always higher). It's making me think this game does this on purpose to get you to spend money on the game so your cards can be level 15 and relevant. I find myself playing less and less because of this, and it is almost at the point clan wars arent viable for myself as a casual player.

This game is a love/Hate relationship because you can start playing and win like 5 games in a row then Supercell decides to put you up against like a top player ever and his king tower is maxed and the guy some how has INFINITE elixer and playing max level cards... LIKE WHAT and then im struggling over here trying to play a 2 elixir card and the guy is placing another 6 elixir card so the guy has a whole 20 elixir push and i have nothing to play...so its like an ex wife that keeps beating you.

Pay to win to an insane degree. Card levels, card evolutions, champions, etc. There are so many ways that you can pay to have a competitive advantage, it makes the game so un-fun. They could have monetized their game a thousand different ways, like charging for cosmetics only, but they decided to go the pay to win route. Also, there is basically no strategy in this game apart from making your deck. Once you're actually in a match, the winner is just the one who has a better deck.

still play this game daily but its so pay to win its impossible not to get hardstuck in any given areana no matter your skill level due to people who have multiple levels higher than you in cards and towers edit: still same problem ive also ran into an issue with grinding where the game only incourages you to play 4 games a day because outside of the 4 chests you can get the pass takes forever to get with mid loot and the events are just bad and the game continues to push pay to win to the top

terrible game, they make it hard to play this game without paying, removed season shop one of the best thing for f2p players because "it wasn't doing it for most people" when they still have the trader who is completely useless, this game is horrible if you don't use your credit card, if I could rate this -5 stars I would

Matchmaking is ridiculous. Essentially, you cannot fight on a leveled playing field unless you have been playing for years or spend hundreds of $$ which will only get you to a even matchup. Extremely not recommended for new players. Would be a great game if it wasnt for the intentional lack of balancing. Edit: Clan Wars 2 is here. They've officially taken out the last thing left in this game that had any real balancing or leveled playing field. They're really just in it for the money now.
if you are underleveled and you dont use ur money the game isnt worth playing at all

I've been playing this game since it launched and I just can't anymore. It used to be paying gave you an advantage over free but it wasn't near as bad as it has become now.

This game is really fun to play, and that is the only reason why I'm not giving it a one star, which I'm giving it a two star review because way to often it feels like it's pay to win, or requires serval months of just straight grinding. Which just ruins the experience for me.

I love this game. Thanks for all of the improvement and new challenges!!! However, the only issue is the match making. Clash Royale has become a pay-to-win game, making it frustrating for free players. The introduction of level 16 cards was a bad move, increasing the grind and widening the gap. The game is also rage-inducing due to constant baiting strategies. They've added too much, and the game doesn't feel fun anymore. It's a shame because the core gameplay is still fun.

I've played this game before. And I've had issues before it too. But now, the whole gameplay is the issue, you just can't find an opponent who's a match to you. Even with a teammate, it's hard. It's just some you can win by paying, which really isn't fair considering how much other player suffer to upgrade their decks and be overwhelmed by rich kids.

it not right to gives Battle machine these ability i have to face 5 heroes and 3 to 4 machine who is 3 and 4 star it makes the games sucks

This is probably one of most difficult game I have ever played and not in a good way. It has some of the worst match macking I have ever seen (Worse than call of duty). Leaving 1 star because of the new card in Merge Tactics, Echo Sage. That is the most hilarious thing I've ever seen in a game. a guy with 1 star cards beat me while I had full 3 star deck.

All of these new features amount to nothing when the free to play experience has been slowed, nerfed, and subtly removed throughout the years. Being toe to toe against a player with cards higher level than yours is infuriarating. You're almost never on the same playing field when you go against somebody, you either outmatch them, not in skill, but in card level or they similarly outmatch you. Unbalance. Bad matchmaking (Example level 8 vs Level 10).Card level beats skill(Im a bad player but i always manage to beat very skilled players just because my cards are a higher level). The game is good at base. Much better than clash of clans. The issues lie in its pay to win structure. the game is obviously good it's just over the years it's been moved to a pay to win focus and matchmaking use to be fair I have a 4 year badge rn and I played for the first time 5 years ago when I started it was so goodd and it was grindy now it feels like this game has been babied and everything is thrown at u by the time I was able to use champion cards I had all 3 in a hour like old clash would have made u waste half a month getting ts smh still fun and nostalgic, also nerf prince plz

I played a week but had to delete the game. The game play is masterpiece and is very addicting. As a way to kill some time and get a quick thrill, it succeeds; however, it's designed to be addictive with its balance of free and paid content, fast adrenaline rushes, and the promise of rewards. Unlike some others of its kind, this incarnation of the pay-or-wait strategy incorporates card collection and special powers, which adds some interest. Yet the entertainment value is fleeting and as frequently frustrating as it is exciting. There are many better fantasy games, better tower-defense ga

This game is very fun and takes a lot of skill and time. It does however have some issues. The servers are just generally laggy even if you have a good connection, and for a game that requires precise placement and time it is quite frustrating when the servers don't function very well. It is also very much pay to win and it is very easy to get angry when you get put against someone who shouldn't be playing against you. Its a fun game but look out for these things if your considering playing it.

This game is pretty fun with its strategy and gameplay. I just find the matchmaking for the later arenas like arena 14 frustrating. I'm just saying it's annoying to have a clear disadvantage against a decent player. I still give the game a try. I just hope people don't have to fight maxed level units with low ones.

There is an algorithm in the game. After a certain place, the opponent starts to come according to your deck( in a bad way). The object of the game is to keep you in a certain trophy, or to make you spend as much time there as possible. So you have to spend money to go further because there are really annoying and very strong opponents coming (like 5 14 level cards in one deck at 5000 trophy). But it's a good game if you don't get greedy and play comfortably.

So after 4 and a half years of on and off playing, I still somewhat enjoy it. With that being said, the addition of champions was a HUGE mistake, and is what will forever keep me from rating 5 stars, unless they're actually balanced. But with a game of its type lasting 5+ years, whilst being somewhat balanced without being too "Pay2win" is certainly admirable, and worthy of 4 stars.

Clash Royale is the best game ever because it perfectly blends strategy, skill, and fast-paced action. Each match is unique, demanding smart deck building and quick decisions. Real-time battles keep the game exciting, and frequent updates add fresh cards, modes, and balance changes. It’s easy to learn but challenging to master, making every victory satisfying. Clans, tournaments, and leaderboards build a strong community that keeps players engaged and always striving to improve. I enjoy clash!

worst meta play I've seen in a long time the elixir is so inconsistent it's insane 5+7 somehow is 10 when it's not even possible then other cards just being terrible to others honestly the worse experience for free to plays filled with pay 2 win slop honestly I'm surprised this game is popular it is extremely horrible go play another game please this doesn't a player base don't support greedy devs.

Used to be really fun, but with each update, it feels like it is getting harder and more oppressive to progress. this game is so bad with balance changes and releasing cards it is impossible to have a good deck in any metta bcs the release s card that is absolutely broken and it changes the the who metta and it's impossible to play f2p it's just a rly bad company it's just a rly rly rly rly terrible game nothing is fair there is no such thing as an even match it's either u go up against a hard counter 2 games in a row and then the next game u win it just repeats. fix the damn game 😭

The worst of pay to win. Every match there is someone with max out troops. Even in the lower trophies. Highly recommend not to play this game if you are free to play or have anger issues thank you.
This game has turned into "Bigger the wallet Better the cards!" dont play unless you got money to spend.

The game is unplayable. Lags horribly, frequently crashes or freezes mid-game. Played several games where I lost while in the loading screen 😐. Game-play wise, its good! No exploits glitches or what have you. With regards to 2v2s and 1v1s and even challenges; Instead of just playing a random player in your class you seem to get matched up against players that directly have the cards that beat you. All in all, I used to recommend this game. However, grind something else. Itll save you pain.

This is a great game! I loved playing it at first and it was so satisfying to level up your cards. However, as of lately, the game has been getting a bit stale. I do however love the game, the skill involved with it, and all the different options. Overall great game, juat needs something new.

Ngl i used to play back in 2019 and i used to have some good cards like legendaries but i wanted to play it again so i downloaded it last month and tried to get the account, i had the gmail but it didnt let me have my old account so i had to restart the game and now its changed. pay to win so its trash

AI BOTS BY TENCENT USING FAKE PLAYERS. ABSOLUTE PAY TO WIN. UNPLAYABLE. NO HUMAN PLAYERS FOR MONTHS. Supercell is rigging their games to prevent you from winning matches. Absolutely DO NOT start playing this game. The game uses a lot of psychological tricks to trick players into spending money. New cards will be introduced, and match-making will pair players who don't spend money on the new card up against players who do. In one mode where only 1/4 decks can POSSIBLY have that card, I've been consistently facing it 50~75% of the time. This defies random chance (aka. bad luck). The game is PURPOSELY designed to be unbalanced and less fun unless you pay.

This game passed from #2 strategy to just strategy. And there is no longer a strategy. You just play over and over against the same pre-configured decks with high win rate. At this point, I see the first card, and I already know the end. The other day a member from my clan says "this game is no longer entertaining even while taking a s**t", which I find to be the perfect description. Don't waist your time on this. After thousands of hours you are going to realize that it just frustrates you.

Why is the empress for merge tactics so weak? It costs $20 to unlock and is by far the weakest. Whenever I play her the RNG for cheap units go up the roof and only get 3-4 elixir cost units. She dies by turn 2 or 3 and maybe get 1 fusion in. Whoever did the systems design for her should get fired.

I've played this game exclusively for years. It was easily the best game out. But now it's terrible. Every update in the last 2 years has made everything so confusing. Evolutions, champions, cards with multiple abilities, and towers that launch goblins have made it impossible to keep track of everything. All the skill I've accumulated over the last 6 years has gone out the window because of overpowered cards. It's pay to win now.

Overall great game, fun to play, easy to set up. Supercell makes it really easy to connect with friends as well by creating clans. Mostly kind playerbase and beginner friendly. my only problem is that a lot of good cards are unlocked through money.

I've been playing for 7+ years. Pay 2 win is very strong with this game. It was always p2w. I was ok as f2p for awhile, but just recently, it has become unplayable unless you fork out money. I play this game for 5 years. It's probably the only game that I actually got good at. This game is different from every other game out there. I've been playing this for 6 years, close to seven. And it may be fun, but this game sucks, honestly. It's completely P2W. Used to be fun, In the new update it's just pay-to-win Clash Royale was a great game, but now it's almost impossible to level up your cards unless you spend money. this game is fun but if you got a job and got a credit card then it's not, I like to call it the EVO credit card

Supercell has made a really fun game that's they've entirely destroyed with their pay 2 win model. If you haven't gotten in to the game at this point, there's no point in starting now. But if the game is genuinely difficult to have fun with, don't play it so much, if at all.

I've played this game since it was released. It used to be fun and reasonably rewarding, but now it's clearly headed toward being pay to win. After playing this game for four years I can say with full confidence that Clash Royale is one of the most upsetting, frustrating and disappointing games to play. game is pretty chill and its getting way more free to play but every time i try to play merge tactics the game kicks me out and i cant seem to be able to get back on the game until the merge tactics match has ended.

Amazing game. However, it's kinda pay to win, now. Also, recently, whenever I try to go onto the game, it doesn't work. I keep waiting, and waiting, but the screen just says 'Updating' I waited half an hour for it to work, but no success. I restarted my phone, reinstalled the app, tried everything, but it still doesn't work.
Great game just fix the sound that peka says when you place him down he says mega knight in pekas voice

Don't even consider playing, at first it may seem fun and climbing the ladder is easy but very soon after you see how much this game is pay to win. The card levels play a big part in if you are going to win because one level will decide if a goblin barrel takes 2 or more shots or if you troops are on par with theirs. Theirs also a lot of balancing issues even though the game had been out for years. The meta also never changes and has stayed the same for a long time

I would like to actually give a 0 star rating as Supper Cell do not give any assistance regarding help needed urgently. They are pathetic with service the support system does not work and now I have lost 9 Years of playing Clash Royale as my account got hacked and I was seeking assistance in order to restore it. 12k trophies gone down the drain. If this is how one is supposed to keep the people happy it's not working. I do not recommend any person to download a supercell game.

In the beginning it was the best game I had ever played on my phone. Now though connection during just about every game is terrible. Sometimes the game doesn't even load. It could be that I just have a bad phone. But honestly I've played it on worse and done better. Not to mention that this game is getting far to expensive for my blood. If you want anything good you can wait a few months or buy it...

wtaf is merge mode on? cards are randomly drawn sure, but the chances of getting what you need seem to be predetermined before you even start your first match. then when you think you'll be smart and trade in your pieces, the RNG so conveniently decides to draw all the cards you just traded in.... I could setup a bot that would just play, as long as I keep playing my score will always go up... regardless of however many matches I lose.

I like the game but the developers have strangely decided to foster a culture of extreme toxicity and bming so they can make money selling bm emotes.....very toxic, I can't see anyone sensitive playing, the game is full of haters and misogynists. (also they are a pay to win game, I have payed each season for 2+ years and still havn't maxed my decks, this is WAY more than the cost of a AAA pc game). tl:dr- play a decent PC game, this isn't worth it. edit: 2025 wow it's worse than ever 0 stars

I think this game could use some large mass arena, or like a huge battle field like team deathmatch, I just think the diffrent modes with events in them ain't enough for my any more, but thats me and so far I do love the game. Its iconic with great character, but honestly I hate when somebody uses an overpowered push and I counter they just give up. I don't really care if nobody reads this. Just keep up the good work its a great game.

Ive been playing this game for 4 years now, and i think its been really fun. What really sucks now is that they added lvl 16 AND heroes? whats the point of champions now? there def ruining this game, and it sucks.

I had review at 5 star but I've realized the whole system of leveling cards, opening crates for more cards, leveling them up( which I enjoy), really doesn't matter in most of the game. most of the game is leveled off anyway Until they add a 2v2 where u can actually use the cards that u put all your effort into, it won't feel as fun for me, I understand balancing issues, but add a mode where people can choose balanced, or leveled.

The game is overall fun. But there's this match making problem. I would always be matched with someone who's a level or even 2 levels a head of me. How am I supposed to win? This game is fun but this problem is ruining the experience. I would rate this 5 stars but the match making problem caused me to loose so much. It's obvious it's kind of biased. Please fix this. I'm already loosing interest in the game. Thank you.

Deck building game with some fun mechanics and quick gameplay. But make no mistake, until you have all level 13 cards it's pay to win. No matter how good you are you will hit a point where your opponents have an average deck of cards 2-3 levels higher than yours and they will win with just brute force. It also feels like it's nearing the end where they've designed themselves into a hole. Upping the max card level gives higher players something to work towards but it's just more grinding.
been playing since release. disappointed with game balance since people have been coming back. I get it. a company has to make money but this is beyond greedy
amazing game always loved it but owners killed it with heroes and pay ro win😞

The game was around a 3.5 but with this newest update that brings level 15 cards, it has plummeted to a 1 out of 5 which I believe is fair considering the huge shift from a "pay to win" game that does try to help "free to play" players have a chance to compete, to a totally pay to win monetization system. The Battlepass was a good help when it was $5 a month, now it's twice that if you want to get everything the battlepass has to offer, i think the first game with a 3 purchase tier battlepass.

yeah so far so good game l love play everyday untill last update it just become pay to win now you can just use gems to upgrade cards before this update everything go great clash royale or more like pay royale meet opponents that have lvl 16 card get overleveld this game just become actual PAY TO WIN

The game keeps crashing since the new update. I was able too play it for a few days but now it doesn't even start up. I do enjoy playing the game (even though i dont agree with what happened with the trade tokens). So could you please fix this so i can give you for stars. You lost the one star, because you probably won't fix it before the next Brawl Stars challenge ends. I was really looking forward to it.

Game is fun but customer service and any aid with an accidental purchase is nonexistent in my experience thus far. even a simple card exchange for accidental purchases would he better than what's currently offered.

The worst game in terms of support and providing assistance. They do not respond to messages and do not communicate with players to solve their problems. A supporter needs support in order to respond to customers or pay money in order to solve a problem you face within the game. The worst company you can fall into the trap of assistance and support service. There are no solutions, no help, no solution to your problem, just a lot of nonsense. Very, very bad experience.
This game is a master class on how to destroy a game and alienate your fan base in a single update. Heroes + lvl 16 turn the game from semi p2w to fully p2w

It's an ok game been playing for a month. Very slow to progress to higher level unless you want to unleash on the pay to play scale. The matching system really sucks plus the chests you obtain you really should have a choice on what you want otherwise you will be mostly disappointed 3 stars. Lots of better more friendly options out there so uninstalling but wanted to leave a review.

absolutely horrible game, devs say they have fair matchmaking but as soon as you take a specific card out of your deck every player you play against has a card you cant counter because you took a card out of your deck. Example, evo executioner player here, in every deck I use. However as soon as I try a fun deck without executioner, boom! 15 log bait decks, skeleton barrel mirror clone and goblin barrel clone. horrible game, dont play
great strategy game have been playing for a while but why is it so pay to win and who decided that there should be heros noon wants them please remove them supercell

This game really became disappointing. I enjoyed playing this game during the first two years, the matchmaking was great, but now I'm getting paired with higher levels then me. No matter what kind of strategy is in use I can't even use them because of the players high level. At one point in the game I got ten loss in row just because I was only getting paired with higher levels.😭

Strongest card in the game is your credit card. You won't exit an arena while being paired up with people a king tower 2 levels higher than yours. And if by some miracle you win, the next opponent is no better. Unless you have money to spend this game certainly doesn't welcome you. Hell, they even removed the shop which f2p heavily relied on just to encourage us to spend money. Skill or not, you aren't beating somebody with evolved level 15 Megaknight with a level 11 mini pekka even on defense.
it is a very competitive game with lot of ways to reach to ylthe top
its a amazing game honestly. just peak this is my very informative review.

I haven't touched the game in two years. I started up again and honestly I'm in a purgatory. It's unbalanced at all. I'm fighting lvl 11s with maxed out cards and troops and I'm level 10 troops level 11. It went from a game that could kill sometime and have fun to a painful grind of regret and sorrow. Honestly it's depressing. However my opinion won't be taken into consideration but I wanted to give the vets who haven't touched this game in about 2-3 years a warning of don't bother.

the game really good i agre bit why why they make this evo cards level 16 and heros they make it pay to win the game was so good but after ts make it hard to pkay the game isnt fair who pay more win realy??

Great game, except this last season and the cost to play is ridiculous. Also, what genius decided it would be a good idea to make war decks uneditable after we play? That's when it's fresh in my mind that I'd like to edit a deck, please fix that. Secondly charging $12.99 a month for any type of pass should be criminal. Match making needs and over haul.

not fun anymore. everyone plays evo credit card and wins. Boss bandit spam Bridge Pekka mega knight and the rest 1 elixir cards. Ts bullcr@p is in every match. Not even enjoying matches anymore. All toxic, no skill left.

this game has great potential. But some of the characters are overpowered. I also suspect sometimes the game slows down the Elixir production speed for some players. I've measured and have noticed inconsistent times. some characters have excessive strength and when coupled with increased Elixir time makes this game very frustrating. I've uninstalled this game five times wanting to give it one more chance, but this time I'm done

Great fun for 5 minutes at a time... Or more. If you are complaining about level it is because the rest of us have been playing for years. Grind it out like the rest of us. I have a ton of max cards and have spent very little money. If you feel like you have to "catch up" then spend it. The clash team has made an amazing balance between grind to play and pay to play. Better than most games!! I would like to see a maximum level difference of 1.5 that would calm all the complaints. 🤔👍

I know no one will see this review, but whatever. I've been playing this game for 6 YEARS and let me say; this game has devolved. The core gameplay is amazing. One of the best mobile games out there. Amazing strategy with well made cards. The only problem is in the most recent days, SuperCell has encouraged paying real money to get an advantage. When a new card releases, it's broken. You can max level it by buying it, It gets nerfed, a new card releases, it's broken. Rinse and repeat.
A fun game but is be coming very pay to win.

Don't download this game unless u plan on putting money into it. It is very much a "pay to play" game. The higher u get in the game the easier it is to see that. It is NOT a free to play friendly game. Also clan wars suck! It almost seems like they purposely give you terrible cards to use every time. The game lags a lot resulting sometimes in a loss. Also it will crash from time to time which will definitely result in a loss. Legendary cards are near impossible to come by. I've been playing for over a year and I still don't have all the legendaries. You will constantly get the same cards instead of cards you need. The new emotes are kinda cool but u have to pay for them. So free to play players can't access them. They are constantly nerfing the good cards and buffing the bad ones. Not downloading this game is ur best bet.

Its fun as long as you are ok with slow progression. If you play this game 12 hours a day you'll only progress slightly faster than someone who spends 30 minutes a day. The game itself is great, theres a lot of cool strategies to test, but if you're someone who likes to get everything unlocked in a week and move on your going to have a bad time.
Amazing game! For refrence, here are some skilled cards: - Mega Knight - Lumberjack & Balloon - Boss Bandit - E Golem - Witch - Elite Barbarians & Rage The game is also very free to play!

Good game bad company; would not recommend unless you are willing to spend real life money. This game is HEAVILY pay to win. Every corner you look at has p2w aspects even in a casual duels meant to have players on the most even playing field has ways to get advantages with broken cards released monthly only obtainable through the pass or grinding 1-2 months to get it in which it’s likely nerfed. In the trophy road you often play against people who spend real life money with higher level cards...

Game was good before but now it's almost entirely pay to win, and matchmaking isn't fair at all, you will be placed against opponents twice your level and with cards that you can only get at that level by paying real money. I've been playing this game for 6 years so I know what I am talking about. If you don't spend you dont win. simple as that

Clash Royale is a pretty good strategy game. It has a great graphics along with good gameplay. The battle algorithm is quite good too. But I am not so satisfied with the controls. It runs slow on 1 GB RAM smartphones. Plus, it charges highly on mobile data. Supercell should put the whole game in a 90 megabyte package. I had another problem when playing it on PC via bluestacks and Gameloop. It faces problems and a lot of lagging. So, supercell should also create a PC version of this game.

This game could have been so much better then what it's become. The wars are absolutely oppressing. Not having the ability to select when to start them and who to put in them has lead to burnout. If your clan isn't active enough to finish in the first 2 or 3 days then you end up only having 1 or 2 days off from needing to war. I've been leading a clan for well over 3 years now and this boat race war update killed it. People don't want to have to play so often. Come up with a better system.

I literally lost a match because the game froze, so I reset the app and by the time I load into the match I was a second away from losing. Supercell needs to have a system where you can report a loss where you had no say in.

Great game turned into P2W trash. I loved Clash Royale at the start, but as you progress through the game, which takes a long time, more time is needed to even have a chance against opponents. The current state of the game requires money to be on an even playing field with others, not to mention absurd prices for offers. $140 for evolution shards, you can't tell me this isn't P2W.

Long time now, the devs have been getting more and more greedy and ruining the game with each update. Ever since the Clan Wars 2 update the game has been turning into a p2w mess, which pretty much made me stop caring for the game. At the beginning it was fine, but card evolutions, emotes locked behind pay walls, banners just being a thing and premium stuff pretty much being required just ruined every fun aspect. It used to be a fun game. Now it's not. Wanna guess why? Read from the beginning.

Game is good but needs a revamp or new content Update 11/15/21 A handful of new characters were added along with a few modes but the maps are boring. There's no effort into making them unique. There's no gameplay change. They actually made the game much easier to progress which was a terrible thing. All in all the game is good but it's stale and in need of a major update to revamp the levels, make them interactive or less static, more unique.

Game is good to a point. It is addictive. However you will only get so far without paying. If you don't pay matching system changes when get high enough. This games matching system and elixir throttle are completely BS. I spend money on games after I play them for a bit to see what their about. Would never spend money on this one. Unless your one of their YouTubers it's not worth it. Scam to get you to back one of their creators also.

2 stars purely because of the fact that litte rats can come from 6 arenas higher with their good card and slaughter you. here's how you fix that problem. if you get knocked down an arena, you can't use a card from higher arenas. FIXED. Literally wouldn't have that issue at all. such a simple fix yet never implemented.

The game is great, I play it as often as I have breaks...which is a lot! However, since the recent update, I have notice that some of my cards have been 'replaced or better yet...removed. Almost lime some of my progress has been removed. Cards I had, I no longer have. Please fix. Over a year now, and still waiting for some sort of reply/response from the developers. It's clear they are working on the game, as there are updates. But at the same time, clear they read the comment. Typical.

This game is a lot fun and strategic. But sometimes I just can't log in! I mean I can't enter the game, even if I can enter the game I face so LAG that it is the same as not entering it. For this thing I even lost the Sudden Death Tournament, it was my last chance! I even checked my internet it was totally working right I could even watch YouTube a lot smoothly, So plz fix this!

This game has always been a pay-to-win game. It's definitely possible to get good playing free-to-play, as I am free-to-play and have gotten very high on ladder and high levek cards. However that doesn't stop people from paying their weekly paychecks to get max level cards before they should. The balancing team (team behind making cards fair/not overpowered or underpowered) are out of their minds. The new battle pass is stupid as well. Avoid this game if you can. I could go on but 500 limit.

pay to win , doing everything they can to make players spend money . and secondly, fix your glitches, screens not loading, going into battles 2v2 , taking longer and longer, hell my game isn't even opening up , and it's happening a lot.

this is the worst game of all time, some cards need a nerf but instaed of this you go and nerf a weak card and adding level 16 to the game is a good way to make money from players right?I'm changing my openion when you add good balance changing and add a level cap, I hope you don't add level 17 soon

The game itself is lots of fun! I've been playing it for a long time but recently it has been horrible getting matched against people 2 to 3 crown levels higher than me. On top of that the game has really become a pay to win. How am I supposed to even just compete with someone who is 2-3 leves higher than me and their cards are way stronger than mine. Fix that issue and the game is easily a 5 star game.
worst game in the world. Pay to win no1 game.No any fair between players.Developers intention is to make more money not to make game better.
extremely pay to win and update quality just gets worse and worse. A waste of time supporting a game that doesn't respect the players

What's up with getting paired up with opponents that are 2 levels higher all the time. I dont stand a chance. Ever since they started the subscription for battle chests. I now only play until I lose 2 games in a row which is usually my first 2 games. If the game lets me win then I win. If I lose 2 then no point in continuing to play. I don't stand a chance with the nonstop mismatching of levels. Either its rigged or their matching algorithm sucks. Finally deleted this game. Its annoying.

I am now editing my previous review, as there have been some updates since my last review. The game has made some great progress over the years. However, one issue that really bothers me is that every time I use an emote after finishing a battle, the game crashes. Other than this issue, the game is great, and I give it a solid 4 stars. Very entertaining, competitive, and encourages outside-the-box thinking. Overall, very good.
the gameplay is definitely more fun, but the amount of things to buy, and how everything is just shoved down your throat. This plus the lvl16 pay to win stuff. Hot dumpster fire

EXTREMELY PAY TO WIN; don't think about trying to reach the top without spending at least 100s of dollars bc of the horrible progression, the cards are annoying, and also is home to one of the most toxic communities. I have played this game from the start(Month after global launch) and I can see that the game's enjoyment is declining. The silver lining is that Supercell is now giving free items, although the people who bought them are not getting their money refunded, so bear this in mind.

Started playing this game in middle school and loved it, decided to redownload about a month ago. The amount of pay to win mechanics they've implemented is overwhelming. Constantly fighting players who have spent $ much to level their cards. I absolutely regret picking it up again. I would recommend that no one plays this garbage unless you're willing to drop $200+ on the game. Sad to see how low they've sunk to keep it alive. Seems like it's the new norm nowadays. Would give 0 starts if I could

bored to tears of this game, who thinks of these games, it's the worst type of grindy game, that wants to hook you into buying upgrades, this is a tax on kids, $900 million and counting, don't waste your money you will get to a level where you can't progress any further so don't start it in the first place, problem solved, constantly matching me against op opponents makes it impossible to progress, upgrade process of troops is biblically slow, 2 days is all I could stand, deleted.

it was good but now annoying, updates all the time and maintenance breaks taking ages. also glitches sometimes which explains the maintenance but its all the time and the take things away or change things when they didnt need too. dont fix what's not broken and all that

Absolutely DO NOT PLAY. The "vanilla" experience is agony due to the ridiculous amount of cards available, making it so that anything you play 70% of the time you will be queued up against someone with the perfect counter to it. And this isn't even tapping into the constant release of new, more overpowered cards. The only way i see this game being worth playing even minutes at a time is if they add a "Do not want to play against decks with theese cards" section with at least 20 card blacklists

This game is an overcomplicated version of rock-paper-scissors, where luck often outweighs skill. Starting hands and matchups largely determine outcomes, leaving little room for strategy. My experience with Supercell’s support was disappointing—I spent two hours resolving a purchase issue, only to receive an apology and no compensation, not even a token gesture. Overall, the randomness and poor support make it frustrating. I wouldn't recommend it, even as a quick bathroom distraction

The basic concept of the game, GREAT. Elite gameplay and wide range of cards to choose. I gave it a 1 star because the people who spend money on the game have a massive benefit above those who don't. I find that quite unfair. In the beginning everyone starts on the same level but later on you'll find yourself at a high arena only being King level 7 and all the people who you battle against are KL 8 and above. With troop level far higher than yours. So yeah good game but nah I'm good.
Very hard to leave a game after accidentally clicking play, crash sometimes after pressing play and when going into the shop, very hard to play without a good internet connection.

Once you start out its pretty easy. But once you make it to some of the higher levels you get consistently put in games with people and max levels who get bonuses which make them almost impossible to defeat. You get put in game after game with harassing you down to lower levels. This is a game for people who want to large amounts of their time sucked up, then slap in the face for not spending money to get to the highest level and make you feel bad cause it harasses you to losing game after game.

Would've been five stars if it didn't keep closing / not working in matches and matches only; whenever I place the gaint snowball it closes and I subsequently lose the match. This is gappening WAY too often. (I'm not arena 8 and don't/ can't get the giant snowball yet and I get it in drafts or clan wars.) Otherwise a very good and tatical game which I recommend getting. It's nice how (rarely) you can get a good deal (eg: two legendary chests for £2!) Also make the trainer difficultly optional!

Yeah so the match up algorithm for 1 vs 1 is getting worse all the time, it wasn't ever this bad before. Before, you would lose and win and lose and win but now it feels like you just lose hundreds of trophies and instead of making no progress, it's like negative progress. I've been playing for over 3 years too, and I don't think I'm so bad that I should be dropping from 5600 trophies to almost 5300 in one sitting.

Used to play 10 years ago, havent plaued in five so decided to redownload, the whole card system was hundreds of times better before. Not to mention my account was reset to zero for some reason when I spent years on that account. Honestly disgusting. Not to mention the fact that you dont get chests anymore for doing battles? What? That was the only reason to keep playing because that was how you progressed. To any returning players, save yourself the time and dont waste a minute on this game.

Because this ia an international format, i can't even abuse these guys. The game is the best (in the start) it gets highly addictive you struggle and play with the perfect strategy but, afterwards it matches you with higher level opponents and they have very very high level late game cards. You cant even play it without spending money. But if you do spend money then the game gets better and you get special items that help a lot and the match making is also the best

for the first time I hated this game especially the last update on merge tactics u round it its okay for lvl 16 some people like they had nothing to do but eco sage sooooooo unfair 5 lvl 3 cards with one hit brooo!!

It's good overall, but it can be a rage baiting game, as this game is filled with pay to win users. As a free to play, my hardest challenge is to go against pay to wins, they are way too hard to go against. Imagine seeing lv 15 e barbs in arena 5, or seeing evo lv 15 firecracker in arena 6.

In the next update please, clash royale, make adding people through the game easier. So that even if you don't know the other person's phone number or anything about them you can just search their player number and add them as a friend in the game. Thank you

I come back from time to time, and it's still a cash grab game. It's fun, but at the same time the players can be atrocious to play against. The matchmaking intentionally sets you up to lose via your opponent and stacking your deck against you. Followed by balance might as well have been taken outback and been shot in the head given all the new gimmicks they added that are behind a pay wall mostly. If you got a credit card to burn then go for it, if not don't expect to get far.

New updates have made a good game completely unreasonable and pay to win. For 12 dollars you can buy a battlepass that gives you access to things dedicated players spend literal years getting to. Makes it impossible to get trophies. Also, the removal of party mode got rid of the only stress free part of this game. Not only are people buying their way up, but the devs made it so much more difficult to get anywhere without spending crazy amounts of money.
I paid tons of money and didn't get any of the items I paid for because of "Acount Security," yet they still took my money. I had to call my bank to fix the issue. You guys need to fix this!

RIP Clash Royal. Newly branded Crash Royale. The new update was what I feared...Pay to play instead of play for free. I appreciate supercell aren't a charity and need to make their money somehow, but £4.99/$4.99 for a season pass is just unnecessarily extortionate. Also, the lag, fps and server speed has become painfully slow making the game, in many cases, unplayable. What a shame, this was my favourite game to play for the past 3 years... time to take up chess

I have been playing this game since it released. I love this game. It's truly fun, but, we should be getting matched against players with the same card level. I'm level 11 and every time I get Matched against a level 12 or 13 player, its an automatic loss. My level 10/11 cards can't compete against their 12/13 cards. (Edit 2021): The same thing continues. I'm level 11, and I get paired against level 12 and 13 Players. The difference in card level is too much. Automatic loss.

Worst game ever. It is a HUGE money grabber. Every game past arena 7 is full of people using extremely high tier cards, I'm talking about level 15 items while meanwhile you're not even a high enough arena to unlock it. This game LOVES to make people pay 2 win. Whenever I load into a match there is people using champions while those don't even unlock for another 8 arenas. Worst game ever. But sometimes it can be fun. Only if you win though.

It's kinda good.... Update: The devs keep adding more levels and making the game feel extremely repetitive rather than adding more things for progression. They also seems to be making the game more pay-to-win. I used to play this game a lot but the recent updates made the the worse and I might quit. If you are a new player, I recommend you that you stay away from the game if you are a casual free-to-play player.

cash grab unless you're in an active clan that constantly donates cards. im lvl 11 been playing almost 2 years, keep fighting lvl 9 players with maxed out cards. smh. constant crashes due to all the updates also makes it agitating. i crash once every three games, sometimes every other game. never used to do that and im not the only one. fix your stability. i feel like I'd have to upgrade my phone to keep playing at this point. other than that its a fun game, very addictive. you should try it.

Oh boy, where to begin. There are countless videos on the latest updates. Summed up: HUGE shift in greed, destroyed a very popular game zust to get even more money. Big nerfs to the economy, if you want to spend 100 plus dollars on a dying game then do it. If not, its a time waste and you can't compete without spending money because of levels. Also extremely annoying meta and overalla bad experience.

With the introduction of the pass Royale, this has essentially become a play to win game. Before you could either work hard and build up your cards or spend a decent amount of money and buy some boxes, both a relatively fair way to level up. The pass Royale has introduced a way for people to significantly increase their card level for the small small fee of $8. Before I might come across a person with all level 13 cards once every 5/6 games, now it's every second game.

this game made me want to hurt myself. As soon as I got to arena 7, I kept getting matched with players that had a bunch of evos and legendaries. I can't get anywhere and its just too hard to play once you get to a decent arena. sorry supercell.

Sorry guys, I had to see if other users felt the same. I had given 5 stars when this game first came out, due to its simplicity and same characters as CoC, but Wow has it changed from my last gameplays, I would say too much! I spaz out just trying to figure out how to relearn to play, and on top of it all, I lost all my decks. Definitely not the same game I gave 5 stars to. Happy gaming all!

Its a great game to begin with, however, it would take years to reach the final level, unless your willing to spend real money on it. Basically once you hit level 10, the progression system becomes 'pay to win'. Also if you're exceptionally good at this game you basically get punished by being teamed up with opponents a much higher level than you, which is no fun at all. I quit the game at level 10 due to constantly being teamed up with level 13's, which is extremely unbalanced and unfair.

My first review being back in October 2018, I really enjoyed this game alot. Ive played it through and through.. but Im just no longer into it, Same repetitive story, Theres not much truly "competetive" play as it all just feels the same. Because all of your progress was meaningless. At first it was okay, but late-game, your credit card becomes the strongest card in the game. It takes a long time for chests to unlock, which gives you cards, which you need to upgrade your unit's level. These upgrades seem insignificant at first, but they actually do have a huge impact in higher arenas. Furthermore, you have to constantly fight people who would normally lose to you, had their cards not been at the max level. Overall, really hard to get max level cards, so 2 stars.

Edited review as I watched the game fall off. The consistent addition of new levels, op cards, etc made the game a living hell for anyone with a life who doesn't want to spend money. You're almost forced to spend upwards to 1000$ (rough calculation to max out if you already have a mid-range account, might be higher) to be able to get past the slippery slope and actually reach a competitive level. Asides from that you'll always be on a unfair playing field with terrible and toxic tryhard players.

Fun, addictive, technically solid tug-of-war game, at least for the first few days. Then you hit a massive grind-or-pay wall, because cards costs increase exponentially every level. You'll also need to increase your payments exponentially. There's no honest purchase option (e.g. unlock all cards for X money), you can only pay for consumables, which doesn't give you an idea how much you'll need to pay in the future. Don't fall for predatory monetisation schemes. Buy honest games, where you get the full experience after paying up. Pay2Win and Pay2Play games like this one are bad for everyone.

This game is incredibly fun to play and slightly addicting. but it does have flaws, the pay to win is VERY apparent and has the absolute WORST matchmaking I have ever seen in a game....but it is mobile so take it as you wish

I've played this game since launch. I miss the simplicity and the f2p aspects of the game. Ever since the lvl 15 update it seems like progressing in the game just became harder for f2p players (I'm a light spender). I used to buy the season pass before it got nerfed into oblivion. Also, broken evolutions always seem like a cash grab with them not being obtainable without paying.
it was very fun and easy to play no ads no payment just a barrel field of fun

Edit: october 2024 update is so good. Glad its heading in the right direction. I spent a lot of hours and money on this game and unfortunately its become a parody of itself. The recent added content is too much and ruins the game. And of course, the shop offers have spiraled out of control and borderline predatory with "fear of missing out." Its a sign of a dying game. 😭

I play alot of diferent games, strategic, action, puzzles, etc this game however is great! Fast, easy and live online mutiplayer. Download. UPDATE 2018 I stopped playing for many reasons, one given that this game was great when it first came out. NOW is all pay to win. I agree that money must be made somehow but I'm tired of playing against people who payed to win.
It was better 8 years ago, when there was a draw, legendary cards hard to find, more logical cards and powers, it was more equal because no evolution, it was the best game.

Most Pay To Win Game there is ever... EVER and its not just pay to win... It's unfair matchmaking that hurts free to play players so much... Literally what am I gonna do with a level 11 deck against a level 15 pekka or mega knight spam... This game just doesnt make sense...

New update (party mode) is awful, game is slow to match, and then starts whilst the loading screen is still up, and when it finally plays the opposition is already playing and the game triple speeds to catch up. :-( It's unplayable now! Way to kill a game! Single player lags more than it ever used to.. However It's currently stuck on "updating"... 4hrs and counting!! do I can't play anyway. Maybe when it finally updates, it will be playable again. It's time to move on I guess...

it's so laggy at times I'll start a match and it will lag not allowing me to place troops while the other guy can and destroys two of my towers before I can place a troop to fight back besides the awful lag it's a good game.

I have been playing for several years now. Supercell has done a lot lately. None for the better. I am changing my review to 1 star and uninstalling. The past 2 seasons, the matchmaking is broken. It's almost impossible to win. The clan war did get boring, but thenew system is horrid. Again it's virtually impossible to win. People then get discouraged and don't participate. Not worth it as it is today. Find another game.

The game is pay 2 win, but isn't even that bad. I have been playing for 7 yrs(lost lots of accounts) and its fine but ngl lvl 15 was their one mistake, and before you point out lvl 15 is p2w, Im at 8500 f2p with 2 level 15s. but slowly the game balancing is becoming worse and worse

horrible. only makes changes for the pro players so if you start be ready for the same megaknight spam until 15k trophies. its repetitive and honestly just boring. no point to play devs dont care about the normal players so its become so PTP at mid later with megaknight and firecracker being spamed in the shop as a money grab for all the mid later players. all they care about is money. games gonna die soon because they wont fix mid later. Just sad.

This game is great it can really rile you up but you feel good when you win but the biggest tip when you lose at least 5 or 6 times you should give the game a break for an hour or 2, but supercell could you guys maybe bring a shop to buy evo shards or something but make them cost around 500 gems or if its coins make it like 250,000 to 500,000 or other spells that would be cool and maybe stuff like that but with other spells so p2w and f2w I reckon that would be a really cool idea.

No matter how much time and money you put into this game, they will just continue to increase the max level on things you spent all that time upgrading instead of adding new things. You can spend thousands of dollars and a decade maxing everything out, and they will just increase the max. All they want to do is squeeze money out of players who have spent hundreds and years on the game.

Unbalanced. It's fun until it's not. It's a pay to win game . It also need some type of rank system based on troops rank not trophy count. Until the game does that I don't think it will be a really good game till these changes are made. Maybe one day this will be a good game, but I doubt it since it's a massive cash grab. The game has a 2 tier system monthly pass. If you don't buy it, the game punishes you. There is also a problem with elixir distribution and service.Worst game in the app store.

Pay to win trash game. New update makes the game even more pay to win. You can NOT play this game as a free to play gamer. Do NOT waste your time playing this game. It will only harm your mentall health.

The shuffling of the card is the key to win the game. So if they want you to loose the shuffle won't be in your favour. This game has already set it's statistics. If you try to go over the set parameters of the trophy they'll set a match against your anti deck or there will be bug or there will be connection error. So no matter how good you play you can't cross the limit of trophies which is set by them for you. That sucks and developers you also suck. New Updates sucks. It's total waste of time

I use to love playing this game but lately it just seems like the matchmaking is off. Its redicioulos how any AI system you play always seems to have any card to counter the deck. You may have tons of cards to choose from but usually have to choose only a select number of cards in order to compete. Getting stronger cards is absolutely pointless. Game is still trash.

This game is a nasty pay to win. Balance is a joke, evolutions are broken and insanely overpriced (14€ each). You can unlock 1 every 3 months without paying. But the worst thing is that matchmaking is blatantly rigged. Win streak means you'll get paired with counter decks. What counter decks? Those with cards you have the most loss rate against. Absolutely disgusting matchmaking and monetization for what is an amazing concept of a game.

Unfairness at its best. Opponent selection based only on trophies. Is it my fault that I have more trophies so I have to fight level high players with more upgraded army?? Sometimes it feels like we're programmed to loose like the opponent elixir fills fast but we have to wait doing nothing. I lost count the no of times I uninstalled and reinstalled the game coz of frustration. IMPORTANT: IF YOU WANT TO RELAX, RELEASE SOME STRESS AND TAKE A BREAK. DON'T PLAY THIS GAME.
The Game is very Pay-2-Win. My son has became morbidly obese because of this game. he keeps saying "DAD IM PUSHING MEDALS GET OUT OF MY ROOM".

With each update the game is getting bad but then came the update of the 'evoluations' after which it has become dead. Now, only if you pay money for it, you have a chance to climb the ladder which is otherwise very impossible and frustrating. I remember the time when it used to be fun. No wonder now people don't play this.

What I think after opening a chest: Wow, that was underwhelming. At least I can actually play the game again. Seriously, if you want to progress in the game, you need to level up your cards. How do you get those cards? Open a chest every 3+ hours for no guaranteed card in your deck. This means that if you want a reward for PLAYING THE GAME, you have to wait 3+ hours(unless your willing to throw gems(money) at the game). The actual gameplay is pretty good, if not a little infuriating in itself

Basically they just want to try to get as much money out if you as possible. Yea I'm sure if you want to play this game for years without spending money you might actually get some max level cards but you'll spend most of your time frustrated that people just have max level everything somehow in the lower trophy range(lower levels of play) Basically they dont care about balance and try to get you to spend a bunch to be competitive.

Once you reach level 10, do not expect to make much progress for a year or two. Unless of course, you spend money for a "boost". Very fun and addicting game, but if you spend $200 up to level 10, expect to fork out another 200 to get somewhat close to your goal. It is an example of loot boxes from other various games. Yes you may find a really good deck, but once you get past the next leauge prepare to shell out some more money before you progress again. Their target is gambling addiction.

if there was in minus i would have given that as this greedy individual has just wanted to suck out money and give you nothing in return he has made this game completely worse for f2p players and I had played it sing 2019 and now is the worst version of it and even the matchmaking is rigged I would love to see him suffer as much as we suffered.

Horrendous gaming experience. This game has obliterated the peace of mind I once had. Now they are just trying to take advantage of you. New pass for $12 and the rewards are less then before. For $12 you better add 5 magic coins & 5 book of books. Greedy CO**SUC**RS. The games too pay to win which makes matchmaking unfun and unfair.

WARNING!!! THIS GAME IS A PAY-TO-WIN CASH GRAB. Unless you want to fork over literal years to this game you're going to have to pay money. Not just a couple dollars here and there, they're asking for 20$+ in some cases. Some shop offers even 40$+. recently the company has been sending notifications and emails to people encouraging them to spend more money in this game. Any of super cells other games would give you a much better experience without even having to spend a dime. Don't play this.

The concept is amazing, but the game just feels like who is willing to sacrifice any morals to win, with the amount of cheap and unfair combos it's no longer a game I would recommend anyone plays if they want to have fun, the only time I ever have fun is with the draft game mode when it comes out, which still sucks when you or the opponent gets a broken card. The newest update has ruined the game. I have been playing for the better half of a decade, and the game has never sucked worse than now. Every trophy road / path of legends is a draft, can't even use your decks. They up'd the price of the Royal pass, and instead of adding stuff for the increase in price, they took stuff away. Pretty much done with this game !

You shouldn't consistently face people 2 levels higher than you. 80% of my losses are from playing opponents who are higher level than me.
