EDIT: After making this review I played some more and decided to try out the party mode, capture the mortar. I'm level 11 and got placed against a level 13 9 times in a row. Your matchmaking sucks supercell

An extremely UNFAIR and PAY TO WIN game. After you progress a lot, the game will ban you and ask you to pay money to lift the ban. After you lift the ban, the game will send an email requesting money for a copyright fine, which includes something you clearly didn't do. Deleted this nonsense. Also the game always gives certain YouTubers bot opponents to promote the game. Purposely disconnects certain people when they are winning to keep noobs happy or when you about to hit a milestone

I always return to this game, I farm out cards, take a break, always enjoyed it, I welcomed the addition of the pass. I am dissapointed because it's a really enjoyable game.

do not download this app, its pay to play, no matter what, every few matches they will match you against someone that will wreck you there is no actual balance of players. there's no real bonuses just grinding and more grinding to grind even more. laaaaaammmmmeeee

Been playing this game since 2016, never have I felt that this game has become more and more of a cash grab. Unless they fix the game and change the current "credit-card-meta" then I will leave my former 5 Star review, as a 1 star.

if I had to describe this game in 1 word it would be cashgrab, you can't pass a certain arena without spending money, the only way to actually play the game is spending real life money for in game currency, the last good update from this game was in 2017,all the updates after are garbage

Although I love this game I would have to give this four stars because sometimes you fight individuals who are in a higher level and have maxed out cards while you have level 11 cards. Unbalanced Royale is a better name for it Update: instead of balancing things for the better, let's completely change things up to make even less sense. Still 0/5 game. This game could be fun. The value is at the most £9.99. All of that fun is sucked out of it by the gargantuan paywall. You have to wait to unlock battle rewards. You can only save four rewards at a time. Cards and in game currency, take an eternity to collect, probably 30 years or more. Any incentive they offer, gives you nothing as contents of chests are not guaranteed, matchmaking is so poor, clan wars are so poor, you lose 95% of the time.Or you could pay thousands to get a very slight gain.

ruined my life after spending years on it perfecting a style just for it to get nerfed into the ground, this is not the game i installed in 2016. unbalanced and undeniably scripted. Besides the game being 100% pay to win, you're guaranteed to run into plenty of cheaters. Who can play back to back high cost cards while you're waiting forever for your Elixir to recharge. Supercell does absolutely nothing to prevent/fix this or, at the very least, for you to report these players. Makes the game not fun when you face someone hacking who can put down a cost 6, 7,4, 2 another 7 card like nothing while you barely can play a cost 4 and 5 card at the same time and forced to wait.

No one who works on the development team for this game has ever played this game. Balance changes rarely make sense, and calling this a "strategy" game is a stretch at best when each game inevitably comes down to invincible spell cards with no counter play. The poor design of this game encourages lazy, braindead play styles and gives no opportunity for actual strategy, skill, or experience to shine through. If you want a fun, balanced, competitive experience, then this game is not for you.

Started out good. Then got problems after problems. Contact the help line and nothing was done about it other then shutting me down on convos. It's a pay to win game, with one of the worst errors I've seen, if I have my Bluetooth on and it disconnects or has poor signal, it is treated as my WiFi signal it doesn't matter if I have five bars, it will disconnect my game and produce lag out of no where, as soon as I turn off BT everything goes back to normal and now with seasons passes it has become just a money milking game.
heros in this game are annoying to deal with especially if you dont have one it takes the fun out of the game

level with me here supercell... just hear me out... why don't we get rid of the minimum trophy amount for ranked. Better yet, let's just make it to where there is one single level. Make it 15, 20, 1 idc some arbitrary number, then maybe... MAYBE I'll consider reinstalling this slop.
This game is meant for mobile but still does great on laptop! It runs smoothly and barely glitches. I love how they help you learn the controls unlike some other games. Its simple and fun so 5 stars.
Nice game! it teaches you strategy and what to do next thats amazing work to be honest!

Well I started playing a game when I first came out It was amazing fun game basic easy to play. As time went on they kept adding more and more. Dollar sign starter racking up to the point of now if you do have pay good luck advancing in the game it's become a pay to play game. I completely understand that you need to make some money and I was happy to put in a little here and there but now to the point where you cannot advance or do hardly anything without paying for something.

Matchmaking is broken. I either get opponents two king tower levels above me, with cards around two levels above anything I have, or opponents with decks perfectly matched to mine. Occasionally I might be on the other end of this and get a ridiculously easy opponent who gets the same treatment as I did above. What I don't see that often is an opponent who is evenly matched to me, either in king/card level or in deck layout. It seems the game is tilted in favor of those who want to spend a bunch of money to level up their cards. Otherwise, there's no progress to be made. I'd be willing to pay a subscription fee of a couple of bucks per month if it would break this cycle where those who pay the most succeed the most. I am a Level 10 King Tower with a good number of levels 10 and 11 cards. Uninstalled for now.

I mean... it's a great way to kill some time, but I'm just not really part of its target audience. Don't get me wrong tho. It's a great game and has a good UI but my problem is is that I want quick results. This means of coarse that it feals like I'm starving to death when waiting for a chest to open and that I'm more of a console/pc gamer. Still a good game

Everyone in the review section is talking about how you have to pay money to get evolutions. However, if the 6 or 7-year-old leaving those hateful reviews had any kind of patience at all, they would realize that if you play for three months semi-consistently, you're practically guaranteed a full evolution from the pass royale free evo wild shards. You can also pull wild shards or even a full-blown evolution from lucky chests. The game is free-to-play friendly, would recommend!

playing this game for 8 years now. hated it more with every year. still came back with hope, just to be disappointed. was great at the beginning. some updates were great but most of them just made it worse. its even more pay to win now. and damn i miss those old chest

Horribl experience, Pay to win, if youre underlevel you cant do anything. Chest are trash giving you cards you dont even use, when youre gonna get to the next arena you face a stuck guy with overlevel cards.

I wish it was pay to play game. It is no longer a fun game matchmaking is horrible and controlled by the company leaving no room for fun or skill. I hate the absolute state of Supercell games right now. I understand the need to maintain a loyal player base, but it feels like you've lost sight of what made your games great in the first place. You keep piling on new features—pop-ups, menus, limited-time modes, endless rewards, flashy offers, and a flood of settings. It's overwhelming. There was a time when you could simply log in, grind, and enjoy leveling up your troops or improving your card. It was straightforward and satisfying.

Love the game. Have had it for a couple years. Solid community etc. However...the new clan wars style is absolutely ruining the game. It was good until they changed it. The new pass royale system is crazy, $4.99 was a perfect attention-grabbing price point and had decent value to it. The pass royale was the only thing I would spend my money on in CRL. This game sucks to the point where I dont even know what the point of it is anymore. been playin it for 7 years best game ever by supercell first I taught this was a easy game when I reached 14 arena things became challenging and i realized that it wasn't a easy game.

I've played this game since it was released, and I was a huge fan! I loved playing 2v2 battles with my battle deck that I've worked hard on building and upgrading for the last 3+ years. It was FUN. Since this last update, it isn't fun anymore, it's HARD. I barely win any 2v2 battles anymore, which is very frustrating to me. I've worked hard for a long time to upgrade my battle deck to what it is, and now it feels like that work was for nothing because I keep losing. Please change it back!

As a player of this game for 7 years, and have put my hours and work into getting better and getting up in the ladder. I can say once this game used to be fun, but now leveling cards is a awful grind for f2p and even worse with each raise of the level cap. With balancing going out the window and the inability to have any variety in your deck or play style, for if u don't have all your cards to at least the same as your opponent you are at a great disadvantage.

I have been playing this game since release. The battle pass felt fair, and i even purchaced it on occasion. HOWEVER. The last year has been nothing but horrible updates, blatant disregard for the player base, and one money grab after another. I LOVED this game, but I would not recommend this game to anyone anymore. They gutted the battle pass and trippled the price. They keep adding levels despite no one wanting more levels, and they refuse to balance cards that have been problematic for MONTHS

Since the crashing issue has been foxed, I am now happy to give this game 5 stars. The graphics are simple, though quite charming. The controls are very simple and easy to learn. The game does have microtransactions, and though they do speed up progress, I don't think they give you a significant advantage over F2P players like myself. Updates are consistent and new content and events are being added all the time. Definitely pick this one up if you've never tried it.

This was a wonderful, yet challenging, game. Especially the recent update has made it a completely pay to win game. That made me stop playing for around two years. I tried it again yesterday and I feel like this game is hopeless. I mean honestly now we have level locked characters? All in all, I most likely won't be playing again.

Game was really fun and I felt like my money and value balanced. With the updates and how much it cost to level to 15. I can no longer spend. Clash Royale has progressively become more and more money hungry over the years. There has been a decrease in playability that has followed the rise of costs for in game purchases. The main deal that Clash Royale has is a monthly subscription that gives features that are new and completely changed the balance of the game with how over powered they often are. It is impossible for free to play accounts to keep up because the meta is constantly shifting because the devs want you to spend money.

Apparently the higher ups changed and the game started selling out. They make super op stuff baiting people to buy them, then nerf them to the ground. Sometimes it's acceptable, when it's a choice. However, those op stuffs last for a season at a time, and lately have become a requirement to rank up. Pay to win is fine, when you can win for free reasonably, but at this point, it has become a rotten apple. I still play it because the game itself is fun, but man, stuff they are adding is killing it

this game used to be fun and very entertaining but for some reason now when I play a match I seem to go against people with unlimited amount of elixir. They always have enough drop a Peka, a witch, hog rider and the prince when I can only play a mini Peka. Not worth playing anymore

I've been playing for a long time off and on but only as of recently has it become pretty insane especially if I don't buy the diamond pass. First, there's an insane amount of people that are constantly leaving the matches and there is no way to report this. Also why am I getting matched with people with troops 2-3 levels higher than me!! It makes no sense and I'm set up for failure every time. I'm beginning to hate this game.. it's sad because it was my favorite 😔

I've been playing since clash royale first came out. The game is nothing like what it used to be. It has been becoming more pay to win over time, which was alright but the most recent update has went too far. They made progression 50% harder and have put in offers with starting price tags of $50 plus. Don't download this game, and if you do, don't pay for the ludicrously priced features that they almost make mandatory.

Game is far less enjoyable than it used to be, that is because now there are so many characters with different abilities that a strong element of luck is needed that your deck has the right characteristics to have a good battle with opposing deck. In the past far more skill was needed and the game although frustrating at times really hooked you in. The game already had a good revenue stream, its pure greed of the developers. The long term enjoyment of the game is gone.

Clash is one of the greatest mobile games ever made and supercell ruined it with greed. The game is in a sad state and only looks to be getting worse. Between game breaking evos and facing players 2-3 lvls higher than me consistently, its impossible to climb trophies without spending more money than modern triple a games cost. Its sad to see how far this game has went down the gacha game route.(if you google gacha games, clash is a top result)
A bit pay2win but still fun no ads

I've been playing this game for 8 years, May be 4 to 5 hours per day and I enjoy it! It's brilliant! But now look at the shop! Look what you did with the evolutions. It's fraud! Had to update my review! The game was fun and enjoyed playing. Was fun. I played 6 years. Spent hundreds of $ and more hours than I care to imagine. Frustrating, annoying and ultimately dull game. The initial period of play is great, advancement is fast with lots of prizes and incentives along the way. I played this game for years and I decided to change my review. It is a real shame seeing this game fall into the pay-to-win mechanic so deep. There were always these little microtransactions, but they were predominantly for speeding up your progress and getting more cards to upgrade your deck. Your skill could always win you the game even if you are at a disadvantage. But now if you have not spent a fortune buying the latest evolutions you will not enjoy your time at all. Pay to win. This game has great potential, but developers are after $$$ not game experience. Im a level 10, mostly facing level 12s and 13s. Clash Royale looks fun but has serious problems. The game creates stress and frustration, slowly hurting players mentally. Losing often feels unfair because money matters more than skill. Clash Royale should focus on fair play, mental health, and respect instead of money.

Unbalanced, pay to wins, horrible match making - literally, as I change my deck, I get match made with literal hard counters! It's OK, unbalanced times for chest openings and such. However gameplay itself is excellent, no complaints there. Smooth graphics, runs amazing on higher-end devices, but has some difficulty on lower ones. The chest cap discourages players from playing for a good while, so this is best for those with little time, as you can play a game, get a chest, then get off until it opens.

Game uses shady techniques(moving important buttons) to trick players into accidentally clicking purchases that use gems with zero confirmation of what you are purchasing. If you do realize what happened, that the equivalent to 5 real world dollars on what amounts to 1 card, and ask support if they can refund this incredibly shady transaction. Support will fully sympathize, but will tell you it would be unfair to refund you, but they're sure you got something "really good" for your purchase.
This game has been completely destroyed by the developers, the matchmaking is terrible, the game is pay to win, and every player is toxic.

hate this game's two player pvp, idk why are the other players so pathetic. I played 5 matches and what a coincidence all 5 matches my partner just left in the middle, supercell should look at this. Game can be fun at times. The continuous long grind to unlock and upgrade cards is unreal! The visuals and controls are fine. The gameplay is where things get annoying. AI doesnt work the way it should, troops are easily distracted and will sometimes go for the least convenient ans least strategic attack. Microtransactions are everywhere. This game is highly pay to win. Overall this game could have been enjoyable however its crippled with microtransactions and the gameplay is seriously broken.

This game's algorithm works as when you don't purchase anything then you won't progress much. As if you'll win 2 matches in row then top level of player will come against you. Like I have a deck with level 11-12 cards. And I am getting golden level 13 fully upgraded players. This is the way they force you to purchase for further progress. That's it!! Worse than a scum.

There's no feasible way for a person to play fairly on this game. In order to advance you have to pay to play. The game is intentionally broken so certain cards are either required (like zap) or unusable (like earthquake). Insanely frustrating and more addictive than hard drugs. The boat system is overly complex and doesn't even really work even if you have a squad of 10 people actively working on it. Lots of problems, but its one of the few games available that actively involve combat with others, even if it is cheap , frustrating, and annoying combat. Needs a "middle finger" emote.

This game used to be really good, but somehow supercell managed to completely screw it up. If possible, I'd give it negative stars. At level 8, I keep getting matched with lvl 10's and 11's. Not just one or two, but most of the battles. However I never found someone below my level. I've been playing for 8 years, through many changes like the clan wars. But this update removing the chests has fundamentally killed the draw of the game for me. I enjoyed popping online and getting chests, seeing if it'll be a silver or even a magical chest, and then knowing I will get to open it after a timeframe as it unlocks in the background. Loot crates were okay as a secondary item, even as annoying as they are to open, but completely having them take over limits uniqueness in the game.

adding level 15 may be what kills this game. This is a new review, 1 star lower (was 3 before) because my previous review was removed. Thats a shady move. First off, the game has solid gameplay, and seldomly has bugs... I can not say much negative there. However, the matchmaking system is 100% based on trophy level alone, which makes for mismatched matches far more often than well matched one. Furthermore, the emote system has produced a player base with the worst sportsmanship and toxic behavior I have ever seen in gaming.

is a great game. controls really fit handheld touch screen. lots of modes to play. my only complaint is its so boring opening all the chests, I only bother to claim the shards now. I need to get an auto clicker and leave my phone to claim all. should be a claim all button

The game was fun at first, but after reaching a few arenas, I noticed something way off. I kept losing in every match and I thought it was because I had to redo my deck. After reworking my deck I STILL kept losing. This was because in almost every match, you're fighting someone who is a much higher level than you. It's rediculously unbalanced. Some cards are also overpowered and you don't have cards to counter said OP card. Overall, the game in unbalanced. This is basically a pay to win game.

Great game, well balanced cards with updates every 2 weeks. Unfortunately it is getting to the point where it is impossible for F2P players to progress and the meta in itself is unsustainable due to too many different cards.. more variety is great but 90 odd cards in a game that worked fine with 40 is a bit much. Having said that I'm still addicted 4 years in 😆

Great game, if they did away with live viewing (even if only a 5 second delay) I would give it 5 stars on game play, too many people creating multiple accounts and cheating by live viewing to see what opponents cards are available. Used to be a great game! But then it seemed the dev team lost heart it. They tried here with evolutions, but then destroyed it by making one of the most annoying cards in the game evolve. I've had the Clash for 3 years and its been really fun to play with mates and everything the reason I gave it 4 stars though is because of me not being able to find the right clan and emote spammers in-game. Busted matchmaking. Don't waste your time. The game clearly places you against players with much higher level cards, or simply cards you don't have access to at the moment. I have been playing this game for almost 7 years, I still remember trophy racing with my friends at school, and I have been pretty much free to play the entire time, I got the pass every once in a while but that's it, I love this game; however I feel betrayed by the developers as during the last few years I've seen a game I've loved be turned into a money grab clearly shown by: decreasing the rewards from the pass, introducing level 15 and evolutions, obviously terrible offers in the shop.

It's a fine game in theory, but the entire leveling system makes it a pay to win nightmare. You can run into a game with a person 2 levels ahead of you, and your opponent's deck is effectively 40% better than yours. No serious strategy game can exist with such a system. On top of this, the new card evolution system is just another way to make the game even more pay to win. To my knowledge, as a free-to-play player, it takes AT LEAST 6 months to evolve 1 card. There are 109 cards in this game.

Designed to stop you when they want. Used to enjoy playing this but gave up a year or so ago. Started playing again recently and it's even worse. Never get cards you want/play all the time. Will only allow you to get so far then you're pitted against people 2 levels above so you just cannot win. Once your trophy count is down again, you start winning again. Uninstalled and will not make the mistake of returning again. Only way to progress at a reasonable rate is to buy the cards you want.

It's fun until you reach a certain level, but then, it starts to get really annoying when you start to confront low level players with maxed out cards that they get through buying everything they can, making it a mismatch because sometimes there is no way to beat them, after a year of playing this, I'm getting bored just because of that

If you're a new or returning player I'd advise not playing as the recent decisions have clearly shown that the developers are very out of touch of what the players want. This update takes more away from the players than given. To throw 2v2 in the party tab which doesn't give chests but now no crowns either to progress the battle pass that's now very unrewarding compared to it's previous version, which costs more with it's new tier that costs twice as much! I'd rather no update than this.

it is a good game but it is just to many people are pay yo win and yall do not have any new cards in the game or any new evos its getting to the point where im going to quit so just add new evos please thank you

It's a some-what entertaining game to pass short periods of time but it takes way too long to open chests, which you're limited to four in total. They take 3hours or more to unlock and they can only be opened one at a time. So basically after 4wins in a 3 hour period you don't get much of anything for further victories. Also, I have a Samsung Galaxy J3 Emerge and have played this game on my last 3 phones but I can't link to my Google at account in game so I'm starting over again

This game was very good from the start, fun and strategic, however, the credit card has the final say. You may play and face players with higher level cards due to the terrible matchmaking or just that the other player spent more money. The lastest updates have only hurt those who don't spend money, making progression longer and slower with no fun features, just copy and pasted events. The developers have great ideas but only care about those who spend money, reminds me of War Thunder.

I have been playing it since 6 years but now when I installed it after a break, 2-3 months ago there were some issues I faced. I thought might be network issue but after I started playing daily it became worse and I uninstalled. Again I downloaded it since a month, the problem persists and its not network issue. 1 year back it took 1-2 seconds for card deployment but now it takes 4 seconds for a card to deploy. Is it really an online game now. Plus the updates are becoming worst time to time.

Like any other pay to win game it's fun at first then you get to level 7-8 and you are stuck if you play without buying gems. You could 'out-strategize' your opponent and his purchased armies will still roll right over you. Sounds fun right? Also, the servers drop signal periodically. Also, they have formulas for pairing decks up against opponents i.e. if you have a Giant, you opponents will have some anti-giant card to make them competitive.

Takes too long to open chests with only 4 slots available then fights have no benefits at all while you wait 8 hours for one chest to open and the others say there doing nowt. Watching the higher level replays there seems nothing to exciting to aspire to match their levels. Really not sure this is one of the better mobile games but I'm sure every update will bring something fun to the game. I'll wait and see.

Game is set up to make you spend money to get better. Whatever deck you use, the matchmaking will put you against decks that are hard counters and make it super hard to win. "Yes, spend money on our game to level up cards" but don't win 2 matches in a row because the game is set so that if you do, your next several matches will be against higher levels with maxed out cards . DO NOT SPEND MONEY ON THEIR GAME. Use it to kill time and nothing more.

The account recovery on this game is amazing, i lost my account and, within a week , got it back. However, I am now changing my review of the game because supercell's recent updates have changed the game for the worst and they are trying to force more money out of there player base as they put more and more stuff behind pay walls.

One of the worst cash grab games on the market after recent update. Slowed progression down to an all time low nerfed the gold pass and double the price for it. Actual game play has gone down so much with evolutions and to make it worse is the match making makes it so you win one and lose 3 in ranked to make you pay for additional cards to try and win more games but that won't work. Game has gone down hill so much and it's a shame.
The game is definitely pay to win. No real strategy over time, lower level players can easily defeat higher level players.If they're willing to spend the money.

Clash The game is simple yet entertaining. This game is fun at the beginning. But once you get into the leagues there is almost no control over you winning or losing. You will face pay to win people with maxed out cards that will just overpower you no matter how good you or they are.

Higher levels are unbalanced and it becomes a waste of time. I'm at the lowest crowns in my tier and EVERY single game matches me against players with higher level cards. The game is more fun at low levels where cards are more balanced and not much stronger, even if a level or two is uneven. It makes sense they'd do this at higher levels to force you to spend money to compete, just like all the other microtransaction games.
Like any mobile game, to play competitive you have to pay to win. Greed

Not worth it, once you reach 5000+ trophies it is going to be a hell for you. League resets like anything, the opponent comes with higher level cards and clash royale makes sure you loose the game. They try to show you that it is not possible to win and also will show you that you can buy everything. I hate to play this game after 5000 trophies as it is not fair, to spend time. I spend days going to challenger 2 and one reset brought me back to challenger 1, what is the point to a golden step.
After the game update, it automatically exits when entering the lobby. Please fix this. My clan leader is very disciplined, and he will kick me out of the clan if I don't attack soon.
the entire experience is p2w and encourages you to spend your money rather than play normally.

Having issues since the October update. Every time I login to the game I get the WiFi symbol, then it takes for ever to find a 2v2 partner, then as the other 3 players are placing troops I can't because the players names are still on my screen. After that it is like the game is on fast forward to catch me up. Then it is still slow and laggy. So since the October update the game play sucks. I am almost to the point of deleting this game for good Other then this I enjoy the game. My rating for oct
merge tactics was fun until they added sage. cant even have fun in this game anymore.
Fun game but can be pay to win in some aspects. Overall though it can be frustrating at times for the most part, it's a great game highly recomended!

The game hasn't changed in the slightest for over a year now. It's the same meta constantly being used. If you aren't max level cards you don't push far and lose constantly, only people who play are top tier ranking. If you are new or under th-13, just delete the game and find something else to play. Update: They added pay to win cards. If you go against those people that have the pay to win cards you lose. I suppose I shouldn't be surprised at this point, "it's a moble game"

After playing on and off over the years, I finally felt some sort of accomplishment after upgrading most the cards I frequently use to the max level and nothing will beat how I felt when I reached Legendary Arena for the first time. Sadly, it seems the devs keep shifting the goal post farther and farther, requiring more time and money to reach that feeling of accomplishment. Its a vicious cycle that im finally comfortable breaking. Was fun while it lasted, but this update truly is for losers.

Alright, I'm going to be brutally honest with you. At first, I thought this game was legit garbage. That was until I unlocked hog rider. After that, it became my number one phone app. I started clearing my schedule to give me at least five hours a day to play. I find that hog rider brings me comfort. I open the game and hear that beautiful jingle, I see the loading screen and then.... an angelic delight. One time Clash was down and I had a panic attack, I started shaking. hope this helps. 🥰

It would be higher. I am a champion player, played for just over a year. The game itself is really good, its a challange especially if you're underlevelled. The reason it's not higher is, over the year of playing it I noticed that instead of finding true balance in the cards they have now, they repeatedly bring out new cards quicker than they can balance the game. Every time you update, you break the game either in terms of having to sort out bugs that slow and lag the game out or an op card

The new update is too bad. 1. The daily tasks may mention something, but once you accomplish it, the game doesn't reward you. Instead, it changes the tasks. 2. The 2vs2 game was great fun. Now, it doesn't reward chests which spoils tge fun. 3. The developers keep adding new levels to troops instead of improving the gameplay. I think the game is getting boring. Earlier, it was fun

The game was very different and cool at first. Unfortunately the game has to turned into a "pay to play" so to speak. Yes, the game is free but if you are unwilling to pay for additional help throughout the game you will find yourself getting beat over and over by either unfair matchups in levels or people who are willing to shell out hard earned cash just to be able to compete with others. I believe the game has run its course. All updates are no longer exciting nor is the game anymore.

This game used to be really challenging and fun ,haven't playing for years install it agin ,now I wish I didn't however create this new system and new cards ,you must been missing on ideas for sure ,like take example Firecrackers girl she literally destroy my tower from the other side of the bridge imagine that ,the card just literally broken ,golden knight aswell ,new system for whatever makes card gets more power in advance i guess that's what called ,anyway GG DELETED

This update killed the game for me. I played for 9 years, but with the removal of chests, season shop, win streaks, etc there is no point in me logging on every day. or ever. Now it's just cash offers in every nook and crevice of the game. I can overlook a lot of things, but there is no fun in this game anymore.

Played for many years. I'll keep it short, the once simple interface has become crowded horribly, this fun game has become increasingly pay to win and is getting more complex and confusing just to earn a few more bucks. Unnecessary things are added just to earn money. Wish I could play the old version before they updated 3-4 years ago. Also tower troops break the balance of all cards.

The game frustrates you with lack of cards, which you might need to build your deck, and matching you up against the opponents far much stronger than you (which means you're going to lose). In addition to the above problems, the game hangs a lot in the beginning and during the matches. If there was an option of giving 0 stars out of 5, I would have chosen that; this game doesn't deserve your time. As frustrating as anything.

It is a ton of fun and has a little bit of a learning curve but nothing a few YouTube videos won't fix. It is fun but challenging especially as you go up in arenas and I've had a lot of fun grinding to go up levels it's pretty easy to play free to play if you can stand to wait a bit.

Fun To play. A lot of people say it's unfair and you have to buy stuff. But I had to start all over with nothing because I forgot my password on an old account and I climbed back to tower lvl. 11 and the level with the two gold swords crossing in like 2 or 3 months. I just recently started getting the pass to speed up the process cause you get extra rewards. So I don't believe you have to buy stuff or that it's unfair. You just have to be add and good at video games.
Downloaded it again after uninstalling it for some quite time. When opening the game, it loads too slow. I just wanted to play this game again but too much loading isn't my thing.
OMG. BEST GAME EVER!!!!!!!!!!!. But it is to pay to win, so if you have skill, you can play Clash royale. This.Is.Clash.Royale
Very good strategy game. However, P2W is a big problem when playing trophy road. Most cards are balanced (except for P.E.K.K.A and Sparky) so this makes them worth their elixir.

It's a fun game, if you're willing to spend the money. I've been playing for a long time now, made it to the maximum amount of trophies and even highest part of leagues. When it comes to games it feels like the skill aspect of it is slowly disappearing. Broken cards and card evolutions are released monthly and locked behind a pay wall. You mostly lose to over leveled opponents or broken new cards. The cards get nerfed afterwards so spending money only gets you so far before having to spend more.

Clash Royale used to be a fun and fair game where progression wasn't a huge barrier for free-to-play players. Supercell's greed now knows no bounds and completely corrupted this game. If you're looking to download this game, try another game. I promise you, you will be disappointed 9/10 times when you face overlevelled cards and evolutions you're realistically never going to get. It used to be a good game. Now it's a shell of itself, and really, the devs couldn't care less.

Merge Tactics has a flaw. The wizard team up is not accurate. I just had a game where they kept making a 2-star a rabbit when there were 4 3 star units on the field. This makes me feel that the rankings are already pre-determined and no actual strategy truly helps. I thought merge Tactics would be a good break from trophy road but that just irritated me too far. Fix Merge Tactics and make it so it's not already determined who will win.

I'm only a few days in, but so far it's fulfilling my new game addiction that I crave so much. If you don't want to spend money, its design limits playability; win four matches, then come back every three hours and play one match. It would be nice if there was a playable mechanism to accelerate chest opening (such as every win after your slots are filled knocks 30 minutes off the timer). Otherwise a nice bit of casual PvP.

The games surprisingly fun and tactical and I've really taken to it despite disliking clash of clans pretty hard. BUT. There is no doubt in my mind that some of the cards are just ridiculously strong and some are perthectic for what they cost in exlier, I feel that there's some balancing issues with the cards that could be adjusted but what do I know. I'm just some guy.

As a concept this game is cool, but at the end of the day this game is not about how skilled or strategic you are, it's really about what level your cards(troops) are at. When you first get the game it's fine, you'll level stuff up decently quick. But eventually you hit a wall around lvl 10-11 where you either have to spend money on the game, or play it obsessively for years in order to progress. You'll get matched against players that have lvl 13-14 cards and you'll stand no chance.

this game is alright, I started playing on release and at one point I took a break from the game for a few years. I hate coming back to this game because my king tower is somehow level 13 but most of my cards are level 11, so I can't make any decks work because of the level of cards I'm up against. it's also incredibly difficult to get enough cards in order to level them up, and it's now impossible for me to get evolutions without paying an absurd amount of money.

Horrible. When I try to go into special challenges it takes between 7min to 15 minutes for a match and then I am put up against a player that has hundreds of hours more experience and a team that is ridiculously better than mine. I messaged the developers but they haven't fixed the problem. It's been months. 1 star until they fix the problem.

I've been having an issue with a little red 1 on my decks tab that doesn't seem to be tied with anything and will not go away. I've checked everything multiple times, but it stays there, like it's glitched. The best part is, as of today, it's a little red 2. Frankly I'd prefer the red notifiers not be on the decks tab, they don't tell me anything I don't already know. For the store and clan tab, it's useful, but this is just a headache.

Game itself is ok, but cheating is so rampant with 3rd party software that it's boring after going up just a few levels. Ok to try, but DON'T waste any money on it. Update: cheating is now so rampant that the game is losing the little bit odd fun that it was. The developers don't care, so I don't either. DON'T waste your time Also: the 'cancel' button works about as well as the 'close door' button in an elevator

Enjoyed the game for years but lately I've gotten fed up with it after every battle encounters "connection" issues in the final minute alone, resulting in a loss when I was far ahead. Other connections are fine, just Clash that encounters the problem. I may give it another try but it's gotten really old.

I have been playing this game for over 6 years and have never seen it in a worse state. I don't know who is behind the updates and card balances and fixing bugs and match making, but they arent good. They are RUINING this game. I have seriously loaded in to game after game after game, only to win 1 and lose 4 in a row, in 2v2 I'll load in and the people I'm playing with have the same deck the last guy had. I have since deleted and will not re-download. Good job SUPERCELL. Ruined the game!

I have been playing this since it came out and was once again finally to the point were I mostly enjoyed playing this game almost any time. After the recent updates with pretty much all my favorite game types and methods to make progress on getting cards and resources changed or gone I can say this game is quickly falling back into the I hate this game category. Thanks for my free time back I guess.

Played this for a few years at the beginning. Returned just out of boredom. Boy has it changed. You can't blame the game. They're here to make money. But it's beyond one sided. Before you couldn't tell who would spend $ on this game. Now the card differences between players are obvious. I just leave the game every time an overpowered paid for card shows up.

this app is great! not only does it work if you have bad Internet it pretty much works wherever you go, and this game also is really fun, you have to work hard to get good rewards, in my opinion it's better than clash of clans. it's one of the best games I've ever played definitely a 5 ⭐ game.

Its fun up until you lose every match because of cards you don't have that go directly to your towers and can't be damage until they get there, if at all. There's no balance, strategy, or skill once you can send a goblin barrel, miner, and spell to one tower at the same time. The elixir cost on the best cards in the game is far too low and allows for spamming the same 3 cards the entire game. Unless your opponent has the same cards and strategy, you win without even having to counter play.

It's a fun game, but I keep getting matched up with other players with cards from several arenas ahead of me. I'm in arena 7 and lost to someone with barbarian hut and giant skeleton. I have made more progress but it is unplayable because I have 1 legendary while people have 4-5 in their deck. Please do something about this. This game is not fun. I do not recommend. It has died off. I would rate 0 if it was possible

I do enjoy this game and would play this game. I recommend it but, the only reason I don't play this is because of the lag I get on my device which sucks and during mid-match and or on the home screen, it blacks out and closes the app relog and is at a disadvantage or already lost the match. Not sure if anyone has this problem but it is a big issue for me and other players. Despite being a gacha. I love this game and I really do but because of those 2 issues it makes it hard to play.

Power is based entirely on the length of time you've been playing or the amount of money you've spent. And you don't notice that until deeper in the rankings. Combined with a useless matchmaking system, you're constantly up against players who just have a huge numerical advantage. It's probably intentional so that you spend money to catch up. I regret all my time in this game.
Level 16 and heroes ruined the game. Supercell doesn't care about f2p players and just try to force you to drop $20 every season for the newest broken gimmick. Uninstalled.

dont try this game all after playing this game for a month now when you keep losing you get suicidal thoughts just like me and break your phone and when you think your getting good it makes you spend money on it at the end and then makes you keep losing over and over

It's a game of luck, no skill at all. You have zero control over many aspects of the game. Unless you are willing to spend BIG money you can't get anything decent. Everyone is buying into supercells name on this one. Seriously unfair on EVERY aspect of the game. Lower level guys will consistently have troops different from you, you can't defend against. How it's getting any good reviews I will never know.

Very much agree with Otingus' review, but also, I am facing an issue where when I try do a quick match in party, it gets stuck on searching, but i can play from invites. This is more of a personal issue, but I think Balloons should either do less damage, or be 6 elixir. It is far too overpowered, and if it reaches your tower with decent health, you're as good as screwed. I also feel Wizard should have more health, as its the best air counter, but dies too quickly to fireballs, etc.

This game isn't fun anymore, man. After months and months of playing, you just go against the same few decks that either have ridiculously high levels, or just are really slow and boring to play against. Its an addictive game, but man, they took away party mode & the fun of being able to play 1v1 draft battles just to make the game more competitive. It's not fun to win anymore, when you know you could still lose by that P2W player with max level cards against you & then BMs you. it's not fun.

The match up y'all create are never even playing field...Some folks competitors are using hacks to win games...Been Playing game for at least 7 plus years....spent enough money ...Please check the program algorithm, cause I swear these matches are rigged.Change 1 card out your deck ,and see how the matches change...

Always, ALWAYS crashes and freezes on new updates, even after clearing cache or re-installing game several times. Actions sometimes don't register in game, especially during ladder. Freezing during ladder, losing rank on no fault of your own. Join in on 2v2 battles late, losing before you get a chance to act. WAY too much money spent on game for constant issues
game is AI controlled. once you reach a certain level it forces you to pay due to frustration battles.

The microtransactions really are annoying to always be seeing and everything costs a good amount of gems. Though they have been making it somewhat easier to get them they've been asking a lot more, but besides that I've been playing it off and on for a couple years now. I'd definitely reccomend it but you may throw 5 dollars in for some gems just to have them. Great game overall.

Stop being greedy Suprcell Trade tokens. Cool. The moment you sell them in the play shop now both people need a token... And why in the hell would I want to pay gold to donate a card to anyone? Cause that wastes gold and you hope I'll buy more. Adding this to my below comment and this is well on its way to being a game I don't play anymore. Don't get comfortable with the cards you spend months building up to a good level. They Nerf good cards far too much. A better game would play test more and not need to break cards that have been in use for a long time. Balloon death damage timer and Fireball building damage being good examples. Balloon generally won't hurt whatever shot it down anymore. Fireball I worked mine up to max level and had 300 building damage now it's been nerfed to 265. This is soon to be another of the greatest games I stopped playing
it is very fun to play and I hope they add like a thing that you can fight your friends
i loe the emotes really fun and kids friendly!!!! especially the pig one,

Used to be good. The game at its core is good, the company ruined it, thanks Supercell. Almost all of the rewards you get to progress through playing are locked behind a pay wall, it is extremely difficult to progress without spending money, and that I cannot forgive. 1 star, unfortunate. Also bring back party modes like triple draft against random opponents, that was the best part of the game.

I would like to make a suggestion. When one of the players during a match goes without internet, trophies should not be lost for this player. Maybe you can give the trophies to the oppountnet winner, but the one without internet should no lost trophies.

I remember when this game was enjoyable. Microtransactions litter every single screen, and now they've even tried disguising some of them with "tap for more info" instead of just telling you prices. This is honestly stupid. Having a few here and there (like for gold or gems) is acceptable, considering the core game is free, and is... somewhat playable without buying a bunch of stuff, but this is just ridiculous. Supercell isn't the fun company they used to be. Don't waste your time or your cash.

No skill. No strategy. This was my favorite game for years. Now I can tell you in the first 5 seconds who will win. Sometimes before my cards even appear they have already played a card. Other times you can see the same cards in both decks and either their cards or yours will move significantly slower and get distroyed much faster with the same defense. I can win 6 games in a row one day and loss 10 in a row the next day. It has nothing to do with your skills. Im just about done with this "game"

After they made the decision to switch from $5 pass to a two tier pass $5/$12 I continued to play because I enjoyed the game. After the most recent update, the game never loads on the first try and consistently crashes during battles. I went from loving this game to uninstalling it in about 2 months time. Supercell seems to be doing everything they can to ruin a once enjoyable experience. I wouldn't waste my time with this game ad I definitely wouldn't waste my money.

Used to play this game alot, for about 6 years and really enjoyed the game. But the game has been on a slow but sure decline since clan wars 2, then they add evos and champs which makes things annoying and too complicated, rather than listening to the community, supercell would rather just add things that'll make more money, I understand it's a business but they're losing way to many players for the money to be worth it.

Horrible, truly one of the worst games that you wanna have fun with. Terrible matchmaking, being paired up with opponents that have cards that are higher level than yours. The progression is slow unless you're going pay actual money for it. Even though this game is more unique than the mobile games we have today this is still one of the most cash grab and worst matchmaking system games ever. How is it even gonna be considered a strategy game if the level gaps are huge.

I have been playing this for years. And I still play almost every single day. This game has always been a 5 star game for me. My problem now is they have been ramping up on all the "pay to accelerate" options. Which I don't love and wish they didn't have, but fine people can buy what they want. But now they are deliberately slowing down your free to play progress. Idk just thought someone might want an honest review

This game is fun but 🫤 the bad part is that I keep getting player higher or stronger opponents then me even tho I have weak cards the enemies have hight level cards then me thats the bad part it would be more fair if I could go against people who have the same levels as me

It's a very fun strategy game but it has a major problem for me at least, it is pay to win. I've been playing it for 3 years I have never spent a penny on it and I see the difference between me and my opponents / clan m8's that do actually spend money on the game. Besides that the developers are active, they always update it to keep the game fresh and I respect that.

This game has become a scam. Nobody asked for Level 15 and 50 000 Elite Wild Cards to upgrade one card is insane. It would take a free-to-play player literal years to upgrade their collection. I was at 8000+ trophies and the meta has become riddled with Evolutions which are hard to counter and hard to come by for free-to-play players aside from specific events. I have hundreds of Wild Cards that I literally cannot use because there are not enough ways to get gold to upgrade my cards! AVOID THIS!
This game is terrible. There are so many over-leveled people and Supercell is the most greedy company ever.

has INSANE potential, and is completely RUINED by the insane pay to win system. I know this review wont change anything about the game, but i can say this to people wondering if they should play, the answer is yes. Just know its going to be infuriating, happy clashing.

There should be the option to lock cards for a deck so when you want to generate a deck it'll generate a good synergized deck with the locked card(s) instead of randomly generated decks with what you have collected.

The game can be frustrating at times but it can also be really fun. I like how there are special game modes where you van get cards easier to lvl the cards you want up. Clash of clans is mainly about strategy or over lvled cards. You should definitely pick up this game because it is a good game to play in the car at home or in your free time. But if you get mad or rage just decide to put the game down and pick it up latter. I hope you think my review was worth reading and pick up clash of clans.

By far the worst pay to win game I had ever played. You have absolutely no chance against someone who has spent money, on it. Its virtually impossible for a casual player to enjoy. SuperCell got carried away with earning money, thus making the matchmaking the worst part of it. You can't do anything against a level 10, or higher when your just an average player. Download this if you want to pull your hair out.

Im really fed up of the way supercell are making the game pay to win again. It was at a point where as pay to skip it was acceptable, but as I got to the upper leagues and they add another level? The people that can afford to spend stupid amounts on this will beat me with higher level cards, though they wouldn't beat me with same level. You should only ever pay for aesthetics in games like this. Feel ripped off. I have played as long as CR has been around and spent more than I could afford.

Sad to see how far this game has fallen. Unless you plan to pay for every release, good luck attempting to get anywhere. The rank system just allows you to get close to your next goal and then repeatedly hits you with players who are light years ahead of you or who pay for everything. Don't worry though they will just release another game in order to attempt to get more of your money vs just making a game that is fun and fair for its players.
it's super good and fun and Larry is my favorite I hope for more and even better updates and more troops:)

Flawless so far. Exceptional Gameplay. Exciting PvP. Minimal Errors. No bugs (at least for me) Simple. But can you kindly fix the matching algorithm. I often get matched with players, 2 levels higher than me. This might seem low, but if you play, you know how this feels. Kindly make the matching a little more fair for us lowlies... Tnx

this game is the accurate meaning of "pay to win" it used to be something greater but now they have fallen for their greed، never forget that the game can control your trophies with counter decks matchups designed to keep you stuck longer.

Recent updates have made the game unplayable. It's completely rigged. I have never seen a game penalize you the more you play. Used to be fun now waste of time. Money pit. Boring. Stupid game that never adjusts the most overpowered card in the game the "hog rider". Played this game for two years but im done with this junk. No variety. So much strategy involved in this game... Every opponent drops the hog rider at the bridge and thats the game. Should be called "Hog Royale". Don't waste your time.

Used to play the game until my old phone became too slow to play it on. Now, I have a new Moto E 5 play and although it doesn't lag, in 75% of matches it crashes. Means the only thing I can consistantly play is 2 v 2. I doubt you care about a problem on a less popular phone that isn't an iPhone but I would appreciate it a lot if you could fix this bug. Thanks for reading

As a player since launch it saddens me to say this game is not worth the time anymore. Supercell used to take player feedback, now player feedback means nothing. We get changes we know is bad for this game only justified by the chance somebody might like it, the average player doesn't matter. The game used to be free to play, as of it's current state it's free to lose. Leveling is a major part of the game, and takes time, but if you open your wallet it's instantaneous, the higher level wins.

one of the best game I ever played i am addicted to this now this is so simple but so fun sometimes the games feels unfair but this game is so great if u are curious about playing it just give it s try u will love it

The game used to be fun back in 2019 for me but now it's the next level of pay2win. Monotonous and not dynamic game. After a while you can't improve if you don't follow some patterns in terms of possible card combinations. Somehow it forces you to use combinations of cards that take away your freedom of choice. Some cards are very unbalanced. The main purpose of the game is to make the users pay for the prizes. Money rules the game. It also fails a lot due to internal errors. The new war update made everything even worse.

Impossible to advance when Im being put up against players who have way better cards than me. The matchmaking could be far better with a couple tweaks, but I guess the devs are too busy jerking off to change simple C++ code. And then when I get one singular lag spike for one microsecond, the entire game crashes and it prevents you from placing anything. An autistic infant born with anencephaly and a 47th chromosome per cell could code better than this. 0/10, too addicting and underhated.

Fun at first, but it becomes a snowball slowly growing to become more pay to win. You used to need to time cards in the beginning, but now you face off against people 2-4 king levels higher than you with cards you can't even unlock. In summary, level scaling, matchmaking, and pay walls are severely damaging this game's potential.

The new reworks, rebalancing and update from Halloween 2022 disables older players to keep up with the new cards. Also, the Devs took out the 2v2 game mod, thus, whatever you wish to play is going to hurt you in some way, trophies, arena, clan wars or championships. Overall the more you play, the more advanced you are, the less fun it is.

This is a great game that once was and still a bit is unique and fun. UNBALANCED, NOT WORTH INVESTING MONEY: They have set a sick algorithm at the backend, which never allows you to play fairly. Whatever deck you have, the other player will always have a counter to it. Clash Royale needs to address a number of long-standing issues to retain its player base and restore its reputation. A primary concern for many players is the "pay-to-win" model, which has been exacerbated by the introduction of new progression systems and powerful, often unbalanced, cards like Evolutions and Tower Troops. This creates a significant gap between free-to-play players and those who spend money, making it difficult to compete on an even playing field. Additionally, many players feel

the new update is disappointing. level 14 was a bad idea for loyal free users. you can't just lift the roof up every time I try getting to the top. it takes a great deal of passion and persistence to max cards without paying for it. this great game's been unfortunately reduced to a money making gimmick. I have played this game for nearly 4 years now on a daily basis. The levels are challenging to begin with and card collection is key to the best character and can be done f2p, albeit slowly. The devs pay attention to the community and are quick to make changes when and where needed. The fifth star was lost in the last year. The team stagnated on innovation and the reworked Clan War (and subsequent patch/tweaks) was and is an overall disappointment. The game still entertains and I recommend it!

2 years later and while Im still casually playing, my review doesn't change. I guess both Supercell and I are okay with mediocrity. You get to a point where you are maxed out and their algorithm decides how many games in a row you can win. Eventually you just starting getting match after match of opponents that have the exact same deck that is a perfect counter for yours. You switch decks and magically your match counters that. It forces you to disengage with the app.
I am a returning player and have been facing this issue for 2 weeks that the game is getting stuck at 75% loading and don't proceed further, tried reinstalling the game but it didn't help.

New update ruined the game. Only way to farm chests now is to risk losing trophies. They've also made the pass royale silly as you can't get a guaranteed card upgrade anymore, not that you need it, since they've capped every game mode except trophy road; which is taking away from one of the points of the game. The new tokens update is also dumb, you need to spend gems in order to buy the best thing in the shop, as the season doesn't allow you to obtain enough tokens.... disappointed.

Every update makes the game more and more unplayable. With the current update, if you were to start playing right now, you will never have an opportunity to unlock the new level 15 cards. As far as Graphics, Amount of Gameplay Functions such as Quests and just things to do in general, everything is fine. The only problem I have been seeing is that you are not Equally matched against others with the same Card Deck Quality and possible options available to them vs what u may have since you haven't either been playing as long or don't Pay to Win. Also there should be some sort of system in place that accounts for people who just Pay To Win Vs others like myself that don't buy anything to help increase the difficulty, play factor and longevity of the game. The Developers could add a system that acknowledges whether or not someone has Purchased items and if so, phase them into there own Group which only allows them to be Matched against others who have been phased into that group from Purchasing Items as well. Then for the individuals who are in the Non-Purchased Items Group, if they would like to possibly increase there difficulty in a way so to speak, they could have an option to turn On or Off which would allow them to be Matched with individuals in the Purchased Items Group. With all that said, this post probably won't be seen by anyone but it does bring up some good Characteristics that would help Current and Future Games along with all of it being plausible and easy to emplement. Thank U All for your time and Keep Gaming!!!!

I'm changing my review to a 1 star because Chests have been removed, only the 3 daily lucky drops remain (which was added to supplement the slow ftp progress). Entertaining. Addicting. Trash. 3 words to sum this game up. Make no mistake - while there's definitely an element of skill/good timing involved, it's very much a pay-to-win game. When you get to a certain level, Supercell's algorithms will match you w/someone in a well-connected online "clan," or who's a CC player. Meaning your opponents will often be at a higher level (or sometimes a lower level) with maxed out cards all higher than yours. It becomes a, "War of Attrition." Painful.

Clash Royale, once celebrated for its strategic depth, is now widely criticized for devolving into a pay-to-win grind that prioritizes aggressive monetization over fair gameplay. The introduction of new features like Level 15, Evolutions, and increasingly expensive Pass Royale tiers has significantly widened the gap between free-to-play users and paying players. This is exacerbated by a rigged matchmaking system that frequently pairs players against perfect counter-decks or over leveled decks

This is a fun card strategy game. The matchmaking can be a little dodgy at times but that's part of the experience in my opinion. And to those who say it's a pay to win, I and many of my friends are all 4000+ trophies without spending a penny. And to the others who find the game hard, there are many useful videos online about good decks and how to use them along with how to counter some of the harder to deal with cards. The 'tough' gameplay can be easily solved by YouTube.

From my experience, it's a fun, competitive and exciting game to play. The game used to be a lot of fun, but Supercell seems absolutely determined to alienate its players and push profits as opposed to listen to their community and creators. This game is becoming more slop with each update. The introduction of heroes and level 16 being the only the most recent example. They show no sign of stopping and are continuing to make bad choices. I recommend uninstalling the game to discourage this behavior. Stop giving them money, and find your entertainment elsewhere.
pretty bummed that the devs decided to make all my hard work to get my cards to lvl 15 a worthless endeavor really makes me feel unappreciated...

This game is fun, when it doesn't pull straight up bs on you. I don't know why but this game loves giving you OVER-LEVELED OPONENTS in EVERY GAME MODE and VERY OFTEN! They are always either spamming their no-skill cards like Mega-Knight, Elite Barbarians, or Electro-Giant +rage. Or they are 2+ king levels higher than you with cards that are 3+ levels higher that any of your cards. Though, when they give you a fair game, it can be pretty fun. But the grind can still be an issue sometimes.

I've been playing this game on and off for years. In the last few it seems they're adding just any idea anyone at supercell can think of. There's regular cards, wild cards, magic items, shards, star points and cash all for upgrading cards. It's busy in a messy kinda way. Predominantly 8 to 12 hr chests = check the app/ play less frequently/ less time. Serious pay to play vibe. Bland options for 2v2 w friends.

This game is pay to win style. You don't actually play. The algorithm is set to decide when to let you win and when to let you lose. And even if you pay to upgrade your level to be able to compete with high level, a new update comes to make all the money you paid before worthless, and you need to pay again to upgrade to the next upgrade that comes with the update, the game is not playable anymore

My main problem with Supercell games is the way opponents are matched. Rarely are opponents match equally. You can work hard and get a good deck just to play someone who has a far advanced deck and not because they bought it but because the game pairs people based to trophies which a player can manipulate. i always wondering why there was differences when everytime i won or lose the match, the crown reward are not balance. i am level 14 and my opponent was 12 or 13, my two archer are still alive and haven't received any damage, yet the crown i recieved is 27, 28 , 29 or if was lucky enough i would get 30. but if my opponent were much way higher than i am, and i lose the crown deduction is 30 to 33, are you serious about the system?? come on

The best card in the game is a parents credit card. This game is unplayable due to the fact that people can just buy whatever they want. Somewhat entertaining game. Unfortunately, it is the age old problem with these games, the companies get greedy. I joined so that I can play with my friends, but it turns out, everytime you lose, it automatically gives you a harder opponent to battle and you end up not going up the arenas. the game overall is super fun because you get to level up arena, and you get to use cards and other stuff like that!.
this game is just a money grab and never let's you get into another arena unless you get lucky or spend money

This is your basic pay-to-win app. Unless you blow a boat load of money rapidly updating your cards, which I am guessing would cost as much as a couple of Playstation 4s, you're at the mercy of kids who probably maxed out their parents credit card so they can gloat about how great they are in virtuosity. This is a fun little time waster if you can get over the fact it's fixed for those who spend a lot of money. I wouldn't spend a cent on it, but it's worth a download if you spend a lot of time on teleconferences. There's a lot of weird things that happen during the game that would appear as though their are hacks or cheats. But keeping in mind that these guys didn't develop the game for altruistic reasons and are looking for a profit, that's not a head scratcher. Again, it seems like the intent on the part of CR is to make money, and that doesn't happen with people who play the game for free, so you will likely suffer way more losses than win unless you want to blow bank on this phone app.

The recent changes to the game are kinda not good. The new event system is boring and the new gamemodes are the same repetitive unfun mush capture this unit or use this overpowered card. It feels like the game really doesn't want you to play it so why play a game that doesn't want you to have fun playing it. The worst part is that the core gameplay of clash royale is very fun. Everything just happens to try as hard as possible to make sure you don't experience that.

The core mechanics of the game are somewhat fun and addicting. However the game is so disgustingly pay to win that every match no longer comes down to skill. It just comes down to whoever has spent more money on the game and has higher upgradeded card levels. If this game had no card level system it would be so much better. However you can clearly see the developers have stopped caring about the game and only care about monetization.
i hate just hate how they only allow the stuff you have in trophy road instead of having everything like 2 updates ago and this game is so toxic

This game is so unbalanced. It'll put you up against way more experienced players with way higher level stuff than you. It needs a better ranking system. Also, the you basically need to buy gold once you get passed a certain point to level up your stuff which you need to do is you want to keep up. It doesn't do a good job of teaching you how to play, and if you're opponent has something you've never seen before you're most likely screwed. if you get frustrated easy, stay away. Not enjoyable.

patience is key when it comes to playing the ladder. So what if you're stuck at arena 4! Watch pros play on YouTube and look at the level of their cards, and look at what they play! You now know that it's a combination of skill and time. Get into a clan, buy a bundle(one time), save gold, wrinse and repeat! This game never wanted anyone to feel overpowered from day one installing the game.

I would want to give this higher stars because it is a fun game but the matchmaking is just broken, and SC has this automated response for their "help" so leaving a review seems to be the only way to get them to read something from a player pov. Played the game for years now and matchingmaking is always so off, I don't care to be put into a match in seconds, I'd much rather wait 3 and up mins for a more even match then to be put into a lopsided one over and over and over and over again.
This game is actually so horrible Everything about it is pay to win because this game was made by dumb money hungry devs and this game is so buggy I don't know why people hype it up so damn much

This game is literally cancerous. It's a deck game where you create your deck and have 1v1 (or 2v2) with others. Problem is that there are so many p2w (pay to win: people who use too much money in the game and get ahead of others) that you often have hard time playing if you dont wanna spend your money on the game. People who spend their money are given a lot of things to the point where its very unbalanced. The publishers are very greedy. Certainly, its only a free game in paper.

7 yr player and I had multiple cards fully ready to level up and all I needed was the gold. After the update, everything got converted into these “jewel” items I never asked for, and now my progress is basically reset. I already put in the time, grinding and saving the resources I needed. Instead of letting me use what I’d earned, the new system forces extra steps, new currency, and more grinding just to reach the same point I was at before. It feels like my e.

clash Royale is one of the best and most enjoyable strategy games that I've ever played. unfortunately there's an incredible P2W problem! for context each card level gives cards roughly a 10% increase to the stats of the previous level card. if you don't spend money on the game your opponent often will have 2-3 level higher cards. meaning their troops will be 21-32%~ stronger than yours because they spent money and you didn't. if you. are rich sure have fun. otherwise don't bother

It's fun but expect alot of mico transaction, and cheap gameplay. If you don't level up your stuff then you will be at a sever disadvantage. Match ups are not equal, vary rarely will it be skill that wins a match. It's mainly a "who has the higher level stuff" kind of game. Once you reach the top top tier you have to have statagy but until you have been playing for a long while or dropped a couple hundred in micro transaction you will taper off and hit a elo hell stage quickly.

I would not recommend this game to a soul this game is pay to win. You get ludicrous benefits for paying, it may be a small amount of money, but you're paying to enjoy. it is painfully obvious when you are facing someone paying to win, all of their cards are better, higher level, evo, and you can do nothing. unless you pay. To summarise, the game is designed to make you pay by making the experience unbearable without paying. 0 stars if I could, it's the heroin of mobile games.

Could be a really fun game, but just when you think it can’t get more pay-to-win, it does. If you take a break from playing, don’t expect to enjoy coming back unless you’re ready to spend money. The meta is heavily dominated by Evo cards, and without them, you’ll constantly be at a disadvantage against players who have paid to stay competitive. It’s frustrating because the core gameplay is solid, but it feels like progression now hinges more on your wallet than your skill.

Hands down the single greatest game of all time. No ads and not really a need to spend money because your most of the time paired with people who do spend money (if you spend money) or dont spend money (if you dont). Sometimes the game can be annoying but thats mostly when I have no patience and lose a match but it's still somehow fun even when have NO patience. Did I mention no ads?? In conclusion, the game is a 10/10 game that can be played by anybody and enjoyed by many!

I’ve been playing Clash Royale for years, and it’s still one of the most strategic and enjoyable mobile games out there. The fast-paced battles, unique cards, and balanced gameplay always keep things interesting. Unlocking chests, upgrading decks, and competing in events adds long-term excitement. Sometimes progress feels slow and matchmaking can be tough, but overall Clash Royale remains a highly addictive and polished strategy game.

Not a skill based game, you are required to spend a significant amount of money to compete equally in this game. Game mechanics and match making are designed in such a way that it'll constantly force you to keep buying gems and spend a lot of money to be able to play the game fairly!

It's a really fun game. I've been playing for quite some time now and I love the mechanics. It's not a skill game anymore, it's a game where the winner is the person who spent the most money. The heroes update was kind of useless, as it's just another way to make the game even more pay to win than before. It's not bad, but it should be more fair with free to play players.

At the end of November, my toddler accidentally opened an app on my phone and I was charged multiple times in one day without receiving any email receipts, resulting in about $60 per day in charges. I never received a refund, so please be careful with this app, as their support was unhelpful and unresponsive.

This app has become more pay to win than ever. They've moved a lot of the old features (including majority of 3 loss tournaments) to places returning players would struggle to find. The game also has an extreme bot problem and bad match making problem. The gameplay is fun but not very rewarding without paying.

It's been ages since we've seen a DECENT update, they are truly incapable of releasing an update that isn't garbage, I've been playing for 7 years on and off, I finally started being able to play more cards since I've maxed 3 different decks, I had to pay some money for this but it seem worth it at the time, to be able to usethe decks I had to be maxed, now they released level 15 and everything I grinded for is essentialy useless and people who spend money have a major advantage, I uninstalled.

I've been playing it since launch. The thing that you need to know is this: everything that Supercell does to the game is to get more money from you. Here's how they work, they do periodic releases of new cards, that they intentionally make extra powerful, so if you want to win, you need to get it and max it out. Cha-ching. They leave that go for a while, then rebalance to even the cards out, just in time for the new hot release. Until recently you could play noncompetitive, but they broke that

For years, this was the perfect mobile strategy game. Recently, however, the developers became greedy. IT IS NOW PAY TO PLAY. Let me explain. For years, if you were patient, you could acquire everything in the game: all the units, all the levels, all without paying. Now, however, evolution shards take your units beyond level 15. If you have multiple evolved units, you win. The only way to get multiple evolved units? Pay the developers. Trust me. I've been playing for 8 years.

Ever since April Season Pass update I've stopped buying passes, cause it's no longer worth it.

As an active Clash Royale player, I'm extremely disappointed with Supercell's recent updates. This is a good game! Once you start playing it, the game can get very addicting. In my experience, the game is somewhat addicting but I get more frustrated than addicted. Download this game only if you're sure you can treat it as a casual pastime. It's designed to be addictive. Personally, I've never spent money on it, and I recommend you don’t either. The only way to stay competitive is to buy the new cards released each month, which are purposely designed to break the game. I advise against playing it if you have low self-control.

A Review After 5 Months Free to Play It was fine for a while - at some point (King Tower 13, about 5800 trophies) that Free to Play really becomes a slog, especially for a casual player. Supercell recently pushed an overpowered card and gave away its evolution. If I never hear "MeGa KnIgHt!!" again, it will be great. Farewell, clash!
