Meta of the game makes me want to bang my head on a brick wall until I break through the other side, but the other side is nothing but razor wire and broken glass. Get one tower, turtle for the rest of the game and you win, it's not fun, it's repetitive and every game feels the as the last. You can easily get rid of the meta by giving an actual reward for 3 crowning someone, and don't say your reward is 3 crowns because no one cares about crowns for 23 hours of the day. The only real fun is draft mode but even then you get bent over if the game wants you to choose 4 spells while the other guy gets to pick all the units. Doubles is fun too but they reduce how much elixer you get so the game crawls by at a snail's pace or your team mate leaves and it is then impossable to to win. I want to like this game but every time I play it is just the same, everyone does the same dominant strategy, and if you use a deck to counter the turtle then you loose to everything else. I regret every purchase I made on this game and if I had a time machine with one use, I would rather stop me from downloading this game than stopping 9/11

This used to be my go to fun game for a number of years. They've added lots of fun modes too. If it's not that, you get spell spammers for the entire game, and so much more. Also, there is no way to report a player, so people have free reign in making the game frustrating and unplayable. Avoid!!!

I have been playing the game since the first day of release and I can say the game has had its ups and downs. This game is really fun and it's a clear no brainers to see why for most. It's addictive for the wrong reasons. The fun characters and mass destruction of towers and enemies pull you in until you progress too far in a short amount of time. At this point, you realize the progression is ridiculous and tedious. If you are a new player, don't even try playing now. It was fun when the game first came out, but year after year, the game digs itself into a hole, losing amounts of players. I guess that's what happens to games that become ancient over time. 🤷

Clash Royale is simply unfair. It pairs you with stronger opponents but around the same crown level. Game is stale. I'm a 4 year player and have given 5* ratings previously. Now I want Supercell to earn that rating again. Dear Developer, I am writing to express my utmost disappointment and frustration with your recent game release. I regret to inform you that the game is, without a doubt, one of the worst gaming experiences I have ever had. From the moment I started playing, it became apparent that the game lacked polish, depth, and any semblance of enjoyable gameplay. The graphics were outdated and subpar, the controls were clunky and unresponsive, and the storyline was cliché and uninspiring.

When you first start, it's a good game. Pretty average on wins and losses. However, once I hit player level 7, it's literally 1 in 5/6 wins. The game is extremely unbalanced when placing against other players. I'm constantly getting battles with players leveled 8 or 9. How the hell am I supposed to beat them, when their towers have more hp then mine, and they have access to better cards BECAUSE of their higher level. Getting an uninstall from me.

This game has gone to the dumpster. The level system is complete garbage and the only way to climb is to pay more and more money. It's nothing more than a lazy cash grab now. Clash Royale's Level 16 "update" is a masterclass in greed. They simplified nothing, just added a brutal 120,000 Gold/card grind. My Elite Wild Cards were converted for a pathetic 1 Gem/20. Avoid this scam.

I came back to this game after about 7 years of not playing it, and it is so p2w now. This game very obviously favors people who spend a lot of money on it. The new heroes are a good example of how you could either wait a very long time to get one for free, or you could spend 12 bucks and get it now. The people who spend that money will most likely have the upper hand in most arenas. Not really fair. This game isn't worth playing for a long time if you don't want to spend a lot of money on it.

The game was a good game but due to their recent changes I can confirm the game is now Pay to Win. They have put the new cards and levels behind massive level walls and money now unlocks them. If you want to start playing this game, just dont unless you have the best card in the game.... the credit card!! Now they will give you the new cards one at a time for £12 a month - netflix does not even charge that much - they have lost all sense of value and want to get as much $ as they can now shame!

The graphics and art are well made and definitely give off the "Clash of Clans" vibe, a straight upgrade from its predecessor But the actual gameplay isnt that great. The game also suffers from "meta" cards that punish you for not using them. The chest and levelling system makes this game a "Freemium" game, and it's getting worse in that regard. Too much emphasis on grinding, as that is the only way to deal with p2w players, and the grinding takes too much time for it to be worth playing.

I’ve been playing Clash Royale for over a year now, and it’s pretty addictive. The strategic gameplay is awesome, but the grind to level up your cards can be a bit much. Matchmaking can be frustrating too, especially when you’re up against higher-leveled players. But, once you start mastering your deck, the game is really fun. Tip: focus on upgrading a few cards instead of trying to max them all!

The matchmaking is built in a way to frustate lower level players. At certain point you will face opponents with higher levels and they end up winning the games despite the bad plays they make. Clan wars works the same way. So, after all isn't a matter of skill but who has the higher level. It takes a long time to get high level and I rather pay 20/30€ for a full PC game experience with no micro transactions than a couple of gems that will grant me a couple cards. This game has potential though

it is a money game. you have to pay to get the best of it. what i mean by this is two things: if you buy upgrades you get better upgrades compared to the ones you get if you just strive to play enough to get enough coins. if you pay with real money, the prizes you get is much more advanced. second, if you buy, you are advantageous compared to your opponents. unless the opponent paid more. these are more evident during special events. Best world-wide multiplayer game since 2016!!! XD Or so I thought... At the time I thought that this app and the creators of it were phenomenal, but the longer you play, you start to realize that this game is SUPER unforgiving and merciless towards players who dont pay a single cent... I understand a mobile game being pay to win, but pay to PLAY? Even I wouldn't go out of my way to punish ppl for ACTUALLY enjoying my game, especially when since u get chest from winning, only to have a timer...
I think this game is really good, it involves a lot of thinking and smart decision making. I really enjoy this game and I would recommend this game to anyone who doesn't have it right now.

One of the worst games ever. The game is not about skill at all, it's just about luck and money. A really good player can lose against a bad player just because the bad player has a good counter and spent more money on the game. The matchmaking is bad. The devs are just greedy and the next update is gonna be the end of Clash Royale for sure.

I’ve been playing Clash Royale for a while, and it’s become clear that this game is a frustrating cash grab. While the gameplay is initially fun and strategic, the matchmaking system quickly becomes imbalanced, putting you against players with much higher-level cards unless you’re willing to spend money to keep up. The constant push towards microtransactions makes it feel like the game is less about skill and more about who can pay the most.

Disappointed in the gm and its current course. I've been playing since it came out and it has become more and more pay to play. No one uses a high elixir deck purposely to spam elixir over and over on their opponents which was never the case before. Using a deck 4.0 or more is completely suicide now. If you don't play the same as your current opponents you simply lose more than you win and where's the fun in that. The gm blows so please don't put no money into it waste of your time.
the new vine spell is doing the same exact thing as the freeze spell, but costs 1 less elixir, does more damage, and grounds flyers. RIP freeze spell

Game is too imbalanced. I'm constantly finding myself in matches against higher level players and higher level cards. All in all the game needs fixing, which should've been done when it was first released.

This competitive multiplayer game is controlled by the top performing players, a minority of the community. You HAVE to spend money on this game if you want to make progress. Certain cards are very powerful and unbalanced until you unlock the cards needed to counter them. This isn't until you reach the level of progress at the top performing player. This is not a fun or equitable game for casual players who do not spend money. Do NOT play this game.

The general idea for the game is good, but it's so poorly executed. It's a complete cash grab. Do yourselves a favor and don't install this game, unless you like getting matched with overleveled players and unbalanced cards. Wish I could give it 0 stars. Bummer... this game is not fair it matches you up with opponents that counter your deck or weakness to your deck I've played 8 games and theve all had log bait deck that is a counter to my deck.
this game has worst loading it's loading is very long it frustrated me please do something better 🙏🏼😭

This is the most unbalance game I have ever played. Players who are paying for it are getting huge advantage their elixir growth is 2 times faster than normal players and also they need to face less levelup player than themselves. On the other hand it seems like they are letting paid players win. So in my opinion if you don't have money to pay don't even download this game but if you have a lot of money please spend on it, I ensure you that you won't loss even a single match.

Clash Royale is one of the best games that you can play on mobile, having tons of different strategies to learn and master, but the development team behind it seems to hate the game and anyone who plays it. This is most evident in the April 2025 update, where they made progressing through the game take twice as long and removed dozens of useful features. This game has meant something to me, and hundreds of others for more the 9 years now, but I can't bear to play it anymore. Goodbye CR

A month ago I would have rated this 5 star.... Now.. I dont know how to rate it. Ever since one of the most recent updates this game has started to have major issues. It is very glitchy, large lag times, and automatically closes on my devices at random times (usually in the middle of battle). I am not sure what the developers did... But I am on the verge of deleting this and never opening another supercell app again. It is VERY frustrating!

Pay to win. Clash Royale was amazing when it first launched and portrayed a novel concept of the deck-builder and strategy genre. But nowadays it's almost as if the game can detect whether I make purchases or not and tailors my gameplay experience. If I've recently bought gems, I seem to win much more often and get better matchmaking. If it's been a while, I tend to go on losing streaks and get matched with decks that completely counter mine.

Unsustainable game. The longer you play, the more at a disadvantage you are if you don't pay. I have paid to play a couple times, so if you don't pay at all there is no way you can attain legendaries or even epics at a high enough level to compete in ladder. Still the same issue in 2022. I'm level 11 with level 11 cards and I get matched with same level players with level 13 and level 14 cards

Quitting this game after the newest update. They doubled the price for passes but removed the best game progression items magic coins and book of books. Less gold and magic items and they are adding a level 15? They also made it so that my favorite 2v2 mode will not count towards progressing through the pass, and it takes about 20 minutes to match to one game vs a few seconds before???

This Game is really good aftet play Clash of Royayle for 8 hours. can't stop play I also remember when I was kid play all night and day and still grow up now am 15 years old still love this game I wish this game don't leave thx u for Best time of my life ❤️😊

Look quick and simple, you have a great game ngl, but here's the thing, matchmaking is the real major problem, idk why but I'm a level 10 and I'm getting pared with level 11 and 12s. This might seem normal, you get a level 12 or 13 now or then, but this is a recurring thing for me, The lowest leveled player I have faced is a level 11, there's a catch, he has level 12 or higher cards and I have leveled 10-11 cards. All I want is for you guys to hear me out, and fix matchmaking. Thank you.
Developers don't even play their game. every update makes the game worse. it's all pay to win garbage.

was a great game until they updated the trade system. now it just makes me want to blow my brains out in chat as there are 5000 trade offers available. stupid if you ask me and others.. gameplay is easy to use and good. game is just becoming to micro transaction based rather than play... as most if these types of games do before they die.

Startef playing this about 3 days after release, 6 or 7nyears back now, it was by a long way the best game on the market, but now, now its little more than a capitalistic wet dream of a game, pay to play at its very peak, taken all the decent game modes out and just ruined the game over the last 2 years. And now its just a race on who can spend the most money. Don't waste your time on this admittingly once great game. Supercell sold out and ruined their games too.

had a good review that's been up for years, started the game when it was new and on/off for years. coming back to it and seeing basically everything behind a paywall to get anything, removing chests, removing the mini games and banner boxes makes this game unplayable unless you enjoy spending money on a game on your phone. It was fun while it lasted but these last updates will kill the OG crowd and make it harder for new players so even want to try.

I've been playing this game since it almost first came out on Android. but it's sad to see that this game is starting to become pay to win. I'm in Challenger I and I constantly lose two people that I've just super high levels (not even King tower just high level cards). But on top of all this, the matchmaking is insanity. You win 1 game easy, game 2 is hard, but possible, then game 3 someone completely counters your deck. Please Supercell, fix the game I've loved for 3+ years.

No ads, lots of creativity with deck building. They just removed wild cards from the season shop, making it even harder for people who don't spend money to progress. I could spend a bunch of time getting the cards in my deck leveled up, or I could spend some money and get the same result. I also get matched up with players with highly overleveled decks, making it feel like all of their cards absorb all damage.

Although paid players are privileged than free players, Supercell indeed has taken lots of step to ensure that free players can excel as well. Especially every month, the wild shard and book of cards can be bought from the shop that helps to maximize card levels. Plus, the daily free gifts, and crown gifts as well. Those who lack skills, are crying in the corner and bragging, and you can play it on pc as well, it runs well, unless you have a potato pc.

As far as I can tell, it's a very annoying game. I started the game from scratch and there are so many sweaty players in the beginning that it's hard to even win. I'd be losing more trophies than I gain if I had any. They should add a feature to have a like a AI bot at certain difficulties to help the player improve and get better.
The game is crashing every time.
it is good for your mind because It is a strategy game.
my account got reset for no reason whilst I was arena 20, annoyed but an alright game. p2w tho.

Matchmaking is horrendous, matches you up intentionally against better players from time to time to make you lose trophies and convince you to pay. Progression is incredibly slow without using money, I have been playing for over 5 years on the same account and I still haven't reacted the maximum account level. Another cash grabbing game like all the rest of them.

Been playing for 5 years, I almost maxed in all my cards and there's almost no reason to play anymore. Clan wars was okay when it came out, but it got stale real quick. They need to do something quick before the older players just switch to another game.
fun, but after I deleted my grades got better. very addicting
Would give 0 star if I can. Absolute horrible matchmaking with extremely overleveled opponents. Some cards are too broken eg. Prince while others are in the trash.

I'm currently facing the worst enemy selection in 1v1 battles. I don't usually make reviews or give feedback, but this is outrageous!! I redownloaded the game after 2/3 years and some of my already unlocked cards are missing! Amazing game! You defintely won't want to break your phone, take a youtube shorts break, then come back within 5 minutes.

Very fun game once you finally learn how to play it. I played it off and on for about 2 years, but never had much fun. Recently I started using an actual strategy, rather than some random homemade deck. It takes a while to get good at a deck, but once you do it's pretty fun. I personally use splashyard and I really enjoy it. One main problem is the amount of time it takes to level up cards... getting one level 14 can take a whole month, even with pass royale. But still a solid and fun game.

this game is one of the most disgusting things that ever happened to humanity. It is pay to win to the point that you can spend thousands of dollars and still not be maxed. Great game! I would give it 5 stars but I have been really annoyed lately with the fact that there is no give up button. It's diffrent but a good diffrent Edit: I had no idea how to spell different at the time and I have failed in revising it when I changed my rating in 2022. Anyway, this game used to be such a great time, though I lost interest once early 2023 came around due to the game's changes such as adding level 15 and costs of upgrading cards. That coupled together with my interest in another card game coming back, I simply didn't care for the game anymore. I'll probably come back to the game eventually.

It is a great game. However, the matchmaking system and card leveling system need a redo. I've been playing for 6 years, and over time, I have noticed the difference between card levels got larger and larger to a point where the game has become a lot more annoying to play. If you have higher level cards, it's a massive handicap to the other player. It is very difficult to win if the opponent has a higher level card even if you are skilled.

Great game and quite engaging but it misleads customers into purchasing their "gifts". For example, the game showcased that the player would recive 3x rewards via an in-game tracker. However, when you purchase this, the 3x "reward" is the total reward. This is quite deceiving as many players would assume it's the showing the reward X3, which is what they showed in the game. As someone who's played for 6 years, this is quite unfortunate.
Gamemodes, Events Everything is pay to win it is no fun for anyone who can't pay just to have fun also if a new player downloads the game it's just garbage

My last review was in 2016. Lots has changed in this game and it's better now. You can grow allot faster as a free2play player. The ladder gives nice stuff when you pay. Make them just like the others, complete in any game mode.

This game used to be a great game but now it's almost impossible to go to a new arena since they always match up you with people who are more than 2 levels ahead of you which makes impossible to fight since their cards are super leveled up and when you get a fair match up the game freezes and doesn't let you play which makes you almost an auto lose
its great if you struggle at the beginning its because its not meant for you to breeze by its skill based for a reason (for the most part.

Watching this game's downwards progression was tremendous. Used to be a pay to win game and now it's become even more a pay to win game. Ruined every single mechanic the game used to have. I can't even fit whole balance issue of the cards here. There are some cards that are just too powerful and not yet fixed after 2 years. This game used to be really fun but not anymore. The game is literally ruined to crisp. Skill almost non required anymore. Whoever wastes money on the game wins.

This game is horrible. It's completely pay-to-win and supercell even encourages that mindset. The match ups in the game are horrible. My lvl 10 account is constantly going against lvl 13s and lvl 12s, while my other account (lvl 1) is going against lvl 4s, 5s, 6s, and occasionally lvl 7s. The game's algorithms are absolutely horrible. They need to fix match ups and encourage people who AREN'T pay-to-wins otherwise, I see no point in playing when you can't do what the game wants you to do, push.
there are times where I want to delete and never play again but its so addictive
the most rage baited game I ever seen.never play this game. just as about u are going to the next arena some toxic dude with overleveled stuff comes out and defeat you.

I started playing 4 years ago and The biggest problem is is that it's pay to win, the gap between each level is insane. Clash Royale is a great game in the hands of a horrible company. Supercell is the scourge of the app store. Clash royale itself is a good game. The mechanics, controls, and game design is superb. Its sad there isnt another game like it that isnt pay to win. Everything about the game is designed to keep you buying things. The store is constantly updating with new high priced chests for small things. The matchmaking system is designed to make you lose more than you win.

Imagine spending lots of time and money; money to upgrade a card you like and time learning how best to use it. Coming up with a a deck you like and spending more time on each card. Then, because the game makers introduce some new card that they make overpowered so everyone will use it and spend money upgrading it fast, they cripple/nerf the cards you've taken time and money to improve. That's this game all the time. It's frustrating. They let their desire to make money supercede all.
Algorithm makes it impossible to win if you're doing well.

After a while the game becomes unplayable, you are always paired against opponents with card 2 or 3 levels above you. it gets very hard to get cards to level up and there is the problem of always getting countered, somehow the opponents always have the counter to your cards somehow, you win 1 game with your deck and then you are matched with someone whos cards level are higher then you, after a certain time it becomes boring and frustrating to play, I've deleted the game. 👎

I reinstall this game after formatting my device. I receive prompt asking to load my previous progress and after clicking on it and entering details, I didnt receive verification code. After 2 hours, I get mail from supercell that supercell id is not available on this email. My whole progress is lost and I am very disappointed with this. If there is any other way to raise ticket/report, please reply on this review. I will be glad to receive some help regarding this issue.
this game is very good even better on moble, credits to jixsy he showed me this game and inspired me to play it hes the goat and supercell is the goat to

All-around fun, simple and diverse multiplayer game with a lot of content made by an awesome game company, supercell. The game in the beginning was pretty much a pay to win game, but the devs have really done a great job to make it easier, for free to play players to compete against paying players. Awesome game!

This used to be a game that I just played for fun. But lately I have become a better player and am getting to the higher leagues. The only thing setting me back is my luck. But I'm used to it, I do get hardcountered most of the time but it's not anything out of the ordinary. Although today I have gotten 34 hardcounters in a row and counting. To those who are wondering, I am playing mighty miner logbait. While I have won half of them, it's still not good enough to progress to ultimate champion.

Still needs work and a lot of it. supercell is running out of ideas. The new cards are garbage. New game modes are alright. AI is still complete trash. Troops will switch targeting to a different enemy troop before taking out the first target.. Matchmaking is laughable at best. I cant believe this game has so many high ratings.

Last year the company has been constantly teasing ways to get the most money out of the game, despite how it affects to (all) the players. The last update is the result of that teasing applied to almost every aspect of the game, for the absolute worst. Conciously trying to push addiction into players just for money. This game has been in my life for a big part of it, and seeing what has become of it really saddens me. For the sake of my self-respect and my ethics I won't be a part of it anymore
Every game during mid ladder makes me want to die, cards are unbalanced, Pay to win is a big problem, just an addicting torture cycle.

This used to be the very best mobile game on the game store. I had played it since launch and maxed out several cards. The updates over the last 2 years have little by little eroded the fun, with the game becoming more and more predatory and anti-F2P. The death-knell for this game being when they gutted the 2v2 format that casuals loved. Screw this game.

The opponents matching is very annoying and unfair. I've playing this game for so long that it is hard not to notice that there is something behind it. Nice clan wars mode, however the game is so much less fun than it was in the beginning. PS: i kept receiving notification that I should review the game since I have already have. Please fix bugs

2020 meta is incredibly boring. Huge amount of units available in the game but far too many people using the same few units. It makes for really dull defensive tactics followed usually by Hogrider. Valk is a unit that's meant to be good at crowd control but also holds her own against single target units far too well. Just over Clash Royale at this point. Takes too long to max units and it's just not well balanced at the higher levels. 3 year player and I see why so many 1* reviews lately.
very fun, but I am meeting some very swetty players some time
From the 2.6 hog cycle to mid ladder mega night bridge spam. From the pure enjoyment to the crashing out after losing 8 times in a row this game iwas perfect until they add the heroic stuff

the balancing in this game seems to be an after thought in the minds of the developers. Clash is a competitive game but card levels are way too impactful in the current meta and certain cards are just not used. An example is the balloon vs pekka. the balloon hits harder, only goes for towers, moves faster, flies, hits instantly the first time, and is 2 elixer less. the balloon can hit one time and win the game. nerf it
Initially I didn't like the evolution cards but they grew on me. If more than two are used in a deck I think I wouldn't feel the same though. Don't overdo it.

Haven't played in while but just found out that after overtime the weaker tower automatically gets destroyed...I think it should end in a draw like it used to instead of giving the enemy a free win just cause my tower was weaker by a few hp. It's stupid that I put up a good fight to defend my tower just for it to automatically be destroyed in the end, it makes the battle useless it makes overtime useless!

I used to love this game...been playing for 3 years almost,it just saddening to see such a good game become a pay to win shitshow. Also if that wasn't enough,matchmating sucks and then comes the crashes. Also as a bonus Loading times makes sure you lose all your battles.And then out of nowhere,the LAG arrives to put the final nail in the coffin.We don't need so many different modes,quests and this and that...just fix the game please guys,so that at least it becomes playable.

When there isn't a lag, it's ok. Any delay in the run of play seriously affects the outcome. Timing is everything. Then there is the Money grabbing approach supercell has morphed into. It's very difficult to play and not pay. Sad thing is, purchased material really doesn't do itself justice either. Irrelevant charges to get mediocre extras. Was a great game 6 months ago. If it's not broke, don't fix it. They broke it and cant fix it now.

best multiplayer game ever(old review). This was my review 6 years back but now it changed, they changed it. It's the worst game ever. You wanna win, pay fricking money. Used to love this game. Now you can't even play for free. If your deck is bad you can't switch because your card levels won't be high enough to viable use so now you have to pay money. Started playing because my little brother recommended the game and I'm hooked! I started playing while in a restaurant waiting for my food not too long ago and I'm already level 5 and got my daily wins done no sweat! So much fun!!

They made a very bad update and it takes thousands of hours to upgrade now. I have been a Max player and find zero ambition to continue. The upgrades and add ons have significantly raised in price. I need no longer find a reason to support this game. Which is a shame, because I was a beta tester and played it consistently for seven years.

After playing this for 7 years, the game updates now make the gap between F2P and pay to win obscenely obvious and frustrating. The lag for deployment of troop placement and the extremely slow speed of the game now has made this game unplayable. An example of this would be a hog rider or equivalent running half a map attacking a tower when you have placed a counter at the halfway mark. I guess it's time to find an alternative. A bit of a shame to waste 7 years of progression, I'm just 1 voice...

the game is one of the most fun experiences until you wanna play at the high level and supercell just keeps increasing card levels and making it harder and harder for f2p players. Concept and gameplay is great, it really is, but the game is awful now. If you want fair matches, open your wallet and I mean spend a LOT. The game is actively being ruined. I won't quit playing right now, but don't get this game. Unless something major changes this is getting 1 star.

It is obvious that supercell cares more about money than making sure their game is running smoothly. Every recent update gets worse and worse. After 2 years of playing this game, i am just about done with it. If these issues aren't addressed soon, i say boycott Supercell. Good game but going down the drain fast.

Faux offers. You can win up to 35 chests, the last of which holds a legendary in the season tiers without paying for the season pass, which gives you extra rewards. For people who don't buy, however, it is literally impossible to reach that legendary. Once you get past tier 4, you must wait between 8-24 hours so that you can work up to the next tier and next reward. You aren't given enough time to do this unless you buy the season pass which unlocks tiers instantly. Pay to Play.

the money hungry executive that came up with the idea of getting crystals for useless emotes with the left over cards after maxing out a card INSTEAD of wild cards, should get the biggest raise of all time. game sucks its all pay to win now and its no fun now I am stuck on arena 11 with weak cards its luke you have to pay them to get good ones but it sucks its not fun anymore like it used to be so I gave it a 1 star

don't waste your time. it's a pay-to-win kind of game you are stuck in a never-ending Loop of never progressing unless you pay real money. this game starts off very fun and it's a very addicting game but it gets to be ridiculous when you run into people who are either the same level as you or lower with less health on their towers but they somehow still manage to beat you using the same cards you have. there have been multiple times that I have played someone who had a seemingly endless deck.
very fun and relaxing it makes you want to keep playing

Introduction: Clash Royale is a real-time strategy game created by Supercell which was globally released on March 2nd, 2016. Clash Royale is a hybrid of 3 core game concepts, collectible card games, tower defense, and multiplayer online battle arena. The game progresses as players compete against each other in isolated battles which give the players rewards for winning and punishments for losing. A way that game rewards the player is by giving them chests (loot boxes) that contain cards that can be unlocked and upgraded the more the player collects them, these cards can be played in-game during battles. The player is also 'rewarded' by receiving trophies, I say rewarded with quotes because this isn't necessarily a reward but a side effect of winning or losing, these trophies are an indicator of the player's skill level and they are matched against players with a similar trophy count . My Opinion: There are many more things to do in Clash Royale, but what I want to focus on is the core matchmaking battles. I first started playing Clash Royale when I was in 7th grade during its initial release, I still have fond memories of the time, I would talk with my friends at school about getting new cards and we would play against each other in friendly battles. After a while, I stopped playing and completely forgot about it for a few years. About 2 Years ago I saw one of my friends playing Clash Royale which made me remember the good times I had had years ago, so I redownloaded the game and started playing it again I was able to quickly rise in the ranks due to the player base getting better and widening the skill gap between lower ranks, this gave me a sense of gratification that hooked me. It's been 2 years since I started playing again and I still play on a daily basis. I do enjoy the grind of matchmaking and the rewarding feeling I get by outplaying my opponents however I do have one big problem with the game, the Freemium aspect of the game. The game is objectively paid to win up to the max level when players max out the levels of the cards and towers. Players with higher-level cards have an advantage over other players with lower levels since their cards can deal more damage and have more health this makes playing at lower levels very frustrating since you can play much better than another player and still lose just because they are a higher level than you. You can upgrade your cards through the aforementioned chests that you get from winning battles but you can also directly buy them from the shop with in-game currency and paid currency. The frustration that players get from losing to players with higher-level cards drives them to buy cards so that they can become better at the game and have a better chance of winning. This aspect makes it so free to play players have a much harder time playing and leveling up compared to players willing to sink cash into buying more cards which in turn gets them more trophies. This aspect is the only part of the game that I really dislike and wish was never added since the game would be much fairer without it. Despite this feature I will still continue to play the game until I reach a point at which I am at the top 1% of the player base then I will quit and never play again. Conclusion: The game is fun and addicting so if you know you have an addictive personality I wouldn't recommend this game to you, but If you are looking for a fun strategy game that you can play with friends and expand your deck over time, I would recommend this game since I can't find anything better than it. Overall, I'd give this game a 7/10 since I feel like I've learned so much from it and still have a fun time playing it, but the Pay to Win aspect stops me from giving it a better score.

I won't deny that it is a lot of fun but the grind and money required to be truly competitive is rather off putting. On top of that there is wait times for unlocking chests which effectively limits the number of games you play because you don't want to "waste" a chest. For a casual pick up and play to burn three minutes of time once in a while it's a great choice, but if you want to seriously dedicate yourself to it then expect to hand over your bank details.

Had this game for years now. Crazy that they took the turn to paid to win. I've been playing this game since day 1. The pass originally being released was a new big thing, but not too bad, $3.99 at the time. Not only did they up it to $5.99 now, but they also added the 'diamond pass' for $11.99. You get a substantial amount of cards and gold, which are exclusive to the diamond pass. The shop now is another story. The grind aspect is literally gone now. Maybe make the basic pass gem purchasable to make a bit more fair??

Game has algorithms that chooses which deck is counter to your deck and vice versa against other players. Game technically and literally chooses who has an advantage over the other. If the algo is with you, you get an opponent that has a weaker deck. Otherwise, the game gives you an OP opponent and their deck is counter to yours. In the higher ranks, you'll really notice this. It's not random, it's not a game of chance, it's a game of the house and it decides who wins. The house always wins.

The season pass introduced on april 3rd 2023 totally messed up the experience. I just uninstalled the game, have been playing from the very begining, it's a shame that greed ruined what was an entertaining game
good time killer and a ton of fun, but it does make me rage

I've been playing this game for the past 3 years. The game constantly looks to update and develop which is great! However, the 1v1 battles have recently become a joke. One game you'll get a decent match up against a similar level player e.g. Lvl 12 with a mix of lvl 11, 12 cards, the next you'll get someone who's lvl 13 with maxed out cards and a complete mismatch. This area of the game needs addressing as players like myself get disorientated with 1v1 battles.

The latest update has absolutely ruined the game for me. It's garbage when you're forced to play a game a certain way. You are the developer, not the player. You make the game, and we enjoy it whatever way makes us happy. I played clash of clans from the beginning, then super cell broke it. Initially this game was fun and it felt like free to play players had a fair chance. But its not like that anymore. The latest addition of the pass is just one big money grab. The mini events kept me excited but now they are all messed up. Because people who buy the pass quit and leave the second they feel like they are falling behind.. they don't care they have endless lives anyway.. hell some just left the match intentionally so free to play players like me get a free loss.

Nice Supercell 👍 Added a new season with a whole brand new card that can't even be played for f2p players unless you spend $40 depending on where you live. The only way to play the new cards is through spending 10 or 100 gems for the classic or grand challenges. Removed Chest which is a big part of the whole game to progress, but now if you just installed the game you can't unlock the 8th card. Then nerfing the pass for people who pay for the pass, making the progression a lot more difficult.

Clash royale has been a balanced game for most of its lifetime now, with occasional spending necessary to truly dive into it. However, since the arrival of evolutions(2023), the power creep has exponentially grown. The next update will even double that; an additional level and a stronger form of evolutions. The entire community is against it. Clash Royale made tons of money the last years, but they're now ruining the game to make more while there was still so much more to gain from evo's only...
Finally time to delete this trash game...such a shame seeing this game lose its spark because of money hungry devs.

Very good game and very fun and entertaining, there isn't really any bugs but my one problem is that I feel like they put you in a match where the guy has 2 more king tower levels higher than you, it doesn't seem fair imo, I get that they might not want to make players progress too fast but I feel like it'll still bum out some players like me

Edit: rating this now a one star. Originally a 3. Designed for you to be countered and to lose 80% of the time. Has a fun aspect. Other than that, just is frustrating. Seems less random and more opponents that "happen to" counter your deck. On top of that, there are many instances where your opponent is able to pull off cards that are high price back to back to back in a matter of seconds. Crazy. Overall, pretty cool game that helps you get frustrated with hopes of you spending money.

I've been playing for about 4-5 years. A level of difference in cards makes the game entirely unbalanced. It is unfair to play against and unsatisfying with, because you may have only won because of the strength of your cards, not the skill and strategy of the player. 4-5 years I've been playing, I have yet to own anycards to max level. As i would rather vary my playstyle instead of funnel my resources into a one deck. The games mechanic to keep players playing. Gave me a negative experience.

So begin, I've played this way before many of its QOL updates, and stopped playing since then. I re-downloaded the game, just to try and have fun with it, and I specially do not recommend it! Card balance DO NOT exist for some cards, making some of them completely useless in terms of meta. To make the experience worse, Evo cards and champions are added, which completely ruins the game for newbies and returners. Unless you're willing to fork over money, I don't recommend Clash Royale at all!

I've played a lot of this game. While it may be fun at a base level at this point the game is nosediving straight into the ground in terms of pay to win and terrible development decisions. They just crank out terrible update after terrible update where the obvious motive is not to make the game better but to make more money. They also increase the level cap sporadically, which means even if you're maxed eventually they'll ask for more. Don't play it.

Backwards balancing. They have the side games lvl and balanced at 11 across the board but their ranked is pay to win.. I have lvl 12 and every other match I play is against lvl 14 and the levels are slow to get and very time consuming so the only way to catch up is to pay real money to catch up... not a small amount.. atleast not for the average person.. don't play this game unless you got the extra cash!!

I previously had a 5 star review, but within the past 2 months I had some second thoughts. This game is amazing and very fun with strategy but in a different way, and it's extremely competitive. The main reason that I changed my review from 5 star to 2 star is because of matchmaking, when and if you get to arena 13 you are paired with other players who counter you completely. The next reason I chose to change my review is becose as you get more trophies the game becomes pay to win.
I've played this game off and on for a year im at arena 10 I was 1 win away from arean 11 and I lost 6 games in a row because of the game glitch ing out and kicking me out of it very aggravating

Gets worse every update... been playing since day 1 and the matchmaking and lagging into games is now absolutely terrible. this game is so bad and so good at the same time when I three crown someone I feel good but when I lose I rage

The game is a fraud because it is advertised as a strategy game when it is ridiculously dependant on spending money if you wanna have decent wins, the matches are supposed to be based on who uses their cards better "having the same amount of elixir availability, but it doesn't take a genius to notice that doesn't happen, those who don't pay some money to win can clearly use less elixir during a match.

What starts off as fun soon turns into a frustrating mess, this game brings you in with its recognisable Clash of Clans art style and card based gameplay and then slaps you in the face with its microtransactions and unfair matchmaking. The moment I spent any money in the game, I immediately experienced the sunk cost fallacy as i started forcing myself to play on a daily basis even when i was tired of the game. Not even the recent "Evolution" update could keep me playing.
I LOVE clash royale, it's personally gotten me back into gambling because of the star drops, and I've put the 2nd mortgage on my house to keep up with these gemmers.

I love this game I play it all the time, but there are obscenely huge flaws in the game I've had fun playing I've even bought two season passes, but the negatives in this game highly out weight the positives. Wanna waste time playing against people/bots who out level you. Well, you found the right game. From the developers of classics such as town hall leveler and rng fight sim, you can rise up the ranks to constantly face opponents who out level you.

Some pay-to-win and rigged matchmaking have always been a part of this game, but by now these aspects have been ramped up to all-time highs. It's rock, paper, scissors, except you must FIRST make your choice, and AFTER that the algorithm decides what you're up against. Skill decides maybe 10-20% of the game, and the rest is how much money you spend on upgrades, and what the matchmaker decides to pit against you. Free-to-play and low-roller players have been virtually squeezed out of competition.

In 2026, Clash Royale is a paradox. The 3-minute duels and new "Heroic" cards are as addictive as ever, and a recent creator-led surge has doubled the player base. However, the move to Level 16 and "double evolutions" has made the pay-to-win gap feel like a canyon. Matchmaking often pits you against over-leveled whales, making the ladder climb feel hopeless for F2P players. It’s still the best mobile battler, but the monetization is slowly suffocating the fun.

The game is fun I've have been playing this game since i was a child but throughout the years supercell have been making their games pay to win that that really takes the fun out of the game for me "maybe for others too" because you could have been grinding for a lone time to reach were you are just for someone else to reach were you are by jusy spending money and not actually playing the game and i feel that ain't fair for others like me.

This game is so fun. I love it. but I did lose my account and have to restart when I was like 6 but now I've relapsed and im having a great time for sure. thank you supercell

I've been playing Clash Royale for years, but the game has become a shell of its former self. The constant push for monetization has turned it into a pay-to-win nightmare. The fun features that made the game engaging have been stripped away, leaving only frustration.Getting two evolution slots is now a Herculean task, and upgrading to level 15 feels like an insurmountable challenge. The game's design seems to actively discourage progression, instead encouraging players to spend money.
Kind of pay to win and has a lot of bugs but overall fantastic game and clan chat can get a little suggestive at time
playing this game over 8 years now. i am free to player now this update just killed me. hate this game .. after 8 years playing this game i am deleting the game .
a really good game. don't see any issues with it other than it's not the best at being beginner friendly, but the tutorial still does what it needs to do.

I've been playing for around 8 years, and i can honestly say, dont play this game. What starts as a great game quickly turns into a pay to play/win. You will think you have a good set up, you will get 1 trophy away from the next arena. The game just became a bad money-grabber over the last few years. I got signed out of my Supercell account. the only way to log in is to put in a verification code sent to your email, but they won't send me the email. There's no help offered within the app. So I thought I'd leave a bad review to catch some attention to the matter and not be locked out of my account forever. If I'm helped, I'll go back and change this to the 5-star it deserves

One of the things that steered me away from online games was the insidious trend of busting packs in every game under the sun for game progression. Since this year I ran out of interesting enough big budget offline games to play, I decided to log back into clash royale which was my favorite game in high school, and man this game has also become the busting packs version of the supercell games. The game is still interesting, but you need to spend money for progression, which is a shame.

I've been playing for almost 10 years now and if you're looking for a highly skilled competitive game this is for you since it offer's different strategies and requires quick thinking, but the problem is when it comes to the game if you have not spent at least 20-40 dollars in diamond passes you will struggle A LOT due to the amount of rewards and how much it actually progresses players. Other than that the game is a 4/5 in my opinion.

The magical tactics part is completely algorithm based its not in our control. Irrespective of the level or the stars of the cards the game will let you will or lose the battle. Even after getting hit it will increase the health of cards if it wants you to lose. if both the opponents have same card it will make the ones hit faster and the others slower if it wants to make you lose. waste part of the game. It just wants players to be online. waste of time uninstalling this game

I enjoyed the game more when I first started playing 9 yrs ago. Now, it has too much going on, cards are next to impossible to level unless you're paying rl cash, and while I'm playing against tower levels the same as mine their cards are over powered due to the now pay to win mechanics. Developers are updating the game to oblivion.

Once an absolute masterpiece has now been sucked bone-dry of any joy or passion. Clash Royale was always gonna be a game that wouldn't be peaking forever, but it's clear the game has been on life support for quite some time now. Constant new Pay2Win features mean that anything added or tweaked either overpowers everything or is utterly useless every week. I'd say I appreciate the continuous experimentation if they were actually unique and cool additions instead of painfully obvious cashgrabs.

Nope yeah dead game. I officially give up and never coming back. Adding more levels so people spend is wild and completely stupid to be fair but you guys are used to this so I'm not surprised. The addition of what you guys called heroes was unnecessarily... say with me now stupid. So there's no value to this so called game if that's what you guys want to call it. It overall became an overwhelming casino where the ones who spend more win and I'm not for that. Hopefully the game ends this year.

It is, overall an excellent game that reminds me of chess a lot. Whether it be how you plan your attacks and defenses, or managing Elixer, card synergy and deck building. The main issue I have is, that it is at the end a Pay To Win game, especially mid ladder, as an F2P player, it really sucks having to fight cards way higher level than mine. So I mostly play the game with my friends and family now.

There is too much network in this game due to which I get very angry. My phone has full network and full internet. Still I was winning while playing the match and suddenly the game crashes for 10 seconds and I lose. And this happens 4-5 times in a day. This is not right. Now I am deleting the game. Until this problem is fixed I will not play this game.

Pay to win. matchmaking so bad it helps paying players. Internet connection issues. Game mechanics work at random. Creativity is NOT advised as any deck except "The 6 Meta Decks" is just guaranteeing you'll lose. Overpriced in game purchases. Takes 10 years to achieve lvl 13 cards normally. Level 14 takes twice as long, and forget about 15. Only players left are more toxic than the alcohol keeping me sane. However, the gameplay is pretty fun. But i'm pretty sure cocain is less addicting.

I've played this game since it comes out, and the only consistent thing about it is that whoever spends the most money wins 90% of the time. when my pekka gets fully countered by 1 elixir skeletons, there's nothing you can do to win. If you like being a whale and bringing people to deleteing the game, then this is a good game

This game has fallen from grace so hard. F2P players are in a state of limbo, in the way they're unable to progress in the game by any shape or form because this game caters more to P2W players. It is BAFFLING the amount of micro transactions there is. Imagine having to pay money just so you can compete with others. Do better devs.

This game stopped being fun after they hard pushed pay to win into the mix, you can get to the midgame without putting some money into the game but let me tell you. The current state of Competitive Yu-Gi-Oh is easier to play through than this. Unless this is the only game you plan to pay to grind harder than a Warframe player grinding for platinum when a new frame drops, don't look at this game.

Worst game I've ever played. Once your done in the bot lobbies have fun winning more then one match a day the matchmaking will put you against the most obvious hard counters possible and to make it better they just continue to ruin what was a good game with removing the only way to get gold so unless you plan on spending lots of money to level anything up I suggest finding a different game if I could give this awful game less stars I would. -10/10 do NOT recommend

Honestly a great game... if you have money. This game just heavily heavily encourages pay to win mentality because if you're f2p you'll be at a huge disadvantage every single match. This makes for a very frustrating and repetitive experience where some matches are lost from the beginning purely due to money difference. Great game though.

First off, when I came back I saw these loot boxes. now they are chests and that you have to tap and I quite like that idea and the game has purchase items that can help you upgrade your cards faster or get gold or whatever that's fine and all but don't for the love of God have an emote that is locked behind where you have to pay for it. I do not like that. I would prefer to get it through other means. easier means. It's gotten a little better but I'm above 9,000 trophies so I have no say

This game used to be phenomenal. Great graphics and smooth gameplay. Unfortunately, the game developers have chosen a more "Pay to Win" style, and gameplay shows. You work to upgrade cards in a deck and then battle other players' decks. If you're good, you'll level up quick and the rewards are aplenty. Unfortunately, no matter what you will find yourself at a skill cap where only those who spend $$$ get to progress, the infamous "Mid-Ladder". Be prepared for an experience full of highs and lows.

Finding a fair opponent in this game is nearly impossible. The matchmaking feels completely unbalanced, as if it’s deliberately set up against the player. No matter which deck you choose, the counter lineup appears instantly. I’ve decided to uninstall the game because of this lack of balance in matchmaking. It feels like playing is pointless, and honestly, it’s just a waste of time.Matchup❌️ 💩💩✅️

The game used to be so good but now it feels really frustrating. I totally lost interest in the game. Uninstalled. Disappointed.

game is good. you will never leave if yo get hang of it. every player who comes for an opponent is a closer level to mine. but the problem is those pay 2 win players in the same level as I am, crushing the match in a second. I hope it would be possible to play matchs only with the same level AND the same type of players as I am.

was a really fun game and great idea, hadn't played in a few years, came back to being grossly out gunned and to find it this game as become all about money and not at all about the users, 100% pay to win, or if you have the ability to not work or sleep and do nothing but play this game you might be able to keep up. would give 0 stars of possible. 10/10 would not recommend, unbalanced, no fun, no consequences for those who derank in order to take advantage of lower level players. uninstall

This game is good, don't get me wrong, but the fact that you fight people with units five teirs ahead of you is insane for multiple days I was put up against people with units from multiple tiers ahead of me every time I got close or made to the next area. Cant even enter the game its stuck at 75% on updating and after hours of trying different ways to fix the problem it didn't work so instead of trying to play this on my PC I tried on my phone once I got in after a month of playing I figured out the game is super pay to win either you pay or lose. do not recommend unless you have a bunch of money willing to spend or a couple years of consistant playing just to be as good as or worse than a play to win player.

You will play with ai bots on trophy road it's obvious with the player name and their gameplay and when you get to higher trophy you will be matched with higher tower levels and card levels. You get a good match and then next game a total mismatch and get crushed by a player with high level cards and tower. Obviously it's a pay to win game. If you're planning to play it for free you'll just be stuck somewhere because of imbalance mismatches.

I used to love the game so much which is why I give it four stars. It now has some pay to win advantages which sucks. The game was extremely fun and still is honest but a lot of the times I'm playing against people who started the game 3 years ago and have more lvl 15 cards and better cards leveled up compared to me. The gold also sucked it's almost impossible to get enough to upgrade the cards. I'm sitting at 9811 trophies and only have two lvl 15's but everyone I play has atleast six.

Used to enjoy this game alot. Everyone I knew played this game but over time everyone has left due to the pay to win experience. You simply end up in a loophole of winning a game, then loosing to an over leveled player 2 or 3 times. The only way I can see myself having any fun on this game is if I invest lots of money. You can no longer climb the ladder at a normal pace once you start reaching mid ladder. Don't reccommend.

I love what this game used to be. Overall great game, no bloatware and no ads. greatest mobile game of all time. however this game is pay to progress, the game intentionally matches you with hard counters and pass royale players so you dont win, get frustrated and buy their microtransactions. overall 1/5. love the concept but it's impossible to progress without swiping your credit card. I'd rather watch ads but have a playable game then an unplayable game with no ads.

game is unplayable without paying to win, it's fine in the beginning, but eventually, you hit a wall that you can not pass without dishing out truckloads of money. You eventually get matched against unbelievably bad players with even more unbelievably high-level decks that will stomp you just purely on stats no matter how well you play.

It's too much frustrating for free to player. In my last 30 match i face 26 defeat. No matter what kind of deck i choose it will be ending at loosing. But currently the match up they make for free to player is unbelievably frustrating. I think they should change their match making strategy or they will loos a lot of free to player.

Ladder matchmaking is straight up the worst thing ever created. if the game can't find an even match it will put you in an unwinnable matchup. The game has devolved into wallet wars. Want to try a new deck? Gotta spend money to level the cards up or else you stand 0 chance. Accidentally play too well and climb too high? Sorry you're underleveled you aren't winning, but you can go to our store and buy your way to "skill"

This game is not only pay to win, it's also pay to play. edited from 1 star to 4 start and now to 2 : this game is in much better shape than it was a few years ago. better rewards, not much shortage of coins, but getting legendaries is still pretty hard and same goes for other rarity cards, you just feel like progression is pay walled, you can never play the deck type you like in trophy road, tbh it sucks, now they plan to add new levels and things are only gonna get worse

Prime example of pay to win. I wanted to try it again after years since they updated it so much, and I can see why. You hit walls where you can't progress without buying some of their packs, if you don't you will be placed against people who have much higher leveled soldiers since you can only level them from cards you receive through chests.

The game has become completely monotonous. Ever since balance changes were taken away there is very limited card use. I tried it again. 4 years later, the game has gotten somehow worse. They add cards, but it's the same 5-6 decks over and over again. I'm always shocked when my opponent is using Evo mega knight and Evo firecracker.. or they drop their lumberjack followed by balloon at the bridge. It took 17 days for me to find the game unbearable... again

I come back from time to time, and it's still a cash grab game. It's fun, but at the same time the players can be atrocious to play against in that they BM constantly through the emotes. By setting you up against opponents that have decks that hard counter whatever you have, regardless of whether you swap decks.

the community is very toxic, and whoever spends the most money on the game is the "best". Most p2w game I've ever played and honestly I would never recommend this game to anyone. Another pay to win BS game. completely addicted to this game. Supercell is pretty money hungry, and I've only spent like $5 on this game it was for emotes. I used to love Clash Royale, but it’s become frustrating to play. The matchmaking feels completely unfair, pay-to-win cards dominate, and updates don’t fix the real problems. Progressing without spending money takes forever, and the fun, balanced gameplay it once had is gone. Really disappointing from a game that used to be great.

Dogshit game that is pay to win no matter where you are in the game. returner experience sucks. This game is simply unplayable if you go free-to-play after a certain amount of time. pay to win, that's it. if you dont pay, you ain't winning. the game likes to give out wins to people who give money. When you play it in the first stages it is good and it is fun but when you go up the ranks you will see a lot of pay to win players,they have characters that cannot be unlocked yet in the stage but they have it and they have so much leveled up and Evo characters it is frustrating to play with players like that, but the game is fun.

No other game I play: mobile, console, or PC has the connectivity issues this one has. It feels like 1/3rd of my losses are due to losing connection and I have 1 gb/second internet (very good). I'd advise you to stay away unless you're looking for blanket frustration and pay-to-win mechanics.

Played for six years. You use to be able to get away being a level or two under with good tactics. Want to f4p? impossible. Want to spend money? make sure you have disposable income. After you spend half your wage to "catch up" you will not enjoy playing. It becomes boring.

the game crashes to not pay out. had 29 chests from last season. opened maybe 7, game forced restart for "update" came back opened 12 and ran out. i had a lot of fun at first but as you progress every player pays money for the game and it is impossible to win as players just pay and their towers and cards destroy yours as they are só over levelled and it is no fun for players who cant pay for the game. you can sit there and play for 3 hours straight and lose progress as it is virtually impossible and unfair when you play against players who pay a lot of money for the game
I live this game ever since I came back after 3 years. It's truly addictive and fun 10/10

this game is genuinely impossible to play at low tier, for example, occasionally you get a easy player to go up against, most of the time, you go up against players that have over leveled cards use broken/unbeatable cards and can't counter them without being in higher tier, genuinely the worst mobile game that I've ever played.

Do NOT install this game unless you enjoy spending insane amounts of money on a mobile game just to compete w/others, at a certain point you will not be able to progress since it takes ages to level a card and all your opponents have higher levels than you, and dont get me started on clan wars, it's pay wars, everyone there is max level, no point in playing this game, i suggest just watching YouTubers who are are p2w play the game, that's the only way to get enjoyment out of this game for free

This was one of my favorite games to play for many years but several issues have caused me to quit. The trade system is broken after recent update. In a clan with many near max players trading used to be common. We would even trade for cards we don't want just to help each other. Trades used to last about one hour in chat. After the update next to no one will trade except for cards they need. We now have 41 trade offers available that no one will accept because they don't want to use a trade token. An easy fix would be to remove the requirement of needed a trade token to accept trades. Another major issue is you can over-level your cards. By focus only on upgrading your deck you can be a level 10 with level 13 commons. This can break balance as they will face level 10s with level 10 commons and destroy them. The easy way to fix this would be to cap card levels at their king level. Of course with an exception for the first two or three card levels. I do hope you take these issues and possible fixes into consideration. If these changes are made then this game could become a fantastic game with much less frustration involved. Thank you for your time, Gizmoman64

The game is totally fair, as all players can get the same cards and create the same 'decks', but in an advanced form of Rock, Paper, Scissors there is no real 'best deck'. Some cards use more elixir points, meaning they are more powerful at a greater cost per play, so you have to select 8 cards and then decide when and where to play them in combination, depending largely on how your opponent plays and what cards you are against. Will your opponent have a Rock, or Paper deck to your Scissors?

READ RECENT REVIEWS. TOTAL RATING IS NOT ACCURATE. I've spent money on this game to see if it makes a difference and it does but very marginally. It's basically statistically impossible to get level 15 cards unless you cough up about $60. If your entire collection is level 14, it takes the equivalent of 400,000 common cards to get a level 15 deck. If only your main deck is level 14, it takes millions. An 8-hour gold chest drops about 85 common cards worth. If you do the math, it takes literal years to get to a competitive level. You could always avoid the trophy mode, but this also affects clan war battles. It just isn't worth it.

I've been playing CR for 9 years, and I finally hit the uninstall button. Clash is VERY pay to win. As a new player, you can't progress unless you drop $50 on evolutions & the battle pass. What used to be a balanced & fun mobile game, is now one of the most predatory, greedy franchises in mobile gaming. I do NOT recommend.

Okay, this game is good. It's a great game. But at this point, it's just impossible to play for fun, or trophy pushing. You have all these players that haven't even been playing for a year and already have max leveled cards. The outcome of a game doesn't even rely on skill anymore, that's whats really sad. You have all these mommy's boys who use her credit card to max out everything, just play classic decks and win. They don't even need to think. They just wait until double elixir to spam. This is really only in higher ranks though, or in the new clan wars. Like I said, the game is really great, but don't download if you're trying to have fun. Unless you actually played a lot and have upgraded your cards on your own, or you have mommy and daddy's credit card, you won't have fun in higher leagues or clan wars. And trust me, I'm no noob. I've played since 2017, and have reached 5300 trophies. I pushed when the game actually required skill.

Not sure if this is inability to make the game better or it's just the highlight of the modern era: profits, profits, profits...

The fundamental game mechanic was revolutionary back in 2016: Supercell had made a truly exceptional game. As is the norm with non-indie studios though, greed ultimately consumed it. From 'adding new levels and down-valuing current ones' type of updates aimed at boosting engagement, to LoL-inspired new character policy (making it too strong so that people will pay to upgrade it), all the way to battle passes' greed has made it clear that supercell wants your money, not your happiness. Run away!

very pay-to-win and not cheap either. Yes it's free to play up to a certain point. Evo cards aka Evolutions are upgrades for your card that significantly improve the stats and abilities. Once you get around 6000+ trophies, even at lower trophies, you'll begin to encounter more pay-to-win players. Supercell is a greedy bunch.

CLASH ROYALE: LEGACY WARS Concept: A New Game Mode + Content Update to Celebrate 8 Years of Clash Royale This update aims to honor the game’s history while adding fresh strategic depth, bringing back fan-favorite elements and introducing new ways to play.   CORE NEW MODE: LEGACY WARS Format: 2v2 or 1v1 Progressive Match – matches span 3 "Eras" of Clash Royale history, each with unique rules and card pools. - Era 1: The Beginning (2016–2017) - Card pool limited to the original 42 card
